1:7.t: Siraatal lazeena an'amta 'alaihim ghayril maghdoobi 'alaihim wa-lad daaalleen

2:2.t: Zaalikal Kitaabu laa raib'a, feeh'i, hudal lilmuttaqeen

2:3.t: Allazeena yu'minoona bilghaibi wa-yuqeemoonas salaata wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

2:4.t: Wallazeena yu'minoona bimaaa unzila ilaika wa-maaa unzila min qablika wa-bil-Aakhirati hum yooqinoon

2:5.t: Ulaaa'ika 'alaa hudam mir rabbihim; wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

2:6.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo sawaaa'un 'alaihim 'a-anzar-tahum am lam tunzirhum laa yu'minoon

2:7.t: Khatamal laahu 'alaa quloobihim wa-'alaa sam'i-him; wa-'alaaaa absaarihim ghishaa-wa(tunw); wa-lahum 'azaabun 'azeem

2:8.t: Wa-minan naasi mainy yaqoolu aamannaa billaahi wa-bil-yawmil aakhiri wa-maa hum bimu'mineen

2:9.t: Yukhaadi'oonal laaha wallazeena aamanoo wa-maa yakhda'oona illaaa anfusahum wa-maa yash'uroon

2:10.t: Fee quloobihim mara-dun fazaadahumul laahu maradaa(n); wa-lahum 'azaabun aleemum bimaa kaanoo yakziboon

2:11.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahum laa tufsidoo fil ardi qaalooo innamaa nahnu muslihoon

2:12.t: Alaaa innahum humul mufsidoona wa-laakil laa yash'uroon

2:13.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahum aaminoo kamaaa aamanan naasu qaalooo anu'minu kamaaa aamanas sufahaaa'(u): alaaa innahum humus sufahaaa'u wa-laakil laa ya'lamoon

2:14.t: Wa-izaa laqul lazeena aamanoo qaalooo aamannaa wa-izaa khalaw ilaa shayaateenihim qaalooo innaa ma'akum innamaa nahnu mustahzi'oon

2:15.t: Allahu yastahzi'u bihim wa-yamudduhum fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon

2:16.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeenash tara-wud dalaalata bilhudaa famaa rabihat tijaaratuhum wa-maa kaanoo muhtadeen

2:17.t: Masaluhum kamasalil lazis tawqada naaran falammaaa adaaa'at maa hawlahoo zahabal laahu binoorihim wa-tarakahum fee zulumaatil laa yubsiroon

2:19.t: Aw kasaiyibim minas samaaa'i feehi zulumaatunw wa-ra'dunw wa-barq(unwi) yaj'aloona asaabi'ahum feee aazaanihim minas sawaa'iqi hazaral mawt,(i) wallaahu muheetum bilkaafireen

2:20.t: Yakaadul barqu yakhtafu absaarahum; kullamaaa adaaa'a lahum mashaw feehi wa-izaaa azlama 'alaihim qaamoo, wa-law shaaa'al laahu lazahaba bisam'ihim wa-absaarihim, innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

2:21.t: Yaaa-aiyuhan naasu 'budoo Rabbakumul lazee khalaqakum wallazeena min qablikum la'allakum tattaqoon

2:22.t: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda firaashanw wassamaaa'a binaaa'a(nw) wa-anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-akhraja bihee minas samaraati rizqal lakum; falaa taj'aloo lillaahi andaadan wa-antum ta'lamoon

2:23.t: Wa-in kuntum fee raibim mimmaa nazzalnaa 'alaa 'abdinaa fatoo bi-sooratim mim mislihee- wad'oo shuhadaaa'akum min doonil laahi in kuntum saadiqeen

2:24.t: Fa-il lam taf'aloo wa-lan taf'aloo fattaqun naaral latee waqooduhan naasu walhijaara(tu); u'iddat lil-kaafireen

2:25.t: Wa-bashshiril lazeena aamanoo wa-'amilus saalihaati anna lahum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaar(u); kullamaa ruziqoo minhaa min samaratin rizqan qaaloo haazal lazee ruziqnaa min qabl(u); wa-utoo bihee mutashaabihaa(n); wa-lahum feehaaa azwaajum mutahhara-tu(nw); wa-hum feehaa khaalidoon

2:26.t: ^Innal laaha laa yastahyee-e ai yadriba masalam maa ba'oodatan famaa fawqahaa, faammal lazeena aamanoo faya'lamoona annahul haqqu mir rabbihim; wa-ammal lazeena kafaroo fayaqooloona maazaaa araadal laahu bihaazaa masalaa. Yudillu bihee- kaseeranw wa-yahdee bihee kaseeraaâ€™n wa-maa yudillu bihee-e illal faasiqeen

2:27.t: Allazeena yanqudoona 'ahdal laahi mim ba'di meesaaqihee wa-yaqta'oona maaa amaral laahu bihee-e ai yoosala wa-yufsidoona fil ard,(i) ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

2:28.t: Kaifa takfuroona billaahi wa-kuntum amwaatan fa-ahyaakum; summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum summaa ilaihi turja'oon

2:29.t: Huwal lazee khalaqa lakum maa fil ardi jamee'an summas tawaaa ilas samaaa'i fasaw-waahunna sab'a samaa-waat,(in) wa-Huwa bikulli shai'in Aleem

2:30.t: Wa-iz qaala rabbuka lil malaaa'ikati innee jaa'ilun fil-ardi khaleefa(tan); qaalooo ataj'alu feehaa mai yufsidu feehaa wa-yasfikud dimaaa'a wa-nahnu nusabbihu bihamdika wa-nuqaddisu lak(a); qaala inneee a'lamu maa laa ta'lamoon

2:31.t: Wa-'allama Aadamal asmaaa'a kullahaa summa 'aradahum 'alal malaaa'ikati faqaala ambi'oonee bi-as maaa'i haaa'ulaaa'i in-kuntum saadiqeen

2:32.t: Qaaloo subhaanaka laa 'ilma lanaaa illaa maa 'allamtanaaa; innaka antal 'aleemul hakeem

2:33.t: Qaala yaaa-Aadamu ambi'hum biasmaaa'ihim; falammaa amba-ahum bi-asmaaa'ihim qaala alam aqul lakum inneee a'lamu ghaibas samaawaati wal-ardi wa-a'lamu maa tubdoona wa-maa kuntum taktumoon

2:34.t: Wa-iz qulnaa lilmalaaa'i-katis judoo li-aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa abaa wastakbara wa-kaana minal kaafireen

2:35.t: Wa-qulnaa yaaa Aadamus-kun anta wa-zawjukal jannata wa-kulaa minhaa raghadan haisu shi'tumaa wa-laa taqrabaa haazihish shajarata fatakoonaa minaz zaalimeen

2:36.t: Fa-azallahumash Shaitaanu 'anhaa fa-akhrajahumaa mimmaa kaanaa feeh(i); wa-qulnah bitoo ba'dukum liba'din 'aduw(wunw); wa-lakum fil ardi mustaqarrunw wa-mataa'un ilaa heen

2:37.t: Fatalaqqaaa Aadamu mir Rabbihee Kalimaatin fataaba 'alaihi, innahoo Huwat Tawwaabur Raheem

2:38.t: Qulnah bitoo minhaa jamee-'a(n); fa-immaa ya'tiyannakum minnee huda(n) faman tabi'a hudaaya falaa khawfun 'alaihim wa-laa hum yahza-noon

2:39.t: Wallazeena kafaroo wa-kaz-zabooo bi-aayaatinaa ulaaa'ika As-haabun Naar(i); hum feehaa khaalidoon

2:40.t: Yaa-Baneee Israaa'eelaz kuroo ni'matiyal lateee an'amtu 'alaikum wa-awfoo bi'Ahdeee oofi bi-ahdikum wa-iyyaaya farhaboon

2:41.t: Wa-aaminoo bimaaa anzaltu musaddiqal limaa ma'akum wa-laa takoonooo awwala kaafirim bih(ee);- wa-laa tashtaroo bi-Aayaatee samanan qaleelanw wa-iyyaaya fattaqoon

2:42.t: Wa-laa talbisul haqqa bilbaatili wa-taktumul haqqa wa-antum ta'lamoon

2:43.t: Wa-aqeemus salaata wa-aatuz zakaata warka'oo ma'ar raaki'een

2:44.t: ^Ataamuroonan naasa bilbirri wa-tansawna anfusakum wa-antum tatloonal Kitaab,(a) afalaa ta'qiloon

2:45.t: Wasta'eenoo bissabri was-Salaah,(ti) wa-innahaa lakabee-ratun illaa alal khaashi'een

2:46.t: Allazeena yazunnoona annahum mulaaqoo Rabbihim wa-annahum ilaihi raaji'oon

2:47.t: Yaa-Baneee Israaa'eelaz kuroo ni'matiyal lateee an'amtu 'alaikum wa-annee faddaltukum 'alal 'aalameen

2:48.t: Wattaqoo Yawmal laa tajzee nafsun 'an nafsin shai'a(nw) wa-laa yuqbalu minhaa shafaa'atunw wa-laa yu'khazu minhaa 'adlunw wa-laa hum yunsaroon

2:49.t: Wa-iz najjainaakum min Aali Fir'awna yasoomoonakum sooo'al azaabi yuzabbihoona abnaaa'akum wa-yastahyoona nisaaa'akum, wa-fee zaalikum balaaa'um mir Rabbikum 'azeem

2:50.t: Wa-iz faraqnaa bikumul bahra fa-anjainaakum wa-agh-raqnaaa Aala Fir'awna wa-antum tanzuroon

2:51.t: Wa-iz waa'adnaa Moosaaa arba'eena lailatan summat takhaztumul 'ijla mim ba'dihee wa-antum zaalimoon

2:52.t: Summa 'afawnaa 'ankum mim ba'di zaalika la'allakum tashkuroon

2:53.t: Wa-iz aatainaa Moosal kitaaba wal-Furqaana la'allakum tahtadoon

2:54.t: Wa-iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihee- yaa-qawmi innakum zalamtum anfusakum bittikhaa-zikumul 'ijla fatoobooo ilaa Baari'ikum faqtulooo anfusakum zaalikum khairul lakum 'inda Baari'ikum fataaba 'alaikum, innahoo Huwat Tawwaabur Raheem

2:55.t: Wa-iz qultum yaa-Moosaa lan nu'mina laka hattaa naral laaha jahratan fa-akhazat-kumus saa'iqatu wa-antum tanzuroon

2:56.t: Summa ba'asnaakum mim ba'di mawtikum la'allakum tashkuroon

2:57.t: Wa-zallalnaa 'alaikumul ghamaama wa-anzalnaa 'alaikumul Manna was-Salwaa; kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum; wa-maa zalamoonaa wa-laakin kaanooo anfusahum yazlimoon

2:58.t: Wa-iz qulnad khuloo haazihil qaryata fakuloo minhaa haisu shi'tum raghadanw wadkhulul baaba sujjadanw wa-qooloo hittatun naghfir lakum khataayaakum, wa-sanazeedul muhsineen

2:59.t: Fabaddalal lazeena zalamoo qawlan ghairal lazee qeela lahum fa-anzalnaa 'alal lazeena zalamoo rijzam minas samaaa'i bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon

2:60.t: ^Wa-izis tasqaa Moosaa liqawmihee faqulnad rib bi'asaakal hajar(a); fanfajarat minhusnataaa 'ashrata 'ayna(n); qad 'alima kullu unaasim mash-rabahum; kuloo washraboo mir rizqil laahi wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

2:61.t: Wa-iz qultum yaa-Moosaa lan nasbira 'alaa ta'aaminw waahidin fad'u lanaa rabbaka yukhrij lanaa mimmaa tumbitul ardu mim baqlihaa wa-qis-saaa'ihaa wa-foomihaa wa-'adasihaa wa-basalihaa; qaala atastabdiloonal lazee huwa adnaa billazee huwa khayr, ihbitoo misran fa-inna lakum maa sa-altum: wa-duribat 'alaihimuz zillatu walmaskanatu wa-baaa'oo bighadabim minal laah:(i) zaalika bi-annahum kaano yakfuroona bi-aayaatil laahi wa-yaqtuloonan Nabiyyeena bighairil haqq:(i) zaalika bimaa 'asaw wa-kaanoo ya'tadoon

2:62.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo wallazeena haadoo wan-nasaaraa was-Saabi'eena man aamana billaahi wal-yawmil aakhiri wa-'amila saalihan falahum ajruhum 'inda Rabbihim wa-laa khawfun 'alaihim wa-laa hum yahzanoon

2:63.t: Wa-iz akhaznaa meesaaqakum wa-rafa'naa fawqakumut Toora khuzoo maaa aatainaakum biquwwatinw wazkuroo maa feehi la'allakum tattaqoon

2:64.t: Summa tawallaitum mim ba'di zaalik(a); falawlaa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa-rahmatuhoo lakuntum minal khaasireen

2:65.t: Wa-laqad 'alimtumul lazeena' -tadaw minkum fis Sabti faqulnaa lahum koonoo qiradatan khaasi'een

2:66.t: Faja'alnaahaa nakaalal limaa baina yadihaa wa-maa khalfahaa wa-maw'izatal lilmuttaqeen

2:67.t: Wa-iz qaala Moosaa liqawmiheee innal laaha yaamurukum an tazbahoo baqara(tan); qaalooo atattakhizunna huzuwa(n); qaala a'oozu billaahi an akoona minal jaahileen

2:68.t: Qaalu ud'u lanaa rabbaka yubaiyil lanaa maa hee,(a) qaala innahoo yaqoolu innahaa baqaratul laa faaridunw wa-laa bikrun 'awaanum baina zaalik(a); faf'aloo maa tu'maroon

2:69.t: Qaalu ud'u lanaa Rabbaka yubaiyil lanaa maa launuhaa, qaala innahoo yaqoolu innahaa baqaratun safraaa'u faaqi'ul launuhaa tasurrun naazireen

2:70.t: Qaalu d-'u lanaa Rabbaka yubaiyil lanaa maa hiya innal baqara tashaabaha 'alainaa wa-innaaa in shaaa'al laahu lamuhtadoon

2:71.t: Qaala innahoo yaqoolu innahaa baqaratul laa zaloolun tuseerul arda walaa tasqil harsa musallamatul laa shiyata feehaa, qaalul 'aana jita bilhaqq,(i) faza-bahoo-haa wamaa kaado yaf'aloon

2:72.t: Waiz qataltum nafsan faddaara'tum feehaa; wallaahu mukhrijum maa kuntum taktumoon

2:73.t: Faqulnad riboohu biba'dihaa, kazaalika yuhyil laa-hul mawtaa wa-yureekum aayaatihee la'allakum ta'qiloon

2:74.t: Summa qasat quloobukum mim ba'di zaalika fahiya kalhijaarati aw-ashaadu qaswa,(tan) wa-inna minal hijaarati lamaa yatafajjaru minhul anhaar,(u) wa-inna minhaa lamaa yash shaqqaqu fayakhruju minhul maaa',(u) wa-inna minhaa lamaa yahbitu min khashyatil laah:(i) wamal laahu bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon

2:75.t: ^Afatatma'oona ai yu'minoo lakum wa-qad kaana fareequm minhum yasma'oona Kalaamal laahi summa yuharri foonahoo mim ba'di maa'aqaloohu wa-hum ya'lamoon

2:76.t: Wa-izaa laqul lazeena aamanoo qaalooo aamannaa wa-izaa khalaa ba'duhum ilaa ba'din qaalooo atuhaddisoonahum bimaa fatahal laahu 'alaikum liyuhaajjookum bihee 'inda rabbikum, afalaa ta'qiloon

2:77.t: Awalaa ya'lamoona annal laaha ya'lamu maa yusirroona wa-maa yu'linoon

2:78.t: Wa-minhum ummiyyoona laa ya'lamoonal kitaaba illaaa amaaniyya wa-in hum illaa yazunnoon

2:79.t: Fawailul lillazeena yaktuboonal kitaaba bi-aidihim summa yaqooloona haazaa min 'indil laahi liyashtaroo bihee samanan qaleela(n); fawailul lahum mimaa katabat aydeehim wa-wailul lahum mimmaa yaksiboon

2:80.t: Wa-qaaloo lan tamassanan Naaru illaaa ayyaamam ma'doo-dah,(tan) qul attakhaztum 'indal laahi 'ahdan falain yukhlifal laahu 'ahdah(ooo); am taqooloona 'alal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

2:81.t: Balaa man kasaba sayyi'atanw wa-ahaatat bihee khateee'atuhoo fa-ulaaa'ika As-haabun Naar(i); hum feehaa khaalidoon

2:82.t: Wallazeena aamanoo wa-'amilus saalihaati ulaaa'ika As-haabul Janna(ti); hum feeha khaalidoon

2:83.t: Wa-iz akhaznaa meesaaqa Baneee Israaa'eela laa ta'budoona illal laaha wa-bil waalidaini ihsaana(nw) wa-zil qurbaa walyataamaa walmasaakeeni wa-qooloo linnaasi husna(nw) wa-aqeemus salaata wa-aatuzZakaat(a) summa tawallaitum illaa qaleelam minkum wa-antum mu'ridoon

2:84.t: Wa-iz akhaznaa meesaa-qakum laa tasfikoona dimaaa'akum wa-laa tukhrijoona anfusakum min diyaarikum summa aqrartum wa-antum tashhadoon

2:85.t: Summa antum haaa'ulaaa'i taqtuloona anfusakum wa-tukhrijoona fareeqam minkum min diyaarihim tazaaharoona 'alaihim bil-ismi wal'udwaani wa-in yaatookum usaaraa tufaadoohum wahuwa muharramun 'alaikum ikhraajuhum, afatu'-mi-noona biba'dil Kitaabi wa-takfuroona biba'd,(in) famaa jazaaa'u mai yaf'alu zaalika minkum illaa khizyun fil hayaatid dunyaa; wa-yawmal qiyaamati yuraddoona ilaaa ashaddil 'azaab:(i) wa-mal laahu bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon

2:86.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeenash tarawul hayaatad dunyaa bil-aakhira(ti); falaa yukhaffafu 'anhumul 'azaabu wa-laa hum yunsaroon

2:87.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba wa-qaffainaa mim ba'dihee bir-Rusul(i); wa-aatainaa 'Eesab- na- Maryamal baiyinaati wa-ayyadnaahu bi-Roohil Qudus:(i) afakullamaa jaaa'akum Rasoolum bimaa laa tahwaaa anfusukumus takbartum fafareeqan kazzabtum wa-fareeqan taqtuloon

2:88.t: Wa-qaaloo quloobunaa ghulf,(um) bal la'anahumul laahu bikufrihim faqaleelam maa yu'minoon

2:89.t: Wa-lammaa jaaa'ahum Kitaabum min 'indil laahi musaddiqul limaa ma'ahum wa-kaanoo min qablu yastaftihoona 'alal lazeena kafaroo falammaa jaaa'ahum maa 'arafoo kafaroo bih,(ee) fala-'natul laahi 'alal kaafireen

2:90.t: Bi'samash taraw biheee anfusahum ai yakfuroo bimaaa anzalal laahu baghyan ain yunazzilal laahu min fadlihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min ibaadi(hee); fabaaa'oo bighadabin 'alaa ghadab,(in) wa-lilkaafireena 'azaabum muheen

2:91.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahum aaminoo bimaaa anzalal laahu qaaloo nu'minu bimaaa unzila 'alainaa wa-yakfuroona bimaa waraaa'ahoo wa-huwal haqqu musaddiqal limaa ma'ahum: qul falima taqtuloona Ambiyaaa'al laahi min qablu in kuntum mu'mineen

2:92.t: ^Wa-laqad jaaa'akum Moosa bilbaiyinaati summat takhaztumul 'ijla mim ba'dihee wa-antum zaalimoon

2:93.t: Wa-iz akhaznaa meesaaqakum wa-rafa'naa fawqakumut Toora khuzoo maaa aatainaakum biquwwatinw wasma'oo; qaaloo sami'naa wa-'asainaa wa-ushriboo fee quloobihimul 'ijla bikufrihim, qul bi'samaa yaamurukum biheee eemaanukum in kuntum mu'mineen

2:94.t: Qul in kaanat lakumud Daarul Aakhiratu 'indal laahi khaalisatam min doonin naasi fatamannawul mawta in kuntum saadiqeen

2:95.t: Wa-lai yatamannawhu abadam bimaa qaddamat aideehim: wallaahu 'aleemum bizzaalimeen

2:96.t: Wa-latajidannahum ahrasannaasi 'alaa hayaatinw wa minal lazeena ashrakoo, yawaddu ahaduhum lau yu'ammaru alfa sana(tinw) wa-maa huwa bi-muzahzihihee minal 'azaabi ai yu'ammar:(a) wallaahu baseerum bimaa ya'maloon

2:97.t: Qul man kaana 'aduwwal li-Jibreela fa-innahoo nazzalahoo 'alaa qalbika bi-iznil laahi musaddiqal limaa baina yadaihi wa-hudanw wa-bushraa lilmu'mineen

2:98.t: Man kaana 'aduwwal lillaahi wa-malaaa'ikatihee wa-Rusulihee wa-Jibreela wa-Meekaala fa-innal laaha 'aduwwul lilkaafireen

2:99.t: Wa-laqad anzalnaaa ilaika Aayaatim baiyinaat(inw); wa-maa yakfuru bihaaa illal faasiqoon

2:100.t: Awa-kullamaa 'aahadoo ahdan nabazahoo fareequm minhum, bal aksaruhum laa yu'minoon

2:101.t: Wa-lammaa jaaa'ahum Rasoolum min 'indil laahi musaddiqul limaa ma'ahum nabaza fareequm minal lazeena ootul Kitaaba Kitaabal laahi waraaa'a zuhoorihim ka-annahum laa ya'lamoon

2:102.t: Wattaba'oo maa tatlush Shayaateenu 'alaa mulki Sulaimaan(a); wamaa kafara Sulaimaanu walaakinnash Shayatteena kafaroo yu'al-limoonan naasas sihra wa-maaa unzila 'alal malakaini bi-Baabila Haaroota wa-Maaroot, wa-maa yu'allimaani min ahadin hattaa yaqoolaaa innamaa nahnu fitnatun falaa takfur; fayata'al-lamoona minhumaa maa yufarriqoona bihee bainal mar'yee wa-zawjih,(i) wa-maa hum bidaaarreena bi-hee min ahadin illaa bi-iznil llah,(i) wa-yata'allamoona maa yadurruhum wa-laa yanfa'uhum, wa-laqad 'alimoo lamanish taraahu maa lahoo fil Aakhirati min khalaaq,(in) wa-labi'sa maa sharaw biheee anfusahum, lau kaanoo ya'lamoon

2:103.t: Wa-law annahum aamanoo wattaqaw lamasoobatum min 'indil laahi khair(un); lau kaanoo ya'lamoon

2:104.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa taqooloo raa'inaa wa-qoolun zurnaa wasma'oo: wa-lilkaafireena 'azaabun aleem

2:105.t: Maa yawaddul lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi wa-lal mushrikeena ai-n yunazzala 'alaikum min khairim mir Rabbikum: wallaahu yakhtassu birahmatihee mai-n yashaaa,(u) wallaahu zul fadlil 'azeem

2:106.t: ^Maa nansakh min aayatin aw nunsihaa na-ti bikhairim minhaaa aw mislihaaa: alam ta'lam annal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeer

2:107.t: Alam ta'lam annal laaha lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ard:(i) wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi minw waliyyinw wa-laa naseer

2:108.t: Am tureedoona an tas'aloo Rasoolakum kamaa su'ila Moosa min qabl:(u) wa-mai-n yatabaddalil kufra bil-eemaani faqad dalla sawaaa'as sabeel

2:109.t: Wadda kaseerum min ahlil kitaabi lau yaruddoo-nakum mim ba'di eemaanikum kuffaaran hasadam min 'indi anfusihim mim ba'di maa tabaiyyana lahumul haqq(u); fa'foo wasfahoo hattaa yaa-tiyal laahu bi-amrih:(ee) innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeer

2:110.t: Wa-aqeemus salaata wa-aatuz zakaah,(ta) wa-maa tuqaddimoo li-anfusikum min khairin tajidoohu 'indal laah:(i) innal laaha bimaa ta'maloona baseer

2:111.t: Wa-qaaloo lai-n yadkhulal jannata illaa man kaana Hoodan aw Nasaaraa: tilka amaaniyyuhum: qul haatoo burhaa-nakum in kuntum saadiqeen

2:112.t: Balaa man aslama wajhahoo lillaahi wa-huwa muhsinun falahooo ajruhoo 'inda rabbihee wa-laa khawfun 'alaihim wa-laa hum yahzanoon

2:113.t: Wa-qaalatil Yahoodu laisatin Nasaaraa 'alaa shai'inw wa-qaalatin Nasaaraaa laisatil Yahoodu 'alaa shai'inw 'wa-hum yatloonal Kitaab:(a) kazaalika qaalal lazeena la ya'lamoona misla qawlihim, fallaahu yahkumu bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

2:114.t: Wa-man azlamu mimmam mana'a masaajidal laahi ai-n yuzkara feehas muhoo wa-sa'aa fee kharaabihaaa, ulaaa'ika maa kaana lahum ai-n yadkhuloohaaa illaa khaaa'ifeen,(a) lahum fid dunyaa khizyunw wa-lahum fil aakhirati 'azaabun 'azeem

2:115.t: Wa-lillaahil mashriqu walmaghrib,(u) fa-aynamaa tuwalloo fasamma wajhul laah,(i) innal laaha waasi'un Aleem

2:116.t: Wa-qaalut takhazal laahu walada:(n) subhaana(hoo); bal lahoo maa fis samaawaati wal-ard(i); kullul lahoo qaanitoon

2:117.t: Badeee'us samaawaati wal-ard(i); wa-izaa qadaaa amran fa-innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fayakoon

2:118.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena laa ya'lamoona lau-laa yukallimunal laahu au taateenaaa aaya:(tun) kazaalika qaalal lazeena min qablihim misla qawlihim. tashaabahat quloobuhum: qad baiyannal aayaati liqawmin-y yooqinoon

2:119.t: Innaaa arsalnaaka bilhaqqi basheeranw wa-nazeera(nw); wa-laa tus'alu 'an As-haabil Jaheem

2:120.t: Wa-lan tardaa 'ankal Yahoodu wa-lan Nasaaraa hattaa tattabi'a millatahum: qul inna hudal laahi huwal hudaa: wa-la'init taba'ta ahwaaa'ahum ba'dal lazee jaaa'aka minal 'ilmi maa laka minal laahi minw waliyyinw wa-laa naseer

2:121.t: Allazeena aatainaahumul Kitaaba yatloonahoo haqqa tilaawatiheee ulaaa'ika yu'minoona bih:(ee) wa-mai-n yakfur bihee fa-ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

2:122.t: Yaa-Baneee Israaa'eelaz kuroo ni'matiyal lateee an'amtu 'alaikum wa-annee faddaltukum 'alal 'aalameen

2:123.t: Wattaqoo yawmal laa tajzee nafsun 'an nafsin shai-'anw wa-laa yuqbalu minhaa 'adlunw wa-laa tanfa'uhaa shafaa-'atunw wa-laa hum yunsaroon

2:124.t: ^Wa-izib talaaa Ibraaheema Rabbuhoo bi-Kalimaatin fa-atammahun(na); qaala Innee jaa'iluka linnaasi Imaama(n); qaala wa-min zurriyyatee; qaala laa yanaalu 'ahdiz zaalimeen

2:125.t: Wa-iz ja'alnal Baita masaabatal linnaasi wa-amna-nw wattakhizoo mim Maqaami Ibraaheema musallaaa; wa-'ahidnaaa ilaaa Ibraaheema wa-Ismaa'eela an tahhiraa Baitiya littaaa'ifeena wal'aakifeena warrukka'is sujood

2:126.t: Wa-iz qaala Ibraaheemu Rabbij 'al haazaa baladan aaminanw warzuq ahlahoo minas samaraati man aamana minhum billaahi wal-yawmil aakhir(i); qaala wa-man kafara fa-umatti'uhoo qaleelan summa adtarruhooo ilaa 'azaabin Naar(i); wa-bi'sal maseer

2:127.t: Wa-iz yarfa'u Ibraaheemul qawaa'ida minal Baiti wa-Ismaa'eelu Rabbanaa taqabbal minnaa; innaka Antas Samee'ul Aleem

2:128.t: Rabbanaa waj'alnaa muslimaini laka wa-min zurriyyatinaaa ummatam muslimatal laka wa-arinaa manaasikanaa wa-tub 'alainaa; innaka antat Tawwaabur Raheem

2:129.t: Rabbanaa wab'as feehim Rasoolam minhum yatloo 'alaihim aayaatika wa-yu'allimuhumul Kitaaba wal-Hikmata wa-yuzakkeehim, innaka Antal 'Azeezul Hakeem

2:130.t: Wa-mai-n yarghabu 'am Millati Ibraaheema illaa man safiha nafsah,(u) wa-laqadi astafainaahu fid dunyaa; wa-innahoo fil aakhirati laminas saaliheen

2:131.t: Iz qaala lahoo Rabbuhooo aslim; qaala aslamtu li-Rabbil 'aalameen

2:132.t: Wa-wassaa bihaaa Ibraaheemu baneehi wa-Ya'qoobu, yaa-baniyya innal laahas tafaa lakumud deena falaa tamootunna illaa wa-antum muslimoon

2:133.t: Am kuntum shuhadaaa'a iz hadara Ya'qoobal mawtu iz qaala libaneehi maa ta'budoona mim ba'dee qaaloo na'budu ilaahaka wa-ilaaha aabaaa'ika Ibraaheema wa-Ismaa'eela wa-Ishaaqa Ilaahanw waahidanw wa-nahnu lahoo muslimoon

2:134.t: Tilka ummatun qad khalat; lahaa maa kasabat wa-lakum maa kasabtum; wa-laa tus'aloona 'ammaa kaanoo ya'maloon

2:135.t: Wa-qaaloo koonoo Hoodan aw Nasaaraa tahtadoo: qul bal Millata Ibraaheema Haneefa(nw); wa-maa kaana minal mushrikeen

2:136.t: Qoolooo aamannaa billaahi wa-maaa unzila ilainaa wa-maaa unzila ilaaa Ibraaheema wa-Ismaa'eela wa-Ishaaqa wa-Ya'qooba wal-Asbaati wa-maa ootiya Moosa wa-'Eesaa wa-maaa ootiyan Nabiyyoona mir Rabbihim laa nufarriqoo baina ahadim minhum wa-nahnu lahoo muslimoon

2:137.t: Fa-in aamanoo bimisli maaa aamantum bihee faqadih tadaw; wa-in tawallau fa-innamaa hum fee shiqaaq(i); fasayak-feekahumul laah,(u) wa-Huwas Samee'ul Aleem

2:138.t: Sibghatal laah(i); wa-man ahsanu minal laahi sibgha(tanw); wa-nahnu lahoo 'aabidoon

2:139.t: Qul atuhaaajjoonanaa fil laahi wa-Huwa Rabbunaa wa-Rabbukum wa-lanaa a'maalunaa wa-lakum a'maalukum wa-nahnu lahoo mukhlisoon

2:140.t: Am taqooloona inna Ibraaheema wa-Ismaa'eela wa-Ishaaqa wa-Ya'qooba wal-asbaata kaanoo Hoodan aw Nasaaraa: qul 'a-antum a'lamu amil laah:(u) wa-man azlamu mimman katama shahaadatan 'indahoo minal laah:(u) wa-mal laahu bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon

2:141.t: Tilka ummatun qad khalat; lahaa maa kasabat wa-lakum maa kasabtum; wa-laa tus'aloona 'ammaa kaano ya'maloon

2:142.t: ^Sayaqoolus sufahaaa'u minan naasi maa wallaahum 'an Qiblatihimul latee kaanoo 'alaihaa, qul lillaahil mashriqu walmaghrib,(u) yahdee mai yashaaa'u ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

2:143.t: Wa-kazaalika ja'alnaakum ummatanw wasatal litakoonoo shuhadaaa'a 'alan naasi wa-yakoonar Rasoolu 'alaikum shaheedaa: wa-maa ja'alnal qiblatal latee kunta 'alaihaaa illaa lina'lama mai yattabi'ur Rasoola mimmai yanqalibu 'alaa 'aqibaiyh,(i) wa-in kaanat lakabeeratan illaa 'alal lazeena hadal laah:(u) wa-maa kaanal laahu liyudee'a eemaanakum, innal laaha binnaasi la-Ra'oofur Raheem

2:144.t: Qad naraa taqalluba wajhika fis samaaa'(i); fala-nuwalliyannaka qiblatan tardaahaa, fawalli wajhaka shatral Masjidil haaraam,(i) wa-haisu maa kuntum fawalloo wujoohakum shatrah: wa-innal lazeena ootul Kitaaba laya'lamoona annahul haqqu mir Rabbihim: wa-mal laahu bighaafilin 'ammaa ya'maloon

2:145.t: Wa-la'in ataital lazeena ootul kitaaba bikulli aayatim maa tabi'oo Qiblatak, wa-maaa anta bitaabi'in Qiblatahum, wa-maa ba'duhum bitaabi'in Qiblata ba'd,(in) wa-la'init taba'ta ahwaaa'ahum mim ba'di maa jaaa'aka minal 'ilmi innaka izal laminaz zaalimeen

2:146.t: Allazeena aatainaahumul kitaaba ya'rifoonahoo kamaa ya'rifoona abnaaa'ahum; wa-inna fareeqam minhum layaktumoonal haqqa wa-hum ya'lamoon

2:147.t: Alhaqqu mir Rabbik(a); falaa takoonana minal mumtareen

2:148.t: Wa-likullinw wijhatun huwa muwalleehaa; fastabiqul khairaat,(i) ayna maa takoonoo ya`ti bikumul laahu jamee'aa,(n) innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeer

2:149.t: Wa-min haisu kharajta fawalli wajhaka shatral Masjidil Haraam(i); wa-innahoo lalhaqqu mir Rabbik: wa-mal laahu bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon

2:150.t: Wa-min haisu kharajta fawalli wajhaka shatral Masjidil Haraam,(i) wa-haisu maa kuntum fawalloo wujoohakum shatrahoo li'allaa yakoona linnaasi 'alaikum hujjatun illal lazeena zalamoo minhum falaa takhshawhum wakhshawnee wa-li-utimma ni'matee 'alaikum wa-la'allakum tahtadoon

2:151.t: kamaaa arsalnaa feekum Rasoolam minkum yatloo 'alaikum aayaatina wa-yuzakkeekum wa-yu'alli-mukumul kitaaba wal-hikmata wa-yu'allimukum maa lam takoonoo ta'lamoon

2:152.t: Fazkurooneee azkurkum washkuroo lee wa-laa takfuroon

2:153.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal laazeena aamanus ta'eenoo bissabri was-Salaah,(ti) innal laaha ma'as saabireen

2:154.t: Wa-laa taqooloo limai-n yuqtalu fee sabeelil laahi amwaat,(um) bal ahyaaa'unw wa-laakil laa tash'uroon

2:155.t: Wa-lanablu-wannakum bishai'im minal khawfi waljoo'i wa-naqsim minal amwaali wal-anfusi was-samaraat:(i) wa-bashshiris saabireen

2:156.t: Allazeena izaaa asaabathum museebatun qaalooo innaa lillaahi wa-innaaa ilaihi raaji'oon

2:157.t: Ulaaa'ika 'alaihim salawaatum mir Rabbihim wa-rahma(tum); wa-ulaaa'ika humul muhtadoon

2:158.t: ^Innas Safaa wal-Marwata min sha'aaa'iril laah(i); faman hajjal Baita awi'tamara falaa junaaha 'alaihi ai yattawwafa bihimaa, wa man tatawwa'a khairan fa-innal laaha Shaakirun 'Aleem

2:159.t: Innal lazeena yaktumoona maaa anzalnaa minal baiyinaati walhudaa mim ba'di maa baiyannaahu linnaasi fil kitaab(i) ulaaa'ika yal'anuhumul laahu wa-yal'anuhumul laa-'inoon

2:160.t: Illal lazeena taaboo wa-as-lahoo wa-baiyanoo fa-ulaaa'ika atoobu 'alaihim, wa-Anat Tawwaabur Raheem

2:161.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo wamaa-too wa-hum kuffaar(un) ulaaa'ika 'alaihim la-'natul laahi walmalaa'ikati wannaasi ajma'een

2:162.t: khaalideena feeha; laa yukhaffafu 'anhumul 'azaabu wa-laa hum yunzaroon

2:163.t: Wa-ilaahukum illaahunw waahid(ul); laaa ilaaha illaa Huwar Rahmaanur Raheem

2:164.t: Inna fee khalqis samaawaati wal-ardi wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari walfulkil latee tajree fil bahri bimaa yanfa'un naasa wa-maaa anzalal laahu minas samaaa'i mim maaa'in fa-ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa wa-bas-sa feehaa min kulli daaabbatinw wa-tasreefir riyaahi was-sahaabil musakhkhari bainas samaaa'i wal-ardi la-aayaatil liqawminy ya'qiloon

2:165.t: Wa-minan naasi mai yattakhizu min doonil laahi andaadai-n yuhibboonahum kahubbil laah(i); wallazeena aamanooo ashaddu hubbal lillah: wa-lau yaral lazeena zalamoo iz yarawnal 'azaaba annal quwwata lillaahi jamee'a(nw) wa-annal laaha shadeedul 'azaab

2:166.t: Iz tabarra-al lazeenat tubi'oo minal lazeenat taba'oo wa-ra-awul 'azaaba wa-taqatta'at bihimul as-baab

2:167.t: Wa-qaalal lazeenat taba'oo lau anna lanaa karratan fanatabarra-a minhum kamaa tabarra'oo minnaa: kazaalika yureehimul laahu a'maalahum hasaraatin 'alaihim; wa-maa hum bikhaarijeena minan Naar

2:168.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu kuloo mimmaa fil ardi halaalan taiyyiba(nw) wa-laa tattabi'oo khutu-waatish Shaitaan,(i) innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen

2:169.t: Innamaa yaa`murukum bis-sooo'i walfah-shaaa'i wa-an taqooloo alal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

2:170.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahumut tabi'oo maaa anzalal laahu qaaloo bal nattabi'u maaa alfainaa 'alaihi aabaaa'anaaa: awa-lau kaana aabaaa'hum laa ya'qiloona shai'anw wa-laa yahtadoon

2:171.t: Wa-masalul lazeena kafaroo kamasalil lazee yan'iqu bimaa laa yasma'u illaa du'aaa'anw wa-nidaaa'aa,(n) summum bukmun 'umyun fahum laa ya'qiloon

2:172.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum washkuroo lillaahi in kuntum iyyaahu ta'budoon

2:173.t: Innamaa harrama 'alaikumul maitata waddama wa-lahmal khinzeeri wa-maaa uhilla bihee lighairil laah(i); famanid turra ghaira baaghinw wa-laa 'aadin falaaa isma 'alaih,(i) innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

2:174.t: Innal lazeena yaktumoona maaa anzalal laahu minal kitaabi wa-yashtaroona bihee samanan qaleel(an) ulaaa'ika maa yaakuloona fee butoonihim illan Naar(a) wa-laa yukallimu-humul laahu Yawmal Qiyaamati wa-laa yuzakkeehim wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem

2:175.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeenash tarawud dalaalata bilhudaa wal'azaaba bilmaghfirah,(ti) famaaa as-barahum 'alan Naar

2:176.t: Zaalika bi-annal laaha nazzalal kitaaba bilhaqq: wa-innal lazee-nakh talafoo fil kitaabi lafee shiqaaqim ba'eed

2:177.t: ^Laisal birra an tuwalloo wujoohakum qibalal mashriqi walmaghribi wa-laakinnal birra man aamana billaahi wal-yawmil aakhiri wal-malaaa'ikati wal-kitaabi wan-nabiyyeena wa-aatal maala 'alaa hubbihee zawil qurbaa walyataa-maa walmasaakeena wabnas sabeeli wassaaa'ileena wa-fir riqaabi wa-aqaamas salaata wa-aataz zakaata walmoofoona bi-ahdihim izaa 'aahadoo; wa-saabireena fil baasaaa'i waddarraaa'i wa-heenal baas:(i) ulaaa'ikal lazeena sadaqoo; wa-ulaaa'ika humul muttaqoon

2:178.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo kutiba alaikumul qisaasu fil qatlaa; alhurru bilhurri wal'abdu bil'abdi wal-unsaa bil-unsaa, faman 'ufiya lahoo min akheehi shai'un fattibaa'um bilma'roofi wa-adaaa'un ilaihi bi-ihsaan:(in) zaalika takhfeefum mir rabbikum wa-rahmah:(tun) famani' tadaa ba'da zaalika falahoo 'azaabun aleem

2:179.t: Wa-lakum fil qisaasi hayaatuin yaaa-ulil albaabi la'allakum tattaqoon

2:180.t: Kutiba 'alaikum izaa hadara ahadakumul mawtu in taraka khairanil wasiyyatu lilwaalidaini wal-aqrabeena bil-ma'roof(i); haqqan 'alal muttaqeen

2:181.t: Famam baddalahoo ba'da-maa sami'ahoo fa-innamaaa ismuhoo 'alal lazeena yubaddi-loonah,(u) innal laha Samee'un 'Aleem

2:182.t: Faman khaafa mim moosin janafan aw isman fa-aslaha bainahum falaaa ismaa 'alayh,(i) innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

2:183.t: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo kutiba 'alaikumus Siyaamu kamaa kutiba 'alal lazeena min qablikum la'allakum tattaqoon

2:184.t: Ayyaamam ma'doodaat,(in) faman kaana minkum mareedan aw' alaa safarin fa'iddatum min ayyaamin ukhar,(a) wa-'alal lazeena yuteeqoonahoo fidyatun ta'aamu miskeen(in); faman tatawwa'a khairan fahuwa khairul lah,(oo) wa-an tasoomoo khairul lakum; in kuntum ta'lamoon

2:185.t: Shahru Ramadaanal lazeee unzila feehil Qur'aanu hudal linnaasi wa-baiyinaatim minal hudaa wal-furqaan,(i) faman shahida minkumush shahra fal-yasum(hu); wa-man kaana mareedan aw 'alaa safarin fa'iddatum min ayyaamin ukhar:(a) yureedul laahu bikumul yusra wa-laa yureedu bikumul 'usra wa-litukmilul 'iddata wa-litukabbirul laaha 'alaa maa hadaakum wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

2:186.t: Wa-izaa sa-alaka 'ibaadee 'annnee fa-innee qareeb(un); ujeebu da'watad daa'i izaa da'aan(i); falyastajeeboo lee wal-yu'minoo bee la'allahum yarshudoon

2:187.t: Uhilla lakum laylatas Siyaamir rafasu ilaa nisaaa'ikum, hunna libaasul lakum wa-antum libaasul lahunn:(a) 'alimal laahu annakum kuntum takhtaanoona anfusakum fataaba 'alaikum wa'afaa 'ankum; fal'aana baashiroo-hunna wabtaghoo maa katabal laahoo lakum, wa-kuloo washraboo hattaa yatabaiyana lakumul khaitul abyadu minal khaitil aswadi minal fajr(i); summa atimmus Siyaama ilal layl,(i) wa-laa tubaashiroo-hunna wa-antum 'aakifoona fil masaajid:(i) tilka hudoodul laahi falaa taqraboohaa: kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu aayaatihee linnaasi la'allahum yattaqoon

2:188.t: Wa-laa taakuloo amwaalakum bainakum bilbaatili wa-tudloo bihaaa ilal hukkaami litaakuloo fareeqam min amwaalin naasi bil-ismi wa-antum ta'lamoon

2:189.t: ^Yas'aloonaka 'anil ahilla(ti); qul hiya mawaaqeetu linnaasi wal-Hajj:(i) wa-laisal birru bi-an ta'tul buyoota min zuhoorihaa wa-laakinnal birra manit taqaa: wa'tul buyoota min abwaa-bihaa, wattaqul laaha la'allakum tuflihoon

2:190.t: Wa-qaatiloo fee sabeelil laahil lazeena yuqaatiloonakum wa-laa ta'tadooo, innal laaha laa yuhibbul mu'tadeen

2:191.t: Waq-tuloohum haisu saqif-tumoohum wa-akhrijoohum min haisu akhrajookum, walfitnatu ashaddu minal qatl,(i) wa-laa tuqaa-tiloohum 'indal Masjidil Haraami hattaa yuqaatilookum feeh(i); fa-in qaata-lookum faq-tuloohum: kazaalika jazaaa'ul kaafireen

2:192.t: Fa-i'ninn tahau fa-innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

2:193.t: Wa-qaatiloohum hatta laa takoona fitnatunw wa-yakoonad deenu lillaah(i); fa-inin tahau falaa 'udwaana illaa 'alaz zaalimeen

2:194.t: Ash-Shahrul Haraamu bish-Shahril Haraami wal-hurumaatu qisaas,(un) famani' tadaa 'alaikum fa'tadoo 'alaihi bimisli ma' tadaa 'alaikum, wattaqul laaha wa'lamooo annal laaha ma'al muttaqeen

2:195.t: Wa-anfiqoo fee sabeelil laahi wa-laa tulqoo bi-aydeekum ilat tahluka'( ti) wa - ahsinoo' innal laaha yuhibbul muhsineen

2:196.t: Wa-atimmul Hajja wal-Umarata lillaah,(i) fa-in uhsirtum famas taisara minal had(yi); walaa tahliqoo ru'oosakum hatta yablughal hadyu mahilla,(hu) faman kaana minkum mareedan aw biheee azam mir ra'sihee fafidyatum min Siyaamin aw sadaqatin aw nusuk,(in) fa-izaaa amintum faman tamatta'a bil-'Umrati ilal Hajji famas taisara minal had,(yi) famal lam yajid fa-Siyaamu salaasti ayyaamin fil Hajji wa-sab'atin izaa raja'tum: tilka 'asharatun kaamilah:(tun) zaalika limal lam yakun ahluhoo haadiril Masjidil Haraam,(i) wattaqul laaha wa'lamoo annal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab

2:197.t: Al-Hajju ashhurum ma'-loomaat,(tun) faman farada feehinnal hajja falaa rafasa wa-laa fusooqa wa-laa jidaala fil Hajj:(i) wa-maa taf'aloo min khairien ya'lamhul laah:(u) wa-tazawwadoo fa-inna khairaz zaadit taqwaa, wattaqooni yaaa-ulil albaab

2:198.t: Laisa 'alaikum junaahun an tabtaghoo fad-lam mir rabbikum, fa-izaaa afadtum min 'Arafaatin fazkurul laaha 'indal Mash'aril Haraam(i); waz-kuroohu kamaa hadaakum wa-in kuntum min qablihee laminad daaalleen

2:199.t: Summa afeedoo min haisu afaadan naasu wastagh firullaah,(a) innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

2:200.t: Fa-iza qadaitum manaa-sikakum fazkurul laaha kazikrikum aabaaa'akum aw ashadda zikraa:(n) faminan naasi ma-ien yaqoolu Rabbanaaa aatinaa fid dunyaa wa-maa lahoo fil Aakhirati min khalaaq

2:201.t: Wa-minhum maien yaqoolu rabbanaaa aatina fid dunyaa hasanatanw wa-fil aakhirati hasanatanw wa-qinaa azaaban Naar

2:202.t: Ulaaa'ika lahum naseebum mimmaa kasaboo, wal-laahu saree'ul hisaab

2:203.t: ^Wazkurul laaha feee ayyaamin ma'doodaat,(in) faman ta'ajjala fee yawmaini falaaa ismaa 'alaihi wa-man ta-akhara falaaa isma 'alayh,(i) limanit taqaa: wattaqul laaha wa'lamooo annakum ilaihi tuhsharoon

2:204.t: Wa-minan naasi mai yu'jibuka qawluhoo fil hayaatid dunyaa wa-yushhidul laaha 'alaa maa fee qalbihee wa-huwa aladdul khisaam

2:205.t: Wa-izaa tawallaa sa'aa fil-ardi liyufsida feeha wa-yuhlikal harsa wannasl:(a) wal laahu laa yuhibbul fasaad

2:206.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahut taqil laaha akhazathul izzatu bil-ism,(i) fahasbuhoo jahannam,(u) wa-labi'sal mihaad

2:207.t: Wa-minan naasi maien yashree nafsahub tighaaa'a mardaatil laah,(i) wallaahu ra'oofum bil'ibaad

2:208.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanud khuloo fis silmi kaaaffa(tanw) wa-laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish Shaitaan,(i) innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen

2:209.t: Fa-in zalaltum min ba'di maa jaaa'atkumul baiyinaatu fa'lamoo annal laaha 'Azeezun hakeem

2:210.t: Hal yanzuroona illaaa a-ien ya'tiya-humul laahu fee zulalim minal ghamaami walmalaaa'ikatu wa-qudiyal amr,(u) wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

2:211.t: Sal Banee Israaa'eela kam aatainaahum min aayatim baiyinah:(tin) wa-mai yubaddil ni'matal laahi mim ba'di maa jaaa'athu fa-innal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab

2:212.t: Zuyyina lillazeena kafarul hayaatud dunyaa wa-yas-kharoona minal lazeena aamanoo wallazeenat taqaw fawqahum yawmal Qiyaamah:(ti) wallaahu yarzuqu ma-ien yashaaa'u bighairi hisaab

2:213.t: Kaanan naasu ummatanw waahidatan fab'asal laahun Nabiyyeena mubashshireena wa-munzireen(a) wa-anzala ma'ahumul kitaaba bilhaqqi liyahkuma bainan naasi feemakh talafoo feeh,(i) wa-makh talafa feehi 'illal lazeena ootoohu mim ba'di maa jaaa'athumul baiyinaatu baghyam bainahum; fahadal laahul lazeena aamanoo limakh talafoo feehi minal haqqi bi-iznih:(i) wallaahu yahdee ma-ien yashaaa'u ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

2:214.t: Am hasibtum an tadkhulul jannata wa-lammaa yaa-tikum masalul lazeena khalaw min qablikum; massathumul baasaaa'u waddarraaaa'u wa-zulziloo hattaa yaqoolar Rasoolu wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo mataa nasrul laah:(i) alaaa inna nasral laahi qareeb

2:215.t: Yas'aloonaka maazaa yunfiqoon(a); qul maaa anfaqtum min khairin falil-waalidaini wal-aqrabeena walyataamaa wal-masaakeeni wabnis sabeel:(i) wa-maa taf'aloo min khairin fa-innal laaha bihee 'Aleem

2:216.t: Kutiba alaikumul qitaalu wa-huwa kurhul lakum; wa'asaaa an takrahoo shai'anw wa-huwa khairul lakum; wa'asaaa an tuhibbo shai'anw wa-huwa sharrul lakum: wallaahu ya'lamu wa-antum laa ta'lamoon

2:217.t: Yas'aloonaka 'anish Shahril Haraami qitaalin feeh(i); qul qitaalun feehi kabeer(unw); wa-saddun 'an sabeelil laahi wa-kufrum bihee wal-Masjidil Haraam(i) wa-ikhraaju ahlihee minhu akbaru 'indal laah,(i) wal-fitnatu akbaru minal qatl:(i) wa-laa yazaaloona yuqaatiloonakum hatta yaruddookum 'an deenikum inis tataa'oo, wa-ma-ien yartadid minkum 'an deenihee fayamut wahuwa kaafirun fa-ulaaa'ika habitat a'maaluhum fid dunyaa wal-aakhira(ti); wa-ulaaa'ika as-haabun Naar(i); hum feehaa khaalidoon

2:218.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo wallazeena haajaroo wa-jaahadoo fee sabeelil laahi ulaaa'ika yarjoona rahmatal laah,(i) wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

2:219.t: ^Yas'aloonaka 'anil khamri walmaisir(i); qul feehimaaa ismun kabeerunw wa-manaafi'u linnaasi wa-ismuhumaa akbaru min naf'ihimaa: wa-yas'aloonaka maaza yunfiqoona qulil 'afuw:(a) kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakumul aayaati la'allakum tatafakkaroon

2:220.t: Fid dunyaa wal-aakhirah:(ti) wa-yas'aloonaka 'anil yataamaa; qul islaahul lahum khayr(un); wa-in tukhaalitoohum fa-ikhwaanukum, wallaahu ya'lamul mufsida minal muslih,(i) wa-law shaaa'al laahu la-a'natakum, innal laaha 'Azeezun Hakeem

2:221.t: Wa-laa tankihul mushrikaati hattaa yu'minn,(a) wa-la-amatum mu'minatun khairum mim mushrikatinw wa-lau a'jabatkum: wa-laa tunkihul mushrikeena hattaa yu'minoo, wa-la'abdum mu'minun khairum mim mushrikinw wa-lau 'ajabakum: ulaaa'ika yad'oona ilan Naar(i); wallaahu yad'ooo ilal Jannati wal-maghfirati biiznih(ee); wa-yubaiyinu Aayaatihee linnaasi la'allahum yatazakkaroon

2:222.t: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'anil maheed(i); qul huwa aza(n) fa'tazilun nisaaa'a fil maheed(i); wa-laa taqraboo-hunna hattaa yathurn(a); fa-izaa tatah-harrna faatoohunna min haisu amarakumul laah,(u) innal laaha yuhibbut Tawwaabeena wa-yuhibbul mutatahhireen

2:223.t: Nisaaa'ukum harsul lakum faatoo harsakum annaa shi'tum; wa-qaddimoo li-anfusikum, wattaqul laaha wa'lamooo annakum mulaaqooh:(u) wa-bash-shiril mu'mineen

2:224.t: Wa-laa taj'alul laaha 'urdatal li-aymaanikum an tabarroo wa-tattaqoo wa-tuslihoo bainan naas:(i) wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

2:225.t: Laa yu'aakhi-zukumul laahu billaghwi feee aymaa-nikum wa-laakien yu'aakhi-zukum bimaa kasabat quloo-bukum: wallaahu Ghafoorun Haleem

2:226.t: Lillazeena yu'loona min nisaaa'ihim tarabbusu arba'ati ashhur(in); fa-in faaa'oo fa-innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

2:228.t: Walmutallaqaatu yatarab-basna bi-anfusi-hinna salaasata qurooo',(in) wa-laa yahillu lahunna aien yaktumna maa khalaqal laahu feee arhaami-hinna in kunna yu'minna bil-laahi wal-yawmil aakhir,(i) wa-bu'oola-tuhunna ahaqqu biraddi-hinna fee zaalika in araadooo islaa-haa,(n) wa-lahunna mislul lazee alaihinna bilma'roof,(i) wa-lir-rijjaali 'alaihinna daraja:(tun) wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem

2:229.t: Attalaaqu marrataan(i); fa-imsaakum bima'roofin aw tasreehum bi-ihsaan:(in) wa-laa yahillu lakum an taakhuzoo mimmaaa aataitumoohunna shai'an illaaa aien yakhaafaaa alla yuqeemaa hudoodal lah(i); fa-in khiftum allaa yuqeemaa hudoodal laahi falaa junaaha 'Alaihimaa feemaf tadat bih:(ee) tilka hudoodul laahi falaa ta'tadoohaa, wa-maien yata'adda hudoodal laahi fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

2:230.t: Fa-in talla-qahaa falaa tahillu lahoo mim ba'du hattaa tankiha zawjan ghairah:(u) fa-in tallaqahaa falaa junaaha 'alaihimaaa aien yata-raaja'aaa in zannaaa aien yuqeemaa hudoodal laah:(i) wa-tilka hudoodul laahi yubai-yyinuhaa liqawmien ya'lamoon

2:231.t: Wa-izaa tallaq-tumun nisaaa'a faba-laghna ajala-hunna fa-amsi-koohunna bima'roofin aw sarrihoo-hunna bima'roof,(in) wa-laa tumsikoo-hunna diraa-ral lita'tadoo, wa-maien yaf'al zaalika faqad zalama naf-sah,(u) wa-laa tat-takhizooo aayaatil laahi huzuwaa,(nw) wazkuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum wa-maaa anzala 'alaikum minal kitaabi wal-hikmati ya'izukum bih,(i) wattaqul laaha wa'lamooo annal laaha bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

2:232.t: Wa-izaa tallaqtumun nisaaa'a fabalaghna ajalahunna falaa ta'duloo-hunna aien yankihna azwaaja-hunna izaa taraadaw bainahum bilma'roof:(i) zaalika yoo'azu bihee man kaana minkum yu'minu billaahi wal-yawmil aakhir:(i) zaalikum azkaa lakum wa-at-har:(u) wallaahu ya'lamu wa-antum laa ta'lamoon

2:233.t: ^Walwaa-lidaatu yurdi'na awlaada-hunna hawlaini kaamilain(i); liman araada a-ien yutimmar radaa'ah,(ta) wa-'alal mawloodi lahoo rizqu-hunna wa-kiswatuhunna bilma'roof,(i) laa tukallafu nafsun illaa wus'ahaa, laa tudaaarra waalidatum biwaladihaa wa-laa mawloodul lahoo biwaladih,(i) wa'alal waarisi mislu zaalik:(a) fa-in araadaa Fisaalan 'an taraadim minhumaa wa-tashaawurin falaa junaaha 'alaihim:(a) wa-in aradttum an tastardi'ooo awlaadakum falaa junaaha 'alaikum izaa sallamtum maaa aataitum bilma'roof:(i) wattaqul laaha wa'lamooo annal laaha bimaa ta'maloona baseer

2:234.t: Wallazeena yutawaffawna minkum-wa yazaroona azwaajaien yatarabbasna bi-anfusi-hinna arba'ata ashhurinw wa'ashra(n); fa-izaa balaghna ajalahunna falaa junaaha 'alaikum feemaa fa'alna feee anfusi-hinna bilma'roof:(i) wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer

2:235.t: Wa-laa junaaha 'alaikum feema 'arrad-tum bihee min khit-batin nisaaa'ee aw aknantum feee anfusikum, 'alimal laahu annakum sataz-kuroo-nahunna wa-laakil laa tuwaa'idoohunna sirran illaaa an taqooloo qawlam ma'roofaa,(n) wa-laa ta'zimoo 'uqdatan nikaahi hattaa yablughal kitaabu ajalah,(u) wa'lamooo annal laaha ya'lamu maa feee anfusikum fah-zarooh,(u) wa'lamooo annal laaha Ghafoorun Haleem

2:236.t: Laa junaaha 'alaikum in tallaq-tumun nisaaa'a maa lam tamassoo-hunna aw tafridoo lahunna fareedah,(tan) wa-matti'oohunna 'alal moosi'ee qadaruhoo wa-'alal muqtiri qadaruhoo matta'am bil-ma'roof(i); haqqan 'alal muhsineen

2:237.t: Wa-in tallaqtumoo-hunna min qabli an tamassoo-hunna wa-qad farad-tum lahunna fareeda-tan fanis-fu maa farad-tum illaaa aien ya'foona aw ya'fuwal lazee biyadihee 'uqdatun nikaah,(i) wa-an ta'fooo aqrabu littaqwaa, wa-laa tansawul fadla bainakum, innal laaha bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

2:238.t: Haafizoo 'alas salawaati was-Salaatil Wustaa wa-qoomoo lillaahi qaaniteen

2:239.t: Fa-in khiftum farijaalan aw rukbaana(n); fa-izaaa amintum fazkurul laaha kamaa 'allamakum maa lam takoonoo ta'lamoon

2:240.t: Wallazeena yutawaf-fawna minkum wa-yazaroona azwaajanw wasiyyatal li-azwaajihim mataa'an ilal hawli ghaira ikhraaj,(in) fa-in kharajna falaa junaaha 'alaikum fee maa fa'alna feee anfusihinna min ma'roof:(in) wal-laahu Azeezun Hakeem

2:242.t: Kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakum aayaatihee la'allakum ta'qiloon

2:243.t: ^Alam tara ilal lazeena kharajoo min diyaari-him wa-hum uloofun hazaral mawt(i) faqaaala lahumul laahu mootoo summa ahyaahum, innal laaha lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yashkuroon

2:244.t: Wa-qaatiloo fee sabeelil laahi wa'lamooo annal laaha Samee'un 'Aleem

2:245.t: Man zal lazee yuqridul laaha qardan hasanan fayudaa-'ifahoo lahoo ad'aafan kaseerah,(tan) wallaahu yaqbidu wa-yabsutu wa-ilaihi turja'oon

2:246.t: Alam tara ilal mala-i mim Baneee Israaa'eela mim ba'di Moosaaa iz qaaloo li-Nabiyyil lahumub 'as lanaa malikan nuqaatil fee sabeelil laah(i); qaala hal 'asaitum in kutiba 'alaikumul qitaalu allaa tuqaatiloo; qaaloo wa-maa lanaaa allaa nuqaatila fee sabeelil laahi wa-qad ukhrijnaa min diyaarinaa wa-abnaaa'inaa; falammaa kutiba 'alaihimul qitaalu tawallaw illaa qaleelam minhum: wallaahu 'aleemum bizzaalimeen

2:247.t: Wa-qaala lahum Nabiy-yuhum innal laaha qad ba'asa lakum Taaloota malikaa,(an) qaalooo annaa yakoonu lahul mulku 'alainaa wa-nahnu ahaqqu bilmulki minhu wa-lam yu'ta sa'atam minal maal,(i) qaala innal laahas tafaahu 'alaikum wa-zaadahoo bastatan fil 'ilmi waljism(i); wallaahu yu'tee mulkahoo maien yashaaa',(u) wallaahu Waasi'un 'Aleem

2:248.t: Wa-qaala lahum Nabiyyuhum inna Aayata mulkiheee aien ya`atiya-kumut Taabootu feehi sakeenatum mir Rabbikum wa-baqiyyatum mimmaa taraka Aalu Moosa wa-Aalu Haaroona tahmi-luhul malaaa'ikah,(tu) inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal lakum in kuntum mu'mineen

2:249.t: Falammaa fasala Taalootu biljunoodi qaala innal laaha mub-taleekum binahar(in) faman shariba minhu falaisa minnee wa-mal lam yat'amhu fa-innahoo minneee illaa manigh tarafa ghurfatam biyadih,(i) fashariboo minhu illaa qaleelam minhum, falammaa jaawazahoo huwa wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo qaaloo laa taaqata lanal yawma bi-Jaaloota wa-junoodih,(i) qaalal lazeena yazunnoona annahum mulaaqul laahi kam min fi'atin qaleelatin ghalabat fi'atan kaseeratam bi-iznil laah:(i) wallaahu ma'as saabireen

2:250.t: Wa-lammaa barazoo li-Jaaloota wa-junoodihee qaaloo Rabbanaaa afrigh 'alainaa sabranw wa-sabbit aqdaamanaa wansurnaa 'alal qawmil kaafireen

2:251.t: Fahaza-moohum bi-iznil laah(i) wa-qatala Daawoodu jaaloota wa-aataahul laahul mulka Wal-Hikmata wa'allamahoo mimmaa yashaaa':(u) wa-law-laa daf'ul laahin naasa ba'dahum biba'dil lafasadatil ard(u) wa-laakinnal laaha zoo fadlin 'alal 'aalameen

2:252.t: Tilka Aayaatul laahi natloohaa 'alaika bilhaqq,(i) wa-innaka laminal mursaleen

2:253.t: ^Tilkar Rusulu faddalnaa ba'dahum 'alaa ba'd. minhum man kallamal laah(u); wa-rafa'a ba'dahum darajaat,(in) wa-aatainaa 'Eesab na Maryamal baiyinaati wa-ayyadnaahu bi-Roohil Qudus:(i) wa-law shaaa'al laahu maq tatalal lazeena mim ba'dihim mim ba'di maa jaaa'athumul baiyinaat(u) wa-laakinikh talafoo faminhum man aamana wa-minhum man kafar,(a) wa-law shaaa'al laahu maq tataloo wa-laakinnal laaha yaf'alu maa yureed

2:254.t: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo anfiqoo mimmaa razaq-naakum min qabli aien ya`atiya yawmul laa bai'un feehee wa-la khullatunw wa-laa shafaa'ah:(tun) wal-kaafiroona humuz zaalimoon

2:255.t: Allahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwal Haiyul Qaiyoom,(u) laa taakhuzuhoo sinatunw wa-laa nawm,(un) lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa-maa fil ard:(i) man zal lazee yashfa'u indahooo illaa bi-iznih,(i) ya'lamu maa baina aydeehim wa-maa khalfahum; wa-laa yuheetoona bishai'im min 'ilmihee illaa bimaa shaaa',(a) wasi'a Kursiyyuhus samaawaati wal-ard(a); wa-laa Ya'ooduhoo hifzuhum,(aa) wa-Huwal Aliyyul 'Azeem

2:256.t: Laaa ikraaha fid deen(i); qadt tabiyanar rushdu minal ghayy,(i) famai yakfur bit-Taaghooti wa-yu'mim billaahi faqadis tamsaka bil'urwatil wusqaa lan fisaama lah:(aa) wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

2:257.t: Allaahu waliyyul lazeena aamanoo yukhrijuhum minaz zulumaati ilan noor(i); wallazeena kafarooo awliyaaa'uhumut Taaghootu yukhrijoo-nahum minan noori ilaz zulumaat:(i) ulaaa'ika As-haabun Naar(i); hum feehaa khaalidoon

2:258.t: Alam tara ilal lazee Haaajja Ibraaheema fee Rabbiheee an aataahul laahul mulka iz qaala Ibraaheemu Rabbiyal lazee yuhyee wa-yumeetu qaala ana uhyee wa-umeet(u); qaala Ibraaheemu fa-innal laaha yaatee bishshamsi minal mashriqi faati bihaa minal maghribi fabuhital lazee kafar:(a) wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

2:259.t: Aw kallazee marra 'alaa qaryatinw wa-hiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa qaala annaa yuhyee haazihil laahu ba'da mawtih(aa); fa-amaatahul laahu mi'ata 'aamin summa ba'a-sah(oo); qaala kam labist(a); qaala labistu yawman aw ba'da yawm(in); qaala bal labista mi'ata 'aamin fanzur ilaa ta'aamika wa-sharaabika lam yatasannah; wanzur ilaa himaarika wa-linaj'alaka Aayatal linnaas(i); wanzur ilal 'izaami kaifa nunshizuhaa summa naksoohaa lahmaa,(n) falammaa tabaiyyana lahoo qaala a'lamu annal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

2:260.t: Wa-iz qaala Ibraaheemu Rabbi arinee kaifa tuhyil mawtaa; qaala awa-lam tu'min; qaala balaa wa-laakil liyatma'inna qalbee; qaala fakhuz arab'atam minat tairi fasurhunna ilaika summaj 'al a'alaa kulli jabalim minhunna juz'a(n) summad'uu hunna ya`ateenaka sa'yaa,(n) wa'lam annal laaha 'Azeezun Hakeem

2:261.t: Masalul lazeena yunfiqoona amwaalahum fee sabeelil laahi kamasali habbatin ambatat sab'a sanaabil(a) fee kulli sumbulatim mi'atu habbah:(tin) wallaahu yudaa'ifu limaien yashaaa:(oo) wallaahu Waasi'un 'Aleem

2:262.t: Allazeena yunfiqoona amwaalahum fee sabeelil laahi summa laa yutbi'oona maaa anfaqoo mann-anw wa-laaa azal lahum ajruhum 'inda Rabbihim; wa-laa khawfun 'alaihim wa-laa hum yahzanoon

2:263.t: ^Qawlum ma'roofunw wa-maghfiratun khairum min sadaqatien yatba'uhaaa azaa: wallaahu Ghaniyyun Haleem

2:264.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tubtiloo sadaqaatikum bilmanni wal-azaa kallazee yunfiqu maa-lahoo ri'aaa'an naasi wa-laa yu'minu billaahi wal-yawmil aakhir(i); fama-saluhoo kamasali safwaanin 'alaihi turaabun fa-asaabahoo waabilun fatara-kahoo saldaa(l); laa yaqdiroona 'alaa shai'im mimmaa kasaboo: wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal kaafireen

2:265.t: Wa-masalul lazeena yunfiqoona amwaalahu mubtighaaa'a mardaatil laahi wa-tasbeetam min anfusihim kamasali jannatim birabwatin asaa-bahaa waabilun fa-aatat ukulahaa di'faini fa-il lam yusibhaa waabilun fatal:(lun) wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

2:266.t: Ayawaddu ahadukum an takoona lahoo jannatum min nakheelinw wa-a'naabin tajree min tahtihal anhaar(u) lahoo feehaa min kullis samaraati wa-asaa-bahul kibaru wa-lahoo zurriyyatun du'afaaa'(u) fa-asaabahaaa i'saarun feehi naarun fahtaraqat: kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakumul aayaati la'allakum tata-fakkaroon

2:267.t: Yaaa-'ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo anfiqoo min taiyibaati maa kasabtum wa-mimmaaa akhrajna lakum minal ard(i); wa-laa tayammamul khabeesa minhu tunfiqoon(a) wa-lastum bi-aakhizeehi illaaa an tughmidoo feeh,(i) wa'lamooo annal laaha Ghaniyyun Hameed

2:268.t: Ash-Shaitaanu ya'idukumul faqra wa-ya'murukum bil-fahshaaa('i); wallaahu ya'idukum maghfiratam minhu wa-fadlaa:(n) wallaahu Waasi'un 'Aleem

2:269.t: Yu'til Hikmata maien yashaaa,('oo); wa-maien yu'tal Hikmata faqad ootiya khairan kaseeraa:(n) wa-maa yazzakkaru illaaa ulul albaab

2:270.t: Wa-maaa anfaqtum min nafaqatin aw nazartum min nazrin fa-innal laaha ya'lamuh:(u) wa-maa liz-zaalimeena min ansaar

2:271.t: In tubdus sadaqaati fani'immaa hi(ya); wa-in tukhfoohaa wa-tu'toohal fuqaraaa'a fahuwa khayrul lakum, wa-yukaffiru 'ankum min saiyi-aatikum: wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer

2:272.t: ^Laisa 'alaika hudaahum wa-laakinnal laaha yahdee maien yashaaa:('oo) wa-maa tunfiqoo min khairin fali-anfusikum, wa-maa tunfiqoona illab tighaaa'a wajhil laah,(i) wa-maa tunfiqoo min khairien yuwaffa ilaikum wa-antum laa tuzlamoon

2:273.t: Lil-fuqaraaa'il lazeena uh-siroo fee sabeelil laahi laa yastatee'oona darban fil ard(i)-yah sabuhumul jaahilu aghniyaaa'a minat ta'affufi ta'rifuhum biseemaahum laa yas'aloonan naasa ilhaafaa:(n) wa-maa tunfiqoo min khairin fa-innal laaha bihee 'Aleem

2:274.t: Allazeena yunfiqoona amwaalahum billaili wan-nahaari sirranw wa-'alaaniyatan falahum ajruhum 'inda Rabbihim wa-laa khawfun 'alaihim wa-laa hum yahzanoon

2:275.t: Allazeena ya`akuloo`nar ribaa laa yaqoomoona illaa kamaa yaqoomul lazee yatakhabba-tuhush shaitaanu minal mass,(i) zaalika bi-annahum qaalooo innamal bai'u mislur ribaa: wa-ahallal laahul bai'a wa-harramar ribaa, faman jaaa'ahoo maw'izatum mir rabbihee fantahaa falahoo maa salafa wa-amruhooo ilal laah(i); wa-man 'aada fa-ulaaa-'ika As-haabun naar(i); hum feehaa khaalidoon

2:276.t: Yamhaqul laahur ribaa wa-yurbis sadaqaat:(i) wallaahu laa yuhibbu kulla kaffaarin aseem

2:277.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa-amilus saalihaati wa-aqaamus salaata wa-aata-wuz zakaata lahum ajruhum 'inda rabbihim wa-laa khawfun 'alaihim wa-laa hum yahzanoon

2:278.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha wa-zaroo maa baqiya minar ribaaa in kuntum mu'mineen

2:279.t: Fa-il lam taf'aloo faa-zanoo biharbim minal laahi wa-Rasoolih(ee); wa-in tubtum falakum ru'oosu amwaalikum laa tazlimoona wa-laa tuzlamoon

2:280.t: Wa-in kaana zoo 'usratin fa-naziratun ilaa maisarah,(tinw) wa-an tasaddaqoo khairul lakum; in kuntum ta'lamoon

2:281.t: Wattaqoo yawman turja'oona feehi ilal laah(i); summa tuwaffaa kullu nafsim maa kasabat wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

2:282.t: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa tadaayantum bidaiynin ilaa ajalim musamman faktubooh,(u) walyaktub bainakum kaatibum bil'adl,(i) wa-laa yaaba kaatibun aien yaktuba kamaa 'allamahul laah,(u) falyaktub walyum-li-lil lazee 'alaihil haqqu walyattaqil laaha rabbah(oo) wa-laa yabkhas minhu shai'aa,(n) fa-in kaanal lazee 'alaihil haqqu safeehan aw da'eefan aw laa yastatee'u aien yumilla huwa falyumlil waliyyuhoo bil'adl,(i) wastash-hidoo shaheedaini mir rijaalikum; fa-il lam yakoonaa rajulaini farajulunw wamra-ataani mimman tardawna minash shuhadaaa'i an tadilla ihdaahumaa fatuzakkira ihdaahumal ukhraa, wa-laa yaabash shuhadaaa'u izaa maa du'oo, wa-laa tas'amooo an taktuboohu sagheeran aw kabeeran ilaaa ajalih,(i) zaalikum aqsatu 'indal laahi wa-aqwamu lish-shahaadati wa-adnaaa allaa tartaabooo; illaaa an takoona tijaaratan haadiratan tudeeroonahaa bainakum falaisa 'alaikum junaahun allaa taktuboo:(ha) wa-ash-hidooo izaa tabaaya'tum, wa-laa yudaaarra kaatibunw wa-laa shaheed,(un) wa-in taf'aloo fa-innahoo fusooqum bikum: wattaqul laah(a); wa-yu'allimu-kumul laah:(u) wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

2:283.t: ^Wa-in kuntum 'alaa safarinw wa-lam tajidoo kaatiban fari-haanum maqbooda(tun); fa-in amina ba'dukum ba'dan falyu'addil lazi tumina amaa-natahoo wal-yattaqil laaha Rabbah:(u) wa-laa taktumush shahaadah,(ta) wa-maien yaktumhaa fa-innahooo aasimun qalbuh:(u) wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem

2:284.t: Lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wa-maa fil ard:(i) wa-in tubdoo maa feee anfusikum aw tukhfoohu yuhaasibkum bihil laah(u); fayaghfiru li-maien yashaaa'u wa-yu'azzibu maien yashaaa:(oo) wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai-in qadeer

2:285.t: Aamanar Rasoolu bimaaa unzila ilaihi mir Rabbihee walmu'minoon,(a) kullun aamana billaahi wa-Malaaa'ikathihee wa-Kutubhihee wa-Rusulihee laa nufarriqu baina ahadim mir Rusulih,(i) wa-qaaloo sami'naa wa-ata'naa; ghufraanaka Rabbanaa wa-ilaikal maseer

2:286.t: Laa yukalliful laahu nafsan illaa wus'ahaa, lahaa maa kasabat wa'alaihaa mak tasabat: Rabbanaa laa tu'aakhiznaaa in naseenaaa aw akhta`naa, Rabbanaa wa-laa tahmil 'alainaaa isran kamaa hamaltahoo 'alal lazeena min qablinaa, Rabbanaa wa-laa tuhammilnaa maa laa taaqata lanaa bih(i); wa'fu 'annaa waghfir lanaa warhamnaa, Anta mawlaanaa fansurnaa 'alal qawmil kaafireen

3:2.t: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwal Haiyul Qaiyoom

3:3.t: Nazzala 'alaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi musaddiqal limaa baina yadaihi wa-anzalat Tawraata wal-Injeel

3:4.t: Min qablu hudal linnaasi wa-anzalal Furqaan:(a) innal lazeena kafaroo bi-Aayaatil laahi lahum 'azaabun shadeed:(unw) wallaahu 'azeezun zun tiqaam

3:5.t: Innal laaha laa yakhfaa 'alaihi shai'un fil ardi wa-laa fis samaaa'

3:6.t: Huwal lazee yusawwi-rukum fil arhaami kaifa yashaaa,('oo) laa ilaaha illaa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

3:7.t: Huwal lazeee anzala 'alaikal Kitaaba minhu Aayaatum Muh-kamaatun hunna Ummul Kitaabi wa-ukharu Muta-shaabihaat(un); fa-ammal lazeena fee quloobihim zaiyghun fa-yattabi'oona ma tashaa-baha minhub tighaaa 'alfitnati wabtighaaa'a ta`weelih:(i) wa-maa ya'lamu ta`wee-lahooo illal laah:(u) war-raasi-khoona fil 'ilmi yaqooloona aamannaa bihee kullum min 'indi Rabbinaa: wa-maa yazzakkaru illaaa ulul albaab

3:8.t: Rabbanaa laa tuzigh quloobanaa ba'da iz hadaitanaa wa-hab lanaa mil ladunka rahmah,(tan) innaka antal Wahhaab

3:9.t: Rabbanaaa innaka jaami 'un-naasi li-Yawmil laa raiba feeh,(i) innal laaha laa yukhliful mee'aad

3:10.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo lan tughniya 'anhum am-waaluhum wa-laaa aw-laaduhum minal laahi shai'a(nw); wa-ulaaa'ika hum waqoodun Naar

3:11.t: Kada`abi Aali Fir'awna wallazeena min qablihim, kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa fa-akhaza-humul laahu bi-zunoo-bihim: wallaahu shadeedul 'iqaab

3:12.t: Qul lillazeena kafaroo satugh-laboona wa-tuh`sharoona ilaa jahannam,(a) wa-bi'sal mihaad

3:13.t: Qad kaana lakum Aayatun fee fi'atainil taqat(aa); fi'atun tuqaatilu fee sabeelil laahi wa-ukhraa kaafiratuien yaraw`nahum mis`laihim ra`ayal 'ayn,(i) wallaahu yu'ayyidu bi-nasrihee maien yashaaa':(u) innaa fee zaalika la-'ibratal li-ulil absaar

3:14.t: Zuyyina linnaasi hubbush shahawaati minan nisaaa'i wal-baneena wal-qanaa-teeril muqan-tarati minaz zahabi wal-fiddati wal-khailil musaw-wamati wal-an'aami walhars:(i) zaalika mataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa; wallaahu 'indahoo husnul ma-aab

3:15.t: ^Qul a'unabbi-'ukum bikhairim min zaalikum, lil-lazeenat taqaw 'inda Rabbihim jannaatun tajree min tah-tihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa wa-azwaajum mutah-haratunw wa-ridwaanum minal laah:(i) wallaahu baseerum bil'ibaad

3:16.t: Allazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaaa innanaaa aamannaa faghfir lanaa zunoobanaa wa-qinaa 'azaaban Naar

3:17.t: Assaabireena wassaa-diqeena walqaaniteena walmunfiqeena walmus-taghfireena bil-as-haar

3:18.t: Shahidal laahu annahoo laa ilaaha illaa Huwa wal-malaaa'ikatu wa-ulul 'ilmi qaaa'imam bilqist; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

3:19.t: Innad deena 'indal laahil Islaam;(u) wamakh talafal lazeena ootul Kitaaba illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum: wa-mai yakfur bi-Aayaatil laahi fa-innal laaha saree'ul hisaab

3:20.t: Fa-in haaaj-jooka faqul aslamtu wajhiya lillaahi wa-manit taba'an:(i) wa-qul lillazeena ootul Kitaaba wal-ummiyyeena 'a-aslamtum, fa-in aslamoo faqadih tadaw; wa-in tawallaw fa-innamaa 'alaikal balaagh:(u) wallaahu baseerum bil-'ibaad

3:21.t: Innal lazeena yakfuroona bi-Aayaatil laahi wa-yaqtuloonan Nabiyyeena bighairi haqqinw wa-yaqtuloonal lazeena yaa`muroona bilqisti minan naasi fabash-shirhum bi'azaabin aleem

3:22.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena habitat a'maaluhum fid dunyaa wal-Aaakhirah(ti) wa-maa lahum min naasireen

3:23.t: Alam tara ilal lazeena ootoo naseebam minal Kitaabi yud'awna ilaa Kitaabil laahi liyah-kuma bai-nahum summa yata-wallaa fareequm minhum wa-hum mu'ridoon

3:24.t: Zaalika bi-annahum qaaloo lan tamassanan naaru illaaa ayyaamam ma'doodaat(inw); wa-gharrahum fee deenihim maa kaanoo yaftaroon

3:25.t: Fa-kaifa izaa jama'naahum li-Yawmil laa raiba fee wa-wuffiyat kullu nafsim maa kasabat wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

3:26.t: Qulil laahumma Maalikal Mulki tu'til mulka man tashaaa'u wa-tanzi'ul mulka mimman tashhaaa'u wa-tu'izzu man tashaaa'u wa-tuzillu man tashaaa'(u); biyadikal khair(u); innaka 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

3:27.t: Toolijul laila fin nahaari wa-toolijun nahaara fil lail(i); wa-tukhrijul haiya minal maiy-yiti wa-tukhrijul maiy-yita minal haiy(yi); wa-tarzuqu man tashaaa'u bighari hisaab

3:28.t: Laa yatta-khizil mu'minoonal kaafireena awliyaaa'a min doonil mu'mineen(a); wa-maien yaf'al zaalika falaisa minal laahi fee shai'in illaaa an tat-taqoo minhum tuqaah:(tan) wa-yuhazzi-rukumul laahu nafsah:(u) wa-ilal laahil maseer

3:29.t: Qul in tukhfoo maa fee sudoorikum aw tubdoohu ya'lamhul laah:(u) wa-ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wa-maa fil ard:(i) wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

3:30.t: Yawma tajidu kullu nafsim maa 'amilat min khairim muh-dara(nw) wa-maa 'amilat min sooo'in tawaddu law anna baina-haa wa-baina-hooo amadam ba'eedaa:(an) wa-yuhazzi-rukumul laahu nafsah:(u) wallaahu ra'oofum bil'ibaad

3:31.t: Qul in kuntum tuhib-boonal laaha fattabi'-oonee yuh`bib-kumul laahu wa-yaghfir lakum zunoobakum: wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

3:32.t: Qul atee'ul laaha war-Rasool(a); fa-in tawallaw fa-innal laaha laa yuhibbul kaafireen

3:33.t: ^Innal laahas tafaaa Aadama wa-Noohanw wa-Aala Ibraaheema wa-Aala Imraana 'alal 'aalameen

3:34.t: Zurriyyatam ba'duhaa mim ba'd:(inw) wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

3:35.t: Iz qaalat im'ra-atu 'Imraana Rabbi innee nazartu laka maa fee batnee muhar-ra-ra(n) fataqabbal min(nee); innaka Antas Samee'ul 'Aleem

3:36.t: Fa-lammaa wada'at-haa qaalat Rabbi innee wada'tuhaaa unsaa wallaahu a'lamu bimaa wada'at wa-laisaz zakaru kalunsaa; wa-innee sammai-tuhaa Maryama wa-innee u'eezuhaa bika wa-zurriy-yatahaa minash Shaitaanir Rajeem

3:37.t: Fata-qabba-lahaa Rabbuhaa biqaboolin hasaninw wa-ambatahaa nabaatan hasananw wa-kaffalahaa Zakariyyaa; kullamaa dakhala 'alaihaa Zakariyyal Mihraaba wajada 'indahaa rizqa(n); qaala yaa-Maryamu annaa laki haazaa; qaalat huwa min 'indil laah(i); innal laaha yarzuqu maien yashaaa'u bighairi hisaab

3:38.t: Hunaaa-lika da'aa Zakariyyaa Rabbah(oo); qaala Rabbi hab lee mil ladunka zurriyyatan taiyiba(tan); innaka samee'ud du'aaa'

3:39.t: Fanaadat-hul malaaa'ikatu wa-huwa qaaa'ee-muien yusallee fil Mihraabi annal laaha yubash-shiruka bi-Yahyaa musaddiqam bi-Kalimatim minal laah(i) wa-saiyidanw wa-hasooranw wa-Nabiyyam minas saaliheen

3:40.t: Qaala Rabbi annaa yakoonu lee ghulaamunw wa-qad bala-gha-niyal kibaru wam-raatee 'aaqir(un); qaala kazaa-likal laahu yaf'alu maa yashaaa'

3:41.t: Qaala Rabbij 'al leee Aayah(tan); qaala Aaayatuka allaa tukalliman naasa salaasata ayyaamin illa ramzaa:(an) wazkur Rabbaka kaseeranw wa-sabbih bil'ashiyyi wal-ib-kaar

3:42.t: Wa-iz qaa-latil malaaa'ikatu yaa-Maryamu innal laahas tafaaki wa-tah-haraki wastafaaki 'alaa nisaaa'il 'aalameen

3:43.t: Yaa-Maryamu uq-nutee li-Rabbiki wasjudee warka'ee ma'ar raaki'een

3:44.t: Zaalika min ambaaa'il ghaibi noo-heehi ilaik,(a) wa-maa kunta ladai`him iz yulqoona aq`laamahum ayyuhum yak-fulu Maryama wa-maa kunta ladai-him iz yakh-tasimoon

3:45.t: Iz qaa-latil malaaa'ikatu yaa-Maryamu innal laaha yubash-shiruki bi-Kalimatim minhus muhul Maseehu 'Eesab nu Maryama wajeehan fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati wa-minal muqar-rabeen

3:46.t: Wa-yukallimun naasa fil mahdi wa-kahlanw wa-minas saaliheen

3:47.t: Qaalat Rabbi annaa yakoonu lee waladunw wa-lam yamsa-snee bashar(un); qaala kazaa-likil laahu yakhluqu maa yashaaa',(oo) izaa qadaaa amran fa-innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fayakoon

3:49.t: Wa-Rasoolan ilaa Baneee Israaa'eela annee qad ji'tukum bi-Aayatim mir Rabbikum; annee akhluqu lakum minat teeni kahai'atit tairi fa-anfukhu feehi fayakoonu tairam bi-iznil laah(i); wa-ubri'ul akmaha wal-abrasa wa-uhyil mawtaa bi-iznil laah(i); wa-unabbi'ukum bimaa taa`kuloona wa-maa tadda-khiroona fee buyootikum, inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal lakum in kuntum mu'mineen

3:50.t: Wa-musaddiqal limaa baina yadaiy-yaa minat Tawraati wa-li-uhilla lakum ba'dal lazee hurrima 'alaikum, wa-ji'tukum bi-Aayatim mir Rabbikum fattaqul laaha wa-atee'oon

3:51.t: Innal laaha Rabbee wa-Rabbukum fa'budooh:(u) haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem

3:52.t: ^Fa-lammaaa ahassa 'Eesaa min-humul kufra qaala man ansaaree ilal laah(i); qaalal Hawaariy-yoona nahnu ansaarul laahi aamannaa billaahi wash-had bi-annaa muslimoon

3:53.t: Rabbanaaa aamannaa bimaaa anzalta wattaba'nar Rasoola faktubnaa ma'ash shaahideen

3:54.t: Wa-makaroo wa-makaral laah(u); wallaahu khairul maakireen

3:55.t: Iz qaalal laahu yaa-'Eesaaa innee mutawaffeeka wa-raafi'uka ilaiya wa-mutah-hiruka minal lazeena kafaroo wa-jaa'ilul lazeenat taba-ooka fawqal lazeena kafarooo ilaa Yawmil Qiyaama(ti); summa ilaiya marji'ukum fa-ahkumu bainakum feemaa kuntum feehi takh-taliifoon

3:56.t: Fa-ammal lazeena kafaroo fa-u'az-zibuhum 'azaaban shadeedan fid dunyaa wal-Aakhira(ti) wa-maa lahum min naasireen

3:57.t: Wa-ammal lazeena aamanoo wa-'amilus saalihaati fa-yuwaf-feehim ujoorahum: wallaahu laa yuhibbuz zaalimeen

3:58.t: Zaalika natloohu 'alaika minal Aayaati wa-Zikril Hakeem

3:59.t: Inna masala 'Eesaa 'indal laahi kamasali Aadam(a); khala-qahoo min turaabin summa qaala lahoo kun fayakoon

3:60.t: Alhaqqu mir Rabbika falaa takum minal mumtareen

3:61.t: Faman haaaj-jaka feehi mim ba'di maa jaaa'aka minal 'ilmi faqul ta'aalaw nad'u abnaaa'anaa wa-abnaaa'akum wa-nisaaa'anaa wa-nisaaa'akum wa-anfusanaa wa-anfusakum summa nabtahil fanaj'al la'natal laahi 'alal kaazibeen

3:62.t: Innaa haazaa lahuwal qasasul haqq,(u) wa-maa min ilaahin illal laah,(u) wa-innal laahaa la-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

3:64.t: Qul yaa-Ahlal Kitaabi ta'aalau ilaa Kalimatin sawaaa'im bainanaa wa-bainakum allaa na'buda illal laaha wa-laa nushrika bihee shai'anw wa-laa yat-takhiza ba'dunaa ba'dan arbaabam min doonil laah,(i) fa-in tawallau faqoo-lush hadoo bi-annaa muslimoon

3:65.t: Yaaa-Ahlal Kitaabi limaa tuhaaaj-joona feee Ibraaheema wa-maaa unzilatit Tawraatu wal-Injeelu illaa mim ba'dih,(ee) afala ta'qiloon

3:66.t: Haaa-antum haaa'ulaaa'i haa-jajtum feemaa lakum bihee 'ilmun falima tuhaaaj-joonaa feemaa laisa lakum bihee 'ilm,(un) wal-laahu ya'lamu wa-antum laa ta'lamoon

3:67.t: Maa kaana Ibraaheemu Yahoodiy-yanw wa-laa Nasraa-niyyanw wa-laakin kaana Haneefam Muslima(nw) wa-maa kaana minal mushrikeen

3:68.t: Innaa awlan naasi bi-Ibraaheema lallazeenat taba-'oohu wa-haazan nabiyyu wallazeena aamanoo: wallaahu waliyyul mu'mineen

3:69.t: Waddat taaa'ifatum min Ahlil Kitaabi lau yudil-loonakum wa-maa yudilloona illaaa anfusa-hum wa-maa yash'uroon

3:70.t: Yaaa-Ahlal Kitaabi lima takfuroona bi-Aayaatil laahi wan-antum tashadoon

3:71.t: Yaaa-Ahalal Kitaabi lima talbisoonal haqqa bilbaatili wa-taktumoonal haqqa wa-antum ta'lamoon

3:72.t: Wa-qaalat taaa'ifatum min Ahlil Kitaabi aaminoo billazeee unzila 'alal lazeena aamanoo waj-han nahaari wak-furooo aakhirahoo la'alla-hum yarji'oon

3:73.t: Wa-laa tu'minooo illaa liman tabi'a deenakum qul innal hudaa hudal laahi aien yu'taaa ahadum misla maaa ooteetum auw yuhaaaj-jookum 'inda Rabbikum: qul innal fadla biyadil laahi yu`teehi maien yashaaa':(u) wal-laahu Waasi'un 'Aleem

3:74.t: Yakhtassu birahmatihee maien yashaaa':(u) wal-laahu zul fadlil 'azeem

3:75.t: ^Wa-min Ahlil Kitaabi man in taa`manhu biqintaarien yu'addihee ilaika wa-minhum man in taamanhu bideenaaril laa yu'addiheee ilaika illaa maa dumta 'alaihi qaaa'ima:(n) zaalika bi-annahum qaaloo laisa 'alainaa fil ummiyyeena sabeel(unw) Wa-yaqooloona 'alal laahil kaziba wa-hum ya'lamoon

3:76.t: Balaa man awfaa bi'ahdihee wattaqaa fa-innal laaha yuhibbul muttaqeen

3:77.t: Innal lazeena yashtaroona bi'ahdil laahi wa-aymaanihim samanan qaleelan ulaaa'ika laa khalaaqa lahum fil Aakhirati wa-laa yukallimu-humul laahu wa-laa yanzuru ilaihim Yawmal Qiyaamati wa-laa yuzakkeehim wa-lahum 'azabun 'aleem

3:78.t: Wa-inna minhum lafaree qaien yalwoona alsinatahum bil Kitaabi litah-saboohu minal Kitaab, Wa-maa huwa minal Kitaabi Wa-yaqooloona huwa min 'indillaahi Wa-maa huwa min 'indillaah(i) Wa-yaqooloona 'alal laahil kaziba Wa-hum ya'lamoon

3:79.t: Maa kaana li-basharin aien yu'tiyahul laahul Kitaaba walhukma wan-Nubuwwata summa yaqoola linnaasi koonoo 'ibaadal lee min doonil laahi Wa-laakin koonoo rabbaaniyeena bimaa kuntum tu'allimoonal Kitaaba Wa-bimaa kuntum tadrusoon

3:80.t: Wa-laa ya`murakum an tat-takhizul malaaa-'ikata wan-Nabiyyeena arbaaba:(n) a`yaamurukum bilkufri ba'da iz antum muslimoon

3:81.t: Wa-iz akhazal laahu meesaaqan Nabiyyeena lamaaa aataitukum min Kitaabinw Wa-Hikmatin summa jaaa'akum Rasoolum musaddiqul limaa ma'akum latu'minunna bihee Wala-tan-surunnah,(u) qaala 'aaqrartum Wa-akhaztum alaa zaalikum isree; qaalooo aqrarnaa, qaala fashhadoo Wa-ana ma'akum minash shaahideen

3:82.t: Faman tawallaa ba'da zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon

3:83.t: Afaghaira deenil laahi yab-ghoona Wa-lahooo aslama man fis samaawaati wal-ardi taw'anw Wa-karhanw Wa-ilaihi yurja'oon

3:84.t: Qul aamannaa billaahi Wa-maaa unzila 'alainaa Wa-maaa unzila 'alaaa Ibraaheema Wa-Ismaa'eela Wa-Iss-haaqa Wa-Ya'qooba wal-Asbaati Wa-maaa ootiya Moosaa Wa-'Eesaa wan-Nabiyyoona mir Rabbihim laa nufarriqu baina ahadim minhum Wa-nahnu lahoo muslimoon

3:85.t: Wa-maien yabtaghi ghairal Islaami deenan falaien yuqbala minhu Wa-huwa fil Aakhirati minal khaasireen

3:86.t: Kaifa yahdil laahu qawman kafaroo ba'da eemaanihim Wa-shahidooo annar Rasoola haqqunw Wa-jaaa'ahumul baiyinaat,(u) wal-laahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

3:87.t: Ulaaa'ika jazaaa'uhum anna 'alaihim la'natal laahi walmalaaa'ikati wannaasi ajma'een

3:88.t: Khaalideena feehaa laa yukhaffafu 'anhumul 'azaabu Wa-laa hum yunzaroon

3:89.t: Illal lazeena taaboo mim ba'di zaalika Wa-aslahoo fa-innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

3:90.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo ba'da eemaanihim summaz daadoo kufral lan tuqbala tawbatuhum Wa-ulaaa'ika humud daaalloon

3:91.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo Wa-maatoo Wa-hum kuffaarun falaien yuqbala min ahadihim mil'ul ardi zahabanw Wa-la-wif tadaa bih:(ee) ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleemunw Wa-maa lahum min naasireen

3:92.t: Lan tanaalul birra hattaa tunfiqoo mimmaa tuhibboon,(a) Wa-maa tunfiqoo min shai'in fa-innal laaha bihee 'Aleem

3:93.t: ^Kullut ta'aami kaana hillal li-Baneee Israaa'eela illaa maa harrama Israaa'eelu 'alaa nafsihee min qabli an tunazzalat Tawraah:(tu) qul faa`too bit-Tawraati fatloohaaa in kuntum saadiqeen

3:94.t: Famanif taraa 'alal laahil kaziba mim ba'di zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

3:95.t: Qul sadaqal laah:(u) fattabi'oo Millata Ibraaheema Haneefanw Wa-maa kaana minal mush-rikeen

3:96.t: Inna awwala Baitinw wudi'a linnaasi lallazee bi-Bakkata mubaarakanw Wa-hudal lil-'aalameen

3:97.t: Feehi Aayaatum baiyinaatum Maqaamu Ibraaheem(a); Wa-man dakha-lahoo kaana aamina:(n) Wa-lillaahi 'alan naasi Hijjul Baiti manis tataa'a ilaihi sabeela,(n) Wa-man kafara fa-innal laaha ghaniyyun 'anil 'aalameen

3:98.t: Qul yaaa-Ahlal Kitaabi lima takfuroona bi-Aayaatil laahi wallaahu shaheedun 'alaa maa ta'maloon

3:99.t: Qul yaaa-Ahlal Kitaabi lima tasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi man aamana tab-ghoo-nahaa 'iwajanw Wa-antum shuhadaaa':(u) Wa-mal laahu bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon

3:100.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo in tutee'oo fareeqam minal lazeena ootul Kitaaba yaruddookum ba'da eemaanikum kaafireen

3:101.t: Wa-kaifa takfuroona Wa-antum tutlaa 'alaikum Aayaatul laahi Wa-feekum Rasooluh:(u) Wa-maien ya'tasim bil-laahi faqad hudiya ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

3:102.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha haqqa tuqaatihee Wa-laa tamootunna illaa Wa-antum muslimoon

3:103.t: Wa'tasimoo bi-Hablil laahi jamee'anw Wa-laa tafarraqoo, wazkuroo ni'matal laahi alaikum iz kuntum a'daaa'an fa-allafa baina quloobikum fa-asbah-tum bini'matiheee ikhwaana(nw) Wa-kuntum 'alaa shafaa hufratim minan Naari fa-anqazakum minh:(a) kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakum aayaatihee la'allakum tahtadoon

3:104.t: Waltakum minkum ummatuien yad'oona ilal khairi Wa-ya'muroona bil-ma'roofi Wa-yan-hawna 'anil munkar,(i) Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

3:105.t: Wa-laa takoonoo kallazeena tafarraqoo wakhtalafoo mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul baiyinaat,(u) Wa-ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun 'azeem

3:106.t: Yawma tabi-yaddu wujoohunw Wa-taswaddu wujooh,(un) fa-ammal lazeenas waddat wujoo-hum akafartum ba'da eemaanikum fazooqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon

3:107.t: Wa-ammal lazeena bi-yaddat wujoohuhum fafee rahmatil laahi hum feehaa khaalidoon

3:108.t: Tilka Aayaatul laahi natloohaa 'alaika bilhaqq:(i) Wa-mal laahu yureedu zulmal lil'aalameen

3:109.t: Wa-lillaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ard:(i) Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

3:110.t: Kuntum khaira ummatin ukhrijat linnaasi ta'muroona bilma'roofi Wa-tanhawna 'anil munkari Wa-tu'minoona billaah:(i) Wa-law aamana Ahlul Kitaabi lakaana khairal lahum, minhumul mu'minoona Wa-aksaru-humul faasiqoon

3:111.t: Laien yadurrookum 'illaaa aza(nw); Wa-ien yuqaa-tilookum yuwal-lookumul adbaara summa laa yunsaroon

3:112.t: Duribat 'alaihimuz zillatu aina maa suqifooo illaa bihablim minal laahi Wa-hablim minan naasi Wa-baaa'oo bighadabim minal laahi Wa-duribat 'alaihimul maskanah,(tu) zaalika bi-annahum kaanoo yakfuroona bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-yaqtuloonal Ambiyaaa'a bighairi haqq,(in) zaalika bimaa 'asaw Wa-kaanoo ya'tadoon

3:113.t: ^Laisoo sawaaa'a:(n) min Ahlil Kitaabi ummatun qaaa'ima-tuien yatloona Aayaatil laahi aanaaa'al laili Wa-hum yasjudoon

3:114.t: Yu'minoona billaahi wal-Yawmil Aakhiri Wa-ya'muroona bilma'roofi Wa-yanhawna 'anil munkari Wa-yusaari'oona fil khairaat(i) Wa-ulaaa'ika minas saaliheen

3:115.t: Wa-maa yaf'aloo min khairin falaien yukfarooh:(u) wal-laahu 'aleemun bil-muttaqeen

3:116.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo lan tughniya 'anhum amwaaluhum Wa-laaa awlaaduhum minal laahi shai'a(nw); Wa-ulaaa'ika As-haabun Naar,(i) hum feehaa khaalidoon

3:117.t: Masalu maa yunfiqoona fee haazihil hayaatid dunyaa kamasali reehin feehaa sirrun asaabat harsa qawmin zalamooo anfusahum fa-ahlakath,(hu) Wa-maa zalamahumul laahu Wa-laakin anfusahum yazlimoon

3:118.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tat-takhizoo bitaa-natam min doonikum laa ya'loonakum khabaala(nw) waddoo maa 'anittum qad badatil baghdaaa'u min afwaahihim; Wa-maa tukhfee sudooruhum akbar,(u) qad baiyannaa lakumul Aayaat(i); in kuntum ta'qiloon

3:119.t: Haaa-antum ulaaa'i tuhib-boonahum Wa-laa yuhib-boonakum Wa-tu'minoona bil-kitaabi kullihee Wa-izaa laqookum qaalooo aamannaa Wa-izaa khalaw 'addoo 'alaikumul anaa-mila minal ghaiz,(i) qul mootoo bighai-zikum: innal laaha 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

3:120.t: In tamsaskum hasanatun tasu'hum Wa-in tusibkum saiyyi'a-tuien yafrahoo bih(aa); Wa-in tasbiroo Wa-tattaqoo laa yadurrukum kaiduhum shai'a:(n) innal laaha bimaa ya'maloona muheet

3:121.t: Wa-iz ghadawta min ahlika tubawwi'ul mu'mineena maqaa'ida lilqitaal:(i) wal-laahu samee'un 'aleem

3:122.t: Iz hammat taaa'ifataani minkum an taf-shalaa wal-laahu waliyyuhum:(a) Wa-'alal laahi fal-yatawak-kalil mu'minoon

3:123.t: Wa-laqad nasarakumul laahu bi-Badrinw Wa-antum azilla(tun); fattaqul laaha la'allakum tashkuroon

3:124.t: Iz taqoolu lil-mu'mineena alaien yakfiyakum aien yumiddakum Rabbukum bi-salaa-sati aalaafim minal malaaa'ikati munzaleen

3:125.t: Balaaa, in tasbiroo Wa-tattaqoo Wa-ya'tookum min fawrihim haazaa yumdidkum Rabbukum bi-khamsati aalaafim minal malaaa'ikati musawwimeen

3:126.t: Wa-maa ja'alahul laahu illaa bushraa lakum Wa-litatma'inna quloobukum bih:(i) Wa-man nasru illaa min 'indil laahil 'Azeezil Hakeem

3:127.t: Liyaqta'a tarafam minal lazeena kafarooo auw yakbitahum fayan-qaliboo khaaa'ibeen

3:128.t: Laisa laka minal amri shai'un auw yatooba 'alaihim auw yu'az-zi-bahum fa-innahum zaalimoon

3:129.t: Wa-lilaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ard,(i) yaghfiru limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yu'azzibu maien yashaaa',(u) wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

3:130.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la takulu ribaaa ad'aafam mudaa'afa(tanw); wattaqul laaha la'allakum tuflihoon

3:133.t: ^Wa-saari'ooo ilaa maghfiratim mir Rabbikum Wa-Jannatin ar-duhas samaawaatu wal-ardu u'iddat lilmuttaqeen

3:134.t: Allazeena yunfiqoona fis sarraaa'i wad-darraaa'i wal-kaazimeenal ghaiza wal-aafeena 'anin naas:(i) wal-laahu yuhibbul muhsineen

3:135.t: Wal-lazeena izaa fa'aloo faa-hishatan aw zalamooo anfusahum zakarul laaha fastagh-faroo li-zunoobihim; Wa-maien yaghfiruz zunooba illal laahu Wa-lam yusirroo 'alaa maa fa'aloo Wa-hum ya'lamoon

3:136.t: Ulaaa'ika jazaaa'uhum maghfiratum mir Rabbihim Wa-Jannaatun tajree min tah-tihal anhaaru khaalideena feeha, Wa-ni'ma ajrul 'aamileen

3:137.t: Qad khalat min qablikum sunann faseeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqiba-tul mukazzibeen

3:138.t: Haazaa bayaanul linnaasi Wa-hudanw Wa-maw'izatul lil-muttaqeen

3:139.t: Wa-laa tahinoo Wa-laa tahzanoo Wa-antumul a'lawna in kuntum mu'mineen

3:140.t: Iien yamsaskum qarhum faqad massal qawma qarhum misluh,(u) Wa-tilkal ayyaamu nudaa-wiluhaa bainan naasi Wa-liya'lamal laahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-yattakhiza minkum shuhadaaa:('a) wal-laahu laa yuh-ibbuz zaalimeen

3:141.t: Wa-liyumah-hisal laahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-yamhaqal kaafireen

3:142.t: Am hasibtum an tadkhulul Jannnata Wa-lammaa ya'lamil laahul lazeena jaahadoo minkum Wa-ya'lamas saabireen

3:143.t: Wa-laqad kuntum tamann-nawnal mawta min qabli an tal-qawhu faqad ra-aitu-moohu Wa-antum tanzuroon

3:144.t: Wa-maa Muhammadun illaa Rasoolun qad khalat min qablihir Rusul,(u) afa'im maata auw qutilan qalabtum 'alaaa a'qaabikum, Wa-maien yanqalib 'alaa aqibaihi falaien yadurral laaha shai'a:(n) Wa-sayajzil laahush shaakireen

3:145.t: Wa-maa kaana linafsin an tamoota illaa bi-iznil laahi kitaabam mu'ajjala:(n) Wa-maien yurid sawaabad dunyaa nu'tihee minhaa Wa-maien yurid sawaabal Aakhirati nu'tihee minhaa, Wa-sanaj-zish shaakireen

3:146.t: Wa-ka-aiyim min Nabiyyin qaatala ma'ahoo ribbiy-yoona kaseerun famaa wahanoo limaaa Asaabahum fee sabeelil laahi Wa-maa da'ufoo Wa-mas takaanoo: wallaahu yuhibbus saabireen

3:147.t: Wa-maa kaana qawlahum illaa an qaaloo Rabbanagh fir lanaa zunoobanaa Wa-israafanaa feee amrinaa Wa-sabbit aqdaamanaa wansurnaa 'alal qawmil kaafireen

3:148.t: Fa-aataahumul laahu sawaabad dunyaa Wa-husna sawaabil Aakhirah:(ti) wal-laahu yuhibbul muhsineen

3:149.t: Yaaa-'aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo in tutee'ul lazeena kafaroo yarud-dookum 'alaaa a'qaabikum fatan-qaliboo khaasireen

3:150.t: Balil laahu maw-laakum; Wa-Huwa khairun naasireen

3:151.t: Sanulqee fee quloobil lazeena kafarur ru'ba bimaaa ashrakoo bil-laahi maa lam yunazzil bihee sultaana(nw); Wa-ma`wa-humun Naar,(u) Wa-bi'sa maswaz zaalimeen

3:152.t: Wa-laqad sadaqakumul laahu wa'dahooo iz tahussoo-nahum bi-iznih(ee); hattaaa izaa fashiltum Wa-tanaaza'tum fil amri Wa-'asaitum mim ba'di maaa araakum maa tuhibboon,(a) minkum maien yureedud dunyaa Wa-minkum maien yureedul Aakhira(h),(ta) summa sarafakum 'anhum liyab-taliyakum; Wa-laqad 'afaa 'ankum: wal-laahu zoo fadlin 'alal mu'mineen

3:153.t: ^Iz tus'idoona Wa-laa talwoona 'alaaa ahadinw war-Rasoolu yad'ookum feee ukhraakum fa-asaabakum ghammam bighammil likailaa tahzanoo 'alaa maa faatakum Wa-laa maaa asaabakum: wal-laahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

3:154.t: Summa anzala 'alaikum mim ba'dil ghammi amanatan nu'aasai yaghshaa taaa'-ifatam minkum; Wa-taaa'ifatun qad ahammat-hum an-fusuhum yazun-noona bil-laahi ghairal haqqi zannal jaahiliyya(ti); yaqooloona hal lanaa minal amri min shai':(in) qul innal amra kullahoo lillaah:(i) yukhfoona fee anfusihim maa laa yubdoona lak(a); yaqooloona law kaana lanaa minal amri shai'um maa qutilnaa haahun:(a) qul law kuntum fee buyootikum laba-razal lazeena kutiba 'alaihimul qatlu ilaa madaa-ji'ihim; Wa-liyab-taliyal laahu maa fee sudoorikum Wa-liyumah-hisa maa fee quloobikum: wallaahu 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

3:155.t: Innal lazeena tawallaw minkum yawmal taqal jam'aani innamas tazal-lahumush Shaitaanu biba'di maa kasaboo; Wa-laqad 'afal laahu 'anhum: innnal laaha Ghafoorun Haleem

3:156.t: Yaaa-ayyuhul lazeena aamanoo laa takoonoo kallazeena kafaroo Wa-qaaloo li-ikhwaanihim izaa daraboo fil ardi auw kaanoo ghuzzal law kaanoo 'indanaa maa maatoo Wa-maa qutiloo liyaj'alal laahu zaalika hasratan fee quloobihim: wal-laahu yuhyee Wa-yumeet:(u) wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

3:157.t: Wa-la'in qutiltum fee sabeelil laahi auw muttum la-maghfiratum minal laahi Wa-rahmatun khairum mimmaa yajma'oon

3:158.t: Wa-la'im muttum 'auw qutiltum la-ilal lahi tuhsharoon

3:159.t: Fabimaa rahmatim minal laahi linta lahum; Wa-law kunta fazzan ghaleezal qalbi lan-faddoo min hawlik(a); fa'afu 'anhum wastaghfir lahum Wa-shaawir-hum fil amr(i); fa-izaa 'azamta fatawakkal 'alal laah,(i) innal laaha yuhibbul mutawak-kileen

3:160.t: Iien yansur-kumul laahu falaa ghaaliba lakum; Wa-ien yakh-zulkum faman zal lazee yan-surukum min ba'dih:(i) Wa-'alal laahi fal-yatawak-kalil mu'minoon

3:161.t: Wa-maa kaana li-Nabiyyin aien yaghull,(a) Wa-maien yaghlul ya'ti bimaa ghalla Yawmal Qiyaamah,(ti) summa tuwaffaa kullu nafsim maa kasabat Wa-hum laa yuz-lamoon

3:162.t: Afamanit taba'a Ridwaanal laahi kamam baaa'a bi-sakha-tim minal laahi Wa-ma'waahu Jahannam,(u) Wa-bi'sal maseer

3:163.t: Hum darajaatun 'indal laah:(i) wallaahu baseerum bimaa ya'maloon

3:164.t: Laqad mannal laahu 'alal mu'mineena iz ba'asa feehim Rasoolam min an-fusihim yatloo 'alaihim Aayaa-tihee Wa-yuzak-keehim Wa-yu'allimu-humul Kitaaba wal-Hikma(ta) Wa-in kaanoo min qablu lafee dalaalim mubeen

3:165.t: Awa-lammaaa asaa-batkum museebatun qad asabtum mislaihaa qultum annaa haazaa; qul huwa min 'indi anfusikum: innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

3:166.t: Wa-maa asaabakum yawmal taqal jam'aani fabi-iznil laahi Wa-liya'lamal mu'mineen

3:167.t: Wa-liya'lamal lazeena naafaqoo, Wa-qeela lahum ta'aalaw qaatiloo fee sabeelil laahi awid fa'oo; qaaloo law na'lamu qitaalal-lat taba'naakum: hum lilkufri yawma'izin aqrabu minhum lil-eemaan,(i) yaqooloona bi-afwaahi-him maa laisa fee quloobihim; wal-laahu a'lamu bimaa yaktumoon

3:168.t: Allazeena qaaloo li-ikhwaanihim Wa-qa'adoo law ataa'oonaa maa qutiloo: qul fadra'oo an anfusi-kumul mawta in kuntum saadiqeen

3:169.t: Wa-laa tahsabannal lazeena qutiloo fee sabeelil laahi amwaata,(m) bal ahyaaa'un 'inda Rabbihim yurzaqoon
