6:119.t: Wa-maa lakum allaa ta'kuloo mimmaa zukiras mul laahi 'alaihi Wa-qad fassala lakum maa harrama 'alaikum illaa mad turirtum ilaih; Wa-inna kaseeral la-yudilloona bi-ahwaaa'ihim bighairi 'ilm; inna Rabbaka Huwa a'lamu bilmu'tadeen

6:120.t: Wa-zaroo zaahiral ismi Wa-baatinah; innal lazeena yaksiboonal ismaa sa-yujzawna bimaa kaanoo yaqtarifoon

6:121.t: Wa-laa ta'kuloo mimmaa lam yuzkaris mul laahi 'alaihi Wa-innahoo lafisq; Wa-innash Shayaateena la-yoohoona ilaaa awliyaaa'ihim liyujaadilookum Wa-in ata'tumoohum innakum lamushrikoon

6:122.t: Awa-man kaana maitan fa-ah-yaiynaahu Wa-ja'alnaa lahoo nooraien yamshee bihee fin naasi kamamm masaluhoo fiz zulumaati laisa bikhaarijim minhaa; kazaalika zuyyina lilkaafireena maa kaanoo ya'maloon

6:123.t: Wa-kazaalika ja'alnaa fee kulli qaryatin akaa-bira mujri-meehaa liyamkuroo feehaa Wa-maa yamkuroona illaa bi-anfusihim Wa-maa yash'uroon

6:124.t: Wa-izaa jaaa'athum Aayatun qaaloo lan nu'mina hatta nu'taa misla maaa ootiya Rusulul laah; Allahu a'almu haisu yaj'alu Risaalatah; sa-yuseebul lazeena ajramoo saghaarun 'indal laahi Wa-'azaabun shadeedum bimaa kaanoo yamkuroon

6:125.t: Famaien yuridil laahu aien yahdiyahoo yashrah sadrahoo lil-islaami Wa-maien yurid aien yudillahoo yaj'al sadrahoo daiyyiqan harajan ka-annamaa yassa'-adu fis samaaa'; kazaalika yaj'alul laahur rijsa 'alal lazeena laa yu'minoon

6:126.t: Wa-haazaa siraatu Rabbika Mustaqeemaa; qad fassalnal Aayaati liqawmien yazzakkaroon

6:127.t: Lahum daarus salaami 'inda Rabbihim Wa-huwa waliyyuhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

6:128.t: Wa-yawma yah-shuruhum jamee'a(ien) yaa-ma'sharal jinni qadis taksartum minal insi Wa-qaala awliyaa'uhum minal insi Rabbanas tamta'a ba'dunaa biba'dinw Wa-balaghnaaa ajalannal lazeee ajjalta lanaa; qaalan naaru maswaakum khaalideena feehaaa illaa maa shaaa 'allaah; inna Rabbaka Hakeemun 'Aleem

6:129.t: Wa-kazaalika nuwallee ba'daz zaalimeena ba'dam bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

6:130.t: Yaa-ma'sharal jinni wal-insi alam ya'tikum Rusulum minkum yaqussoona 'alaikum Aayaatee Wa-yunziroonakum liqaaa'a Yawmikum haazaa; qaaloo shahidnaa 'alaaa anfusinaa Wa-gharrat-humul hayaatud dunyaa Wa-shahidooo 'alaa anfusihim annahum kaanoo kaafireen

6:131.t: Zaalika al lam yakkur Rabbuka muhlikal quraa bizulminw Wa-ahluhaa ghaafiloon

6:132.t: Wa-likullin darajaatum mimmaa 'amiloo; Wa-maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ya'maloon

6:133.t: Wa-Rabbukal ghaniyyu zur rahmah(ti); ien yasha' yuz-hibkum Wa-yastakhlif mim ba'dikum maa yashaaa('u) kamaaa ansha-akum min zurriyyati qawmin aakhareen

6:134.t: Inna maa too'adoona la-aatinw Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeen

6:135.t: Qul yaa-qawmi' maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamil(un) fasawfa ta'lamoona man takoonu lahoo 'aaqibatud daar; innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon

6:136.t: Wa-ja'aloo lillaahi mimmaa zara-a minal harsi walan'aami naseeba(n) faqaaloo haazaa lillaahi biza'mihim Wa-haaza lishurakaa'inaa famaa kaana lishurakaaa'ihim falaa yasilu ilal laah(i) Wa-maa kaana lillaahi fahuwa yasilu ilaa shurakaaa'ihim; saaa'a maa yahkumoon

6:137.t: Wa-kazaalika zaiyyana likaseerim minal mushrikeena qatla awlaadihim shurakaaa'uhum liyurdoohum Wa-liyalbisoo 'alaihim deenahum Wa-law shaaa'al laahu maa fa'aloohu fazarhum Wa-maa yaftaroon

6:138.t: Wa-qaaloo haaziheee an'aamunw Wa-harsun hijrun laa yat'amuhaaa illaa man nashaaa'u biza'mihim Wa-an'aamun hurrimat zuhooruhaa Wa-an'aamul laa yazkuroonas mal laahi 'alaihaf tiraaa'an 'alaiyyh; sa-yajzeehim bimaa kaanoo yaftaroon

6:139.t: Wa-qaaloo maa fee butooni haazihil an'aami khaalisatul lizukoorinaa Wa-muharramun 'alaaa azwaajinaa Wa-ien yakum maitatan fahum feehi shurakaaa'; sa-yajzeehim wasfahum; innahoo Hakeemun 'Aleem

6:140.t: Qad khasiral lazeena qatalooo awlaadahum safaham bighairi 'ilminw Wa-harramoo maa razaqahumul laahuf tiraaa'an 'alal laah; qad dalloo Wa-maa kaanoo muhtadeen

6:141.t: Wa-Huwal lazee ansha-a jannaatim ma'rooshaatinw Wa-ghaira ma'rooshaa(tinw) wan-nakhla wazzar'a mukhtalifan ukuluhoo wazzaitoona warrum-maana mutashaabiha(nw) Wa-ghaira mutashaabih; kuloo min samariheee izaaa asmara Wa-aatoo haqqahoo yawma hasaadihee Wa-laa tusrifoo; innahoo laa yuhibbul musrifeen

6:142.t: Wa-minal an'aami hamoolatanw Wa-farshaa; kuloo mimmaa razaqakumul laahu Wa-laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish Shaitaan; innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen

6:143.t: Samaaniyata azwaaj(im) minad da'nis naini Wa-minal ma'zis nain; qul 'aaaz-zaka-raini harrama amil unsa-yaiyni ammash tamalat 'alaihi arhaamul unsayaiyn(i) nabbi-'oonee bi'ilmin in kuntum saadiqeen

6:144.t: Wa-minal ibilis naini Wa-minal baqaris nain; qul 'aaaz-zakaraini harrama amil unsa-yaiyni ammash tamalat 'alaihi arhaamul unsa-yaiyn(i) am kuntum shuhadaaa'a iz wassaa-kumul laahu bihaazaa; faman azlamu mimmanif taraa 'alal laahi kazibal liyuddillan naasa bighairi 'ilm; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

6:145.t: Qul laaa ajidu fee maaa oohiya ilaiyya muharraman 'alaa taa'imien yat'amuhooo illaaa aien yakoona maitatan aw damam masfoohan aw lahma khinzeerin fa-innahoo rijsun aw fisqan uhilla lighairil laahi bih; famanid turra ghaira baa-ghinw Wa-laa 'aadin fa-inna Rabbaka Ghafoorur Raheem

6:146.t: Wa-'alal lazeena haadoo harramnaa kulla zee zufur(inw) Wa-minal baqari walghanami harramnaa 'alaihim shuhoo-mahumaaa illaa maa hamalat zuhoo-ruhumaaa awil hawaayaaa aw makh talata bi'azm; zaalika jazainaahum bibagh-yihim Wa-innaa la-saadiqoon

6:147.t: Fa-in kazzabooka faqur Rabbukum zoo rahmatinw waasi'a(tinw) Wa-laa yuraddu ba'suhoo 'anil qawmil mujrimeen

6:148.t: Sayaqoolul lazeena ashrakoo law shaaa'al laahu maaa ashraknaa Wa-laaa aabaaa'unaa Wa-laa harramnaa min shai'; kazaalika kazzabal lazeena min qablihim hattaa zaaqoo ba'sanaa; qul hal 'indakum min 'ilmin fatukh-rijoohu lanaa in tattabi'oona illaz zanna wa-in antum illaa takhhrusoon

6:149.t: Qul falillaahil hujjatul baalighatu falaw shaaa'a lahadaakum ajma'een

6:150.t: Qul halumma shuhadaaa'akumul lazeena yash-hadoona annal laaha harrama haazaa fa-in shahidoo falaa tashhad ma'ahum; Wa-laa tattabi' ahwaaa'al lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa wallazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhira(ti) Wa-hum bi-Rabbihim ya'diloon

6:151.t: Qul ta'aalaw atlu maa harrama Rabbukum 'alaikum allaa tushrikoo bihee shai'anw Wa-bil-waalidaini ihsaana(nw) Wa-laa taqtulooo awlaadakum min imlaaqin nahnu narzuqukum Wa-iyyaahum Wa-laa taqrabul fawaahisha maa zahara minhaa Wa-maa batana Wa-laa taqtulun nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqq; zaalikum wassaakum bihee la'allakum ta'qiloon

6:152.t: Wa-laa taqraboo maalal yateemi illaa billatee hiyaa ahsanu hattaa yablugha ashudda(hoo) Wa-aoful kaila wal-meezaana bilqisti laa nukallifu nafsan illaa wus'ahaa Wa-izaa qultum fa'diloo Wa-law kaana zaa qurbaa Wa-bi-'ahdil laahi awfoo; zaalikum wassaakum bihee la'allakum tazakkaroon

6:153.t: Wa-annna haazaa Siraatee mustaqeeman fattabi'oo(hu) Wa-laa tattabi'us subula fata-farraqa bikum 'an sabeelih; zaalikum wassaakum bihee la'allakum tattaqoon

6:154.t: Summa aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba tammaaman 'alal lazeee ahsana Wa-tafseelal likulli shai'inw Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal la'allahum bi-liqaaa'i Rabbihim yu'minoon

6:155.t: Wa-haazaa Kitaabun anzalnaahu Mubaarakun fattabi'oohu wattaqoo la'al-lakum turhamoon

6:156.t: An taqooloo inna-maaa unzilal Kitaabu 'alaa taaa'ifataini min qablinaa Wa-in kunnaa 'an diraa-satihim laghaafileen

6:157.t: Aw taqooloo law annaaa unzila 'alainal kitaabu lakunnaaa ahdaa minhum; faqad jaaa'akum baiyyinatum mir Rabbikum Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmah; faman azlamu mimman kazzaba bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-sadafa 'anhaa; sanajzil lazeena yasdifoona 'an Aayaatinaa sooo'al 'azaabi bimaa kaanoo yasdifoon

6:158.t: Hal yanzuroona illaaa an ta'tiyahumul malaaa'ikatu aw ya'tiya Rabbuka aw ya'tiya ba'du Aayaati Rabbik; yawma ya'tee ba'du Aayaati Rabbika laa yanfa'u nafsan eemaanuhaa lam takun aamanat min qablu aw kasabat feee eemaanihaa khairaa; qulin tazirooo innaa muntaziroon

6:159.t: Innal lazeena farraqoo deenahum Wa-kaanoo shiya'al lasta minhum fee shaiyy'; innamaaa amruhum ilal laahi summa yunabbi'uhum bimaa kaanoo yaf'aloon

6:160.t: Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo 'ashru amsaalihaa Wa-man jaaa'a bis-saiyyi'ati falaa yujzaaa illaa mislahaa Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

6:161.t: Qul innanee hadaanee Rabbeee ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem(in) deenan qiyamam Millata Ibraaheema haneefa(wn); Wa-maa kaana minal mushrikeen

6:162.t: Qul inna Salaatee Wa-nusukee Wa-mah-yaaya Wa-mamaa-tee lillaahi Rabbil aalameen

6:163.t: Laa shareeka lahoo Wa-bizaalika umirtu Wa-ana awwalul muslimeen

6:164.t: Qul aghairal laahi abghee Rabbanw Wa-Huwa Rabbu kulli shaiy(inw); Wa-laa taksibu kullu nafsin illaa 'alaihaa; Wa-laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; summa ilaa Rabbikum marji'ukum fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon

6:165.t: Wa-Huwal lazee ja'alakum khalaaa'ifal ardi Wa-rafa'a ba'dakum fawqa ba'din darajaatil liyabluwakum fee maaa aataakum; inna Rabbaka saree'ul 'iqaabi Wa-innahoo la-Ghafoorur Raheem

7:2.t: Kitaabun unzila ilaika falaa yakun fee sadrika harajum minhu litunzira bihee Wa-zikraa lilmu'mineen

7:3.t: Ittabi'oo maaa unzila 'ilaikum mir Rabbikum Wa-laa tattabi'oo min dooniheee awliyaaa'; qaleelam maa tazakkaroon

7:4.t: Wa-kam min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa fajaaa'ahaa ba'sunaa bayaatan aw hum qaaa'iloon

7:5.t: Famaa kaana da'waahum iz jaaa'ahum ba'sunaa illaaa an qaalooo innaa kunnaa zaalimeen

7:6.t: Falanas'alannal lazeena ursila ilaihim Wa-lanas'alannal mursaleen

7:8.t: Walwaznu Yawma'izinil haqq(u), faman saqulat mawaa-zeenuhoo fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

7:9.t: Wa-man khaffat mawaazeenuhoo fa-ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum bimaa kaanoo bi-Aayaatinaa yazlimoon

7:10.t: Wa-laqad makkannaakum fil ardi Wa-ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayish; qaleelam maa tashkuroon

7:11.t: Wa-laqad khalaqnaakum summa sawwar-naakum summa qulnaa lil-malaaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fa-sajadooo illaaa Ibleesa lam yakum minas saajideen

7:12.t: Qaala maa mana'aka allaa tasjuda iz amartuk(a) qaala ana khairum minhu khalaqtanee min naarinw Wa-khalaqtahoo min teen

7:13.t: Qaala fahbit minhaa famaa yakoonu laka an ta-ta-kabbara feehaa fakhruj innaka minas saaghireen

7:16.t: Qaala fabimaaa aghwai-tanee la-aq'udanna lahum siraa-takal mustaqeem

7:17.t: Summa la-aatiyan-nahum mim baini aideehim Wa-min khalfihim Wa-'an aimaa-nihim Wa-'an shamaaa'ilihim Wa-laa tajidu aksarahum shaakireen

7:18.t: Qaala khruj minhaa maz'oomam madhooraa(l); laman tabi'aka minhum la-amla'anna Jahannama minkum ajma'een

7:19.t: Wa-yaaa-Aadamus kun anta Wa-zawjukal Jannata fakulaa min haisu shi'tumaa Wa-laa taqrabaa haazihish shajarata fatakoonaa minaz zaalimeen

7:20.t: Fawaswasa lahumash shaitaanu liyubdiya lahumaa maa wooriya 'anhumaa min saw-aatihimaa Wa-qaala maa nahaakumaa Rabbukumaa 'an haazihish shajarati illaaa an takoonaa malakaini aw takoonaa minal khaalideen

7:22.t: Fadal-laahumaa bighuroor; falammaa zaaqash shajarata badat lahumaa saw-aatuhumaa Wa-tafiqaa yakh-sifaani 'alaihimaa minw waraqil jannah(ti) Wa-naadaa-humaa Rabbuhumaaa alam anha-kumaa 'an til-kumash shajarati Wa-aqul lakumaaa innash shaitaana lakumaa 'aduwwum mubeen

7:23.t: Qaalaa Rabbanaa zalamnaaa anfusanaa Wa-il lam taghfir lanaa Wa-tarhamnaa lana-koo-nanna minal khaasireen

7:24.t: Qaalah bitoo ba'dukum liba'din a'duww(unw), Wa-lakum fil ardi mustaqarrunw Wa-mataa'un ilaa heen

7:25.t: Qaala feehaa tah-yawna Wa-feehaa tamoo-toona Wa-minhaa tukhrajoon

7:26.t: Yaa-Baneee Aadama qad anzalnaa 'alaikum libaa-saien yuwaaree saw-aatikum Wa-reesha(nw) Wa-libaasut taqwaa zaalika khair; zaalika min Aayaatil laahi la'allahum yaz-zakkaroon

7:27.t: Yaa-Banee Aadama laa yafti-nanna-kumush shaitaanu kamaaa akhraja aba-waikum minal Jannah(ti) yanzi'u 'anhumaa libaasa-humaa liyuri-yahumaa saw-aati-himaaa; innahoo yaraakum huwa Wa-qabeeluhoo min haisu laa tarawnahum; innaa ja'alnash shayaateena awliyaaa'a lillazeena laa yu'minoon

7:28.t: Wa-izaa fa'aloo faahishatan qaaloo wajadnaa 'alaihaaa aabaaa'ana wallaahu ama-ranaa bihaa; qul innal laaha laa ya'muru bilfah-shaaa(i) a-taqooloona 'alal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

7:29.t: Qul amara Rabbee bil-qisti Wa-aqeemoo wujoohakum 'inda kulli masjid(inw) wad'oohu mukhliseena lahud deen(a); kamaa bada-akum ta'oodoon

7:30.t: Fareeqan hadaa Wa-fareeqan haqqa 'alaihimud dalaalah; innahumut takhazush shayaateena awliyaaa'a min doonil laahi Wa-yah-saboona annahum muhtadoon

7:31.t: Yaa-Banee Adama khuzoo zeenatakum 'inda kulli masjidinw Wa-kuloo wash-raboo Wa-laa tusrifoo; innahoo laa yuhibbul musrifeen

7:32.t: Qul man harrama zeenatal laahil lateee akhraja li'ibaadihee wat-taiyyi-baati minar rizq; qul hiya lil-lazeena aamanoo fil hayaatid dunyaa khaali-sataien Yawmal Qiyaamah; kazaalika nufassilu(l) Aayaati liqaw-mien ya'lamoon

7:33.t: Qul innamaa harrama Rabbiyal fawaa-hisha maa zahara minhaa wa-maa batana wal-isma wal-baghya bighairil haqqi Wa-an tushrikoo billaahi maa lam yunazzil bihee sultaananw wa-an taqooloo 'alal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

7:34.t: Wa-likulli ummatin ajal(un), fa-izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum laa yasta'-khiroona saa'atanw wa-laa yastaq-dimoon

7:35.t: Yaa-Banee Aadama immaa ya'ti-yannakum Rusulum minkum yaqus-soona 'alaikum Aayaatee famanit taqaa wa-aslaha falaa khawfun 'alaihim wa-laa hum yahzanoon

7:36.t: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa wastakbaroo 'an-haaa ulaaa'ika As-haabun naari hum feehaa khaalidoon

7:37.t: Faman azlamu mimma-nif taraa 'alal laahi kaziban aw kazzaba bi-Aayaatih; ulaaa'ika yanaa-luhum nasee-buhum minal Kitaab; hattaaa izaa jaaa'at-hum rusulunaa yatawaf-fawnahum qaalooo ai-na maa kuntum tad'oonaa min doonil laah(i); qaaloo dalloo 'annaa wa-shahidoo 'alaaa an-fusihim annahum kaanoo kaafireen

7:38.t: Qaalad khuloo feee uma-min qad khalat min qab-likum minal jinni wal-insi fin naar(i); kullamaa dakhalat ummatul la'anat ukhtaha; hattaaa izad daa-rakoo feehaa jamee'an qaalat ukh-raahum li-oolaa-hum Rabbanaa haaa-u'laaa'i adal-loonaa fa-aatihim 'azaaban di'fam minan naar(i); qaala likul-lin di'funw wa-laakil laa ta'lamoon

7:39.t: Wa-qaalat oolaahum li-ukh-raahum famaa kaana lakum 'alainaa min fadlin fazoo-qul azaaba bimaa kuntum taksiboon

7:40.t: Innal lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa wastak-baroo 'anhaa laa tufat-tahu lahum abwaabus samaaa(i) wa-laa yad-khuloonal jannata hattaa yalijal jamalu fee sammil khiyaat; wa-kazaalika najzil mujrimeen

7:41.t: Lahum min jahannama mihaa-dunw wa-min faw-qihim ghawaash(i); wa-kazaalika najziz zaalimeen

7:42.t: Wal-lazeena aamanoo wa-'amilus saalihaati la nukallifu nafsan illaa wus'ahaaa ulaaa'ika As-haabul jannati, hum feehaa khaalidoon

7:43.t: Wa-naza'naa maa fee sudoo-rihim min ghillin tajree min tah-ti-himul anhaar(u), wa-qaalul hamdu lil-laahil lazee hadaa-naa lihaaza wa-maa kunna linah-tadiya lau-laaa ann hadaanal laah(u), laqad jaaa'at Rusulu Rabbinaa bilhaqq; Wa-noodoo an til-kumul jannatu ooris-tumoohaa bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

7:44.t: Wa-naadaa As-haabul jannati as-haaban naari an qad wajadnaa maa wa'ada-naa Rabbunaa haqqan fahal wajad-tum maa wa'ada Rabbukum haqqa(n); qaaloo na'am, fa-azzana mu'azzinum bainahum al la'natul laahi 'alaz zaalimeen

7:45.t: Allazeena yasud-doona 'an sabeelil laahi wa-yabghoo-nahaa 'iwaja(nw), Wa-hum bil-aakhirati kaafiroon

7:46.t: Wa-baina-humaa hijaab(unw), Wa-'alal A'raafi rijaa-luien ya'rifoona kullam bi-seemaahum; Wa-naadaw as-haabal jannati an salaamun 'alaikum; lam yad-khuloohaa wa-hum yatma'oon

7:47.t: Wa-izaa surifat absaaruhum tilqaaa'a as-haabin naari qaaloo Rabbanaa laa taj'alnaa ma'al qawmiz zaalimeen

7:48.t: Wa-naadaaa as-haabul a'raafi rijaa-laien ya'rifoonahum bi-seemaahum qaaloo maaa aghnaa 'ankum jam'ukum wa-maa kuntum tastak-biroon

7:49.t: A-haaa'ulaaa'il lazeena aqsamtum laa yanaa-luhumul laahu bi-rahmah(tin); ud-khulul Jannata laa khawfun 'alaikum wa-laaa antum tah-zanoon

7:50.t: Wa-naadaaa as-haabun naari as-haabal Jannati an afeedoo 'alainaa minal maaa'i aw mimma raza-qakumul laah(u); qaaloo innal laaha harrama-humaa 'alal kaafireen

7:51.t: Allazeenat takhazoo deenahum lahwanw Wa-la'i-banw Wa-gharrat-humul hayaatud dunyaa; fal-Yawma nannsaahum kamaa nasoo liqaaa'a Yawmihim haazaa Wa-maa kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa yajhadoon

7:52.t: Wa-laqad ji'naahum bi-Kitaabin fassalnaahu 'alaa 'ilmin hudanw Wa-rahmatal liqaw-mien yu'minoon

7:53.t: Hal yanzuroona illaa ta'weelah(u); yawma ya'tee ta'wee-luhoo yaqoolul lazeena nasoohu min qablu qad jaaa'at Rusulu Rabbinaa bilhaqq; fahal lanaa min shufa'aaa'a fa-yashfa'oo lanaaa aw nuraddu fana'mala ghairal lazee kunnaa na'mal; qad khasirooo an-fusahum Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

7:54.t: Inna Rabbakumul laahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda fee sittati ayyaamin summas tawaa 'alal 'arshi yughshil lailan nahaara yatlu-buhoo haseesanw wash-shamsa wal-qamara wan-nujooma musakh-khaa-raatim bi-amrih(i); alaa lahul khalqu wal-amr(u); tabaarakal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen

7:55.t: Ud'oo Rabbakum tadarru'anw Wa-khufyah(tan); innahoo laa yuhibbul mu'tadeen

7:56.t: Wa-laa tufsidoo fil ardi ba'da islaahihaa wad'oohu khawfanw Wa-tama'aa; inna rahmatal laahi qareebum minal muhsineen

7:57.t: Wa-Huwal lazee yursilur riyaaha bushram baina yadai rahmatihee hattaaa izaaa aqallat sahaaban siqaalan suqnaahu libaladim maiyitin fa-annzalnaa bihil maaa'a fa-akhrajnaa bihee minn kullis samaraat; kazaalika nukhrijul mawtaa la'allakum tazakkaroon

7:58.t: Walbaladut taiyibu yakhruju nabaatuhoo bi-izni Rabbihee wallazee khabusa laa yakhruju illaa nakidaa; kazaalika nusarriful Aayaati liqawminy yashkuroon

7:59.t: Laqad arsalnaa noohan ilaa qawmihee faqaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem

7:60.t: Qaalal mala-u min qaw-miheee innaa lanaraaka fee dalaalim mubeen

7:61.t: Qaala yaa-qawmi laisa bee dalaalatunw Wa-laakinnee Rasoolum mir Rabbil 'aalameen

7:62.t: Uballighukum Risaalaati Rabbee Wa-ansahu lakum Wa-a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

7:63.t: Awa'ajibtum an jaaa'akum zikrum mir Rabbikum 'alaa rajulim minkum liyunzirakum Wa-litattaqoo Wa-la'allakum turhamoon

7:64.t: Fakazzaboohu fa-anjai-naahu wallazeena ma'ahoo fil fulki Wa-aghraqnal lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa; innahum kaanoo qawman 'ameen

7:65.t: Wa-ilaa 'aadin akhaahum Hoodaa; qaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuh; afalaa tattaqoon

7:66.t: Qaalal mala-ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmiheee innaa lanaraaka fee safaahatinw Wa-innaa la-nazunnuka minal kaazibeen

7:67.t: Qaala yaa-qawmi laisa bee safaahatunw Wa-laakinnee Rasoolum mir Rabbil 'aalameen

7:68.t: Uballighukum Risaalaati Rabbee Wa-ana lakum naasihun ameen

7:69.t: Awa'ajibtum an jaaa'akum zikrum mir Rabbikum 'alaa rajulim minkum liyunzirakum; wazkurooo iz ja'alakum khulafaaa'a mim ba'di qawmi noohinw Wa-zaadakum fil khalqi bastatan fazkurooo aalaaa'al laahi la'allakum tuflihoon

7:70.t: Qaalooo aji'tanaa lina'budal laaha wahdahoo Wa-nazara maa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'unaa fa'tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen

7:71.t: Qaala qad waqa'a alaikum mir Rabbikum rijsunw Wa-ghadab, atujaadiloonanee feee asmaaa'in sammaitumoohaaa antum Wa-aabaaa'ukum maa nazzalal laahu bihaa min sultaan; fantazirooo innee ma'akum minal muntazireen

7:72.t: Fa-anjainaahu wallazeena ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa Wa-qata'naa daabiral lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-maa kaanoo mu'mineen

7:73.t: Wa-ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihaa; qaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo qad jaaa'atkum baiyinatum mir Rabbikum haazihee naaqatul laahi lakum Aayatan fazaroohaa ta'kul feee ardil laahi Wa-laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa-ya'khuzakum 'azaabun aleem

7:74.t: Wazkuroo iz ja'alakum khulafaaa'a mim ba'di 'Aadinw Wa-bawwa-akum fil ardi tattakhizoona min suhoolihaa qusooranw Wa-tanhitoonal jibaala buyootan fazkurooo aalaaa'al laahi Wa-laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

7:75.t: Qaalal mala-ul lazeenas takbaroo min qawmihee lillazeenas tud'ifoo liman aamana minhum ata'lamoona anna Saaliham mursalum mir Rabbih; qaalooo innaa bimaaa ursila bihee mu'minoon

7:76.t: Qaalal lazeenas takbarooo innaa billazeee aamanntum bihee kaafiroon

7:77.t: Fa'aqarun naaqata wa'ataw 'an amri Rabbihim Wa-qaaloo yaa-Saalihu' tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minal mursaleen

7:78.t: Fa-akhazat-humur rajfatu fa-asbahoo fee daarihim jaasimeen

7:79.t: Fa-tawalla 'anhum Wa-qaala yaa-qawmi laqad ablaghtukum Risaalata Rabbee Wa-nasahtu lakum Wa-laakil laa tuhibboonan naasiheen

7:80.t: Wa-Lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee ata'toonal faahishata maa sabaqakum bihaa min ahadim minal 'aalameen

7:81.t: Innakum lata'toonar rijaala shahwatam min doonin nisaaa'; bal antum qawmum musrifoon

7:82.t: Wa-maa kaana jawaaba qawmihee illaa an qaalooo akhrijoohum min qaryatikum innahum unaasuny yatatahharoon

7:83.t: Fa-anjainaahu Wa-ahlahooo illam ra-atahoo kaanat minal ghaabireen

7:84.t: Wa-'amtarnaa 'alaihim mataran fanzur kaifa kaana aaqibatul mujrimeen

7:85.t: Wa-ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'aybaa; qaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo qad jaaa'atkum baiyinatum mir Rabbikum fa-awful kaila walmeezaana Wa-laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaa'ahum Wa-laa tufsidoo fil ardi ba'da islaahihaa; zaalikum khairul lakum in kuntum mu'mineen

7:86.t: Wa-laa taq'udoo bikulli siraatin too'idoona Wa-tasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi man aamana bihee Wa-tabghoonahaa 'iwajaa; waz-kurooo iz kuntum qaleelan fakassarakum wanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mufsideen

7:87.t: Wa-In kaana taaa'ifatum minkum aamanoo billazeee ursiltu bihee Wa-taaa'ifatul lam yu'minoo fasbiroo hattaa yahkumal laahu bainanaa; Wa-Huwa khairul haakimeen

7:88.t: Qaalal mala-ul lazeenas takbaroo min qawmihee lanukhrijannaka yaa-Shu'aibu wallazeena aamanoo ma'aka min qaryatinaaa aw lata'oo-dunna fee millatinaa; qaala awa-law kunnaa kaariheen

7:89.t: Qadif tarainaa 'alal laahi kaziban in 'udnaa fee millatikum ba'da iz najjaanal laahu minhaa; Wa-maa yakoonu lanaaa an na'ooda feehaaa illaaa ai yashaaa'al laahu Rabbunaa; wasi'a Rabbunaa kulla shai'in 'ilmaa; 'alal laahi tawakkalnaa; Rabbanaf tah bainanaa Wa-baina qawminaa bilhaqqi Wa-Anta khairul faatiheen

7:90.t: Wa-qaalal mala-ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee la'init taba'tum Shu'aiban innakum izal lakhaasiroon

7:91.t: Fa-akhazat-humur rajfatu fa-asbahoo fee daarihim jaasimeen

7:92.t: Allazeena kazzaboo Shu'aiban ka-al lam yaghnaw feehaa; allazeena kazzaboo Shu'aiban kaanoo humul khaasireen

7:93.t: Fatawalla 'anhum Wa-qaala yaa-qawmi laqad ablaghtukum Risaalaati Rabbee Wa-nasahtu lakum fakaifa aasaa 'alaa qawmin kaafireen

7:94.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaa fee qaryatim min Nabiyyin illaaa akhaznaaa ahlahaa bil-ba'saaa'i waddarraaa'i la'allahum yaddarra'oon

7:95.t: Summa baddalnaa makaa-nas saiyi'atil hasanata hattaa 'afaw Wa-qaaloo qad massa aabaa'anad darraaa'u wassarraaa'u fa-akhaznaahum baghtatanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

7:96.t: Wa-law anna ahlal quraaa aamanoo wattaqaw lafatahnaa 'alaihim barakaatim minas samaaa'i wal-ardi Wa-laakin kazzaboo fa-akhaznaahum bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

7:97.t: Afa-amina ahlul quraaa ai ya'tiyahum ba'sunaa bayaatanw Wa-hum naaa'imoon

7:98.t: Awa-amina ahlul quraaa ai ya'tiyahum ba'sunaa duhanw Wa-hum yal'aboon

7:99.t: Afa-aminoo makral laah; falaa ya'manu makral laahi illal qawmul khaasiroon

7:100.t: Awa-lam yahdi lillazeena yarisoonal arda mim ba'di ahlihaaa al law nashaaa'u asabnaahum bizunoobihim; Wa-natba'u 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yasma'oon

7:101.t: Tilkal quraa naqussu 'alaika min ambaaa'ihaa; Wa-laqad jaaa'at-hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati famaa kaanoo liyu'minoo bimaa kazzaboo min qabl; kazaalika yatba'ul laahu 'alaa quloobil kaafireen

7:102.t: Wa-maa wajadnaa li-aksarihim min 'ahd; Wa-inw wajadnaaa aksarahum lafaasiqeen

7:103.t: Summa ba'asnaa mim ba'dihim Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaaa ilaa Fir'awana Wa-mala'ihee fazalamoo bihaa fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mufsideen

7:104.t: Wa-qaala Moosaa yaa-Fir'awnu inneee Rasoolum mir Rabbil 'aalameen

7:105.t: Haqeequn 'alaaa al laaa aqoola 'alal laahi illal haqq; qad ji'tukum bibaiyinatim mir Rabbikum fa-arsil ma'iya Baneee Israaa'eel

7:106.t: Qaala in kunnta ji'ta bi-Aayatin fa'ti bihaa in kunnta minas saadiqeen

7:108.t: Wa-naza'a yadahoo fa-izaa hiya baidaaa'u linnaazireen

7:109.t: Qaalal mala-u min qawmi Fir'awna inna haazaa lasaahirun 'aleem

7:110.t: Yureedu ai yukhrijakum min ardikum famaazaa ta'muroon

7:111.t: Qaalooo arjih Wa-akhaahu Wa-arsil fil madaaa'ini haashireen

7:113.t: Wa-jaaa'as saharatu Fir'awna qaaloo inna lanaa la-ajjran in kunnaa nahnul ghaalibeen

7:115.t: Qaaloo yaa-Moosaaa immaaa an tulqiya Wa-immaaa an nakoona nahnul mulqeen

7:116.t: Qaala alqoo falam-maaa alqaw saharooo a'yunan naasi wastarhaboohum Wa-jaaa'oo bisihrin 'azeem

7:117.t: Wa-awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an alqi 'asaaka fa-izaa hiya talqafu maa ya'fikoon

7:118.t: Fawaqa'al haqqu Wa-batala maa kaanoo ya'maloon

7:123.t: Qaala Fir'awnu aamantum bihee qabla an aazana lakum; inna haaza lamakrum makartumoohu fil madeenati litukhrijoo minhaaa ahlahaa fasawfa ta'lamoon

7:124.t: La-uqatti'anna aidiyakum Wa-arjulakum min khilaafin summa la-usallibannakum ajma'een

7:126.t: Wa-maa tanqimu minnaaa illaaa an aamannaa bi-Aayaati Rabbinaa lammaa jaaa'atnaa; Rabbanaaa afrigh 'alainaa sabranw Wa-tawaffanaa muslimeen

7:127.t: Wa-qaalal mala-u min qawmi Fir'awna atazaru Moosaa Wa-qawmahoo liyufsidoo fil ardi Wa-yazaraka Wa-aalihatak; qaala sanuqattilu abnaaa'ahum Wa-nastahyee nisaaa'ahum Wa-innaa fawqahum qaahiroon

7:128.t: Qaala Moosaa liqawmihis ta'eenoo billaahi wasbiroo innal arda lillaahi yoorisuhaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wal-'aaqibatu lilmuttaqeen

7:129.t: Qaaloo oozeenaa min qabli an ta'tiyanaa Wa-mim ba'di maa ji'tanaa; qaala 'asaa Rabbukum ai yuhlika 'aduwwakum Wa-yastakhli-fakum fil ardi fayanzura kaifa ta'maloon

7:130.t: Wa-laqad akhaznaaa Aala Fir'awna bis-sineena Wa-naqsim minas samaraati la'allahum yazzakkaroon

7:131.t: Fa-izaa jaaa'at-humul hasanatu qaaloo lanaa haazihee Wa-in tusibhum saiyi'atuny yattaiyaroo bi-Moosaa Wa-mam ma'ah; alaaa innamaa taaa'iruhum 'indal laahi Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

7:132.t: Wa-qaaloo mahmaa taatinaa bihee min Aayatil litas'haranaa bihaa famaa nahnu laka bimu'mineen

7:133.t: Fa-arsalnaa 'alaihimut toofaana waljaraada walqum-mala waddafaadi'a waddama Aayaatim mufassalaatin fastakbaroo Wa-kaanoo qawmam mujrimeen

7:134.t: Wa-lammaa waqa'a 'alaihimur rijzu qaaloo ya-Moosad-u lanaa rabbaka bimaa 'ahida 'indaka la'in kashafta 'annar rijza lanu 'minanna laka Wa-lanursilanna ma'aka Banee Israaa'eel

7:135.t: Falammaa kashafnaa 'anhumur rijza ilaaa ajalin hum baalighoohu izaa hum yankusoon

7:136.t: Fantaqamnaa minhum fa'aghraqnaahum Fil' yammi bi-Annahum kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-kaanoo 'anhaa ghaafileen

7:137.t: Wa-awrasnal qawmal lazeena kaanoo yustad'afoona mashaariqal ardi Wa-maghaari-bahal latee baaraknaa feehaa Wa-tammat kalimatu Rabbikal husnaa 'alaa Baneee Israaa'eela bimaa sabaroo Wa-dammarnaa maa kaana yasna'u Fir'awnu Wa-qawmuhoo Wa-maa kaanoo ya'rishoon

7:138.t: Wa-jaawaznaa bi-Banneee Israaa'eelal bahra fa-ataw 'alaa qawminy ya'kufoona 'alaaa asnaamil lahum; qaaloo yaa-Moosaj 'al lanaa ilaahan kamaa lahum aalihah; qaala innakum qawmun tajhaloon

7:139.t: Innaa haaa'ulaaa'i mutabbarum maa hum feehi Wa-baatilum maa kaanoo ya'maloon

7:140.t: Qaala a-ghairal laahi abgheekum ilaahanw Wa-Huwa faddalakum 'alal 'aalameen

7:141.t: Wa-iz anjainaakum min Aali Fir'awna yasoomoo-nakum sooo'al 'azaab, yuqattiloona abnaaa'akum Wa-yastahyoona nisaaa'akum; Wa-fee zaalikum balaaa'um mir Rabbikum 'azeem

7:142.t: Wa-waa'adnaa Moosaa salaaseena lailatanw Wa-at-mamnaahaa bi'ashrim fatamma meeqaatu Rabbihee arba'eena lailah; Wa-qaala Moosaa liakheehi Haaroonakh lufnee fee qawmee Wa-aslih Wa-laa tattabi' sabeelal mufsideen

7:143.t: Wa-lammaa jaaa'a Moosa limeeqaatinaa Wa-kallamahoo Rabbuhoo qaala Rabbi arineee anzur ilaik; qaala lan taraanee Wa-laakinin zur ilal jabali fa-inis taqarra makaanahoo fasawfa taraanee; falammaa tajallaa Rabbuhoo liljabali ja'alahoo dakkanw Wa-kharra Moosaa sa'iqaa; falammaaa afaaqa qaala Subhaanaka tubtu ilaika Wa-ana awwalul mu'mineen

7:144.t: Qaala yaa-Moosaaa innis tafaituka 'alan naasi bi-Risaalaatee Wa-bi-kalaamee fakhuz maaa aataituka Wa-kum minash shaakireen

7:145.t: Wa-katabnaa lahoo fil alwaahi min kulli shai'im maw'izaanw Wa-tafseelal likulli shai'in fakhuzhaa biquwwatinw wa'mur qawmaka ya'khuzoo bi-ahsanihaa; sa'ooreekum daaral faasiqeen

7:146.t: Sa-asrifu 'an Aayaatiyal lazeena yatakabbaroona fil ardi bighairil haqq; Wa-iny yaraw kulla Aayatil laa yu'minoo bihaa Wa-iny yaraw sabeelar rushdi laa yattakhizoohu sabeelanw Wa-iny yaraw sabeelal ghaiyi yattakhizoohu sabeelaa; zaalika bi-annahum kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-kaanoo 'anhaa ghaafileen

7:147.t: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-liqaaa'il Aakhirati habitat 'amaaluhum; hal yujzawna illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon

7:148.t: Wattakhaza qawmu Moosaa mim ba'dihee min huliyyihim 'ijlan jasadal lahoo khuwaar; alam yaraw annahoo laa yukallimuhum Wa-laa yahdeehim sabeelaa; ittakhazoohu Wa-kaanoo zaalimeen

7:149.t: Wa-lammaa suqita feee aideehim Wa-ra aw-annahum qad dalloo qaaloo la'il lam yarhamnaa Rabbunaa Wa-yaghfir lanaa lanakoonanna minal khaasireen

7:150.t: Wa-lammaa raja'a Moosaaa ilaa qawmihee ghadbaana asifan qaala bi'samaa khalaftumoonee min ba'dee 'a-'ajiltum amra Rabbikum Wa-alqal alwaaha Wa-akhaza bira'si akheehi yajurruhoo ilaiyh; qaalab na umma innal qawmas tad'afoonee Wa-kadoo yaqtu-loonanee; falaa tushmit biyal a'daaa'a Wa-laa taj'alnee ma'al qawmiz zaalimeen

7:151.t: Qaala Rabbigh fir lee Wa-li-akhee Wa-adkhilnaa fee rahmatika Wa-Anta arhamur raahimeen

7:152.t: Innal lazeenat takhazul 'ijla-sa yanaaluhum ghadabum mir Rabbihim Wa-zillatun fil hayaatid dunyaa; Wa-kazaalika najzil muftareen

7:153.t: Wallazeena 'amilus saiyiaati summa taaboo min ba'dihaa Wa-aamanooo inna Rabbaka min ba'dihaa la-Ghafoorur Raheem

7:154.t: Wa-lammaa sakata 'an Moosal ghadabu akhazal alwaaha Wa-fee nuskhatihaa hudanw Wa-rahmatul lil-lazeena hum li-Rabbihim yarhaboon

7:155.t: Wakhtaara Moosaa qawmahoo sab'eena rajulal li-meeqaatinaa falammaa akhazat-humur rajfatu qaala Rabbi law shi'ta ahlaktahum min qablu Wa-iyyaay; 'a-tuhlikuna bimaa fa'alas sufahaaa'u minaa in hiya illaa fitnatuka tudillu bihaa man tashaaa'u Wa-tahdee man tashaaa; Anta waliyyunaa faghfir lanaa warhamnaa Wa-Anta khairul ghaafireen

7:156.t: Waktub lanaa fee haazi-hid dunyaa hasanatanw Wa-fil Aakhirati innaa hudnaaa ilaik; qaala 'azaabee useebu bihee man ashaaa'u Wa-rahmatee wasi'at kulla shai'; fasa-aktubuhaa lil-lazeena yattaqoona Wa-yu'toonaz Zakaata wal-lazeena hum bi-Aayaatinaa yu'minoon

7:157.t: Allazeena yattabi'oonar Rasoolan Nabiyyal ummiyyal lazee yajidoonahoo maktooban 'indahum fit Tawraati wal-Injeeli ya'muruhum bilma'roofi Wa-yanhaahum 'anil munkari Wa-yuhillu lahumul taiyibaati Wa-yuharrimu 'alaihimul khabaaa'isa Wa-yada'u 'anhum israhum wal-aghlaalal latee kaanat 'alaihim; fallazeena aamanoo bihee Wa-'azzaroohu Wa-nasaroohu wattaba'un nooral lazeee unzila ma'ahooo ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

7:158.t: Qul yaaa-aiyuhan naasu innee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum jamee'anil lazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa yuhyee Wa-yumeetu fa-aaminoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihin Nabiyyil ummiy-yil lazee yu'minu billaahi Wa-Kalimaatihee wattabi'oohu la'allakum tahtadoon

7:159.t: Wa-min qawmi Moosaaa ummatuny yahdoona bilhaqqi Wa-bihee ya'diloon

7:160.t: Wa-qatta'naahumus natai 'ashrata asbaatan umamaa; Wa-awhainaa ilaa Moosaaa izis tasqaahu qawmuhooo anid rib bi'asaakal hajara fambajasat minhus nata 'ashrata 'ainan qad 'alima kullu unaasim mashrabahum; Wa-zallalnaa 'alaihimul ghamaama Wa-anzalnaa 'alaihimul manna was-Salwaa kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum; Wa-maa zalamoonaa Wa-laakin kaanooo anfusahum yazlimoon

7:161.t: Wa-iz qeela lahumus kunoo haazihil qaryata Wa-kuloo minhaa haisu shi'tum Wa-qooloo hittatunw wadkhulul baaba sujjadan naghfir lakum khateee'aatikum; sanazeedul muhsineen

7:162.t: Fabaddalal lazeena zalamoo minhum qawlan ghairal lazee qeela lahum fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim rijzan minas samaaa'i bimaa kaanoo yazlimoon

7:163.t: Was'alhum 'anil qaryatil latee kaanat haadiratal bahri iz ya'doona fis Sabti iz ta'teehim heetaanuhum yawma Sabtihim shurra'anw Wa-yawma laa yasbitoona laa ta'teehim; kazaalika nabloohum bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon

7:164.t: Wa-iz qaalat ummatum minhum lima ta'izoona qaw-manil laahu muhlikuhum aw mu'azzibuhum 'azaaban shadeedan qaaloo ma'ziratan ilaa Rabbikum Wa-la'allahum yattaqoon

7:165.t: Falammaa nasoo maa zukkiroo bihee anjainal lazeena yanhawna 'anis sooo'i Wa-akhaznal lazeena zalamoo bi'azaabim ba'eesim bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon

7:166.t: Falammaa 'ataw 'am maa nuhoo 'anhu qulna lahum koonoo qiradatan khaasi'een

7:167.t: Wa-iz ta-azzana Rabbuka la-yab'asannna 'alaihim ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati mai yasoomuhum sooo'al 'azaab; inna Rabbaka lasaree'ul 'iqaabi Wa-innahoo la-Ghafoorur Raheem

7:168.t: Wa-qatta'naahum fil ardi umaman min-humus saalihoona Wa-min-hum doona zaalika Wa-balawnaahum bil-hasanaati was-saiyi'aati la'allahum yarji'oon

7:169.t: Fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfunw warisul Kitaaba ya'khuzoona 'arada haazal adnaa Wa-yaqooloona sayughfaru lanaa Wa-iny ya'tihim 'aradun misluhoo ya'khuzooh; alam yu'khaz 'alaihim meesaaqul Kitaabi an laa yaqooloo 'alal laahi illal haqqa Wa-darasoo maa feeh; wad-Daarul Aakhirtu khairul lil-lazeena yattaqoon; afalaa ta'qiloon

7:170.t: Wallazeena yumas-sikoona bil-Kitaabi Wa-aqaamus Salaata innaa laa nudeeu 'ajral musliheen

7:171.t: Wa-iz nataqnal jabala fawqahum ka-annahoo zullatunw Wa-zannooo annahoo waaqi'un bihim khuzoo maaa aatainaakum biquwwatinw wazkuroo maa feehi la'allakum tattaqoon

7:172.t: Wa-iz akhaza Rabbuka min Baneee Aadama min zuhoorihim zurriyyatahum Wa-ashhadahum 'alaa anfusihim alastu bi-Rabbikum qaaloo balaa shahidnaaa; an taqooloo Yawmal Qiyaamati innaa kunnaa 'an haazaa ghaafileen

7:173.t: Aw taqoolooo innamaaa ashraka aabaaa'unaa min qablu Wa-kunnaa zurriyyatan min ba'dihim 'a-fa-tuhlikunaa bi-maa fa'alal mubtiloon

7:175.t: Watlu 'alaihim naba allazeee aatainaahu Aayaatinaa fansalakha minhaa fa-atba'a hush-Shaytaanoo fakaana minal ghaaween

7:176.t: Wa-law shi'naa larafa'naahu bihaa Wa-laakin-nahooo akhlada ilal ardi wattaba'a hawaah; famasaluhoo kamasalil kalbi in tahmil 'alaihi yalhas aw tatruk-hu yalhas; zaalika masalul qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa; faqsusil qasasa la'allahum yatafakkaroon

7:177.t: Saaa'a masalanil qawmul lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-anfusahum kaanoo yazlimoon

7:178.t: Mai yahdil laahu fa-huwal muhtadee Wa-mai yudlil fa-ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

7:179.t: Wa-laqad zara'naa li-jahannama kaseeran minal jinni wal-insi lahum quloobul laa yafqahoona bihaa Wa-lahum a'yunul laa yubisiroona bihaa Wa-lahum aazaanul laa yasma'oona bihaa; ulaaa'ika kal-an'aami bal hum adall; ulaaa'ika humul ghaafiloon

7:180.t: Wa-lillaahil Asmaaa-'ul Husnaa fad'oohu bihaa Wa-zarul lazeena yulhidoona feee Asmaaa'ih; sa-yujzawna maa kaanoo ya'maloon

7:181.t: Wa-mimman khalaqnaaa ummatuny yahdoona bilhaqqi Wa-bihee ya'diloon

7:182.t: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa sanastadrijuhum min haisu laa ya'lamoon

7:184.t: Awalam yatafakkaroo maa bisaahibihim min jinnah; in huwa illaa nazeerun mubeen

7:185.t: Awalam yanzuroo fee malakootis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa khalaqal laahu min shai'inw Wa-an 'asaaa ai yakoona qadiq taraba ajaluhum fa-bi-ayyi hadeesin ba'dahoo yu'minoon

7:186.t: Mai yudlil lillaahu falaa haadiya lah; Wa-yazaruhum fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon

7:187.t: Yas'aloonaka 'anis Saa'ati aiyaana mursaahaa qul innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabbee laa yujalleehaa liwaqtihaaa illaa Hoo; saqulat fis samaawaati wal-ard; laa ta'teekum illaa baghtah; yas'aloonaka ka-annaka hafiyyun 'anhaa qul innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'indal laahi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

7:188.t: Qul laaa amliku linafsee naf'anw Wa-laa darran illaa maa shaaa'al laah; Wa-law kuntu a'lamul ghaiba lastaksartu minal khairi Wa-maa massaniyas soo'; in ana illaa nazeerunw Wa-basheerul liqawminy yu'minoon

7:189.t: Huwal lazee khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatinw Wa-ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa liyas-kuna ilaihaa falammaa taghash-shaahaa hamalat hamlan khafeefan famarrat bihee falammaaa asqalad da'a-wal laaha Rabbahumaa la'in aataitana saalihal lanakoonanna minash shaakireen

7:190.t: Falammaaa aataahumaa saalihan ja'alaa lahoo shurakaaa'a feemaaa aataahumaa; fata'aalal laahu 'ammaa yushrikoon

7:191.t: A-yushrikoona maa laa yakhluqu shai'anw Wa-hum yukhlaqoon

7:192.t: Wa-laa yastatee'oona lahum nasranw Wa-laaa anfusahum yansuroon

7:193.t: Wa-in tad'oohum ilal hudaa laa yattabi'ookum; sawaaa'un 'alaikum a-da'awtumoohum 'am antum saamitoon

7:194.t: Innal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi 'ibaadun amsaalukum fad'oohum fal-yastajeeboo lakum in kuntum saadiqeen

7:195.t: A-lahum arjuluny yamshoona bihaa 'am lahum 'aidiny yabtishoona bihaaa 'am lahum a'yunuy yubsiroona bihaaa 'am lahum aazaanuny yasma'oona bihaa; qulid 'oo shurakaaa'akum thumma keedooni falaa tunziroon

7:196.t: Inna waliyyial laahul lazee nazzalal Kitaaba Wa-Huwa yatawallas saaliheen

7:197.t: Wallazeena tad'oona min doonihee laa yastatee'oona nasrakum Wa-laaa anfusahum yansuroon

7:198.t: Wa-in tad'oohum ilal hudaa laa yasma'oo Wa-taraahum yanzuroona ilaika Wa-hum laa yubsiroon

7:200.t: Wa-immaa yanzaghannaka minash Shaitaani nazghun fasta'iz billaah; innahoo Samee'un Aleem

7:201.t: Innal lazeenat taqaw izaa massahum taaa'ifun minash Shaitaani tazakkaroo fa-izaa hum mubsiroon

7:202.t: Wa-ikhwaanuhum yamuddoonahum fil ghayyi thumma laa yuqsiroon

7:203.t: Wa-izaa lam ta'tihim bi-aayatin qaaloo law-laj tabai-tahaa; qul innamaaa attabi'u maa yoohaaa ilaiya mir Rabbee; haazaa basaaa'iru mir Rabbikum Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatul liqawminy yu'minoon

7:204.t: Wa-izaa quri'al Quraanu fastami'oo lahoo Wa-ansitoo la-'allakum turhamoon

7:205.t: Wazkur Rabbaka fee nafsika tadarru'anw Wa-kheefatanw Wa-doonal jahri minal qawli bilghuduwwi wal-aasali Wa-laa takum minal ghaafileen

7:206.t: Innal lazeena 'inda Rabbika laa yastakbiroona 'an 'ibaadatihee Wa-yusabbihoonahoo Wa-lahoo yasjudoon

8:1.t: Yas'aloonaka 'anil anfaali qulil anfaalu lillaahi war-Rasooli fattaqul laaha Wa-aslihoo zaata bainikum Wa-atee'ul laaha Wa-Rasoolahooo in kuntum mu'mineen

8:2.t: Innamal mu'minoonal lazeena izaa zukiral laahu wajilat quloobuhum Wa-izaa tuliyat 'alaihim Aayaatuhoo zaadat-hum eemaananw Wa-'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

8:3.t: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata Wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

8:4.t: Ulaaa'ika humul mu'minoona haqqaa; lahum darajaatun 'inda Rabbihim Wa-magh-firatunw Wa-rizqun kareem

8:5.t: Kaamaaa akhrajaka Rabbuka mim baitika bilhaqq; Wa-inna fareeqam minal mu'mineena lakaarihoon

8:6.t: Yujaadiloonaka fil haqqi ba'da maa tabaiyana kaannamaa yasaaqoona ilal mawti Wa-hum yanzuroon

8:7.t: Wa-iz ya'idukumul laahu ihdat taaa'ifataini annahaa lakum Wa-tawaddoona anna ghaira zaatish shawkati takoonu lakum Wa-yureedul laahu ai yuhiqqal haqqa bikalimaatihee Wa-yaqta'a daabiral kaafireen

8:8.t: Liyuhiqqal haqqa Wa-tubtilal baatila Wa-law karihal mujrimoon

8:9.t: Iz tastagheesoona Rabbakum fastajaaba lakum annee mumiddukum bi-alfim minal malaaa'ikati murdifeen

8:10.t: Wa-maa ja'alahul laahu illaa bushraa Wa-litatma'inna bihee quloobukum; Wa-man nasru illaa min 'indil laah; innal laaha Azeezun Hakeem

8:11.t: Iz yughashsheekumun nu'assa amanatam minhu Wa-yunazzilu 'alaikum minas samaaa'i maaa'al liyutah-hirakum bihee Wa-yuzhiba 'ankum rijzash Shaitaani Wa-liyarbita 'ala quloobikum Wa-yusabbita bihil aqdaam

8:12.t: Iz yoohee Rabbuka ilal malaaa'ikati annee ma'akum fasabbitul lazeena aamanoo; sa-ulqee fee quloobil lazeena kafarur ru'ba fadriboo fawqal a'naaqi wadriboo minhum kulla banaan

8:13.t: Zaalika bi-annahum shaaaqqul laaha Wa-Rasoolah; Wa-mai yushaqiqil laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo fa-innal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab

8:15.t: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa laqeetumul lazeena kafaroo zahfan falaa tuwalloohumul adbaar

8:16.t: Wa-mai yuwallihim yawma'izin duburahooo illaa mutaharrifal liqitaalin aw mutahaiyizan ilaa fi'atin faqad baaa'a bighadabim minal laahi Wa-ma'waahu Jahannamu Wa-bi'sal maseer

8:17.t: Falam taqtuloohum Wa-laakinnal laaha qatalahum; Wa-maa ramaita iz ramaita Wa-laakinnal laaha ramaa; Wa-liyubliyal mu'mineena minhu balaaa'an hasanaa; innal laaha Samee'un Aleem

8:18.t: Zaalikum Wa-annal laaha moohinu kaidil kaafireen

8:19.t: In tastaftihoo faqad jaaa'akumul fathu Wa-in tantahoo fahuwa khairul lakum Wa-in ta'oodoo na'ud Wa-lan tughniya 'ankum fi'atukum shai'anw Wa-law kasurat Wa-annal laaha ma'al mu'mineen

8:20.t: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo atee'ul laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-laa tawallaw 'anhu Wa-antum tasma'oon

8:21.t: Wa-laa takoonoo kallazeena qaaloo sami'naa Wa-hum laa yasma'oon

8:22.t: Inna sharrad dawaaabbi 'indal laahis summul bukmul lazeena laa ya'qiloon

8:23.t: Wa-law 'alimal laahu feehim khairal la-asma'ahum; Wa-law asma'ahum latawallaw Wa-hum mu'ridoon

8:24.t: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanus tajeeboo lillaahi Wa-lir-Rasooli izaa da'aakum limaa yuhyeekum wa'lamooo annal laaha yahoolu bainal mar'i Wa-qalbihee Wa-anahooo ilaihi tuhsharoon

8:25.t: Wattaqoo fitnatal laa tuseebannal lazeena zalamoo minkum khaaaassatanw wa'lamooo annal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab

8:26.t: Wazkurooo iz antum qaleelum mustad-'afoona fil ardi takhaafoona ai yatakhat-tafakumun naasu fa-aawaakum Wa-aiyadakum binasrihee Wa-razaqakum minat taiyibaati la'allakum tashkuroon

8:27.t: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa takhoonal laaha war-Rasoola Wa-takhoonooo amaanaatikum Wa-antum ta'lamoon

8:28.t: Wa'lamooo annamaaa amwaalukum Wa-awlaadukum fitnatunw Wa-annal laaha 'indahooo ajrun azeem

8:29.t: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo in tattaqul laaha yaj'al lakum furqaananw Wa-yukaffir 'ankum saiyi-aatikum Wa-yaghfir lakum; wallaahu zul fadlil 'azeem

8:30.t: Wa-iz yamkuru bikal lazeena kafaroo liyusbitooka aw yaqtulooka aw yukhrijook; Wa-yamkuroona Wa-yamkurul laahu wallaahu khairul maakireen

8:31.t: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa qaaloo qad sami'naa law nashaaa'u laqulnaa misla haazaaa in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

8:32.t: Wa-iz qaalul laahumma in kaana haazaa huwal haqqa min 'indika fa-amtir 'alainaa hijaaratam minas samaaa'i awi 'tinaa bi-'azaabin aleem

8:33.t: Wa-maa kaanal laahu liyu'az-zibahum Wa-anta feehim; Wa-maa kaanal laahu mu'az-zibahum Wa-hum yastaghfiroon

8:34.t: Wa-maa lahum allaa yu'az-zibahumul laahu Wa-hum yasuddoona 'anil Masjidil Haraami Wa-maa kaanooo awliyaaa'ah; in awliyaaa'-uhooo illal muttaqoona Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

8:35.t: Wa-maa kaana Salaatuhum 'indal Baiti illa mukaaa-anw wa-tasdiyah; fazooqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon

8:36.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo yunfiqoona amwaalahum liyasuddoo 'an sabeelil laah; fasayunfiqoonahaa summa takoonu 'alaihim hasratan summa yughlaboon; wal-lazeena kafarooo ilaa Jahannnama yuhsharoona

8:37.t: Liyameezal laahul khabeesa minat taiyibi Wa-yaj'alal khabeesa ba'dahoo 'ala ba'din fayarkumahoo jamee'an fayaj'alahoo fee Jahannnam; ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

8:38.t: Qul lillazeena kafarooo iny yantahoo yughfar lahum maa qad salafa Wa-iny ya'oodoo faqad madat sunnatul awwaleen

8:39.t: Wa-qaatiloohum hattaa laa takoona fitnatunw Wa-yakoonad deenu kulluhoo lillaah; fainin tahaw fa-innal laaha bimaa ya'maloona Baseer

8:40.t: Wa-in tawallaw fa'lamooo annal laaha mawlaakum; ni'mal mawlaa Wa-ni'man naseer

8:41.t: Wa'lamooo annamaa ghanimtum min sha'in fa-anna lillaahi khumusahoo Wa-lir-Rasooli Wa-lizil qurba walyataamaa walmasaakeeni wabnis sabeeli in kuntum aamantum billaahi Wa-maaa anzalnaa 'ala 'abdinaa yawmal Furqaani yawmal taqal jam'aan; wal-laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

8:42.t: Iz antum bil'udwatid dunyaa Wa-hum bil'udwatil quswaa warrakbu asfala minkum; Wa-law tawaa'attum lakhtalaftum fil mee'aadi Wa-laakil liyaqdiyal laahu amran kaana maf'oolal liyahlika man halaka 'am baiyinatinw Wa-yahyaa man haiya 'am baiyinah; Wa-innal laaha la-Samee'un 'Aleem

8:43.t: Iz yureekahumul laahu fee manaamika qaleela; Wa-law araakahum kaseeral lafashiltum Wa-latanaaza'tum fil amri Wa-laakinnal laaha sallam; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

8:44.t: Wa-iz yureekumoohum izil taqaitum feee a'yunikum qaleelanw Wa-yuqallilukum feee a'yunihim liyaqdiyal laahu amran kaana maf'oolaa; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

8:45.t: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa laqeetum fi'atan fasbutoo wazkurul laaha kaseeral la'allakum tuflihoon

8:46.t: Wa-atee'ul laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-laa tanaaza'oo fatafshaloo Wa-tazhaba reehukum wasbiroo; innal laaha ma'as saabireen

8:47.t: Wa-laa takoonoo kallazeena kharajoo min diyaarihim bataranw Wa-ri'aaa'an naasi Wa-yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laah; wallaahu bimaa ya'maloona muheet

8:48.t: Wa-iz zaiyana lahumush shaitaanu a'ma-alahum Wa-qaala laa ghaaliba lakumul yawma minan naasi Wa-innee jaarul lakum falammaa taraaa'atil fi'ataani nakasa 'alaa aqibaihi Wa-qaala innee bareee'um minkum innee araa maa laa tarawna inneee akhaaful laah; wallaahu shadeedul 'iqaab

8:49.t: Iz yaqoolul munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradun gharra haaa'ulaaa'i deenuhum; Wa-mai yatawakkal 'alal laahi fa-innal laaha 'azee-zun Hakeem

8:50.t: Wa-law taraaa iz yatawaf-fal lazeena kafarul malaaa'ikatu yadriboona wujoohahum Wa-adbaarahum Wa-zooqoo 'azaabal hareeq

8:51.t: Zaalika bimaa qaddamat aideekum Wa-anal laaha laisa bizallaamil lil-'abeed

8:52.t: Kadaabi Aali Fir'awna wal-lazeena min qablihim; kafaroo bi-Aayaatil laahi fa-akhazahu-mul laahu bizunoobihim; innal laaha qawiyyun shadeedul 'iqaab

8:53.t: Zaalika bi-annal laaha lam yakumu ghaiyiran ni'matan an'amahaa 'alaa qawmin hattaa yughaiyiroo maa bianfusihim Wa-annal laaha samee'un 'Aleem

8:54.t: Kadaabi Aali Fir'awna wallazeena min qablihim; kazzaboo bi-Aayaati Rabbihim faahlaknaahum bizunoobihim Wa-aghraqnaa Aala Fir'awn; Wa-kullun kaanoo zaalimeen

8:55.t: Inna sharrad dawaaabbi 'indal laahil lazeena kafaroo fahum laa yu'minoon

8:56.t: Allazeena 'aahatta min-hum summa yanqudoona 'ahdahum fee kulli marratinw Wa-hum laa yattaqoon

8:57.t: Fa-immaa tasqafannahum fil harbi fasharrid bihim man khalfahum la'allahum yazzakkaroon

8:58.t: Wa-immaa takhaafana min qawmin khiyaanatan fambiz ilaihim 'alaa sawaaa'; innal laaha laa yuhibbul khaaa'ineen

8:59.t: Wa-laa yahsabannal lazeena kafaroo sabaqooo; innahum laa yu'jizoon

8:60.t: Wa-a'iddoo lahum mas tata'tum min quwwatinw Wa-mir ribaatil khaili turhiboona bihee 'aduwwal laahi Wa-'aduwwakum Wa-aakhareena min doonihim laa ta'lamoo-nahum Allaahu ya'lamuhum; Wa-maa tunfiqoo min shai'in fee sabeelil laahi yuwaffa ilaikum Wa-antum laa tuzlamoon

8:61.t: Wa-in janahoo lissalmi fajnah lahaa Wa-tawakkal 'alal laah; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

8:62.t: Wa-iny yureedooo any yakhda'ooka fainna hasbakal laah; Huwal lazeee aiyadaka binasrihee Wa-bilmu'mineen

8:63.t: Wa-allafa baina quloobihim; law anfaqta maa fil ardi jamee'am maaa allafta baina quloobihim Wa-laakinnal laaha allafa bainahum; innaahoo 'Azeezun Hakeem

8:64.t: Yaaa-aiyuhan Nabiyyu hasbukal laahu Wa-manit taba'aka minal mu'mineen

8:65.t: Yaaa-aiyuhan Nabiyyu harridil mu'mineena 'alal qitaal; iny yakum minkum 'ishroona saabiroona yaghliboo mi'atayn; Wa-iny yakum minkum min'atuny yaghlibooo alfam minal lazeena kafaroo bi-anahum qawmul laa yafqahoon

8:66.t: Al'aana khaffafal laahu 'ankum Wa-'alima anna feekum da'faa; fa-iny yakum minkum mi'atun saabiratuny yaghliboo mi'atayn; Wa-iny yakum minkum alfuny yaghlibooo alfaini bi-iznil laah; wallaahu ma'as saabireen

8:67.t: Maa kaana li-Nabiyyin ai yakoona lahooo asraa hatta yuskhina fil ard; tureedoona aradad dunyaa wallaahu yureedul Aakhirah; wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem

8:68.t: Law-laa Kitaabum minal laahi sabaqa lamassakum fee-maaa akhaztum 'azaabun 'azeem

8:69.t: Fakuloo mimaa ghanimtum halaalan taiyibaa; watta qullaah; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

8:70.t: Yaaa-aiyuhan Nabiyyu qul liman feee aideekum minal asraaa iny ya'lamil laahu fee quloobikum khairany yu'tikum khayram mimmaaa ukhiza minkum Wa-yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

8:71.t: Wa-iny yureedoo khiyaa-nataka faqad khaanul laaha min qablu fa-amkana minhum; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

8:72.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-haajaroo Wa-jaahadoo bi-amwaalihim Wa-anfusihim fee sabeelil laahi wallazeena aawaw Wa-nasarooo ulaaa'ika ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'd; wallazeena aamanoo Wa-lam yuhaajiroo maa lakum minw walaayatihim min shai'in hatta yuhaajiroo; Wa-inis tansarookum fid deeni fa'alaiku munnasru illaa 'alaa qawmin bainakum Wa-bainahum meesaaq; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

8:73.t: Wallazeena kafaroo ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'd; illaa taf'aloohu takun fitnatun fil ardi Wa-fasaadun kabeer

8:74.t: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-haajaroo Wa-jaahadoo fee sabeelil laahi wallazeena aawaw Wa-nasarooo ulaaa'ika humul mu'minoona haqqaa; lahum maghfiratunw Wa-rizqun kareem

8:75.t: Wallazeena aamanoo min ba'du Wa-haajaroo Wa-jaahadoo ma'akum fa-Ulaaa'ika minkum; Wa-ulul arhaami baduhum awlaa biba'din fee Kitaabil laah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

9:1.t: Baraaa'atum minal laahi Wa-Rasooliheee ilal lazeena 'aahattum minal mushrikeen

9:2.t: Faseehoo fil ardi arba'ata ashhurinw wa'lamooo annakum ghairu mu'jizil laahi Wa-annal laaha mukhzil kaafireen

9:3.t: Wa azaanum minal laahi Wa-Rasooliheee ilan naasi yawmal Hajjil Akbari annal laaha bareee'um minal mushrikeena Wa-Rasooluh; fa-in tubtum fahuwa khairullakum Wa-in tawallaitum fa'lamooo annakum ghairu mu'jizil laah; Wa-bashiril lazeena kafaroo biazaabin aleem

9:4.t: Illal lazeena 'aahattum minal mushrikeena summa lam yanqusookum shai'anw-wa lam yuzaahiroo 'alaikum ahadan fa-atimmooo ilaihim 'ahdahum ilaa muddatihim; innal laaha yuhibbul muttaqeen

9:5.t: Fa izansalakhal Ashhurul Hurumu faqtulul mushrikeena haisu wajattumoohum Wa-khuzoohum wahsuroohum waq'udoo lahum kulla marsad; fa-in taaboo Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-aatawuz Zakaata fakhalloo sabeelahum; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

9:6.t: Wa-in ahadum minal mushrikeenas tajaaraka fa-ajirhu hattaa yasma'a Kalaamal laahi summa ablighhu ma-manah; zaalika bi-annahum qawmul laa ya'lamoon

9:7.t: Kaifa yakoonu lilmush-rikeena 'ahdun 'indal laahi Wa-'inda Rasoolihee illal lazeena 'aahattum 'indal Masjidil Haraami famas taqaamoo lakum fastaqeemoo lahum; innal laaha yuhibbul muttaqeen

9:8.t: Kaifa Wa-iny-yazharoo 'alaikum laa yarquboo feekum illanw Wa-laa zimmah; yurdoo nakum biafwaahihim Wa-ta'baa quloobuhum Wa-aksaruhum faasiqoon

9:9.t: Ishtaraw bi-Aayaatil laahi samanan qaleelan fasaddoo 'an sabeelih; innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon

9:10.t: Laa yarquboona fee mu'minin illanw Wa-laa zimmah Wa-ulaaa'ika humul mu'tadoon

9:11.t: Fa-in taaboo Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-aatawuz Zakaata fa-ikhwaanukum fid deen; Wa-nufassilul Aayaati liqawminy ya'lamoon

9:12.t: Wa-in nakasooo aimaanahum mim ba'di 'ahdihim Wa-ta'anoo fee deenikum faqaatilooo a'immatal kufri innahum laaa aimaana lahum la'allahum yantahoon

9:13.t: Alaa tuqaatiloona qawman nakasooo aimaanahum Wa-hammoo bi-ikhraajir Rasooli Wa-hum bada'ookum awwala marrah; atakhshawnahum; fallaahu ahaqqu an takhshawhu in kuntum mu'mineen

9:14.t: Qaatiloohum yu'az-zibhumul laahu bi-aideekum Wa-yukhzihim Wa-yansurkum 'alaihim Wa-yashfi sudoora qawmim mu-'mineen

9:15.t: Wa yuzhib ghaiza quloobihim; Wa-yatoobullaahu 'alaa mai yashaaa'; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

9:16.t: Am hasibtum an tutrakoo Wa-lammaa ya'lamil laahul lazeena jaahadoo minkum Wa-lam yattakhizoo min doonil laahi Wa-laa Rasoolihee Wa-lal mu'mineena waleejah; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

9:17.t: maa kaana lilmushrikeena ai ya'muroo masaajidal laahi shaahideena 'alaaa anfusihim bilkufr; ulaaa'ika habitat a'maaluhum Wa-fin naari hum khaalidoon

9:18.t: Innamaa ya'muru masaa-jidal laahi man aamana billaahi wal-Yawmil Aakhiri Wa-aqaamas Salaata Wa-aataz Zakaata Wa-lam yakhshaa illal laaha fa'asaaa ulaaa'ika aien yakoonoo minal muhtadeen

9:19.t: Aja'altum siqaayatal haaajji Wa-'imaaratal masjidil haraami kamman aamana billaahi wal-Yawmil Aakhiri Wa-jaahada fee sabeelil laah; laa yastawoona 'indal laah; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

9:20.t: Allazeena aamanoo Wa-haajaroo Wa-jaahadoo fee sabeelil laahi bi-amwaalihim Wa-anfusihim a'zamu darajatan 'indal laah; Wa-ulaaa'ika humul faaa'izoon

9:21.t: Yubashshiruhum Rabbuhum birahmatim minhu Wa-ridwaaninw Wa-Jannaatil lahum feehaa na'eemum muqeem

9:22.t: Khaalideena feehaaa abadaa; innal laaha 'indahooo ajrun 'azeem

9:23.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizooo aabaaa-'akum Wa-ikhwaanakum awliyaaa'a inis tahabbul kufra 'alal eemaan; Wa-maien yatawal-lahum minkum fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

9:24.t: Qul in kaana aabaaa'ukum Wa-abnaaa'ukum Wa-ikhwaanukum Wa-azwaajukum Wa-'asheeratukum Wa-amwaaluniq taraftumoohaa Wa-tijaaratun takhshawna kasaadahaa Wa-masaakinu tardawnahaaa ahabba ilaikum minal laahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-Jihaadin fee Sabeelihee fatarabbasoo hattaa ya'tiyallahu bi amrih; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen

9:25.t: Laqad nasarakumul laahu fee mawaatina kaseeratinw Wa-yawma Hunainin iz a'jabatkum kasratukum falam tughni 'ankum shai'anw Wa-daaqat 'alaikumul ardu bimaa rahubat summa wallaitum mudbireen

9:26.t: Summa anzalal laahu sakeenatahoo 'alaa Rasoolihee Wa-'alalmu 'mineena Wa-anzala junoodal lam tarawhaa Wa-azzabal lazeena kafaroo; Wa-zaalika jazaaa'ul kaafireen

9:27.t: Summa yatoobul laahu mim ba'di zaalika 'alaa mai yashaaa'; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

9:28.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanooo innamal mushrikoona najasun falaa yaqrabul Masjidal Haraama ba'da 'aamihim haaza; Wa-in khiftum 'ailatan fasawfa yughnee kumul laahu min fadliheee in shaaa'; innallaaha 'Aleemun hakeem

9:29.t: Qaatilul lazeena laa yu'minoona billaahi Wa-laa bil-yawmil Aakhiri Wa-laa yuharrimoona maa harramal laahu Wa-Rasooluhoo Wa-laa yadeenoona deenal haqqi minal lazeena ootul Kitaaba hattaa yu'tul jizyata aien yadinw Wa-hum saaghiroon

9:30.t: Wa-qaalatil yahoodu 'Uzairunib nul laahi Wa-qaalatin Nasaaral Maseehub nul laahi zaalika qawluhum bi-afwaahihim yudaahi'oona qawlal lazeena kafaroo min qabl; qatalahumul laah; annaa yu'fakoon

9:31.t: ittakhazooo ahbaarahum Wa-ruhbaanahum arbaabam min doonil laahi wal-Maseehab na Maryama Wa-maaa umirooo illaa liya'budooo Ilaahanw Waa-hidan laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; Subhaanahoo 'ammaa yushrikoon

9:32.t: Yureedoona aien yutfi'oo nooral laahi bi'afwaahihim Wa-ya'bal laahu illaaa aien yutimma noorahoo Wa-law karihal kaafiroon

9:33.t: huwal lazeee ar-sala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa Wa-deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullihee Wa-law karihal mushrikoon

9:34.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanooo inna kaseeram minal ahbaari warruhbaani la-ya'kuloona amwaalan naasi bil-baatili Wa-yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laah; wallazeena yaknizoonaz zahaba wal-fiddata Wa-laa yunfiqoonahaa fee sabeelil laahi fabashshirhum bi'azaabin aleem

9:35.t: Yawma yuhmaa 'alaihaa fee naari jahannama fatukwaa bihaa jibaahuhum Wa-junoobuhum Wa-zuhooruhum haazaa maa kanaztum li-anfusikum fazooqoo maa kuntum taknizoon

9:36.t: Inna 'iddatash shuhoori 'indal laahis naa 'ashara shahran fee Kitaabil laahi yawma khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda minhaaa arba'atun hurum; zaalikad deenul qaiyyim; falaa tazlimoo feehinna anfusakum; Wa-qaatilul mushrikeena kaaaffatan kamaa yuqaati-loonakum kaaaffah; wa'lamooo annal laaha ma'al muttaqeen

9:37.t: Inna-man naseee'u ziyaadatun fil kufri yudallu bihil lazeena kafaroo yuhil-loonahoo 'aamanw Wa-yuhar-rimoonahoo 'aamal liyuwaati'oo 'iddata maa harramal laahu fayuhilloo maa harramal laah; zuyyina lahum sooo'u a'maalihim; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal kaafireen

9:38.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo maa lakum izaa qeela lakumun firoo fee sabeelil laahis saaqaltum ilal ard; aradeetum bilhayaatid dunyaa minal Aakhirah; famaa mataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa fil Aakhirati illaa qaleel

9:39.t: Illaa tanfiroo yu'az-zibkum 'azaaban aleemanw Wa-yastabdil qawman ghairakum Wa-laa tadurroohu shai'aa; wal-laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

9:40.t: Illaa tansuroohu faqad nasarahul laahu iz akhrajahul lazeena kafaroo saaniyas naini iz humaa fil ghaari iz yaqoolu lisaahibihee laa tahzan innnal laaha ma'anaa; fa-anzalal laahu sakeenatahoo 'alaihi Wa-aiyyadahoo bijunoodil lam tarawhaa Wa-ja'ala kalimatal lazeena kafarus suflaa; Wa-Kalimatul laahi hiyal 'ulyaa; wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem

9:41.t: Infiroo khifaafanw Wa-siqaalanw Wa-jaahidoo bi-amwaalikum Wa-anfusikum fee sabeelil laah; zaalikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

9:42.t: Law kaana 'aradan qareebanw Wa-safaran qaasidal lattaba'ooka Wa-laakim ba'udat 'alaihimush shuqqah; Wa-sayahlifoona billaahi lawis tata'naa lakharajnaa ma'akum; yuhlikoona anfusahum wal-laahu ya'lamu innahum lakaa-ziboon

9:43.t: Afal laahu 'anka lima azinta lahum hattaa yatabaiy-yana lakal lazeena sadaqoo Wa-ta'lamal kaazibeen

9:44.t: Laa yastaazinukal lazeena yu'minoona billaahi wal-Yawmil Aakhiri aien yujaa-hidoo bi-amwaalihim Wa-anfusihim; wallaahu 'aleemum bilmut-taqeen

9:45.t: Innamaa yastaazinukal lazeena laa yu'minoona billaahi wal-Yawmil Aakhiri wartaabat quloobuhum fahum fee raibihim yataraddadoon

9:46.t: Wa-law araadul khurooja la-'addoo lahoo 'uddatanw Wa-laakin karihal laahum bi'aasahum fasabbatahum Wa-qeelaq 'udoo ma'al qaa'ideen

9:47.t: Law kharajoo feekum maa zaadookum ilaa Khabaalanw Wa-la-awda'oo khilaalakum yabghoona-kumul fitnata Wa-feekum sammaa'oona lahum; wallaahu 'aleemum biz-zaalimeen

9:48.t: Laqadib taghawul fitnata min qablu Wa-qallaboo lakal umoora hattaa jaaa'al haqqu Wa-zahara amrul laahi Wa-hum kaarihoon

9:49.t: Wa-minhum maien yaqoolu' zal lee Wa-laa taftinneee; alaa fil fitnati saqatoo; Wa-inna Jahannama lamuheetatum bil-kaafireen

9:50.t: In tusibka hasanatun tasu'hum; Wa-in tusibka museebatuny yaqooloo qad akhaznaaa amranaa min qablu Wa-yatawallaw Wa-hum farihoon

9:51.t: Qul laien yuseebanaaa illaa maa katabal laahu lanaa Huwa mawlaanaa; Wa-'alal laahi fal-yatawakka-lil mu'minoon

9:52.t: Qul hal tarabbasoona binaaa illaaa ihdal husnayayni Wa-nahnu natrabbasu bikum aien yus-eebakumul laahu bi'azaa-bim min 'indiheee aw biaidee-naa fatarabbasooo innaa ma'akum mutarabbisoon

9:53.t: Qul anfiqoo taw'an aw karhal laien yutaqabbala min-kum innakum kuntum qawman faasiqeen

9:54.t: Wa-maa mana'ahum 'an tuqbala minhum nafaqaatuhum illaaa annahum kafaroo billaahi Wa-bi-Rasoolihee Wa-laa ya'toonas Salaata illaa Wa-hum kusaalaa Wa-laa yunfiqoona illaa Wa-hum kaarihoon

9:55.t: Falaa tu'jibka amwaaluhum Wa-laaa awlaaduhum; innamaa yureedul laahu liyu'az-zibahum bihaa fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-tazhaqa anfusuhum Wa-hum kaafiroon

9:56.t: Wa-yahlifoona billaahi innnahum laminkum Wa-maa hum minkum Wa-laakinnahum qawmuien yafraqoon

9:57.t: Law yajidoona malja'an aw maghaaraatin aw mudda-khalal lawallaw ilaihi Wa-hum yajmahoon

9:58.t: Wa minhum maien yalmizuka fis sadaqaati fa-in u'too minhaa radoo Wa-illam yu'taw minhaaa izaa hum yaskhatoon

9:59.t: Wa-law annahum radoo maaa aataahumul laahu Wa-Rasooluhoo Wa-qaaloo hasbunal laahu sayu'teenal laahu min fadlihee Wa-Rasooluhooo innaaa ilal laahi raaghiboon

9:60.t: Innamas sadaqaatu lilfuqaraaa'i walmasaakeeni wal-'aamileena 'alaihaa wal-mu'al-lafati quloobuhum Wa-fir riqaabi walghaarimeena Wa-fee sabeelil laahi wabnis sabeeli fareedatam minal laah; wal-laahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

9:61.t: Wa-minhumul lazeena yu'zoonan nabiyya Wa-yaqooloona huwa uzun; qul uzunu khairil lakum yu'minu billaahi Wa-yu'minu lil-mu'mineena Wa-rahmatul lil-lazeena aamanoo minkum; wallazeena yu'zoona Rasoolal laahi lahum 'azaabun 'aleem

9:62.t: yahlifoona billaahi lakum liyurdookum wallaahu Wa-Rasooluhoo ahaqqu ai yurdoohu in kaanoo mu'mineen

9:63.t: Alam ya'lamooo annahoo maien yuhaadidil laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo faanna lahoo Naara jahannama khaalidan feehaa; zaalikal khizyul 'Azeem

9:64.t: Yahzarul munaafiqoona an tunaz zala 'alaihim Sooratun tunabbi 'uhum bimaa feequloobihim; qulistahzi'oo innal laaha mukhrijum maa tahzaroon

9:65.t: Wala'in sa-altahum layaqoolunna innamaa kunnaa nakhoodu Wa-nal'ab; qul abillaahi Wa-'Aayaatihee Wa-Rasoolihee kuntum tastahzi'oon

9:66.t: Laa ta'taziroo qad kafartum ba'da eemaanikum; in na'fu 'an taaa'ifatin minkum nu'az-zib taaa'ifatan bi-annahum kaanoo mujrimeen

9:67.t: Almunaafiqoona wal-munaafiqaatu ba'duhum mim ba'd; yaamuroona bilmunkari Wa-yanhawna 'anil ma'roofi Wa-yaqbidoona aidiyahum; nasul laaha fanasiyahum; innal munaafiqeena humul faasiqoon

9:68.t: Wa'adal laahul munafiqeena wal-munaafiqaati wal-kuffaara naara jahannnamma khaalideena feehaa; hiya hasbuhum; Wa-la'annahumul laahu Wa-lahum 'azaabum muqeem

9:69.t: Kallazeena min qablikum kaanoo ashadda minkum quwwatanw Wa-aksara amwaalanw Wa-awlaadan fastamta'oo bikhalaaqihim fastamta'tum bikhalaaqikum kamas tamta'al lazeena min qablikum bikhalaa-qihim Wa-khudtum kallazee khaadooo; ulaaa'ika habitat a'maaluhum fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

9:70.t: Alam ya'tihim naba ul-lazeena min qablihim qawmi Noohinw Wa-'Aadinw Wa-Samooda Wa-qawmi Ibraaheema Wa-as-haabi Madyana wal-mu'tafikaat; atathum Rusuluhum bilbaiy-yinaati famaa kaanal laahu liyazlimahum Wa-laakin kaanooo anfusahum yazlimoon

9:71.t: Wal-mu'minoona wal-mu'minaatu ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'd; ya'muroona bilma'roofi Wa-yanhawna 'anil munkari Wa-yuqeemoonas Salaata Wa-yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-yutee'oonal laaha Wa-Rasoolah; ulaaa'ika sayarhamu-humul laah; innal laaha 'Azeezun Hakeem

9:72.t: Wa'adal laahul mu'-mineena walmu'minaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa Wa-masaakina taiyyibatan fee Jannnaati 'adn; Wa-ridwaanum minal laahi akbar; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

9:73.t: yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu jaahidil kuffaara walmunaafiqeena waghluz 'alaihim; Wa-maawaahum jahannnamu Wa-bi'sal maseer

9:74.t: Yahlifoona billaahi Wa-qaaloo Wa-laqad qaaloo kalimatal kufri Wa-kafaroo ba'da Islaamihim Wa-hammoo bimaa lam yanaaloo; Wa-maa naqamooo illaaa an aghnaa humullaahu Wa-Rasooluhoo min fadlih; fainy yatooboo yaku khairal lahum Wa-iny yatawal law yu'az zibhumullaahu 'azaaban aleeman fiddunyaa wal Aakhirah; wamaa lahum fil ardi minw waliyyinw Wa-laa naseer

9:75.t: Wa-minhum man 'aaha-dal laaha la'in aataanaa min fadlihee lanas-saddaqanna Wa-lanakoonanna minas saaliheen

9:76.t: Falammaaa aataahum min fadlihee bakhiloo bihee Wa-tawallaw Wa-hum mu'ridoon

9:77.t: Fa-a'qabahum nifaaqan fee quloobihim ilaa Yawmi yalqaw-nahoo bimaaa akhlaful laaha maa wa'adoohu Wa-bimaa kaanoo yakhziboon

9:78.t: Alam ya'lamooo annal laaha ya'lamu sirrahum Wa-najwaahum Wa-annal laaha 'Allaamul Ghuyoob

9:79.t: Allazeena yalmizoonal mut tawwi'eena minalmu'mineena fis sadaqaati wallazeena laa yajidoona illaa juhdahum fayaskharoona minhum sakhiral laahu minhum Wa-lahum azaabun aleem

9:80.t: Istaghfir lahum aw laa tastaghfir lahum in tastaghfir lahum sab'eena marratan falaien yaghfiral laahu lahum; zaalika bi-annahum kafaroo billaahi Wa-Rasoolih; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen

9:81.t: Farihal mukhallafoona bimaq'adihim khilaafa Rasoolil laahi Wa-karihooo aien yujaahidoo bi-amwaalihim Wa-anfusihim fee sabeelil laahi Wa-qaaloo laa tanfiroo fil harr; qul Naaru jahannama ashaddu harraa; law kaanoo yafqahoon

9:82.t: Falyadhakoo qaleelanw walyabkoo kaseeran jazaaa'an bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

9:83.t: Fa-ir raja'akal laahu ilaa taaa'ifatim minhum fastaaa-zanooka lilkhurooji faqul lan takhrujoo ma'iya abadanw Wa-lan tuqaatiloo ma'iya 'aduwwan innakum radeetum bilqu'oodi awwala marratin faq'udoo ma'al khaalifeen

9:84.t: Wa-laa tusalli 'alaaa ahadim minhum maata abadanw Wa-laa taqum 'alaa qabriheee innahum kafaroo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-maatoo Wa-hum faasiqoon

9:85.t: Wa-laa tu'jibka amwaaluhum Wa-awlaaduhum; innamaa yureedul laahu aien yu'azzibahum bihaa fid dunyaa Wa-tazhaqa anfusuhum Wa-hum kaafiroon

9:86.t: Wa-izaaa unzilat Sooratun an aaminoo billaahi Wa-jaahidoo ma'a Rasoolihis taazanaka ulut tawli minhum Wa-qaaloo zarnaa nakum ma'al qaa'ideen

9:87.t: Radoo bi-aie yakoonoo ma'al khawaalifi Wa-tubi'a 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yafqahoon

9:88.t: Laakinir Rasoolu wal-lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo jaahadoo bi-amwaalihim Wa-anfusihim; Wa-ulaaa'ika lahumul khairaatu Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

9:89.t: A'addal laahu lahum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; zaalikal fawzul 'azeem

9:90.t: Wa-jaaa'al mu'az-ziroona minal A'raabi liyu'zana lahum Wa-qa'adal lazeena kazabul laaha Wa-Rasoolah; sayuseebul lazeena kafaroo minhum 'azaabun aleem

9:91.t: Laisa 'alad du'aaa'fai Wa-laa 'alal mardaa Wa-laa 'alal lazeena laa yajidoona maa yunfiqoona harajun izaa nasahoo lillaahi Wa-Rasoolih; maa 'alal muhsineena min sabeel; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

9:92.t: Wa-laa 'alal lazeena izaa maaa atawka litahmilahum qulta laaa ajidu maaa ahmilukum 'alaihi tawallaw Wa-a'yunuhum tafeedu minad dam'i hazanan allaa yajidoo maa yunfiqoon

9:93.t: Innamas sabeelu 'alal lazeena yasta'zinoonaka Wa-hum aghniyaaa'; radoo bi-aien yakoonoo ma'al khawaalifi Wa-taba'al laahu 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa ya'lamoon

9:94.t: Ya'taziroona ilaikum izaa raja'tum ilaihim; qul laa ta'taziroo lan nu'mina lakum qad nabba-annal laahu min akhbaarikum; Wa-sa-yaral laahu 'amalakum Wa-Rasooluhoo thumma turaddoona ilaa 'Aalimil Ghaibi washshahaadati fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

9:95.t: Sa yahlifoona billaahi lakum izanqalabtum ilaihim litu'ridoo 'anhum fa-a'ridoo 'anhum innahum rijsunw Wa-ma'waahum jahannamu jazaaa'an bi maakaanoo yaksiboon

9:96.t: Yahlifoona lakum litardaw 'anhum fa-in tardaw 'anhum fa-innal laaha laa yardaa 'anil qawmil faasiqeen

9:97.t: Al-A'raabu ashaddu kufranw Wa-nifaaqanw Wa-ajdaru allaa ya'lamoo hudooda maaa anzalal laahu 'alaa Rasoolih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

9:98.t: Wa-minal A'raabi mai yattakhizu maa yunfiqu maghramanw Wa-yatarabbasu bikumud dawaaa'ir; alaihim daaa'iratus saw'; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

9:99.t: Wa-minal A'raabi maien yu'minu billaahi wal-yawmil aakhiri Wa-yattakhizu maa yunfiqu qurubaatin 'indal laahi Wa-salawaatir Rasool; 'alaaa innahaa qurbatul lahum; sayudkhilu-humul laahu fee rahmatih; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

9:100.t: Was-saabiqoonal awwaloona minal Muhaajireena wal-Ansaari wallazeenat taba'oo-hum bi-ihsaanir radiyal laahu 'anhum Wa-radoo 'anhu Wa-a'adda lahum jannaatin tajree tahtahal anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa abadaa; zaalikal fawzul 'azeem

9:101.t: Wa-mimmann hawlakum minal A'raabi munaafiqoona Wa-min ahlil Madeenati maradoo 'alan nifaaq, laa ta'lamuhum nahnu na'lamuhum; sanu'azzibuhum marrataini summa yuraddoona ilaa 'azaabin 'azeem

9:102.t: Wa-aakharoo na'tarafoo bizunoobihim khalatoo 'amalan saalihanw Wa-aakhara saiyyi'an 'asal laahu 'aien yatooba 'alaihim; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

9:103.t: Khuz min amwaalihim sadaqtan tutahhiruhum Wa-tuzakkeehim bihaa Wa-salli 'alaihim inna salaataka sakanul lahum; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

9:104.t: Alam ya'lamooo annal laaha huwa yaqbalut tawbata 'an ibaadihee Wa-ya'khuzus sadaqaati Wa-annal laaha huwat Tawwaabur Raheem

9:105.t: Wa-qul i'maloo fasayaral laahu 'amalakum Wa-Rasooluhoo wal-mu'minoon; Wa-saturaddoona ilaa 'Aalimil Ghaibi washshahaadati fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

9:106.t: Wa-aakharoona murjawna li-amril laahi immaa yu'azzibuhum Wa-immaa yatoobu 'alaihim; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

9:107.t: Wallazeenat takhazoo masjidan diraaranw Wa-kufranw Wa-tafreeqan bainal mu'mineena Wa-irsaadal liman haarabal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo min qabl; Wa-la-yahlifunna in aradnaaa illal husnaa wallaahu yash-hadu innahum lakaaziboon

9:108.t: Laa taqum feehi abadaa; lamasjidun ussisa 'alat taqwaa min awwali yawmin ahaqqu 'an taqooma feeh; feehi rijaaluien yuhibbona 'aien yata-tah-haroo; wallaahu yuhibbul muttah-hireen

9:109.t: Afaman assasa bunyaanahoo 'alaa taqwaa minal laahi Wa-ridwaanin khairun am man assasa bunyaanahoo 'alaa shafaa jurufin haarin fanhaara bihee fee Naari Jahannam; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

9:110.t: Laa yazaalu bunyaanu-humul lazee banaw reebatan fee quloobihim illaaa an taqatta'a quloobuhum; wal-laahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

9:111.t: Innal laahash taraa minal mu'mineena anfusahum Wa-amwaalahum bi-anna lahumul jannah; yuqaatiloona fee sabeelil laahi fa-yaqtuloona Wa-yuqtaloona wa'dan 'alaihi haqqan fit Tawraati wal-Injeeli wal-Qur'aaan; Wa-man awfaa bi'ahdihee minal laah; fastabshiroo bi-bay'ikumul lazee baaya'tum bih; Wa-zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

9:112.t: At-taaa'iboonal 'aabidoonal haamidoonas saaa'ihoonar raaki'oonas saajidoonal aamiroona bilma'roofi wannaahoona 'anil munkari walhaafizoona lihudoodil laah; Wa-bashshiril mu'mineen

9:113.t: Maa kaana lin-nabiyyi wallazeena aamanooo 'aien yastaghfiroo lil-mushrikeena Wa-law kaanoo ulee qurbaa min ba'di maa tabiyyana lahum annahum As-haabul jaheem

9:114.t: Wa-maa kaanas tighfaaru ibraaheema li-abeehi illaa 'an maw'idatinw Wa-'adahaaa iyyaahu falammaa tabaiyyana lahooo annahoo 'aduwwul lillaahi tabarra-a minh; inna Ibraaheema la-awwaahun haleem

9:115.t: Wa-maa kaanal laahu liyudilla qawman ba'da iz hadaahum hatta yubaiyyina lahum maa yattaqoon; innal laaha bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

9:116.t: Innal laaha lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi yuhyee Wa-yumeet; Wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi minw waliyyinw Wa-laa naseer

9:117.t: Laqat taabal laahu 'alan nabiyyi wal-Muhaajireena wal-Ansaaril lazeenat taba'oohu fee saa'atil 'usrati min ba'di maa kaada yazeeghu quloobu fariqin minhum thumma taaba 'alaihim; innahoo bihim Ra'oofur Raheem

9:118.t: Wa-'alas salaasatil lazeena khullifoo hattaaa izaa daaqat 'alaihimul ardu bimaa rahubat Wa-daaqat 'alaihim anfusuhum Wa-zannnooo al laa malja-a minal laahi illaaa ilaihi summa taaba 'alaihim liyatooboo; innal laaha Huwat Tawwaabur Raheem

9:119.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha Wa-koonoo ma'as saadiqeen

9:120.t: Maa kaana li-ahlil Madeenati Wa-man hawlahum minal A'raabi aien yatakhallafoo 'ar Rasoolil laahi Wa-laa yarghaboo bi-anfusihim 'an nafsih; zaalika bi-annahum laa yuseebuhum zama-unw Wa-laa nasabunw Wa-laa makhmasatun fee sabeelil laahi Wa-laa yata'oona mawti'ai yagheezul kuffaara Wa-laa yanaaloona min 'aduwwin nailan illaa kutiba lahum bihee 'amalun saalih; innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen

9:121.t: Wa-laa yunfiqoona nafa-qatan sagheeratanw Wa-laa kabeeratanw Wa-laa yaqta'oona waadiyan illaa kutiba lahum liyajziyahumul laahu ahsana maa kaanoo ya'maloon

9:122.t: Wa-maa kaanal mu'minoona liyanfiroo kaaaffah; falaw-laa nafara min kulli firqatim minhum taaa'ifatul liyatafaqqahoo fid deeni Wa-liyunziroo qawmahum izaa raja'ooo ilaihim la'allahum yahzaroon

9:123.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo qaatilul lazeena yaloonakum minal kuffaari walyajidoo feekum ghilzah; wa'lamooo annal laaha ma'al muttaqeen

9:124.t: Wa-izaa maaa unzilat Sooratun faminhum maien yaqoolu aiyyukum zaadat hu-haazihee eemaanaa; fa-ammal lazeena aamanoo fazaadat-hum eemaananw Wa-hum yastabshiroon

9:125.t: Wa-ammal lazeena fee quloobihim maradun fazaadat-hum rijsan ilaa rijsihim Wa-maatoo Wa-hum kaafiroon

9:126.t: A-Wa-laa yarawna annahum yuftanoona fee kulli 'aamin marratan 'aw marrataini thumma laa yatooboona Wa-laa hum yazzakkaroon

9:127.t: Wa-izaa maaa unzilat Sooratun nazara ba'duhum ilaa ba'din hal yaraakum min ahadin thumman sarafoo; sarafal laahu quloobahum bi-annahum qawmul laa yafqahoon

9:128.t: Laqad jaaa'akum Rasoolum min anfusikum 'azeezun 'alaihi maa 'anittum hareesun 'alaikum bilmu'mineena ra'oofur raheem

9:129.t: Fa-in tawallaw faqul hasbiyal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa 'alaihi tawakkkaltu Wa-Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil 'Azeem

10:2.t: A-kaana linnaasi 'ajaaban 'an 'awhainaaa 'ilaa rajulin minhum 'an anzirin naasa Wa-bashshiril lazeena 'aamanoo 'anna lahum qadama sidqin 'inda Rabbihim; qaalal kaafiroona 'inna haazaa la-saahirun mubeen

10:3.t: Inna Rabbakumul laahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda fee sittati aiy-yaamin thummas tawaa 'alal 'Arshi yudabbirul amra maa min shafee'in illaa min ba'di iznih; zalikumul laahu Rabbukum fa'budooh; afalaa tazakkaroon

10:4.t: Ilaihi marji'ukum jamee-'anw wa'dal laahi haqqaa; innahoo yabda'ul khalqa thumma yu'eeduhoo liyajziyal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati bilqist; wallazeena kafaroo lahum sharaabun min hamee-minw Wa-'azaabun 'aleemun bimaa kaanoo yakfuroon

10:5.t: Huwal lazee ja'alash shamsa diyaaa'anw walqamara nooranw Wa-qaddarahoo manaazila li-ta'lamoo 'adadas sineena walhisaab; maa khalaqal laahu zaalika illa bilhaqq; yufassilul aayaati li-qawminy ya'lamoon

10:6.t: Inna fikh tilaafil laili wannahaari Wa-maa khalaqal laahu fis samaawaati wal-ardi la-aayaatin liqawmien yattaqoon

10:7.t: Innal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa Wa-radoo bilhayaatid dunyaa watma'-annoo bihaa wallazeena hum 'an Aayaatinaa ghaafiloon

10:8.t: Ulaaa'ika ma'waahumun Naaru bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

10:9.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati yahdeehim Rabbuhum bi-eemaanihim tajree min tahtihimul anhaaru fee jannaatin Na'eem

10:10.t: Da'waahum feehaa Subhaanakal laahumma Wa-tahiyyatuhum feehaa salaam; Wa-aakhiru da'waahum anil hamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

10:11.t: Wa-law yu'ajjilul laahu linnaasish sharra sti'-jaalahum bil-khairi laqudiya ilaihim 'ajaluhum fa-nazarul lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon

10:12.t: Wa-izaa massal insaanad durru da'aanaa li-jambiheee aw qaa'idan aw qaaa'iman falammaa kashafnaa 'anhu durrahoo marra ka-an lam yad'unaaa ilaa durrin massah; kazaalika zuyyina lilmusrifeena maa kaanoo ya'maloon

10:13.t: Wa-laqad ahlaknal quroona min qablikum lammaa zalamoo Wa-jaaa'at-hum Rusuluhum bil-baiy-yinaati Wa-maa kaanoo liyu'minoo; kazaalika najzil qawmal mujrimeen

10:14.t: Thumma ja'alnaakum khalaaa'ifa fil ardi min ba'dihim li-nanzura kaifa ta'maloon

10:15.t: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim aayaatunaa baiy-yinaatin qaalal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'a na'ti bi-Qur'aanin ghairi haazaaa aw baddilh; qul maa yakoonu leee 'an 'ubaddilahoo min tilqaaa'i nafsee in attabi'u illaa maa yoohaaa ilaiy-ya inneee akhaafu in 'asaytu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem

10:16.t: Qul law shaaa'al laahu maa talawtuhoo 'alaikum Wa-laaa adraakum bihee faqad labistu feekum 'umuran min qablih; afalaa ta'qiloon

10:17.t: Faman azlamu mimmanif taraa 'alal laahi kaziban aw kazzaba bi-Aayaatih; innahoo laa yuflihul mujrimoon

10:18.t: Wa-ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yadurruhum Wa-laa yanfa'uhum Wa-yaqooloona haaa'ulaaa'i shufa'aaa-'unaa 'indal laah; qul 'a-tunabbi-'oonal laaha bi-maa laa ya'lamu fis samaawaati Wa-laa fil ard; subhaanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

10:19.t: Wa-maa kaanan naasu illaaa ummatanw waahidatan fa-khtalafoo; Wa-law-laa kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum fee-maa feehi yakhtalifoon

10:20.t: Wa-yaqooloona law-laaa unzila 'alaihi aayatun mir Rabbihee faqul innamal ghaibu lillaahi fantaziroo innee ma'akum minal muntazireen

10:21.t: Wa-izaaa azaqnan naasa rahmatan min ba'di darraaa'a massat-hum izaa lahum makrun feee aayaatinaa; qulil laahu asra'u makraa; inna rusulanaa yaktuboona maa tamkuroon

10:22.t: Huwal lazee yusayyirukum fil barri walbahri hattaaa izaa kuntum fil fulki Wa-jaraina bihim bi-reehin tayyibatinw Wa-farihoo bihaa jaaa'at-haa reehun 'aasifunw Wa-jaaa'ahumul mawju min kulli makaaninw Wa-zannooo 'annahum 'uheeta bihim da'a wullaaha mukhliseena lahud deena la'in anjaitanaa min haazihee la-nakoonanna minash shaakireen

10:23.t: Falammaaa anjaahum izaa hum yabghoona fil ardi bighairil haqq; yaaa-aiy-yuhan naasu innamaa bagh-yukum 'alaaa anfusikum mataa'al hayaatid dunyaa thumma ilainaa marji'ukum fanunabbi-'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

10:24.t: Innamaa masalul hayaatid dunyaa ka-maaa'in anzalnaahu minas samaaa'i fakhtalata bihee nabaatul ardi mimmaa ya'kulun naasu wal-an'aam; hattaaa izaaa akhazatil ardu zukhrufahaa wazzayyanat Wa-zanna ahluhaaa annahum qaadiroona 'alaihaaa ataahaaa amrunaa lailan aw nahaaran faja'alnaahaa haseedan ka-'an lam taghna bil-ams; kazaalika nufassilul aayaati liqawmien yatafakkaroon

10:25.t: Wallaahu yad'ooo ilaa daaris salaami Wa-yahdee many yashaaa'u ilaa Siraatin Mustaqeem

10:26.t: Lil-lazeena ahsanul husnaa Wa-ziyaadatunw Wa-laa yarhaqu wujoohahum qatarunw Wa-laa zillah; ulaaa'ika as-haabul jannati hum feehaa khaalidoon

10:27.t: Wallazeena kasabus saiyi-aati jazaaa'u saiyi'atin bimislihaa Wa-tarhaquhum zillah; maa lahum minal laahi min 'aasimin ka-annamaaa ughshiyat wujoohuhum qita'an minal laili muzlimaa; ulaaa'ika As-haabun Naari hum feeha khaalidoon

10:28.t: Wa-yawma nahshuruhum jamee'an thumma naqoolu lil-lazeena ashrakoo makaanakum antum Wa-shurakaaa'ukum; fazaiy-yalnaa bainahum Wa-qaala shurakaaa'uhum maa kuntum iyyaanaa ta'budoon

10:29.t: Fakafaa billaahi shaheedan bainanaa Wa-bainakum in kunnaa 'an 'ibaadatikum laghaafileen

10:30.t: Hunaalika tabloo kullu nafsin maaa 'aslafat; Wa-ruddoo ilal laahi mawlaahumul haqqi Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

10:31.t: Qul maien yarzuqukum minas samaaa'i wal-ardi ammanien yamlikus sam'a wal-absaara Wa-maien yukhrijul haiyya minal maiyyiti Wa-yukhrijul maiyyita minal haiyyi Wa-maien yudabbirul amr; fasa-yaqooloonal laah; faqul afalaa tattaqoon

10:32.t: Fazaalikumul laahu Rabbukumul haqq; famaazaa ba'dal haqqi illad dalaalu fa-anna tusrafoon

10:33.t: Kazaalika haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika 'alal lazeena fasaqooo annahum laa yu'minoon

10:34.t: Qul hal min shurakaaa-'ikum maien yabda'ul khalqa thumma yu'eeduh; qulil laahu yabda'ul khalqa thumma yu'eeduhoo fa-annaa tu'fakoon

10:35.t: Qul hal min shurakaaa-'ikum maien yahdeee ilal haqq; qulil laahu yahdee lilhaqq; afamaien yahdeee ilal haqqi ahaqqu aien yuttaba'a ammal laa yahiddeee illaaa aien yuhdaa famaa lakum kaifa tahkumoon

10:36.t: Wa-maa yattabi'u aksaruhum illaa zannaa; innaz zanna laa yughnee minal haqqi shai'aa; innal laaha 'Aleemun bimaa yaf'aloon

10:37.t: Wa-maa kaana haazal Qur'aanu ai yuftaraa min doonil laahi Wa-laakin tasdeeqal lazee baina yadaihi Wa-tafseelal Kitaabi laa raiba fee mir Rabbil 'aalameen

10:38.t: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul fa'too bi-sooratin mislihee wad'oo manis tata'tum min doonil laahi in kuntum saadiqeen

10:39.t: Bal kazzaboo bimaa lam yuheetoo bi'ilmihee Wa-lammaa ya'tihim ta'weeluh; kazaalika kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatuz zaalimeen

10:40.t: Wa-minhum maien yu-'minu bihee Wa-minhum mal laa yu'minu bih; Wa-Rabbuka a'lamu bilmufsideen

10:41.t: Wa-in kazzabooka faqul lee 'amalee Wa-lakum 'amalukum antum bareee'oona mimmaaa a'malu Wa-ana bareee'um mimmaa ta'maloon

10:42.t: Wa-minhum maien yastami'oona iliak; afa-anta tusmi'us summa Wa-law kaanoo laa ya'qiloon

10:43.t: Wa-minhum maien yanzuru ilaik; afa-anta tahdil 'umya Wa-law kaanoo laa yubsiroon

10:44.t: Innal laaha laa yazlimun naasa shai'anw Wa-laakin nannaasa anfusahum yazlimoon

10:45.t: Wa-Yawma yahshuruhum ka-'an lam yalbasooo illaa saa'atan minan nahaari yata'aarafoona bainahum; qad khasiral lazeena kazzaboo bi-liqaaa'il laahi Wa-maa kaanoo muhtadeen

10:46.t: Wa-imma nuriyannaka ba'dal lazee na'iduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilainaa marji'uhum thummal laahu shaheedun 'alaa maa yaf'aloon

10:47.t: Wa-likulli ummatir Rasoolun fa-izaa jaaa'a Rasooluhum qudiya bainahum bilqisti Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

10:48.t: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

10:49.t: Qul laaa amliku linafsee darranw Wa-laa naf'an illaa maa shaaa'al laah; likulli ummatin ajalun izaa jaaa'a ajaluhumfa laaa yasta'khiroona saa'atanw Wa-laa yastaqdimoon

10:50.t: Qul 'a-ra'aytum in ataakum 'azaabuhoo bayaatan aw nahaaran maazaa yasta'jilu minhul mujrimoon

10:51.t: A-thumma izaa maa waqa'a aamantum bih; aaal-'aana Wa-qad kuntum bihee tasta'jiloon

10:52.t: Thumma qeela lil-lazeena zalamoo zooqoo 'azaabal khuldi hal tujzawna illaa bimaa kuntum taksiboon

10:53.t: Wa-yastanbi'oonaka 'a-haqqun huwa qul ee Wa-Rabbeee innahoo lahaqq; Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeen

10:54.t: Wa-law anna likulli nafsin zalamat maa fil ardi laftadat bih; Wa-asarrun nadaamata lammaa ra-awul 'azaab, Wa-qudiya bainahum bilqist; Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

10:55.t: Alaaa inna lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wal-ard; alaaa inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

10:57.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhan naasu qad jaaa'atkum maw'izatun mir Rabbikum Wa-shifaaa'ul limaa fis sudoori Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatul lil-mu'mineen

10:58.t: Qul bi-fadlil laahi Wa-bi-rahmatihee fa-bi-zaalika fal-yafrahoo huwa khairun mimmaa yajma'oon

10:59.t: Qul ara'aitum maaa anzalal laahu lakum mir rizqin faja'altum minhu haraamanw Wa-halaalan qul aaallaahu azina lakum; am 'alal laahi taftaroon
