10:60.t: Wa-maa zannul lazeena yaftaroona 'alal laahil kaziba Yawmal Qiyaamah; innal laaha lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa yashkuroon

10:61.t: Wa-maa takoonu fee sha'ninw Wa-maa tatloo minhu min qur'aaninw Wa-laa ta'maloona min 'amalin illaa kunnaa 'alaikum shuhoodan iz tufeedoona feeh; Wa-maa ya'zubu 'ar Rabbika min misqaali zarratin fil ardi Wa-laa fis samaaa'i Wa-laaa asghara min zaalika Wa-laaa akbara illaa fee Kitaabin Mubeen

10:62.t: Alaa innaa awliyaaa'al laahi laa khawfun 'alaihim Wa-laa hum yahzanoon

10:64.t: Lahumul bushraa fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-fil Aakhirah; laa tabdeela li-kalimaatil laah; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

10:65.t: Wa-laa yahzunka qawluhum; innal 'izzata lillaahi jamee'aa; Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

10:66.t: Alaaa inna lillaahi man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ard; Wa-maa yattabi'ul lazeena yad'oona min doonil laahi shurakaaa'; iny yattabi'oona illaz zanna Wa-in hum illaa yakhrusoon

10:67.t: Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul laila litaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil li-qawmien yasma'oon

10:68.t: Qaalut takhazal laahu waladan Subhaanahoo Huwal Ghaniyyu lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ard; in 'indakum min sultaanin bihaazaaa; a'-taqooloona 'al allaahi maa laa ta'lamoon

10:69.t: Qul innal lazeena yaftaroona 'al allaahil kaziba laa yuflihoon

10:70.t: Mataa'un fid dunyaa thumma ilainaa marji'uhum thumma nuzeequhumul 'azaabash shadeeda bimaa kaanoo yakfuroon

10:71.t: Watlu 'alaihim naba-a-Noohin iz qaala liqawmihee yaa qawmi in kaana kabura 'alaikum maqaamee Wa-tazkeeree bi-Aayaatil laahi fa'alal laahi tawakkaltu fa-ajmi'ooo amrakum Wa-shurakaaa'akum thumma laa yakun amrukum 'alaikum ghummatan thummaq dooo ilaiyya Wa-laa tunziroon

10:72.t: Fa-in tawallaitum famaa sa-altukum min ajrin; in ajriya illaa 'alal laahi Wa-umirtu an akoona minal muslimeen

10:73.t: Fa-kazzaboohu fa-najjainaahu Wa-man ma'ahoo fil fulki Wa-ja'alnaahum khalaaa'ifa Wa-aghraqnal lazeena kazzaboo bi-aayaatinaa fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul munzareen

10:74.t: Thumma ba'asnaa min ba'dihee Rusulan ilaa qawmihim fajaaa'oohum bil-baiyyinaati famaa kaanoo liyu'minoo bimaa kazzaboo bihee min qabl; kazaalika natba'u 'alaa quloobil mu'tadeen

10:75.t: Thumma ba'asnaa min ba'dihim Moosaa Wa-Haaroona ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihee bi-aayaatinaa fastakbaroo Wa-kaanoo qawman mujrimeen

10:76.t: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min 'indinaa qaalooo inna haazaa la-sihrun mubeen

10:77.t: Qaalaa Moosaaa 'a-taqooloona lil-haqqi lammmaa jaaa'a-kum 'a-sihrun haazaa Wa-laa yuflihus saahiroon

10:78.t: Qaaloo aji'tanaa litalfitanaa 'ammaa wajadnaa 'alaihi aabaaa'anaa Wa-takoona lakumal kibriyaaa'u fil ardi Wa-maa nahnu lakumaa bi-mu'mineen

10:80.t: Falammaa jaaa'assa haratu qaala lahum Moosaaa alqoo maaa antum mulqoon

10:81.t: Falammaaa alqaw qaala Moosaa maa ji'tum bihis sihr; innal laaha sa-yubtiluhoo; innal laaha laa yuslihu 'amalal mufsideen

10:82.t: Wa-yuhiqqul laahul haqqa bi-Kalimaatihee Wa-law karihal mujrimoon

10:83.t: Famaaa aamana li-Moosaaa illaa zurriyyatun min qawmihee 'alaa khawfin min Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihim 'any yaftinahum; Wa-inna Fir'awna la'aalin fil ardi Wa-innahoo laminal musrifeen

10:84.t: Wa-qaala Moosaa yaa-qawmi in kuntum aamantum billaahi fa'alaihi tawakkalooo in kuntum muslimeen

10:85.t: Faqaaloo 'alal laahi tawakkalnaa Rabbanaa laa taj'alnaa fitnatal lilqawmiz zaalimeen

10:87.t: Wa-awhainaaa ilaa Moosaa Wa-akheehi an tabaw Wa-aali-qawmikuma bi-Misra buyootanw waj'aloo buyootakum qiblatanw Wa-aqeemus Salaah; Wa-bashshiril mu'mineen

10:88.t: Wa-qaala Moosaa Rabbanaaa innaka aataita Fir'awna Wa-mala ahoo zeenatanw Wa-amwaalan fil hayaatid dunyaa Rabbanaa liyudillo 'ansabeelika Rabbanat mis 'alaaa amwaalihim washdud 'alaa quloobihim falaa yu'minoo hatta yarawul 'azaabal aleem

10:89.t: Qaala qad ujeebad da'watukumaa fastaqeemaa Wa-laa tattabi'aaanni sabeelal lazeena laa ya'lamoon

10:90.t: Wa-jaawaznaa bi-Baneee Israaa'eelal bahra fa-atba'ahum Fir'awnu Wa-junooduhoo baghyanw Wa-'adwaa; hattaaa izaaa adrakahul gharaqu qaala aamantu annahoo laaa ilaaha illal lazeee aamanat bihee Banooo Israaa'eela Wa-ana minal muslimeen

10:91.t: Aaal-'aana Wa-qad 'asaita qablu Wa-kunta minal mufsideen

10:92.t: Falyawma nunajjeeka bibadanika litakoona liman khalfaka Aayah; Wa-inna kaseeran minan naasi 'an aayaatinaa laghaafiloon

10:93.t: Wa-laqad bawwa'naa Baneee Israaa'eela mubawwa 'a sidqinw Wa-razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati fa-makhtalafoo hattaa jaaa'ahmul 'ilm; inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

10:94.t: Fa-in kunta fee shakkin mimmaaa anzalnaaa ilaika fas'alil lazeena yaqra'oonal Kitaaba min qablik; laqad jaaa'akal haqqu mir Rabbika fa-laa takoonanna minal mumtareen

10:95.t: Wa-laa takoonanna minal lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatil laahi fatakoona minal khaasireen

10:96.t: Innal lazeena haqqat 'alaihim Kalimatu Rabbika laa yu'minoon

10:97.t: Wa-law jaaa'at-hum kullu Aayatin hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem

10:98.t: Falaw-laa kaanat qaryatun aamanat fa-nafa'ahaaa eemaanuhaaa illaa qawma Yoonusa lammaaa aamanoo kashafnaa 'anhum 'azaabal khizyi fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-matta'naahum ilaa heen

10:99.t: Wa-law shaaa'a Rabbuka la-aamana man fil ardi kulluhum jamee'aa; afa-anta tukrihun naasa hattaa yakoonoo mu'mineen

10:100.t: Wa-maa kaana linafsin an tu'mina illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-yaj'alur rijsa 'alal lazeena laa ya'qiloon

10:101.t: Qulin zuroo maazaa fissamaawaati wal ard; Wa-maa tughnil Aayaatu wannuzuru 'an qawmil laa yu'minoon

10:102.t: Fahal yantaziroona illaa misla ayyaamil lazeena khalaw min qablihim; qul fantazirooo innee ma'akum minal muntazireen

10:103.t: Thumma nunajjee Rusulana wallazeena aamanoo; kazaalika haqqan 'alainaa nunjil mu'mineen

10:104.t: Qul yaaa-ayyuhan naasu in kuntum fee shakk-in min deenee fa-laa a'budul lazeena ta'budoona min doonil laahi Wa-laakin a'budul laahal lazee yatawaffaakum Wa-umirtu an akoona minal mu'mineen

10:105.t: Wa-an aqim wajhaka liddeeni Haneefanw Wa-laa takoonanna minal mushrikeen

10:106.t: Wa-laa tad'u min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uka Wa-laa yadurruk; fa-in fa'alta fa-innaka izam minaz zaalimeen

10:107.t: Wa-ien yamsaskal laahu bidurrin falaa kaashifa lahoo illaa hoo;wa iny yuridka bikhairin falaa raaadda lifadlih; yuseebu bihee many yashaaa'u min 'ibaadih; Wa-huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

10:108.t: Qul yaaa-ayyuhan naasu qad jaaa'akumul haqqu mir Rabbikum; famanih tadaa fa-innamaa yahtadee li-nafsih; Wa-man dalla fa-innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa; Wa-maaa ana 'alaikum bi-wakeel

10:109.t: Wattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika wasbir hattaa yahkumal laah; Wa-Huwa khairul haakimeen

11:1.t: Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun uhkimat Aayaatuhoo summa fussilat mil ladun Hakeemin Khabeer

11:2.t: Allaa ta'budooo illal laah; innanee lakum minhu nazeerunw Wa-basheer

11:3.t: Wa-anis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yumatti'kum mataa'an hasanan ilaaa ajalim musammanw Wa-yu'ti kulla zee fadlin fadlahoo Wa-in tawallaw fa-inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin Kabeer

11:4.t: Ilal laahi marji'ukum Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

11:5.t: Alaa innahum yasnoona sudoorahum liyastakhfoo minh; alaa heena yastaghshoona siyaabahum ya'lamu maa yusirroona Wa-maa yu'linoon; innahoo 'aleemun bizaatis sudoor

11:6.t: Wa-maa min daaabbatin fil ardi illaa 'alal laahi rizquhaa Wa-ya'lamu mustaqarrahaa Wa-mustawda'ahaa; kullun fee Kitaabim Mubeen

11:7.t: Wa-Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda fee sittati aiyaaminw Wa-kaana 'Arshuhoo alal maaa'i liyabluwakum aiyyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; Wa-la'in qulta innakum mab'oosoona min ba'dil mawti la-yaqoolannal lazeena kafaroo in haazaaa illaa sihrum mubeen

11:8.t: Wala'in akharnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba ilaaa ummatim ma'doodatil la-yaqoolunna maa yahbisuh; alaa yawma ya'teehim laisa masroofan 'anhum Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

11:9.t: Wa-la'in azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan summa naza'naahaa minhu, innahoo laya'oosun kafoor

11:10.t: Wala'in azaqnaahu na'maaa'a ba'da darraaa'a massat-hu la-yaqoolanna zahabas saiyiaatu 'anneee; innahoo lafarihun fakhoor

11:11.t: Illal lazeena sabaroo Wa-'amilus saalihaati ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw Wa-ajrun kabeer

11:12.t: Fala'allaka taarikum ba'da maa yoohaaa ilaika Wa-daaa'iqum bihee sadruka aien yaqooloo law-laaa unzila 'alaihi kanzun aw jaaa'a ma'ahoo malak; innamaa anta nazeer; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'inw wakeel

11:13.t: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul faatoo bi'ashri Suwarim mislihee muftarayaatinw wad'oo manis tata'tum min doonil laahi in kuntum saadiqeen

11:14.t: Fa-il-lam yastajeeboo lakum fa'lamooo annamaaa unzilla bi'ilmil laahi Wa-al laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fahal antum muslimoon

11:15.t: Man kaana yureedul hayaatad dunyaa zeenatahaa nuwaffi ilaihim a'maa-lahum feehaa Wa-hum feehaa laa yubkhasoon

11:16.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena laisa lahum fil Aakhirati illan Naaru Wa-habita maa sana'oo feehaa Wa-baatilum maa kaanoo ya'maloon

11:17.t: Afaman kaana 'ala baiyyinatim mir Rabbihee Wa-yatloohu shaahidum minhu Wa-min qablihee Kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw Wa-rahmah; ulaaa-'ika yu'minoona bih; Wa-main yakfur bihee minal Ahzaabi fan-naaru maw'iduh; falaa taku fee miryatim minh; innahul haqqu mir Rabbika Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon

11:18.t: Wa-man azlamu mimmanif taraa 'alal laahi kazibaa; ulaaa'ika yu'radoona 'alaa Rabbihim Wa-yaqoolul ashhaa duhaaa'ulaaa'il lazeena kazaboo 'alaa Rabbihim; alaa la'natul laahi alaz zaalimeen

11:19.t: Allazeena yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi Wa-yabghoonahaa 'iwajanw Wa-hum bil Aakhiratihum kaafiroon

11:20.t: Ulaaa'ika lam yakoonoo mu'jizeena fil ardi Wa-maa kaana lahum min doonil laahi min awliyaaa'; yudaa'afu lahumul 'azaab; maa kaanoo yastatee'oonas sam'a Wa-maa kaanoo yubsiroon

11:21.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

11:22.t: Laa jarama annahum fil Aakhirati humul akhsaroon

11:23.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-akhbatooo ilaa Rabbihim ulaaa'ika Ashaabul Jannati hum feehaa khaalidoon

11:24.t: Masalul fareeqaini kal-a'maa wal-asammi walbaseeri wassamee'; hal yastawiyaani masalaa; afalaa tazakkaroon

11:25.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee innee lakum nazeerum mubeen

11:26.t: Al laa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin aleem

11:27.t: Faqaalal mala-ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee ma naraaka illaa basharam mislanaa Wa-maa naraakat taba'aka illal lazeena hum araazilunaa baadiyar raayi Wa-maa naraa lakum 'alainaa min fadlim bal nazunnukum kaazibeen

11:28.t: Qaala yaa-qawmi ara'aitum in kuntu 'alaa baiyyinatim mir Rabbee Wa-aataanee rahmatam min 'indihee fa'um-miyat 'alaikum anulzimuku-moohaa Wa-antum lahaa kaarihoon

11:29.t: Wa-yaa-qawmi laaa as'alukum 'alaihi maalan in ajriya illaa 'alal laah; Wa-maaa ana bitaaridil lazeena aamanoo; innahum mulaaqoo Rabbihim Wa-laakinneee araakum qawman tajhaloon

11:30.t: Wa-yaa-qawmi main yansurunee minal laahi in tarattuhum; afalaa tazak-karoon

11:31.t: Wa-laa aqoolu lakum 'indee khazaa'inul laahi Wa-laaa a'lamul ghaiba Wa-laa aqoolu inee malakunw Wa-laaa aqoolu lillazeena tazdareee a'yunukum lai yu'tiyahumul laahu khairan Allaahu a'lamu bimaa feee anfusihim innee izal laminaz zaalimeen

11:32.t: Qaaloo yaa-Noohu qad jaadaltanaa fa-aksarta jidaalanaa faatinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen

11:33.t: Qaala innamaa yaateekum bihil laahu in shaaa'a Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeen

11:34.t: Wa-laa yanfa'ukum nusheee in arattu an ansaha lakum in kaanal laahu yureedu aien yughwi-yakum; Huwa Rabbukum Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

11:35.t: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo fa'alaiya ijraamee Wa-ana bareee'um mimmaa tujrimoon

11:36.t: Wa oohiya ilaa Noohin annahoo lany-yu'mina min qawmika illaa man qad aamana falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo yaf'aloon

11:37.t: Wasna'il fulka bi-a'yuninaa Wa-wahyinaa Wa-laa tukhaa-tibnee fil lazeena zalamoo; innahum mughraqoon

11:38.t: Wa-yasna'ul fulka Wa-kullamaa marra 'alaihi mala'um min qawmihee sakhiroo minh; qaala in taskharoo minnaa fa-innaa naskharu minkum kamaa taskharoon

11:39.t: Fasawfa ta'lamoona mai ya'teehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi Wa-yahillu 'alaihi 'azaabun muqeem

11:40.t: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a amrunaa Wa-faarat tannooru qulnah mil feehaa min kullin zawjainis naini Wa-ahlaka illaa man sabaqa 'alaihil qawlu Wa-man aaman; Wa-maaa aamana ma'ahooo illaa qaleel

11:41.t: Wa-qaalar kaboo feehaa bismil laahi majraihaa Wa-mursaahaa; inna Rabbee la-Ghafoorur Raheem

11:42.t: Wa-hiya tajree bihim fee mawjin kaljibaali Wa-naadaa Noohunib nahoo Wa-kaana fee ma'zilien yaa-bunai yarkam ma'anaa Wa-laa takum ma'al kaafireen

11:43.t: Qaala sa-aaweee ilaa jabalien ya'simunee minal maaa'; qaala laa 'aasimal yawma min amril laahi illaa mar rahim; Wa-haala bainahumal mawju fakaana minal mughraqeen

11:44.t: Wa-qeela yaaa ardubla'ee maaa'aki Wa-yaa-samaaa'u aqli'ee Wa-gheedal maaa'u Wa-qudiyal amru wastawat 'alal joodiyyi Wa-qeela bu'dal lilqawmiz zaalimeen

11:45.t: Wa naadaa noohur Rabbahoo faqaala Rabbi innabnee min ahlee Wa-inna wa'dakal haqqu Wa-Anta ahkamul haakimeen

11:46.t: Qaala yaa-Noohu innahoo laisa min ahlika innahoo 'amalun ghairu saalihin falaa tas'alni maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun inneee a'izuka an takoona minal jaahileen

11:47.t: Qaala rabbi inneee a'oozu bika an as'alaka maa laisa lee bihee 'ilmunw Wa-illaa taghfir lee Wa-tarhamneee akum minal khaasireen

11:48.t: Qeela yaa-Noohuh bit bisalaamim minnaa Wa-barakaatin 'alaika Wa-'alaaa umamim mimmam ma'ak; Wa-umamun sanumatti'uhum summa yamassuhum minaa 'azaabun aleem

11:49.t: Tilka min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehaaa ilaika maa kunta ta'lamuhaaaa anta Wa-laa qawmuka min qabli haazaa fasbir innal 'aaqibata lilmuttaqeen

11:50.t: Wa-ilaa 'aadin akhaahum Hoodaa; qaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhooo in antum illaa muftaroon

11:51.t: Yaa-qawmi laaa as'alukum 'alaihi ajran in ajriya illaa 'alal lazee fataranee; afalaa ta'qiloon

11:52.t: Wa-yaa-qawmis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yursilis samaaa'a 'alaikum midraaranw Wa-yazidkum quwwatan ilaa quwwatikum Wa-laa tatawallaw mujrimeen

11:53.t: Qaaloo yaa-Hoodu maa ji'tanaa bibaiyinatinw Wa-maa nahnu bitaarikeee aalihatinaa 'an qawlika Wa-maa nahnu laka bimu'mineen

11:54.t: In naqoolu illa' taraaka ba'du aalihatinaa bisooo'; qaala inneee ushhidul laaha wash-hadooo annee bareee'um mimmaa tushrikoon

11:55.t: Min doonihee fakeedoonee jamee'an summa laa tunziroon

11:56.t: Innee tawakkaltu 'alal laahi Rabbee Wa-Rabbikum; maa min daaabbatin illaa Huwa aakhizum binaasiyatihaa; inna Rabbee 'alaa Siraatim mustaqeem

11:57.t: Fa-in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum maaa ursiltu biheee ilaikum; Wa-yastakhlifu Rabbee qawman ghairakum Wa-laa tadur-roonahoo shai'aa; inna Rabbee 'alaa kulli shai'in Hafeez

11:58.t: Wa-lammaa jaaa'a amrunaa naj-jainaa Hoodanw wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa Wa-naj-jainaahum min 'azaabin ghaleez

11:59.t: Wa-tilka 'aad, jahadoo bi-Aayaati Rabbihim Wa-'asaw Rusulahoo wattaba'ooo amra kulli jabbaarin 'aneed

11:60.t: Wa-utbi'oo fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa inna 'Aadan kafaroo Rabbahum; alaa bu'dal li-'Aadin qawmin Hood

11:61.t: Wa-ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihaa; qaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahim ghairuhoo Huwa ansha-akum minal ardi wasta'-marakum feehaa fastaghfiroohu summa toobooo ilaih; inna Rabbee Qareebum Mujeeb

11:62.t: Qaaloo yaa-Saalihu qad kunta feenaa marjuwwan qabla haazaaa atanhaanaaa an na'bu-da maa ya'budu aabaaa'unaa Wa-innanaa lafee shakkim mimmaa tad'oonaaa ilaihi mureeb

11:63.t: Qaala yaa-qawmi ara'aytum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee Wa-aataanee minhu rahmatan famai yansurunee minal laahi in 'asaituhoo famaa tazeedoonanee ghaira takhseer

11:64.t: Wa-yaa-qawmi haazihee naaqatul laahi lakum aayatan fazaroohaa taakul feee ardil laahi Wa-laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa-yaakhuzakum azaabun qareeb

11:65.t: Fa-'aqaroohaa faqaala tamatta'oo fee daarikum salaasata aiy-yaamin zaalika wa'dun ghairu makzoob

11:66.t: Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najjainaa Saalihanw wal-lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa Wa-min khizyi Yawmi'iz inna Rabbaka Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez

11:67.t: Wa-akhazal lazeena zalamus saihatu fa-asbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeen

11:68.t: Ka-al lam yaghnaw feehaaa; alaaa inna Samooda kafaroo Rabbahum; alaa bu'dal li-Samood

11:69.t: Wa-laqad jaaa'at Rusulunaaa Ibraaheema bilbushraa qaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun famaa labisa an jaaa'a bi'ij-lin haneez

11:70.t: Falammaa ra-aaa aidiyahum laa tasilu ilaihi nakirahum Wa-awjasa minhum kheefah; qaaloo laa takhaf innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmi Loot

11:71.t: Wamra-atuhoo qaaa'imatun fadahikat fabashsharnaahaa bi-Iss-haaqa Wa-minw waraaa'i Iss-haaqa Ya'qoob

11:72.t: Qaalat yaa-wailataaa 'aalidu Wa-ana 'ajoozunw Wa-haaza ba'lee shaikhan inna haazaa lashai'un 'ajeeb

11:73.t: Qaalooo ata'jabeena min amril laahi rahmatul laahi Wa-barakaatuhoo 'alaikum Ahlal Bayt; innahoo Hameedun Majeed

11:74.t: Falammaa zahaba an Ibraaheemar raw'u Wa-jaaa'at hul-bushraaa yujaadilunaa fee qawmi Loot

11:76.t: Yaaa-Ibraaheemu a'rid 'an haazaaa innahoo qad jaaa'a amru Rabbika Wa-innahum aateehim 'azaabun ghairun mardood

11:77.t: Wa-lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim Wa-daaqa bihim zar'anw Wa-qaala haazaa yawmun 'aseeb

11:78.t: Wa-jaaa'ahoo qawmuhoo yuhra'oona ilaihi Wa-min qablu kaanoo ya'maloonas saiyyiaat; qaala yaa-qawmi haaa'ulaaa'i banaatee hunna atharu lakum fattaqul laaha Wa-laa tukhzooni fee daifee alaisa minkum rajulur rasheed

11:79.t: Qaaloo laqad 'alimta maa lanaa fee banaatika min haqq, Wa-innaka lata'lamu maa nureed

11:80.t: Qaala law anna lee bikum quwwatan aw aaweee ilaa ruknin shadeed

11:81.t: Qaaloo yaa-Lootu innaa Rusulu Rabbika lain yasiloo ilaika fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit-'im minal laili Wa-laa yaltafit minkum ahadun illam ra-ataka innahoo museebuhaa maaa asaabahum; inna maw'i-dahumus subh; alaisas subhu biqareeb

11:82.t: Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa ja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa Wa-amtamaa 'alaihaa hijaaratam min sijjeelim mandood

11:83.t: Musawwamatan 'inda Rabbik; Wa-maa hiya minaz zaalimena biba'eed

11:84.t: Wa-ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'aibaa; qaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo Wa-laa tanqusul mikyaala walmeezaan; inneee araakum bikhairinw Wa-innee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmim muheet

11:85.t: Wa-yaa-qawmi awful mikyaala walmeezaana bilqisti Wa-laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa'ahum Wa-laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

11:86.t: Baqiyyatul laahi khairul lakum in kuntum mu'mineen; Wa-maa ana 'alaikum bihafeez

11:87.t: Qaaloo yaa-Shu'aybu 'a-salaatuka ta'muruka an natruka maa ya'budu aabaaa'unaaa aw an naf'ala feee amwaalinaa maa nashaaa'oo innaka la-antal haleemur rasheed

11:88.t: Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aitum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee Wa-razaqanee minhu rizqan hasanaa; Wa-maaa ureedu an ukhaalifakum ilaa maaa anhaakum 'anh; in ureedu illal islaaha mastata't; Wa-maa tawfeeqeee illaa billaah; 'alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-ilaihi uneeb

11:89.t: Wa-yaa-qawmi laa yajri-mannakum shiqaaqeee aien yuseebakum mislu maaa asaaba qawma Noohin aw qawma Hoodin aw qawma Saalih; Wa-maa qawmu Lootim minkum biba'eed

11:90.t: Wastaghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaih; inna Rabbee Raheemunw Wadood

11:91.t: Qaaloo yaa-Shu'aibu maa nafqahu kaseeram mimmaa taqoolu Wa-innaa lanaraaka feenaa da'eefanw Wa-law-laa rahtuka larajamnaaka Wa-maaa anta 'alainaa bi'azeez

11:92.t: Qaala yaa-qawmi arahteee a'azzu 'alaikum minal laahi wattakhaztumoohu waraaa'akum zihriyyan inna Rabbee bimaa ta'maloona muheet

11:93.t: Wa-yaa-qawmi' maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun sawfa ta'lamoona many ya'teehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi Wa-man huwa kaazib; wartaqibooo innnee ma'akum raqeeb

11:94.t: Wa-lammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najjainaa shu'aibanw wal-lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa Wa-akhazatil lazeena zalamus saihatu fa-asbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeen

11:95.t: Ka-al lam yaghnaw feehaaa; alaa bu'dal li-Madyana Kamaa ba'idat Samood

11:96.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-sultaanim mubeen

11:97.t: Ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihee fattaba'ooo amra Fir'awna Wa-maaa amru Fir'awna birasheed

11:98.t: Yaqdumu qawmahoo Yawmal Qiyaamati fa-awrada-humun Naara Wa-bi'sal wirdul mawrood

11:99.t: Wa-utbi'oo fee haazihee la'natanw Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamah; bi'sar rifdul marfood

11:100.t: Zaalika min ambaaa'il quraa naqussuhoo 'alaika minhaa qaaa'imunw Wa-haseed

11:101.t: Wa-maa zalamnaahum Wa-laakin zalamooo anfusahum famaaa aghnat 'anhum aalihatuhumul latee yad'oona min doonil laahi min shai'il lammaa jaaa'a amru Rabbika Wa-maa zaadoohum ghaira tatbeeb

11:102.t: Wa-kazaalika akhzu Rabbika izaaa akhazal quraa Wa-hiya zaalimah; inna akhzahooo aleemun shadeed

11:103.t: Inna fee zaalika la-aayatal liman khaafa 'azaabal Aakhirah; zaalika Yawmum majmoo'ul lahun naasu Wa-zaalika Yawmum mashhood

11:105.t: Yawma yaati laa takallamu nafsun illaa bi-iznih; faminhum shaqiyyunw Wa-sa'eed

11:106.t: Fa-ammal lazeena shaqoo fafin Naari lahum feehaa zafeerunw Wa-shaheeq

11:107.t: Khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis samaawaatu wal-ardu illaa maa shaaa'a Rabbuk; inna Rabbaka fa'-'aalul limaa yureed

11:108.t: Wa-ammal lazeena su'idoo fafil Jannati khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis samaawaatu wal-ardu illaa maa shaaa'a Rabbuk; ataaa'an ghaira majzooz

11:109.t: Falaa taku fee miryatim mimmmaa ya'budu haaa'ulaaa'; maa ya'budoona illaa kamaa ya'budu aabaaa'uhum min qabl; Wa-innaa lamuwaf-foohum naseebahum ghaira manqoos

11:110.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa feeh; Wa-law-laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innahum lafee shakkim minhu mureeb

11:111.t: Wa-inna kullal lammaa la-yuwaffiyannahum Rabbuka a'maalahum; innahoo bimaa ya'maloona Khabeer

11:112.t: Fastaqim kamaaa umirta Wa-man taaba ma'aka Wa-laa tatghaw; innahoo bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

11:113.t: Wa-laa tarkanooo ilal lazeena zalamoo fatamassa-kumun Naaru Wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi min awliyaaa'a summa laa tunsaroon

11:114.t: Wa-aqimis Salaata tarafayin nahaari Wa-zulafam minal layl; innal hasanaati yuzhibnas saiyi-aat; zaalika zikraa liz-zaakireen

11:115.t: Wasbir fa-innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen

11:116.t: Falaw-laa kaana minal qurooni min qablikum ooloo baqiyyatiny yanhawna 'anil fasaadi fil ardi illaa qaleelam mimman anjainaa minhum; wattaba'al lazeena zalamoo maaa utrifoo feehi Wa-kaanoo mujrimeen

11:117.t: Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka liyuhlikal quraa bizulminw Wa-ahluhaa muslihoon

11:118.t: Wa-law shaaa'a Rabbuka laja'al annnaasa ummatanw waa-hidatanw Wa-laa yazaaloona mukhtalifeen

11:119.t: Illaa mar rahima Rabbuk; Wa-lizaalika khalaqahum; Wa-tammat Kalimatu Rabbika la-amla'ana Jahannama minal jinnati wannnaasi ajma'een

11:120.t: Wa-kullan naqussu 'alaika min ambaaa'ir Rusuli maa nusabbitu bihee fu'aadak; Wa-jaaa'aka fee haazihil haqqu Wa-maw'izatunw Wa-zikraa lilmu'-mineen

11:121.t: Wa-qul lillazeena laa yu'minoo na'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innaa 'aamiloon

11:123.t: Wa-lillaahi ghaibus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-ilaihi yurja'ul amru kulluhoo fa'bud-hu Wa-tawakkal 'alaih; Wa-maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon

12:3.t: Nahnu naqussu 'alaika ahsanal qasasi bimaaa awhainaaa ilaika haazal quraana Wa-in kunta min qablihee laminal ghaafileen

12:4.t: Iz qaala Yoosufu li-abeehi yaaa-abati innee ra-aytu ahada 'ashara kawkabanw wash-shamsa walqamara ra-aytuhum lee saajideen

12:5.t: Qaala yaa-bunaiya laa taqsus ru'yaaka 'alaaa ikhwatika fayakeedoo laka kaidaa; innash Shaitaana lil-insaani 'aduwwum mubeen

12:6.t: Wa-kazaalika yajtabeeka rabbuka Wa-yu'allimuka min ta'weelil ahaadeesi Wa-yutimmu ni'matahoo 'alaika Wa-'alaaa Aali Ya'qooba kamaaa atammahaa 'alaaa abawaika min qablu Ibraaheema Wa-Ishaaq; inna Rabbaka 'Aleemun hakeem

12:7.t: Laqad kaana fee Yoosufa Wa-ikhwatiheee Aayaatul lissaaa'ileen

12:8.t: Iz qaaloo la-Yoosufu Wa-akhoohu ahabbu ilaaa Abeenaa minnaa Wa-nahnu 'usbatun; inna abaanaa lafee dalaalim mubeen

12:9.t: Uqtuloo Yoosufa awitra hoohu ardany yakhlu lakum wajhu abeekum Wa-takoonoo mim ba'dihee qawman saaliheen

12:10.t: Qaalaa qaaa'ilum minhum laa taqtuloo Yoosufa Wa-alqoohu fee ghayaabatil jubbi yaltaqithu badus sai-yaarati in kuntum faa-'ileen

12:11.t: Qaaloo yaaa-abaanaa maa laka laa ta'mannaa 'alaa Yoosufa Wa-innaa lahoo lanaa-sihoon

12:12.t: Arsillhu ma'anaa ghadany yarta'wa yal'ab Wa-innaa lahoo lahaafizoon

12:13.t: Qaala innee la-yahzununeee an tazhaboo bihee Wa-akhaafu any ya'kulahuz zi'bu Wa-antum 'anhu ghaafiloon

12:14.t: Qaaloo la-in akalahuz zi'bu Wa-nahnu 'usbatun innaaa izal lakhaasiroon

12:15.t: Falammaa zahaboo bihee Wa-ajma'ooo aien yaj'aloohu fee ghayaabatil jubb; Wa-awhainaaa ilaihi latunabbi-'annahum bi-amrihim haaza Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

12:17.t: Qaaloo yaaa-abaanaaa innaa zahabnaa nastabiqu Wa-taraknaa Yoosufa 'inda mataa'inaa fa-akhalahuz zi'b, Wa-maaa anta bimu'minil lanaa Wa-law kunnaa saadiqeen

12:18.t: Wa-jaaa'oo 'alaa qameesi-hee bidamin kazib qaala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amraa; fasabrun jameel; wallaahul musta'aanu 'alaa maa tasifoon

12:19.t: Wa-jaaa'at saiyyaaratun fa-arsaloo waaridahum fa-adlaa dalwah; qaala yaa-bushraa haaza ghulaam; Wa-asarroohu bi-daa'ah; wallaahu 'aleemum bimaa ya'maloon

12:20.t: Wa-sharawhu bisamanim bakhsin daraahima ma'doo-datinw Wa-kaanoo feehi minaz zaahideen

12:21.t: Wa-qaalal lazish taraahu mim Misra limra atiheee akrimee maswaahu 'asaaa any-yanfa'anaaa aw nattakhizahoo waladaa; Wa-kazaalika mak-kannaa li-Yoosufa fil ardi Wa-linu'allimahoo min ta'weelil ahaadees; wallaahu ghaalibun 'alaaa amrihee Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

12:22.t: Wa-lammaa balagha ashuddahooo aatainaahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmaa; Wa-kazaa-lika najzil muhsineen

12:23.t: Wa-raawadat-hul latee huwa fee baitihaa 'an nafsihee Wa-ghallaqatil abwaaba Wa-qaalat haita lak; qaala ma'aazal laahi innahoo rabbeee ahsana maswaay; innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon

12:24.t: Wa-laqad hammat bihee Wa-hamma bihaa law-laaa ar ra-aa burhaana rabbih; kazaalika linasrifa 'anhu sooo'a walfa-hshaaa'; innahoo min 'ibaadi-nal mukhlaseen

12:25.t: Wastabaqal baaba Wa-qaddat qameesahoo min duburinw Wa-alfayaa saiyidahaa ladal baab; qaalat maa jazaaa'u man araada bi ahlika sooo'an illaaa any-yusjana aw azaabun 'aleem

12:26.t: Qaala hiya raawadatnee 'an nafsee Wa-shahida shaahidum min ahlihaa in kaana qameesuhoo qudda min qubulin fasadaqat Wa-huwa minal kaazibeen

12:27.t: Wa-in kaana qameesuhoo qudda min duburin fakazabat Wa-huwa minas saadiqeen

12:28.t: Falammaa ra-aa qamee-sahoo qudda min duburin qaala innahoo min kaidikunna inna kaidakunna 'azeem

12:29.t: Yoosufu a'rid 'an haaza wastaghfiree li-zanbiki innaki kunti minal khaati'een

12:30.t: Wa-qaala niswatun fil madeenatim ra-atul 'Azeezi turaawidu fataahaa 'an nafsihee qad shaghafahaa hubbaa; innaa lana-raahaa fee dalaalim mubeen

12:31.t: Falammaa sami'at bimak-rihinna arsalat ilaihinna Wa-a'tadat lahunna muttaka-anw Wa-aatat kulla waahidatim min-hunna sikkeenanw Wa-qaala-tikh ruj 'alaihinna falammaa ra-aynahooo akbarnahoo Wa-qatta'na aydiyahunna Wa-qulna haasha lillaahi maa haaza basharaa; in haazaaa illaa malakun kareem

12:32.t: Qaalat fazaalikunnal lazee lumtunnanee feeh; Wa-laqad raawattuhoo 'an nafsihee fasta'sam; Wa-la'il lam yaf'al maaa aamuruhoo la-yusjananna Wa-la-yakoonam minas saaghireen

12:33.t: Qaala rabbis sijnu ahabbu ilaiyya mimma yad'oo-naneee 'ilaihi Wa-illaa tasrif 'annee kaidahunna asbu ilaihinna Wa-akum minal jaahileen

12:34.t: Fastajaaba lahoo rabbuhoo fasarafa 'anhu kaidahunn; innahoo huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

12:35.t: Summa badaa lahum min ba'di maa ra-awul Aayaati layasjununnahoo hatta heen

12:36.t: Wa-dakhala ma'a hussijna fata-yaan; qaala ahaduhumaaa inneee araaneee a'siru khamranw Wa-qaalal aakharu inneee araaneee ahmilu fawqa ra'see khubzan ta'kulut tairu minhu; nabbi'naa bi-ta'weelih; innaa naraaka minal muhsineen

12:37.t: Qaala laa ya'teekumaa ta'aamun turzaqaaniheee illaa nabba'tukumaa bi-ta'weelihee; qabla aien ya'ti-yakumaa; zaalikumaa mimmaa 'allamanee rabbee; innee taraktu millata qawmil laa yu'minoona billaahi wahum bil-aakhirati hum kaafiroon

12:38.t: Wattaba'tu millata aabaaa'eee Ibraaheema Wa-Iss-haaqa Wa-Ya'qoob; maa kaana lanaaa an nushrika billaahi min shai'; zaalika min fadlil laahi 'alainaa Wa-'alan naasi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yashkuroon

12:39.t: Yaa-saahibayis sijni 'a-arbaabum mutafarriqoona khayrun amil laahul waahidul qahhaar

12:40.t: Maa ta'budoona min doonihee illaaa asmaaa'an sam maitumoohaaa antum Wa-aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa min sultan; inilhukmu illaa lillaah; amara allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaah; zaalikad deenul qaiyimu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

12:41.t: Yaa-saahibayis sijni ammaaa ahadukumaa fa-yasqee rabbahoo khamranw Wa-ammal aakharu fa-yuslabu fata'kulut tairu mir ra'sih; qudiyal amrul lazee feehi tastaftiyaan

12:42.t: Wa-qaala lillazee zanna annahoo najim minhumaz kurnee 'inda rabbika fa-ansaahush Shaitaanu zikra Rabbihee falabisa fis sijni bid'a sineen

12:43.t: Wa-qaalal maliku inneee araa sab'a baqaraatin simaanien ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw Wa-sab'a sumbulaatin khudrinw Wa-ukhara yaabisaat; yaaa-ayyuhal mala-u aftoonee fee ru'yaaya in kuntum lirru'yaa ta'buroon

12:44.t: Qaalooo adghaasu ahlaa-minw Wa-maa nahnu bi-ta'weelil ahlaami bi'aalimeen

12:45.t: Wa-qaalal lazee najaa minhumaa waddakara ba'da ummatin ana unabbi'ukum bi-ta'weelihee fa-arsiloon

12:46.t: Yoosufu ayyuhas siddeequ aftinaa fee sab'i baqaraatin simaaniny ya'kuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw Wa-sabi'i sumbulaatin khudrinw Wa-ukhara yaabisaatil la'alleee arji'u ilan naasi la'allahum ya'lamoon

12:47.t: Qaala tazra'oona sab'a sineena da-aban famaa hasattum fazaroohu fee sumbu-liheee illaa qaleelam mimmaa ta'kuloon

12:48.t: Thumma ya'tee mim ba'di zaalika sab'un shidaaduny ya'kulna maa qaddamtum lahunna illaa qaleelam mimma tuhsinoon

12:49.t: Thumma ya'tee mim ba'di zalika 'aamun feehi yughaa-sun naasu Wa-feehi ya'siroon

12:50.t: Wa-qaalal maliku 'toonee bihee falammaa jaaa'ahur rasoolu qaalar ji ilaa rabbika fas'alhu maa baalun niswatil laatee qatta'na aydiyahunn; inna Rabbee bikaidihinna 'Aleem

12:51.t: Qaala maa khatbukunna iz raawattunna Yoosufa 'an nafsih; qulna haasha lillaahi maa 'alimnaa 'alaihi min sooo'; qaalatim ra-atul 'Azeezil 'aana hashasal haqq, ana raawat-tuhoo 'an nafsihee Wa-innahoo laminas saadiqeen

12:52.t: Zaalika liya'lama annee lam akhunhu bilghaibi Wa-annal laaha laa yahdee kaidal khaaa'ineen

12:53.t: Wa-maa ubarri'u nafsee; innan nafsa la-ammaaratum bissooo'i illaa maa rahima Rabbee; inna Rabbee Ghafoorur Raheem

12:54.t: Wa-qaalal maliku' toonee biheee astakhlishu linafsee falammaa kallamahoo qaala innakal yawma ladainaa makeenun ameen

12:56.t: Wa-kazaalika makkannaa li-Yoosufa fil ardi yatabawwa'u minhaa haisu yashaaaa'; nuseebu birahmatinaa man nashaaa'u Wa-laa nudee'u ajral muhsineen

12:57.t: Wa-la-ajrul Aakhirati khairul lillazeena aamanoo Wa-kaanoo yattaqoon

12:58.t: Wa-jaaa'a ikhwatu Yoosufa fadakhaloo 'alaihi fa'arafahum Wa-hum lahoo munkiroon

12:59.t: Wa-lammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim qaala' toonee bi-akhil lakum min abeekum; alaa tarawna anneee oofil kaila Wa-ana khairul munzileen

12:60.t: Fa-il lam taatoonee bihee falaa kaila lakum 'indee Wa-laa taqraboon

12:62.t: Wa-qaala lifityaanihij 'aloo bidaa'atahum fee rihaalihim la'allahum ya'rifoonahaaa izan qalabooo ilaaa ahlihim la'allahum yarji'oon

12:63.t: Falammaa raja'ooo ilaaa abeehim qaaloo yaaa-abaanaa muni'a minnal kailu fa-arsil ma'anaaa akhaanaa naktal Wa-innaa lahoo lahaafizoon

12:64.t: Qaala hal aamanukum 'alaihi illaa kamaa amintukum 'alaaa akheehi min qabl; fal-laahu khairun haafizanw Wa-Huwa arhamur Raahimeen

12:65.t: Wa-lammaa fatahoo mataa-'ahum wajadoo bidaa'atahum ruddat ilaihim qaaloo yaaa-abaanaa maa nabghee; haazihee bida-'atunaa ruddat ilainaa Wa-nameeru ahlanaa Wa-nahfazu akhaanaa Wa-nazdaadu kaila ba'eer; zaalika kailuien yaseer

12:66.t: Qaala lan ursilahoo ma'akum hattaa tu'tooni mawsiqam minal laahis lataa-tunnanee biheee illaaa aien yuhaata bikum falammaaa aatawhu mawsiqahum qaalal laahu 'alaa maa naqoolu Wakeel

12:67.t: Wa-qaala yaa-baniyya laa tadkhuloo mim baabinw waa-hidinw wadkhuloo min abwaabim mutafarriqah; Wa-maaa ughnee 'ankum minal laahi min shai'in; inil hukmu illaa lillaahi 'alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-'alaihi fal-yatawakkalil Mutawakkiloon

12:68.t: Wa-lammaa dakhaloo min haisu amarahum aboohum maa kaana yughnee 'anhum minal laahi min shai'in illaa haajatan fee nafsi Ya'qooba qadaahaa; Wa-innahoo lazoo 'ilmil limaa 'allamnaahu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

12:69.t: Wa-lammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi akhaahu qaala inneee ana akhooka falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

12:70.t: Falammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim ja'alas siqaayata fee rahli akheehi summa azzana mu'azzinun ayyatuhal 'eeru innakum lasaariqoon

12:72.t: Qaaloo nafqidu suwaa'al maliki Wa-liman jaaa'a bihee himlu ba'eerinw Wa-ana bihee za'eem

12:73.t: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad 'alimtum maa ji'na linufsida fil ardi Wa-maa kunnaa saariqeen

12:74.t: Qaaloo famaa jazaaa'u-hooo in kuntum kaazibeen

12:75.t: Qaaloo jazaaa'uhoo manw wujida fee rahlihee fahuwa jazaaa'uh; kazaalika najziz zaalimeen

12:76.t: Fabada-a bi-aw'iyatihim qabla wi'aaa'i akheehi summas takhrajahaa minw wi-'aaa'i akheeh; kazaalika kidnaa li-Yoosuf; maa kaana liyaakhuza akhaahu fee deenil maliki illaaa aien yashaaa'al laah; narfa'u darajaatim man nashaaa'; Wa-fawqa kulli zee 'ilmin 'Aleem

12:77.t: Qaaloo ien yasriq faqad saraqa akhul lahoo min qabl; fa-asarrahaa Yoosufu fee nafsihee Wa-lam yubdihaa lahum; qaala antum sharrum makaananw wallaahu a'lamu bimaa tasifoon

12:78.t: Qaaloo yaaa-ayyuhal 'Azeezu inna lahooo aban shaikhan kabeeran fakhuz ahadanaa makaanahoo innaa naraaka minal muhsineen

12:79.t: Qaala ma'aazal laahi an naakhuza illaa manw wajadnaa mataa'anaa 'indahoo innaaa izal lazaalimoon

12:80.t: Falammas tay'asoo minhu khalasoo najiyyan qaala kabeeruhum alam ta'lamoon anna abaakum qad akhaza 'alaikum mawsiqam minal laahi Wa-min qablu maa farrattum fee Yoosufa falan abrahal arda hattaa yaazana leee abeee aw yahkumal laahu lee Wa-huwa khairul haakimeen

12:81.t: Irji'ooo ilaaa abeekum faqooloo yaaa-abaanaaa innab naka saraq; Wa-maa shahidnaaa illaa bimaa 'alimnaa Wa-maa kunnaa lilghaibi haafizeen

12:82.t: Was'alil qaryatal latee kunnaa feehaa wal'eeral lateee aqbalnaa feehaa Wa-innaa lasaadiqoon

12:83.t: Qaala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jameelun 'asal laahu aien yaa-tiyanee bihim jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem

12:84.t: Wa-tawallaa 'anhum Wa-qaala yaaa-asafaa 'alaa Yoosufa wabyaddat 'aynaahu minal huzni fahuwa kazeem

12:85.t: Qaaloo tallaahi tafta'u tazkuru Yoosufa hattaa takoona haradan aw takoona minal haalikeen

12:86.t: Qaala innamaaa ashkoo bassee Wa-huzneee ilal laahi Wa-a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

12:87.t: Yaa-baniyyaz haboo fatahassasoo mien Yoosufa Wa-akheehi Wa-laa tai'asoo mir rawhil laahi innahoo laa yai'asu mir rawhil laahi illal qawmul kaafiroon

12:88.t: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaihi qaaloo yaaa-ayyuhal 'Azeezu massanaa Wa-ahlanad durru Wa-ji'naa bibidaa 'timmuzjaatin fa-awfi lanal kaila Wa-tasaddaq 'alainaa innal laaha yajzil mutasaddiqeen

12:89.t: Qaala hal 'alimtum maa fa'altum bi-Yoosufa Wa-akheehi iz antum jaahiloon

12:90.t: Qaaloo 'a-innaka la-anta Yoosufu qaala ana Yoosufu Wa-haazaaa akhee qad mannal laahu 'alainaa innahoo mai yattaqi Wa-yasbir fa-innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen

12:91.t: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad aasarakal laahu 'alainaa Wa-in kunnaa lakhaati'een

12:92.t: Qaala laa tasreeba 'alaikumul yawma yaghfirul laahu lakum Wa-Huwa arhamur raahimeen

12:93.t: Izhaboo biqameesee haazaa fa-alqoohu 'alaa wajhi abee yaati baseeranw waatoonee bi-ahlikum ajma'een

12:94.t: Wa-lammaa fasalatil 'eeru qaala aboohum innee la-ajidu reeha Yoosufa law-laaa an tufannidoon

12:95.t: Qaaloo tallaahi innaka lafee dalaalikal qadeem

12:96.t: Falammaaa an jaaa' albasheeru alqaahu 'alaa wajhihee fartadda baseeran qaala alam aqul lakum inneee a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

12:97.t: Qaaloo yaaa-abaanas taghfir lanaa zunoo-banaaa innaa kunnaa khaati'een

12:98.t: Qaala sawfa astaghfiru lakum Rabbeee innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

12:99.t: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi abayaihi Wa-qaalad khuloo Misra in shaaa' al-laahu aamineen

12:100.t: Wa-raf'a abawaihi 'alal 'arshi Wa-kharroo lahoo sujjadaa; Wa-qaala yaaa-abati haaza taaweelu ru'yaaya min qablu qad ja'alahaa Rabbee haqqaa; Wa-qad ahsana beee iz akhrajanee minas sijni Wa-jaaa'a bikum minal badwi mim ba'di an nazaghash Shaitaanu bainee Wa-baina ikhwatee; inna Rabbee lateeful limaa yashaaa'; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem

12:101.t: Rabbi qad aataitanee minal mulki Wa-'allamtanee min taaweelil ahaadees; faati-ras samaawaati wal-ardi Anta waliyyee fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati tawaffanee muslimanw Wa-alhiqnee bissaaliheen

12:102.t: Zaalika min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehi ilaika Wa-maa kunta ladaihim iz ajma'ooo amrahum Wa-hum yamkuroon

12:103.t: Wa-maa aksarun naasi Wa-law harasta bimu'mineen

12:104.t: Wa-maa tas'aluhum 'alaihi min ajr; in huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen

12:105.t: Wa-ka-ayyim min Aayatin fis samaawaati wal-ardi yamurroona 'alaihaa Wa-hum 'anhaa mu'ridoon

12:106.t: Wa-maa yu'minu aksaru-hum billaahi illaa Wa-hum mushrikoon

12:107.t: Afa-aminooo an taatiya-hum ghaashiyatum min 'azaabil laahi aw taatiyahumus Saa'atu baghtatanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

12:108.t: Qul haazihee sabeeleee ad'ooo ilal laah; 'alaa baseera-tin ana Wa-manit taba'anee Wa-Subhaanal laahi Wa-maaa ana minal mushrikeen

12:109.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim min ahlil quraa; afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; Wa-la-Daarul Aakhirati Khairul lillazeenat taqaw; afalaa ta'qiloon

12:110.t: Hattaaa izas tai'asar Rusulu Wa-zannooo annahum qad kuziboo jaaa'ahum nas-runaa fanujjiya man nashaaa'u Wa-laa yuraddu baasunna 'anil qawmil mujrimeen

12:111.t: Laqad kaana fee qasasihim 'ibratul li-ulil albaab; maa kaana hadeesany yuftaraa Wa-laakin tasdeeqal lazee baina yadihi Wa-tafseela kulli shai'inw Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal liqawmien yu'minoon

13:1.t: Alif-Laaam-Meeem-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaab; wallazee unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon

13:2.t: Allaahul lazee raf'as samaawaati bighairi 'amadin tarawnahaa summas tawaa 'alal 'Arshi Wa-sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li-ajalim musammaa; yudabbirul amra yufassilil Aayaati la'allakum biliqaaa'i Rabbikum tooqinoon

13:3.t: Wa-Huwal lazee maddal arda Wa-ja'ala feehaa rawaasiya Wa-anhaaraa; Wa-min kullis samaraati ja'ala feehaa zawjainis naini Yughshil lailan nahaar; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatil liqawmien yatafakkaroon

13:4.t: Wa-fil ardi qita'um muta-jaawiraatunw Wa-jannaatum min a'naabinw Wa-zar'unw Wa-nakheelun sinwaanunw Wa-ghairu sinwaanien yusqaa bimaaa'inw waahid; Wa-nufaddilu ba'dahaa 'alaa ba'din fil ukul; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatil liqawmien ya'qiloon

13:5.t: Wa-in ta'jab fa'ajabun qawluhum 'a-izaa kunna turaaban 'a-inna lafee khalqin jadeed; ulaaa-'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi-Rabbihim Wa-ulaaa'ikal aghlaalu feee a'naaqihim Wa-ulaaa'ika As-haabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon

13:6.t: Wa-yasta'jiloonaka bis-saiyi'ati qablal hasanati Wa-qad khalat min qablihimul masulaat; Wa-inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratil linnaasi 'alaa zulmihim Wa-inna Rabbaka lashadeedul 'iqaab

13:7.t: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law-laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; innamaaa anta munzirunw Wa-likulli qawmin haad

13:8.t: Allaahu ya'lamu maa tahmilu kullu unsaa Wa-maa tagheedul arhaamu Wa-maa tazdaad, Wa-kullu shai'in 'indahoo bimiqdaar

13:10.t: Sawaaa'um minkum man asarral qawla Wa-man jahara bihee Wa-man huwa mustakhfim billaili Wa-saaribum binnahaar

13:11.t: Lahoo mu'aqqibaatum mim baini yadaihi Wa-min khalfihee yahfazoonahoo min amril laah; innal laaha laa yughaiyyiru maa biqawmin hattaa yughaiyiroo maa bianfusihim; Wa-izaaa araadal laahu biqawmin sooo'an falaa maradda lah; Wa-maa lahum min doonihee minw waal

13:12.t: Huwal lazee yureekumul barqa khawfanw Wa-tama'anw Wa-yunshi'us sahaabas siqaal

13:13.t: Wa-yusabbihur ra'du bihamdihee walmalaaa'ikatu min kheefatihee Wa-yursilus sawaa'iqa fa-yuseebu bihaa mai yashaaa'u Wa-hum yujaadiloona fil laahi Wa-Huwa shadeedul mihaal

13:14.t: Lahoo da'watul haqq; wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yastajeeboona lahum bishai'in illaa kabaasiti kaffaihi ilal maaa'i liyablugha faahu Wa-maa huwa bibaalighih; Wa-maa du'aaa'ul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal

13:15.t: Wa-lillaahi yasjudu man fis samaawaati wal-ardi taw-'anw Wa-karhanw Wa-zilaaluhum bilghuduwwi wal-aasaal

13:16.t: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaati wal-ard; qulil laah; qul afattakhaztum min dooniheee awliyaaa'a laa yamlikoona li-anfusihim naf'anw Wa-laa darraa; qul hal yastawil a'maa wal-baseeru am hal tastawiz zulumaatu wannoor; am ja'aloo lillaahi shurakaaa'a khalaqoo kakhalqihee fatashaa-bahal khalqu 'alaihim; qulil laahu Khaaliqu kulli shai'inw Wa-Huwal Waahidul Qahhar

13:17.t: Anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasaalat awdiyatum biqadarihaa fahtamalas sailu zabadar raabiyaa; Wa-mimmmaa yooqidoona 'alaihi fin naarib tighaaa'a bilyatin aw mataa'in zabadum misluh; kazaalika yadribul laahul haqqa wal-baatil; fa-ammaz zabadu fa-yazhabu jufaaa'aa; Wa-ammaa maa yanfa'un naasa fa-yamkusu fil ard; kazaalika yadribul laahul amsaal

13:18.t: Lillazeenas tajaaboo lirabbihimul husnaa; wallazeena lam yastajeeboo lahoo law anna lahum maa fil ardi jamee'anw Wa-mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bih; ulaaa'ika lahum sooo'ul hisaab; Wa-ma'waahum Jahannamu Wa-bi'sal mihaad

13:19.t: Afamai ya'lamu annamaaa unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu kaman huwa a'maa; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab

13:20.t: Allazeena yoofoona bi'ahdil laahi Wa-laa yanqu-doonal meesaaq

13:21.t: Wallazeena yasiloona maaa amaral laahu bihee an yoosala Wa-yakhshawna Rabbahum Wa-yakhaafoona sooo'al hisaab

13:22.t: Wallazeena sabarub tighaaa'a Wajhi Rabbihim Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw Wa-'alaaniyatanw Wa-yadra'oona bilhasanatis saiyi'ata ulaaa'ika lahum 'uqbad daar

13:23.t: Jannaatu 'adnien yadkhu-loonahaa Wa-man salaha min aabaaa'ihim Wa-azwaajihim Wa-zurriyyaatihim walmalaaa'i-katu yadkhuloona 'alaihim min kulli baab

13:25.t: Wallazeena yanqudoona 'Ahdal laahi mim ba'di meesaaqihee Wa-yaqta'oona maaa amaral laahu biheee ai yoosala Wa-yufsidoona fil ardi ulaaa'ika lahumul la'natu Wa-lahum sooo'ud daar

13:26.t: Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; Wa-farihoo bilhayaatid dunyaa Wa-mal hayaatud dunya fil Aakhirati illaa mataa'

13:27.t: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law-laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; qul innal laaha yudillu maien yashaa'u Wa-yahdeee ilaihi man anaab

13:28.t: Allazeena aamanoo Wa-tatma'innu quloobuhum bizikril laah; alaa bizikril laahi tatma'innul quloob

13:29.t: Allazeena aamanoo Wa-a'amilus saalihaati toobaa lahum Wa-husnu ma-aab

13:30.t: Kazaalika arsalnaaka feee ummatin qad khalat min qablihaaa umamul litatluwa 'alaihimul lazeee awhainaaa ilaika Wa-hum yakfuroona bir-Rahmaaan; qul Huwa Rabbee laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa 'alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-ilaihi mataab

13:31.t: Wa-law anna Quraanan suyyirat bihil jibaalu aw qutti'at bihil ardu aw kullima bihil mawtaa; bal lillaahil amru jamee'aa; afalam yai'asil lazeena aamanooo al law yashaaa 'ullaahu lahadan naasa jamee'aa; Wa-laa yazaalul lazeena kafaroo tuseebuhum bimaa sana'oo qaari'atun aw tahullu qareebam min daarihim hatta ya'tiya wa'dul laah; innal laaha laa yukhliful mee'aad

13:32.t: Wa-laqadis tuhzi'a bi-Rusulim min qablika fa-amlaitu lillazeena kafaroo summa akhaztuhum fakaifa kaana 'iqaab

13:33.t: Afaman Huwa qaaa'imun 'alaa kulli nafsim bimaa kasabat; Wa-ja'aloo illlaahi shurakaaa'a qul samoohum; am tunabbi'oona-hoo bimaa laa ya'lamu fil ardi; am bizaahirim minal qawl; bal zuyyina lillazeena kafaroo makruhum Wa-suddoo 'anis sabeel; Wa-mai yudlilil laaahu famaa lahoo min haad;

13:34.t: Lahum 'azaabun fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaaq, Wa-maa lahum minal laahi min waaq

13:35.t: Masalul Jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona tajree min tahtihal anhaaru ukuluhaa daaa'imunw Wa-zilluhaa; tilka uqbal lazeenat taqaw Wa-'uqbal kafireenan Naar

13:36.t: Wallazeena aatainaa-humul Kitaaba yafrahoona bimaa unzila ilaika Wa-minal Ahzaabi mai yunkiru ba'dah; qul innamaa umirtu an a'budal laaha Wa-laaa ushrika bih; ilaihi ad'oo Wa-ilaihi maab

13:37.t: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaahu hukman 'Arabiyyaa; Wa-la'init taba'ta ahwaaa-'ahum ba'da-maa jaaa'aka minal 'ilmi maa laka minal laahi minw waliyinw Wa-laa waaq

13:38.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika Wa-ja'alnaa lahum azwaajanw Wa-zurriyyah; Wa-maa kaana lirasoolin aien ya'tiya bi-aayatin illaa bi-iznil laah; likulli ajalin kitaab

13:39.t: Yamhul laahu maa yashaaa'u Wa-yusbitu Wa-'indahooo ummul Kitaab

13:40.t: Wa-im maa nurriyannaka ba'dal lazee na'iduhum aw nata-waffayannaka fa-innamaa 'alaikal balaaghu Wa-'alainal hisaab

13:41.t: Awalam yaraw annaa na'til arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; wallaahu yahkumu laa mu'aqqiba lihukmih; Wa-Huwa saree'ul hisaab

13:42.t: Wa-qad makaral lazeena min qablihim falillaahil makru jamee'aa; ya'lamu maa taksibu kullu nafs; Wa-sa-ya'lamul kuffaaru liman 'uqbad daar

13:43.t: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo lasta mursalaa; qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee Wa-bainakum Wa-man 'indahoo 'ilmul Kitaab

14:1.t: Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika litukhrijan naasa minaz zulumaati ilan noori bi-izni Rabbihim ilaa siraatil 'Azeezil Hameed

14:2.t: Allaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fill ard; Wa-wailul lilkaafireena min 'azaabin shadeed

14:3.t: Allazeena yastahibboo-nal hayaatad dunyaa 'alal aakhirati Wa-yasuddoona 'ansabeelil laahi Wa-yabghoonahaa 'iwajaa; ulaaa 'ika fee dalaalin ba'eed

14:4.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaa mir Rasoolin illaa bilisaani qawmihee liyubaiyina lahum fa-yudillul laahu mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdee mai yashaaa'; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

14:5.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa an akhrij qawmaka minaz zulumaati ilan noori Wa-zak-kirhum bi-ayyaamil laah; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

14:6.t: Wa-iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihiz kuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz anjaakum min Aali Fir'awna yasoomoo-nakum sooo'al 'azaabi Wa-yuzabbihoona abnaaa'akum Wa-yastahyoona nisaaa'akum; Wa-fee zaalikum balaaa'un mir Rabbikum 'azeem

14:7.t: Wa-iz ta-azzana Rabbukum la'in shakartum la-azeedannakum Wa-la'in kafartum inna 'azaabee lashadeed

14:8.t: Wa-qaala Moosaaa in takfurooo antum Wa-man fil ardi jamee'an fa-innal laaha la-Ghaniyyun Hameed

14:9.t: Alam ya'tikum naba'ul lazeena min qablikum qawmi Noohinw Wa-'Aadinw Wa-Samood, wallazeena mim ba'dihim; laa ya'lamuhum illallaah; jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faraddooo aydiyahum feee afwaahihim Wa-qaalooo innaa kafarnaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee Wa-innaa lafee shakkim mimmaa tad'oonanaaa ilaihi mureeb

14:10.t: Qaalat Rusuluhum afil laahi shakkun faatiris samaawaati wal-ardi yad'ookum liyaghfira lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yu'akhirakum ilaaa ajalin musammaa; qaaloo in antum illaa basharum mislunaa tureedoona an tasuddoonaa 'ammaa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'unaa fa'toonaa bi-sultaanin mubeen

14:11.t: Qaalat lahum Rusuluhum in nahnu illaa basharum mislukum Wa-laakinnal laaha yamunnu 'alaa maien yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee Wa-maa kaana lanaaa an na'tiyakum bisul-taanin illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minoon

14:12.t: Wa-maa lanaa allaa natawakkala 'alal laahi Wa-qad hadaanaa subulanaa; Wa-lanasbiranna 'alaa maaa aazaitumoonaa; Wa-'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mutawakkiloon

14:13.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo li-Rusulihim lanukhrijanna-kum min aardinaaa aw la-ta'oodunna fee millatinaa fa-awhaaa ilaihim Rabbuhum lanuhlikannaz zaalimeen

14:14.t: Wa-lanuskinan-nakumul arda min ba'dihim; zaalika liman khaafa maqaamee Wa-khaafa wa'eed

14:16.t: Minw waraaa'ihee jahannamu Wa-yusqaa min maaa'in sadeed

14:17.t: Yatajarra'uhoo Wa-laa yakaadu yuseeghuhoo Wa-ya'teehil mawtu min kulli makaaninw Wa-maa huwa bimaiyitinw Wa-minw waraaa'ihee 'azaabun ghaleez

14:18.t: Masalul lazeena kafaroo bi-Rabbihim; a'maaluhum karamaadinish taddat bihir reehu fee yawmin 'aasifin; laa yaqdiroona mimmaa kasaboo 'alaa shai'; zaalika huwad dalaalul ba'eed

14:19.t: Alam tara annal laaha khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; iny yasha yuzhibkum Wa-ya'ti bikhalqin jadeed

14:21.t: Wa-barazoo lillaahi jamee'an faqaalad du'afaaa'u lil-lazeenas takbarooo innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal antum mughnoona 'annaa min 'azaabil laahi min shai'; qaaloo law hadaanal laahu la-hadaynaakum sawaaa'un 'alainaaa ajazi'naa am sabarnaa maa lanaa min mahees

14:22.t: Wa-qaalash Shaitaanu lammaa qudiyal amru innal laaha wa'adakum wa'dal haqqi Wa-wa'attukum fa-akhlaftukum Wa-maa kaana liya 'alaikum min sultaanin illaaa an da'awtukum fastajabtum lee falaa taloomoonee Wa-loomooo anfusakum maaa ana bimusrikhikum Wa-maaa antum bimusrikhiyya innee kafartu bimaaa ashraktumooni min qabl; innaz zaalimeena lahum azaabun aleem

14:23.t: Wa-udkhilal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa bi-izni Rabbihim tahiyyatuhum feeha salaam

14:24.t: Alam tara kaifa darabal laahu masalan kalimatan taiyibatan kashajaratin taiyibatin asluhaa saabitunw Wa-far'uhaa fis samaaa'

14:25.t: Tu'teee ukulahaa kulla heenim bi-izni Rabbihaa; Wa-yadribul laahul amsaala linnaasi la'allahum yatazak-karoon

14:26.t: Wa-masalu kalimatin khabeesatin kashajaratin khabee-satinij tussat min fawqil ardi maa lahaa min qaraar

14:27.t: Yusabbitul laahul lazeena aamanoo bilqawlis saabiti fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-fil Aakhirati Wa-yudillul laahuz zaalimeen; Wa-yaf'alul laahu maa yashaaa'

14:28.t: Alam tara ilal lazeena baddaloo ni'matal laahi kufranw Wa-ahalloo qawmahum daaral bawaar

14:30.t: Wa-ja'aloo lillaahi andaadal liyudilloo 'an sabeelih; qul tamatta'oo fa-innaa maseerakum ilan Naar

14:31.t: Qul li'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanoo yuqeemus Salaata Wa-yunfiqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw Wa-'alaaniyatam min qabli any yaatiya Yawmul laa bai'un feehi Wa-laa khilaal

14:32.t: Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an faakhraja bihee minas samaraati rizqal lakum Wa-sakhkhara lakumul fulka litajriya fil bahri bi-amrihee Wa-sakhkhara lakumul anhaar

14:33.t: Wa-sakhkhara lakumush shamsa walqamara daaa'ibaini Wa-sakhkhara lakumul laila wannahaar

14:34.t: Wa-aataakum min kulli maa sa-altumooh; Wa-in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa tuhsoohaa; innal insaana lazaloo-mun kaffaar

14:35.t: Wa-iz qaala Ibraaheemu Rabbij 'al haazal balada aaminanw wajnubnee Wa-baniyya an na'budal asnaam

14:36.t: Rabbi innahunna adlalna kaseeram minan naasi faman tabi'anee fa-innahoo minnee Wa-man 'asaanee fa-innaka Ghafoorur Raheem

14:37.t: Rabbanaaa inneee askantu min zurriyyatee biwaadin ghairi zee zar'in 'inda Baitikal Muharrami Rabbanaa liyuqeemus Salaata faj'al af'idatam minan naasi tahweee ilaihim warzuqhum minas samaraati la'allahum yashkuroon

14:38.t: Rabbanaaa innaka ta'lamu maa nukhfee Wa-maa nu'lin; Wa-maa yakhfaa 'alal laahi min shai'in fil ardi Wa-laa fis samaaa'

14:39.t: Alhamdu lillaahil lazee wahaba lee 'alal kibari Ismaa'eela Wa-Ishaaq; inna Rabbee lasamee'ud du'aaa

14:40.t: Rabbij 'alnee muqeemas Salaati Wa-min zurriyyatee Rabbanaa Wa-taqabbal du'aaa'

14:41.t: Rabbanagh fir lee Wa-liwaalidaiya Wa-lilmu'mineena Yawma yaqoomul hisaab

14:42.t: Wa-laa tahsabannal laaha ghaafilan 'ammaa ya'maluz zaalimoon; innamaa yu'akh-khiruhum li-Yawmin tashkhasu feehil absaar

14:43.t: Muhti'eena muqni'ee ru'oosihim laa yartaddu ilaihim tarfuhum Wa-af'idatuhum hawaaa'

14:44.t: Wa-anzirin naasa Yawma yaateehimul 'azaabu fa-yaqoolul lazeena zalamoo Rabbanaaa akhkhirnaaa ilaaa ajalin qareebin nujib da'wataka Wa-nattabi-'ir Rusul; awalam takoonooo aqsamtum min qablu maa lakum min zawaal

14:45.t: Wa-sakantum fee masaakinil lazeena zalamooo anfusahum Wa-tabaiyana lakum kaifa fa'alnaa bihim Wa-darabnaa lakumul amsaal

14:46.t: Wa-qad makaroo makrahum Wa-'indal laahi makruhum Wa-in kaana makruhum litazoola minhul jibaal

14:47.t: Falaa tahsabannal laaha mukhlifa wa'dihee Rusulah; innal laaha 'azeezun zun tiqaam

14:48.t: Yawma tubaddalul ardu ghairal ardi wassamaawaatu Wa-barazoo lillaahil Waahidil Qahhaar

14:49.t: Wa-taral mujrimeena Yawma'izim muqarraneena filas faad

14:50.t: Saraabeeluhum min qatiraaninw Wa-taghshaa wujoohahumun Naar

14:51.t: Liyajziyal laahu kulla nafsim maa kasabat; innal laaha saree'ul hisaab

14:52.t: Haaza balaaghul linnaasi Wa-liyunzaroo bihee Wa-liya'lamooo annamaa Huwa Illaahunw Waahidunw Wa-liyaz-zakkara ulul albaab

15:1.t: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabi Wa-Qur-aa-nim Mubeen

15:2.t: Rubamaa yawaddul lazeena kafaroo law kaanoo muslimeen

15:3.t: Zarhum yaakuloo Wa-yatamatta'oo Wa-yulhihimul amalu fasawfa ya'lamoon

15:4.t: Wa-maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa Wa-lahaa kitaabum ma'loom

15:5.t: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa Wa-maa yastaakhiroon

15:6.t: Wa-qaaloo yaaa-aiyuhal lazee nuzzila 'alaihiz Zikru innaka lamajnoon

15:7.t: Law maa taateenaa bil-malaaa'ikati in kunta minas saadiqeen

15:8.t: Maa nunazzilul malaaa'i-kata illaa bilhaqqi Wa-maa kaanooo izam munzareen

15:9.t: Innaa Nahnu nazalnaz Zikra Wa-Innaa lahoo lahaa-fizoon

15:10.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa min qablika fee shiya'il awwaleen

15:11.t: Wa-maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

15:13.t: Laa yu'minoona bihee Wa-qad khalat sunnatul awwaleen

15:14.t: Wa-law fatahnaa 'alaihim baabam minas samaaa'i fazaloo feehi ya'rujoon

15:15.t: Laqaaloo innamaa sukkirat absaarunaa bal nahnu qawmum mashooroon

15:16.t: Wa-laqad ja'alnaa fis samaaa'i buroojanw Wa-zaiyannaahaa linnaazireen

15:18.t: Illaa manis taraqas sam'a fa-atba'ahoo shihaabum mubeen

15:19.t: Wal-arda madadnaahaa Wa-alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya Wa-ambatnaa feehaa min kulli shai'im mawzoon

15:20.t: Wa-ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayisha Wa-mal lastum lahoo biraaziqeen

15:21.t: Wa-im min shai'in illaa 'indanaa khazaaa-'inuhoo Wa-maa nunazziluhooo illaa biqadarim ma'loom

15:22.t: Wa-arsalnar riyaaha la-waaqiha fa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-asqai-naakumoohu Wa-maaa antum lahoo bikhaazineen

15:23.t: Wa-innnaa la-nahnu nuhyee Wa-numeetu Wa-nahnul waarisoon

15:25.t: Wa-inna Rabbaka Huwa yahshuruhum; innahoo Hakeemun 'Aleem

15:26.t: Wa-laqad khalaqnal insaana min salsaalim min hama-im masnoon

15:27.t: Waljaaanna khalaqnaahu min qablu min naaris samoom

15:28.t: Wa-iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'-ikati innee khaaliqum basharam min salsaalim min hama-im masnoon

15:29.t: Fa-izaa sawwaituhoo Wa-nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen

15:31.t: Illaaa ibleesa abaaa ai yakoona ma'as saajideen

15:32.t: Qaala yaaa-Ibleesu maa laka allaa takoona ma'as saajideen

15:33.t: Qaala lam akul li-asjuda libasharin khalaqtahoo min salsaalim min hama-im masnoon

15:36.t: Qaala Rabbi fa-anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

15:39.t: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa aghwaitanee la-uzayyin-anna lahum fil ardi Wa-la-ughwiyan-nahum ajma'een

15:42.t: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaanun illaa manit taba'aka minal ghaaween

15:44.t: Lahaa sab'atu abwaab; likulli baabim minhum juz'um maqsoom

15:47.t: Wa-naza'naa ma fee sudoorihim min ghillin ikhwaanan 'alaa sururim mutaqaabileen

15:48.t: Laa yamas-suhum feehaa nasabunw Wa-maa hum minhaa bimukhrajeen

15:52.t: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala innaa minkum wajiloon

15:53.t: Qaaloo la tawjal innaa nubashshiruka bighulaamin 'aleem

15:54.t: Qaala abashshartumoonee 'alaaa am massaniyal kibaru fabima tubashshiroon

15:55.t: Qaaloo bashsharnaaka bilhaqqi falaa takum minal qaaniteen

15:56.t: Qaala Wa-mai yaqnatu mir rahmati Rabbiheee illad daaaloon

15:58.t: Qaaloo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen

15:59.t: Illaaa Aala Loot; innaa lamunajjoohum ajma'een

15:60.t: Illam ra-atahoo qaddarnaaa innahaa laminal ghaabireen

15:63.t: Qaaloo bal ji'naaka bimaa kaanoo feehi yamtaroon

15:65.t: Fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit'im minal laili wattabi' adbaarahum Wa-laa yaltafit minkum ahadunw wamdoo haisu tu'maroon

15:66.t: Wa-qadainaaa ilaihi zaalikal amra anna daabira haaa'ulaaa'i maqtoo'um musbiheen

15:68.t: Qaala inna haaa'ulaaa'i daifee falaa tafdahoon

15:71.t: Qaala haaa'ulaaa'i banaateee in kuntum faa'ileen

15:74.t: Faja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa Wa-amtamaa 'alaihim hijaaratam min sijjeel

15:82.t: Wa-kaanoo yanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan aamineen

15:85.t: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqq; Wa-innas Saa'ata la-aatiyatun fasfahis safhal jameel

15:87.t: Wa-laqad aatainaaka sab'am minal masaanee wal-Qur-aanal 'Azeem

15:88.t: Laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa maa matta-'naa biheee azwaajam minhum Wa-laa tahzan 'alaihim wakhfid janaahaka lilmu-'mineen

15:94.t: Fasda' bimaa tu'maru Wa-a'rid anil mushrikeen

15:96.t: Allazeena yaj'aloona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; fasawfa ya'lamoon

15:97.t: Wa-laqad na'lamu annaka yadeequ sadruka bimaa yaqooloon

15:98.t: Fasbbih bihamdi Rabbika Wa-kum minas saajideen

16:1.t: Ataaa amrul laahi falaa tasta'jilooh; Subhaanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

16:2.t: Yunazzilul malaaa-'ikata birroohi min amrihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee an anzirooo annahoo laaa ilaaha illaaa ana fattaqoon

16:3.t: Khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

16:4.t: Khalaqal insaana min nutfatin fa-izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen

16:5.t: Wal-an-'amaa khalaqahaa; lakum feehaa dif'unw Wa-manaafi'u Wa-minhaa taakuloon

16:6.t: Wa-lakum feehaa jamaalun heena tureehoona Wa-heena tasrahoon

16:7.t: Wa-tahmilu asqaalakum ilaa baladil lam takoonoo baaligheehi illaa bishiqqil anfus; inna Rabbakum la-Ra'oofur Raheem

16:8.t: Walkhaila wal-bighaala wal-hameera litarkaboohaa Wa-zeenah; Wa-yakhluqu maa laa ta'lamoon

16:9.t: Wa-'alal laahi qasdus sabeeli Wa-minhaa jaaa'ir; Wa-law shaaa'a lahadaakum ajma'een

16:10.t: Huwal lazeee anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'al lakum minhu sharaabunw Wa-minhu shajarun feehi tuseemoon

16:11.t: Yumbitu lakum bihiz zar'a wazzaitoona wanna-kheela wal-a'naaba Wa-min kullis samaraat, inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqawminy yatafakkaroon

16:12.t: Wa-sakkhkhara lakumul laila wannahaara wash-shamsa walqamara wannujoomu musakhkharaatum bi-amrih; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawminy ya'qiloon

16:13.t: Wa-maa zara-a lakum fil ardi mukhtalifan alwaanuh; inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqawminy yazakkaroon

16:14.t: Wa-Huwal lazee sakhkharal bahra litaakuloo minhu lahman tariyyanw Wa-tastakhrijoo minhu hilyatan talbasoonahaa Wa-taral fulka mawaakhira feehi Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

16:15.t: Wa-alqaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bikum Wa-anhaaranw Wa-sublulal la-'allakum tahtadoon

16:17.t: Afamany yakhluqu kamal laa yakhluq; afalaa tazak-karoon

16:18.t: Wa-in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa tuhsoohaa; innal laaha la-Ghafoorur Raheem

16:19.t: Wallaahu ya'lamu maa tusirroona Wa-maa tu'linoon

16:20.t: Wallazeena yad'oona min doonil laahi laa yakhluqoona shai'anw Wa-hum yukhlaqoon

16:21.t: Amwaatun ghairu ahyaaa'inw Wa-maa yash'uroona aiyaana yub'asoon

16:22.t: Illahukum Ilaahunw Waahid; fallazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati quloobuhum munkiratunw Wa-hum mustakbiroon

16:23.t: Laa jarama annal laaha ya'lamu maa yusirrona Wa-ma yu'linoon; innahoo laa yuhibbul mustakbireen

16:24.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahum maazaaa anzala Rabbukum qaaloo asaateerul awwaleen

16:25.t: Liyahmilooo awzaarahum kaamilatany Yawmal Qiyaamati Wa-min awzaaril lazeena yudilloonahum bighairi 'ilm; alaa saaa'a maa yaziroon

16:26.t: Qad makaral lazeena min qablihim fa-atal laahu bunyaa-nahum minal qawaa'idi fakharra 'alaihimus saqfu min fawqihim Wa-ataahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon

16:27.t: Summa Yawmal Qiyaamati yukhzeehim Wa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum tushaaaqqoona feehim; qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma innal khizyal Yawma wassooo'a 'alal kaafireen

16:28.t: Allazeena tatawaf-faahu-mul malaaa'ikatu zaalimeee anfusihim fa-alqawus salama maa kunnaa na'malu min sooo'; balaaa innal laaha 'aleemum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

16:29.t: Fadkhulooo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha falabi'sa maswal mutakab-bireen

16:30.t: Wa-qeela lillazeenat taqaw maazaaa anzala Rabbukum; qaaloo khairaa; lillazeena ahsanoo fee haazihid dunyaa hasanah; Wa-la-Daarul Aakhirati khair; Wa-lani'ma daarul muttaqeen

16:31.t: Jannaatu 'Adniny yadkhuloonahaa tajree min tahtihal anhaaru lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oon; kazaalika yajzil laahul muttaqeen

16:32.t: Allazeena tatawaf-faahumul malaaa'ikatu taiyibeena yaqooloona salaamun 'alai-kumud khulul Jannata bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

16:33.t: Hal yanzuroona illaaa an taatiyahumul malaaa'ikatu aw yaatiya amru Rabbik; kazaalika fa'alal lazeena min qablihim; Wa-maa zalamahumul laahu Wa-laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon

16:34.t: Fa-asaabahum saiyi-aatu maa 'amiloo Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaano bihee yastahzi'oon

16:35.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena ashrakoo law shaaa'al laahu ma 'abadnaa min doonihee min shai'in nahnu Wa-laaa aabaaa'unaa Wa-laa harramnaa min doonihee min shai'; kazaalika fa'alal lazeena min qablihim fahal 'alar Rusuli illal balaaghul mubeen

16:36.t: Wa-laqad ba'asnaa fee kulli ummatir Rasoolan ani' budul laaha wajtanibut Taaghoota faminhum man hadal laahu Wa-minhum man haqqat 'alaihid dalaalah; faseeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen

16:37.t: In tahris 'alaa hudaahum fa-innal laaha laa yahdee mai yudillu Wa-maa lahum min naasireen

16:38.t: Wa-aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim laa yab'asul laahu mai yamoot; balaa wa'dan 'alaihi haqqanw Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

16:39.t: Liyubaiyina lahumul lazee yakhtalifoona feehi Wa-liya'lamal lazeena kafarooo annahum kaanoo kaazibeen

16:40.t: Innamaa qawlunaa lishay'in izaa aradnaahu an naqoola lahoo kun fa-yakoon

16:41.t: Wallazeena haajaroo fil laahi mim ba'di maa zulimoo lanubawwi'-annahum fid dunyaa hasanatanw Wa-la-ajrul Aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

16:43.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim; fas'alooo ahlaz zikri in kuntum laa ta'lamoon

16:44.t: Bilbaiyinaati waz-Zubur; Wa-anzalnaaa ilaikaz Zikra litubaiyina linnaasi maa nuzzila ilaihim Wa-la'allahum yatafakkaroon

16:45.t: Afa-aminal lazeena makarus saiyi-aati ai yakhsifal laahu bihimul arda aw yaaa-tiyahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon

16:46.t: Aw yaakhuzahum fee taqallubihim famaa hum bi-mu'jizeen

16:47.t: Aw yaakhuzahum 'alaa takhawwuf; fa-inna Rabbakum la-Ra'oofur Raheem

16:48.t: Awa-lam yaraw ilaa maa khalaqal laahu min shai'iny yatafaiya'u zilaaluhoo 'anil yameeni washshamaaa'-ili sujjadal lillaahi Wa-hum daakhiroon

16:49.t: Wa-lillaahi yasjudu maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi min daaabbatinw walma-laaa'ikatu Wa-hum laa yastakbiroon

16:50.t: yakhaafoona Rabbahum min fawqihim Wa-yaf'aloona maa yu'maroon

16:51.t: Wa-qaalal laahu laa tatta-khizooo ilaahainis naini innamaa Huwa Ilaahunw Waahid; fa-iyyaaya farhaboon

16:52.t: Wa-lahoo maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-lahud deenu waasibaa; afaghairal laahi tattaqoon

16:53.t: Wa-maa bikum min ni'matin faminal laahi summa izaa massakumud durru fa-ilaihi taj'aroon

16:54.t: Summaa izaa kashafad durra 'ankum izaa fareequm minkum bi-Rabbihim yushrikoon

16:55.t: Liyakfuroo bimaa aatainaahum; fatamatta'oo, faswfa ta'lamoon

16:56.t: Wa-yaj'aloona limaa laa ya'lamoona naseebam mimmaa razaqnnaahum; tallaahi latus'alunaa 'ammaa kuntum taftaroon

16:57.t: Wa-yaj'aloona lillaahil banaati Subhaanahoo Wa-lahum maa yashtahoon

16:58.t: Wa-izaa bushshira ahaduhum bil-unsaa zalla wajhuhoo muswaddanw Wa-huwa kazeem

16:59.t: yatawaaraa minal qawmi min sooo'i maa bushshira bih; a-yumsikuhoo 'alaa hoonin am yadussuhoo fit turaab; alaa saaa'a maa yahkumoon

16:60.t: Lillazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati masalus saw'i Wa-lillaahil masalul a'laa; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

16:61.t: Wa-law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bizulminhim maa taraka 'alaihaa min daaabbatinw Wa-laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa-izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum laa yastaakhiroona saa'atanw Wa-laa yastaqdimoon

16:62.t: Wa-yaj'aloona lillaahi maa yakrahoona Wa-tasifu alsinatuhumul kaziba anna lahumul husnaa laa jarama anna lahumun Naara Wa-annahum mufratoon

16:63.t: Tallaahi laqad arsalnaaa ilaaa umamim min qablika fazayyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fahuwa waliyyuhumul yawma Wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem

16:64.t: Wa-maaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba illaa litubaiyina lahumul lazikh talafoo feehi Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal liqawminy yu'minoon

16:65.t: Wallaahu anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa; inna fee zaalika la-aayatal liqaw-miny yasma'oon

16:66.t: Wa-inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmmaa fee butoonihee mim baini farsinw Wa-damil labanann khaalisan saaa'ighallish shaaribeen

16:67.t: Wa-min samaraatin nakheeli wal-a'nnaabi tattakhizoona minhu sakaranw Wa-rizqann hasanaa; inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqawmien ya'qiloon

16:68.t: Wa-awhaa Rabbuka ilan nahli anit takhizee minal jabaali buyootanw Wa-minash shajari Wa-mimmaa ya'rishoon

16:69.t: Summma kulee min kullis samaraati faslukee subula Rabbiki zululaa; yakhruju mim butoonihaa sharaabum mukh-talifun alwaanuhoo feehi shifaaa'ul linnaas, innna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqawmien yatafakkaroon

16:70.t: Wallaahu khalaqakum suma tatawaffaakum; Wa-minkum maien yuradu ilaaa arzalil 'umuri likai laa ya'lama ba'da 'ilmin shai'aa; innal laaha 'Aleemun Qadeer

16:71.t: Wallaahu faddala ba'dakum 'alaa ba'din fir rizq; famal lazeena fuddiloo biraaaddee rizqihim 'alaa maa malakat aimaanuhum fahum feehi sawaaa'; afabini'matil laahi yajhadoon

16:72.t: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw Wa-ja'ala lakum min azwaajikum baneena Wa-hafadatanw Wa-razaqakum minat taiyyibaat; afabil-baatili yu'minoona Wa-bini'matil laahi hum yakkfuroon

16:73.t: Wa-ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yamliku lahum rizqam minas samaawaati wal-ardi shai'anw Wa-laa yastatee'oon

16:74.t: Falaa tadriboo lillaahil amsaal; innal laaha ya'lamu Wa-antum laa ta'lamoon

16:75.t: Darabal laahu masalan 'abdam mammlookal laa yaqdiru 'alaa shai'inw Wa-mar razaqnaahu mminnaa rizqan hasanan fahuwa yunfiqu minhu sirranw Wa-jahra; hal yasta-woon; alhamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

16:76.t: Wa-darabal laahu masalar rajulaini ahaduhumaaa abkamu laa yaqdiru 'alaa shai'inw Wa-huwa kallun 'alaa mawlaahu ainamaa yuwajjihhu laa yaati bikhairin hal yastawee huwa Wa-maien yaamuru bil'adli Wa-huwa 'alaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

16:77.t: Wa-lillaahi ghaibus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-maaa amrus Saa'ati illaa kalamhil basari aw huwa aqrab; innal laaha 'alaaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

16:78.t: Wallaahu akhrajakum mim butooni ummahaatikum laa ta'lamoona shai'anw Wa-ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idata la'allakum tashkuroon

16:79.t: Alam yaraw ilat tairi musakhkharaatin fee jawwis samaaa'i maa yumsikuhunna illal laah; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawminy yu'minoon

16:80.t: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum mim buyootikum sakananw Wa-ja'ala lakum min juloodil an'aami buyootan tastakhif-foonahaa yawma za'nikum Wa-yawma iqaamatikum Wa-min aswaafihaa Wa-awbaarihaa Wa-ash'aarihaaa asaasanw Wa-mataa'an ilaa heen

16:81.t: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum mimmaa khalaqa zilaalanw Wa-ja'ala lakum minal jibaali aknaananw Wa-ja'ala lakum saraabeela taqeekumul harra Wa-saraabeela taqeekum baasakum; kazaalika yutimmu ni'matahoo alaikum la'allakum tuslimoon

16:83.t: Ya'rifoona ni'matal laahi summa yunkiroonahaa Wa-aksaruhumul kaafiroon

16:84.t: Wa-yawma nab'asu min kulli ummatin shaheedan summa laa yu'zanu lillazeena kafaroo Wa-laa hum yusta'taboon

16:85.t: Wa-izaa ra al-lazeena zalamul 'azaaba falaa yukhaf-fafu 'anhum Wa-laa hum yunzaroon

16:86.t: Wa-izaa ra al-lazeena ashrakoo shurakaaa'ahum qaaloo Rabbana haaa'ulaaa'i shurakaaa'unal lazeena kunnaa nad'oo min doonika fa-alqaw ilaihimul qawla innakum lakaaziboon

16:87.t: Wa-alqaw ilal laahi yawma'izinis salama Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

16:88.t: Allazeena kafaroo Wa-saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi zidnaahum 'azaaban fawqal 'azaabi bimaa kaanoo yufsidoon

16:89.t: Wa-yawma nab'asu fee kulli ummmatin shaheedan 'alaihim min anfusihim Wa-ji'naa bika shaheedan 'alaa haaa'ulaaa'; Wa-nazzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba tibyaanal likulli shai'inw Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatanw Wa-bushraa lilmuslimeen

16:90.t: Innal laaha ya'muru bil-'adli wal-ihsaani Wa-eetaaa'i zil qurbaa Wa-yanhaa 'anil fahshaaa'i wal-munkari walbagh-i' ya'izukum la'allakum tazakkaroon

16:91.t: Wa-awfoo bi-Ahdil laahi izaa 'aahattum Wa-laa tanqudul aimaana ba'da tawkeedihaa Wa-qad ja'altumul laaha 'alaikum kafeelaa; innal laaha ya'lamu maa taf'aloon

16:92.t: Wa-laa takoonoo kallatee naqadat ghazlahaa mim ba'di quwwatin ankaasaa; tattakhizoona aimaanakum dakhlalam bainakum an takoona ummatun hiya arbaa min ummah; innnamaa yablookumul laahu bih; Wa-la-yubaiyyinanna lakum yawmal Qiyaamati maa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon

16:93.t: Wa-law shaaa'al laahu laja'alakum ummmatanw waahidatanw Wa-laakien yudillu maien yashaaa'u Wa-yahdee maien yashaaa'; Wa-latus'alunna 'ammaa kuntum ta'maloon

16:94.t: Wa-laa tattakhizooo aimaanakum dakhalam bainakum fatazilla qadamum ba'da subootihaa Wa-tazooqus sooo'a bimmaa sadattum 'an sabeelil laahi Wa-lakum 'azaabun 'azeem

16:95.t: Wa-laa tashtaroo bi-'ahdil laahi samanan qaleelaa; innamaa 'indal laahi huwa khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

16:96.t: maa 'indakum yanfadu Wa-maa 'indal laahi baaq; Wa-lanajziyannal lazeena sabarooo ajjrahum bi-ahsani maa kaanoo ya'maloon

16:97.t: Man 'amila saaliham min zakarin aw unsaa Wa-huwa mu'minun falanuhyiyannahoo hayaatan taiiyibatanw Wa-lanajzi-yannnahum ajrahum bi-ahsani maa kaanoo ya'maloon

16:98.t: Fa-izaa qara-tal Quraana fasta'iz billaahi minashh Shai-taanir rajeem

16:99.t: Innahoo laisa lahoo sultaanun 'alal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

16:100.t: Innnamaa sultaanuhoo 'alal lazeena yatawallawnahoo wallazeena hum bihee mushrikoon

16:101.t: Wa-izaa baddalnaaa Aayatam makaana Aayatinw wal-laahu a'lamu bimaa yunazzilu qaalooo innamaa anta muftar; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

16:102.t: Qul nazzalahoo Roohul Qudusi mir Rabbika bilhaqqi liyusabbital lazeena aamanoo Wa-hudanw Wa-bushraa lilmuslimeen

16:103.t: Wa-laqad na'lamu annahum yaqooloona innamaa yu'allimuhoo bashar; lisaanul lazee yulhidoona ilaihi a'ja-miyyunw Wa-haaza lisaanun 'Arabiyyum mubeen

16:104.t: Innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bi-Aayaatil laahi laa yahdehimul laahu Wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem

16:105.t: Innamaa yaftaril kazibal lazeena laa yu'minoona bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-ulaaa'ika humul kaaziboon

16:106.t: Man kafara billaahi mim ba'di eemaanihee illaa man ukriha Wa-qalbuhoo mutmma'innum bil-eemaani Wa-laakim man sharaha bilkufri sadran fa'alaihim ghadabum minal laahi Wa-lahum 'azaabun 'azeem

16:107.t: Zaalika bi-annahumus tahabbul hayaatad dunyaa 'alal Aakhirati Wa-annal laaha laa yahdil qawmal kaafireen

16:108.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena taba'al laahu 'alaa quloobihim Wa-sam'ihim Wa-absaarihim Wa-ulaaa'ika humul ghaafiloon

16:109.t: Laa jarama annnahum fil Aakhirati humul khassiroon

16:110.t: Summa inna Rabbaka lillazeena haajaroo mim ba'dimaa futinoo summma jaahadoo Wa-sabaroo inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la Ghafoorur Raheem

16:111.t: Yawma taatee kullu nafsin tujaadilu 'an nafsihaa Wa-tuwaffaa kullu nafsim maa 'amilat Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

16:112.t: Wa-darabal laahu masalan qaryatan kaanat aaminatam mutma'innataien yaaateehaa rizquhaa raghadam min kulli makaanin fakafarat bi-an'umil laahi fa-azaaqahal laahu libaasal joo'i walkhawfi bimaa kaanoo yasna'oon

16:113.t: Wa-laqad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum minhum fakazzaboohu fa-akhazahumul 'azaabu Wa-hum zaalimoon

16:114.t: Fakuloo mimmaa razaqa-kumul laahu halaalan taiyyibanw washkuroo ni'matal laahi in kuntum iyyaahu ta'budoon

16:115.t: Innamaa harama 'alai-kumul maitata waddama Wa-lahmal khinzeeri Wa-maaa uhilla lighairil laahi bihee famanid turra ghaira baaghinw Wa-laa 'aadin fa-innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

16:116.t: Wa-laa taqooloo limaa tasifu alsinatukumul kaziba haaza halaalunw Wa-haazaa haraamul litaftaroo 'alal laahil kazib; innal lazeena yaftaroona 'alal laahil kaziba laa yuflihoon

16:118.t: Wa-'alal lazeena haadoo harramnaa ma qasasnaa 'alaika min qablu Wa-maa zalamanaahum Wa-laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon

16:119.t: Summma inna Rabbaka lillazeena 'amilus sooo'a bijahaalatin summa taaboo mim ba'di zaaalika Wa-aslahoo inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la-Ghafoorur Raheem

16:120.t: Inna Ibraaheema kaana ummatan qaanital lillaahi Haneefanw Wa-lam yaku minal mushrikeen

16:121.t: Shaakiral li-an'umih; ijtabaahu Wa-hadaahu ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

16:122.t: Wa-aatainaahu fid dunyaa hasanah; Wa-innahoo fil Aakhirati laminas saaliheen

16:123.t: Summma awhainaa ilaika anit tabi' Millata Ibraaheema haneefaa; Wa-maa kaana minal mushrikeen

16:124.t: Innnamaa ju'ilas Sabtu 'alal lazeenakhtalafoo feeh; Wa-inna Rabbaka la yahkumu bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

16:125.t: Ud'u ilaa sabeeli Rabbika bilhikmati walmaw-'izatil hasanati Wa-jaadilhum billatee hiya ahsan; inna Rabbaka huwa a'almu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee Wa-Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen

16:126.t: Wa-in 'aaqabtum fa'aaqiboo bimisli maa 'ooqibtum bihee Wa-la'in sabartum lahuwa khairul lissaabireen

16:127.t: Wasbir Wa-maa sabruka illaa billaah; Wa-laa tahzan 'alaihim Wa-laa taku fee daiqim mimmaa yamkuroon

16:128.t: Innal laaha ma'al lazeenat taqaw wal-lazeena hum muhsinoon

17:1.t: Subhaanal lazeee asraa bi'abdihee lailam minal Masjidil Haraami ilal Masjidil Aqsal lazee baaraknaa haw-lahoo linuriyahoo min aayaatinaa; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul Baseer

17:2.t: Wa-aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alnaahu hudal liBaneee Israaa'eel; allaa tat-takhizoo min doonee wakeelaa.

17:3.t: Zurriyyata man hamalnaa ma'a Nooh innahoo kaana 'abdan shakooraa

17:4.t: Wa qadainaaa ilaa Baneee Israaa'eela fil Kitaabi latufsidunna fil ardi marratain; Wa-lata'lunna'uluwwan kabeeraa

17:5.t: Fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'du oolaahumaa ba'asnaaa 'alykum 'ibaadal lanaaa ulee baasin shadeedin fajaasoo khilaalad diyaar; Wa-kaana wa'dam maf'oolaa

17:6.t: Summa radadnaa lakumul karrata 'alaihim Wa-amdad-naakum-bi amwaalinuw Wa-baneen; Wa-ja'alnaakum aksara nafeeraa

17:7.t: In ahsantum ahsantum li-anfusikum Wa-in asaatum falahaa; fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'dul aakhirati liyasooo'oo wujoo-hakum Wa-liyadkhulul masjida kamaa dakhaloohu awwala marratinw Wa-liyutabbiroo maa a'law tatbeera

17:8.t: Asaa rabbukum aien yarhamakum; Wa-in 'uttum 'udnaa; Wa-ja'alnaa jahannama lilkaafireena haseera

17:9.t: Inna haazal Quraana yahdee lillatee hiya aqwamu Wa-yubashshirul mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran kabeeraa

17:10.t: Wa-annal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-aakhirati a'tadnaa lahum 'azaaban aleemaa

17:11.t: Wa-yad'ul insaanu bishsharri du'aaa-'ahoo bilkhayr; Wa-kaanal insaanu 'ajoola

17:12.t: Wa-ja'alnal laila wannahaara Aayatayni famahawnaaa Aayatal laili Wa-ja'alnaaa Aayatan nahaari mubsiratal litabtaghoo fadlam mir Rabbikum Wa-lita'lamoo 'adadas sineena walhisaab; Wa-kulla shai'in fassalnaahu tafseelaa

17:13.t: Wa-kulla insaanin alzamnaahu taaa'irahoo fee 'unuqihee Wa-nukhriji lahoo Yawmal Qiyaamati kitaabany yalqaahu manshooraa

17:14.t: Iqra kitaabaka kafaa bi-nafsikal Yawma 'alaika haseebaa

17:15.t: Manih tadaa fa-innamaa yahtadee linafsihee Wa-man dalla fa-innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa; Wa-laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; Wa-maa kunnaa mu'azzibeena hatta nab'asa Rasoola

17:16.t: Wa-izaaa aradnaaa an nuhlika qaryatan amarnaa mutrafeehaa fafasaqoo feehaa fahaqqa 'alaihal qawlu fadammarnaahaa tadmeeraa

17:17.t: Wa-kam ahlaknaa minal qurooni min ba'di Nooh; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika bizunoobi 'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa

17:18.t: Man kaana yureedul 'aajilata 'ajjalnaa lahoo feehaa maa nashaaa'u liman nureedu summa ja'alnaa lahoo Jahannama yaslaahaa mazmoomammad hooraa

17:19.t: Wa-man araadal Aakhirata Wa-sa'aa lahaa sa'yahaa Wa-huwa mu'minun fa-ulaaa'ika kaana sa'yuhum mashkooraa

17:20.t: Kullan numiddu haaa-'ulaaa'i Wa-haaa'ulaaa'i min 'ataaa'i rabbik; Wa-maa kaana 'ataaa'u rabbika mahzooraa

17:21.t: Unzur kaifa faddalnaa ba'dahum 'alaa ba'd; Wa-lal-Aakhiratu akbaru darajaatinw Wa-akbaru tafdeelaa

17:22.t: Laa taj'al ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fataq'uda mazoomam makhzoolaa

17:23.t: Wa qadaa Rabbuka allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaahu Wa-bilwaalidaini ihsaanaa; immaa yablughanna 'indakal kibara ahaduhumaaa aw kilaahumaa falaa taqul lahumaaa uffinw Wa-laa tanharhumaa Wa-qullahumaa qawlan kareemaa

17:24.t: Wakhfid lahumaa janaahaz zulli minar rahmati Wa-qur Rabbir hamhumaa kamaa rabbayaanee sagheera

17:25.t: Rabbukum a'lamu bimaa fee nufoosikum; in takoonoo saaliheena fa-innahoo kaana lil-awwaabeena Ghafoooraa

17:26.t: Wa-aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnas sabeeli Wa-laa tubazzir tabzeeraa

17:27.t: Innal mubazzireena kaanoo ikhwaanash shayaateeni Wa-kaanash shaytaanu li-Rabbihee kafooraa

17:28.t: Wa-immaa tu'ridanna 'anhum ubtighaaa'a rahmatim mir rabbika tarjoohaa faqul lahum qawlam maisooraa

17:29.t: Wa-laa taj'al yadaka maghloolatan ilaa 'unuqika Wa-laa tabsut-haa kullal basti fataq'uda maloomam mahsooraa

17:30.t: Inna Rabbaka yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeran Baseera

17:31.t: Wa-laa taqtulooo awlaadakum khashyata imlaaqin nahnu narzuquhum Wa-iyyaakum; inna qatlahum kaana khit-'an kabeeraa

17:32.t: Wa-laa taqrabuz zinaaa innahoo kaana faahishatanw Wa-saaa'a sabeelaa

17:33.t: Wa-laa taqtulun nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqq; Wa-man qutila mazlooman faqad ja'alnaa liwaliyyihee sultaanan falaa yusrif fil qatli innahoo kaana mansooraa

17:34.t: Wa-laa taqraboo maalal yateemi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu hattaa yablugha ashuddah; Wa-awfoo bil'ahd, innal 'ahda kaana mas'oolaa

17:35.t: Wa-awful kaila izaa kiltum Wa-zinoo bilqistaasil mustaqeem; zaalika khairunw Wa-ahsanu ta'weelaa

17:36.t: Wa-laa taqfu maa laisa laka bihee 'ilm; innas sam'a walbasara walfu'aada kullu ulaaa'ika kaana 'anhu mas'oolaa

17:37.t: Wa-laa tamshi fil ardi marahan innaka lan takhriqal arda Wa-lan tablughal jibaala toola

17:38.t: Kullu zaalika kaana sayyi'uhoo inda Rabbika makroohaa

17:39.t: Zaalika mimmaaa awhaaa ilaika Rabbuka minal hikmah; Wa-laa taj'al ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatulqaa fee Jahannama maloomammad hooraa

17:40.t: Afa-asfaakum rabbukum bilbaneena wattakhaza minal malaaa'ikati inaasaa; innakum lataqooloona qawlan 'azeema

17:41.t: Wa-laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal Quraani liyazzakkaroo Wa-maa yazeeduhum illaa nufooraa

17:42.t: Qul law kaana ma'ahooo aalihatun kamaa yaqooloona izal labtaghaw ilaa zil 'Arshi Sabeela

17:44.t: Tusabbihu lahus samaawaatus sab'u wal-ardu Wa-man feehinn; Wa-im min shai'in illaa yusabbihu bihamdihee Wa-laakil laa tafqahoona tasbeehahum; innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa

17:45.t: Wa-izaa qara'-tal Quraana ja'alnaa bainaka Wa-bainal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-aakhirati hijaabam mastooraa

17:46.t: Wa-ja'alnaa 'alaa quloo-bihim akinnatan any yafqahoohu Wa-feee aazaanihim waqraa; Wa-izaa zakarta Rabbaka fil Quraani wahdahoo wallaw 'alaaa adbaarihim nufooraa

17:47.t: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yastami'oona biheee iz yastami'oona ilaika Wa-iz hum najwaaa iz yaqooluz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulam mas-hooraa

17:48.t: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa

17:49.t: Wa-qaalooo 'a-izaa kunnaa 'izaamanw Wa-rufaatan 'a-innaa lamab'oosoona khalqan jadeedaa

17:51.t: Aw khalqam mimmaa yakburu fee sudoorikum; fasa-yaqooloona maien yu'eedunaa qulil lazee fatarakum awwala marrah; fasa yunghidoona ilaika ru'oosahum Wa-yaqooloona mataahoo; qul 'asaaa any yakoona qareeba

17:52.t: Yawma yad'ookum fatastajeeboona bihamdihee Wa-tazunnoona il labistum illaa qaleela

17:53.t: Wa-qul li'ibaadee yaqoolul latee hiya ahsan; innash shaitaana yanzaghu bainahum; innash shaitaana kaana lil-insaani 'aduwwam mubeenaa

17:54.t: Rabbukum a'lamu bikum iny yasha' yarhamkum aw iny yasha' yu'azzibkum; Wa-maaa arsalnaaka 'alaihim wakeelaa

17:55.t: Wa-Rabbuka a'lamu biman fis samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-laqad faddalnaa ba'dan Nabiyyeena 'alaa ba'dinw Wa-aatainaaa Daawooda Zabooraa

17:56.t: Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonihee falaa yamlikoona kashfad durri 'ankum Wa-laa tahweelaa
