17:57.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena yad'oona yabtaghoona ilaa Rabbihimul waseelata ayyuhum aqrabu Wa-yarjoona rahmatahoo Wa-yakhaafoona 'azaabah; inna 'azaaba rabbika kaana mahzooraa

17:58.t: Wa-in min qaryatin illaa Nahnu muhlikoohaa qabla Yawmil Qiyaamati aw mu'az-ziboohaa 'azaaban shadeedaa; kaana zaalika fil Kitaabi mastooraa

17:59.t: Wa-maa mana'anaaa an nursila bil-aayaati illaaa an kazzaba bihal awwaloon; Wa-aatainaa Samoodan naaqata mubsiratan fazalamoo bihaa; Wa-maa nursilu bil-aayaati illaa takhweefaa

17:60.t: Wa-iz qulnaa laka inna rabbaka ahaata binnaas; Wa-maa ja'alnar ru'yal lateee arainaaka illaa fitnatal linnaasi washshajaratal mal'oonata fil quraan; Wa-nukhaw-wifuhum famaa yazeeduhum illa tughyaanan kabeeraa

17:61.t: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa qaala 'a-asjudu liman khalaqta teena

17:62.t: Qaala ara'aytaka haazal lazee karramta 'alaiya la'in akhartani ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati la-ahtanikanna zurriyyatahooo illaa qaleelaa

17:63.t: Qaalaz hab faman tabi'aka minhum fa-inna Jahannama jazaaa'ukum jazaaa'am mawfooraa

17:64.t: Wastafziz manis tata'ta minhum bisawtika Wa-ajlib 'alaihim bikhailika Wa-rajilika Wa-shaarik-hum fil amwaali wal-awlaadi Wa-'idhum; Wa-maa ya'iduhumush Shaitaanu illaa ghurooraa

17:65.t: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaan; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika Wakeelaa

17:66.t: Rabbukumul lazee yuzjee lakumul fulka fil bahri litabtaghoo min fadlih; innahoo kaana bikum Raheemaa

17:67.t: Wa-izaa massakumud durru fil bahri dalla man tad'oona illaaa iyyaahu falammaa najjaakum ilal barri a'radtum; Wa-kaanal insaanu kafooraa

17:68.t: Afa-amintum aien yakhsifa bikum jaanibal barri aw yursila 'alaikum haasiban summa laa tajidoo lakum wakeelaa

17:69.t: Am amintum aien yu'eedakum feehi taaratan ukhraa fa-yursila 'alaikum qaasifam minar reehi fa-yugh-riqakum bimaa kafartum summa laa tajidoo lakum 'alainaa bihee tabee'aa

17:70.t: Wa-laqad karramnaa Baneee aadama Wa-hamalnaahum fil barri walbahri Wa-razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati Wa-faddalnaahum 'alaa kaseerim mimman khalaqnaa tafdeelaa

17:71.t: Yawma nad'oo kulla unaasim bi-imaamihim faman ootiya kitaabahoo bi-yameenihee fa-ulaaa'ika yaqra'oona kitaabahum Wa-laa yuzlamoona fateelaa

17:72.t: Wa-man kaana fee haaziheee a'maa fahuwa fil aakhirati a'maa Wa-adallu sabeelaa

17:73.t: Wa-in kaadoo la-yaftinoonaka 'anil lazeee awhainaaa ilaika litaftariya 'alainaaa ghairahoo Wa-izallat takhazooka khaleelaa

17:74.t: Wa-law-laaa an sabbatnaaka laqad kitta tarkanu ilaihim shai'an qaleela

17:75.t: Izal la-azaqnaaka di'fal hayaati Wa-di'fal mamaati summa laa tajidu laka 'alainaa naseeraa

17:76.t: Wa-in kaadoo la-yastafizzoonaka minal ardi liyukhri-jooka minhaa Wa-izal laa yalbasoona khilaafaka illaa qaleelaa

17:77.t: Sunnata man qad arsalnaa qablaka mir Rusulinaa Wa-laa tajidu lisunnatinaa tahweelaa

17:78.t: Aqimis Salaata liduloo-kish shamsi ilaa ghasaqil laili Wa-quraanal Fajri inna quraa-nal Fajri kaana mashhoodaa

17:79.t: Wa-minal laili fatahajjad bihee naafilatal laka 'asaaa any yab'asaka Rabbuka Maqaamam Mahmoodaa

17:80.t: Wa-qur Rabbi adkhilnee mudkhala sidqinw Wa-akhrijnee mukhraja sidqinw waj'al lee mil ladunka sultaanan naseeraa

17:81.t: Wa-qul jaaa'al haqqu Wa-zahaqal baatil; innal baatila kaana zahooqaa

17:82.t: Wa-nunazzilu minal quraani maa huwa shifaaa'unw Wa-rahmatullil mu'mineena Wa-laa yazeeduz zaalimeena illaa khasaaraa

17:83.t: Wa-izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada Wa-na-aa bijaani-bihee Wa-izaa massahush sharru kaana ya'oosaa

17:84.t: Qul kulluny ya'malu 'alaa shaakilatihee fa-rabbukum a'lamu biman huwa ahdaa sabeelaa

17:85.t: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'anir rooh; qulir roohu min amri rabbee Wa-maaa ooteetum minal 'ilmi illaa qaleelaa

17:86.t: Wa-la'in shi'naa lanaz-habanna billazeee awhainaaa ilaika summa laa tajidu laka bihee 'alainaa wakeelaa

17:87.t: Illaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; inna fadlahoo kaana 'alaika kabeeraa

17:88.t: Qul la'inij tama'atil insu waljinnu 'alaaa aien ya'too bimisli haazal quraani laa ya'toona bimislihee Wa-law kaana ba'duhum liba-'din zaheeraa

17:89.t: Wa-laqad sarrafnaa linnaasi fee haazal quraani min kulli masalin fa-abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa

17:90.t: Wa-qaaloo lan nu'mina laka hattaa tafjura lanaa minal ardi yamboo'aa

17:91.t: Aw takoona laka jannatum min nakheelinw Wa-'inabin fatufajjiral anhaara khilaalahaa tafjeeraa

17:92.t: Aw tusqitas samaaa'a kamaa za'amta 'alainaa kisafan aw ta'tiya billaahi wal-malaaa'ikati qabeelaa

17:93.t: Aw yakoona laka baitum min zukhrufin aw tarqaa fis samaaa'i Wa-lan nu'mina liruqiyyika hatta tunazzila 'alainaa kitaaban naqra'uh; qul Subhaana Rabbee hal kuntu illaa basharar Rasoolaa

17:94.t: Wa-maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaaa illaaa an qaalooo aba'asal laahu basharar Rasoolaa

17:95.t: Qul law kaana fil ardi malaaa-'ikatuien yamshoona mutma'in-neena lanazzalnaa 'alaihim minas samaaa'i malakar Rasoolaa

17:96.t: Qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee Wa-bainakum; innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa

17:97.t: Wa-maien yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad; Wa-mai yudlil falan tajida lahum awliyaaa'a min doonih; Wa-nahshuruhum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'alaa wujoohihim umyanw Wa-bukmanw Wa-summaa; ma'waahum Jahannamu kullamaa khabat zidnaahum sa'eeraa

17:98.t: Zaalika jazaa'uhum bi-annahum kafaroo bi-aayaatinaa Wa-qaalooo 'a-izaa kunnaa 'izaamanw Wa-rufaatan 'a-innaa la-mab'oosoona khalqan jadeedaa

17:99.t: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda qaadirun 'alaaa aien yakhluqa mislahum Wa-ja'ala lahum ajalal laa raiba fee; fa-abaz zaalimoona illaa kufooraa

17:100.t: Qul law antum tamlikoona khazaaa'ina rahmati Rabbeee izal la-amsaktum khash-yatal infaaq; Wa-kaanal insaanu qatooraa

17:101.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosaa tis'a Aayaatim baiyyinaatin fas'al Baneee Israaa'eela iz jaaa'ahum faqaala lahoo Fir'awnu inee la-azunnuka yaa-Moosaa mas-hooraa

17:102.t: Qaala laqad 'alimta maaa anzala haaa'ulaaa'i illaa Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi basaaa'ira Wa-innee la-azun-nuka yaa-Fir'awnu masbooraa

17:103.t: Fa-araada aien yastafizzahum minal ardi fa-aghraqnaahu Wa-mam ma'ahoo jamee'aa

17:104.t: Wa-qulnaa min ba'dihee li-Baneee Israaa'eelas kunul arda fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'dul aakhirati ji'naa bikum lafeefaa

17:105.t: Wa-bilhaqqi anzalnaahu Wa-bilhaqqi nazal; Wa-maaa arsalnaaka illaa mubash-shiranw Wa-nazeeraa

17:106.t: Wa-quraanan faraqnaahu litaqra-ahoo 'alan naasi 'alaa muksinw Wa-nazzalnaahu tanzeelaa

17:107.t: Qul aaminoo biheee aw laa tu'minoo; innal lazeena ootul 'ilma min qabliheee izaa yutlaa 'alaihim yakhirroona lil-azqaani sujjadaa

17:108.t: Wa-yaqooloona Subhaana Rabbinaaa in kaana wa'du Rabbinaa lamaf'oolaa

17:110.t: Qulid 'ul laaha awid 'ur Rahmaana ayyam maa tad'oo falahul asmaaa'ul Husnaa; Wa-laa tajhar bi-Salaatika Wa-laa tukhaafit bihaa wabtaghi baina zaalika sabeela

17:111.t: Wa-qulil hamdu lillaahil lazee lam yattakhiz waladanw Wa-lam yakul lahoo shareekun fil mulki Wa-lam yakul lahoo waliyyum minaz zulli Wa-kabbirhu takbeeraa

18:1.t: Alhamdu lillaahil lazeee anzala 'alaa 'abdihil kitaaba Wa-lam yaj'al lahoo 'iwajaa

18:2.t: Qaiyimal liyunzira ba'asan shadeedam mil ladunhu Wa-yubashshiral mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran hasanaa

18:4.t: Wa-yunziral lazeena qaalut takhazal laahu waladaa

18:5.t: Maa lahum bihee min 'ilminw Wa-laa li-aabaaa'ihim; kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwaahihim; iny yaqooloona illaa kazibaa

18:6.t: Fala'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka 'alaaa aasaarihim il lam yu'minoo bihaazal hadeesi asafaa

18:7.t: Innaa ja'alnaa ma 'alal ardi zeenatal lahaa linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu 'amalaa

18:9.t: Am hasibta anna Ashaabal Kahfi war-Raqeemi kaanoo min Aayaatinaa 'ajabaa

18:10.t: Iz awal fityatu ilal Kahfi faqaaloo Rabbanaaa aatinaa mil ladunka rahmatanw Wa-haiyi' lanaa min amrinaa rashadaa

18:12.t: Summa ba'asnaahum lina'lama ayyul hizbaini ahsaa limaa labisooo amadaa

18:13.t: Nahnu naqussu 'alaika naba-ahum bilhaqq; innahum fityatun aamanoo bi-Rabbihim Wa-zidnaahum hudaa

18:14.t: Wa-rabatnaa 'alaa quloo-bihim iz qaamoo faqaaloo Rabbunaa Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi lan nad'uwa min dooniheee ilaahal laqad qulnaaa izan shatataa

18:15.t: Haaa'ulaaa'i qawmunat takhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal law laa yaatoona 'alaihim bisultaanim baiyin; faman azlamu mimmaniftaraa 'alal laahi kazibaa

18:16.t: Wa-izi'tazal tumoohum Wa-maa ya'budoona illal laaha faawooo ilal kahfi yanshur lakum Rabbukum mir rahmatihee Wa-yuhaiyi' lakum min amrikum mirfaqa

18:17.t: Wa-tarash shamsa izaa tala'at tazaawaru 'an kahfihim zaatal yameeni Wa-izaa gharabat taqriduhum zaatash shimaali Wa-hum fee fajwatim minh; zaalika min Aayaatil laah; maien yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad, Wa-maien yudlil falan tajida lahoo waliyyam murshidaa

18:18.t: Wa-tahsabuhum ayqaazanw Wa-hum ruqood; Wa-nuqallibuhum zaatal yameeni Wa-zaatash shimaali Wa-kalbuhum baasitun ziraa'ayhi bilwaseed; lawit tala'ta 'alaihim la-wallaita minhum firaaranw Wa-lamuli'ta minhum rubaa

18:19.t: Wa-kazaalika ba'asnaahum liyatasaaa'aloo bainahum; qaala qaaa'ilum minhum kam labistum qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawm; qaaloo Rabbukum a'lamu bimaa labistum fab'asooo ahadakum biwariqikum haazihee ilal madeenati falyanzur ayyuhaaa azkaa ta'aaman falyaatikum birizqim minhu walyatalattaf Wa-laa yush'iranna bikum ahadaa

18:20.t: Innahum ien yazharoo 'alaikum yarjumookum aw yu'eedookum fee millatihim Wa-lan tuflihooo izan abadaa

18:21.t: Wa-kazaalika a'sarnaa 'alaihim liya'lamooo anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-annas Saa'ata laa raiba feehaa iz yatanaaza'oona bainahum amrahum faqaalub noo 'alaihim bunyaanaa; Rabbuhum a'lamu bihim; qaalal lazeena ghalaboo 'alaaa amrihim lanat-takhizanna 'alaihim masjidaa

18:22.t: Sa-yaqooloona salaasatur raabi'uhum kalbuhum Wa-yaqooloona khamsatun saadisuhum kalbuhum rajmam bilghaib; Wa-yaqooloona sab'atunw Wa-saaminuhum kalbuhum; qur Rabbeee a'lamu bi'iddatihim maa ya'lamuhum illaa qaleel; falaa tumaari feehim illaa miraaa'an zaahiranw Wa-laa tastafti feehim minhum ahadaa

18:23.t: Wa-laa taqoolanna lishai'in innee faa'ilun zaalika ghadaa

18:24.t: Illaaa aien yashaaa'al laah; wazkur Rabbaka izaa naseeta Wa-qul 'asaaa any yahdiyani Rabbee li-aqraba min haazaa rashadaa

18:25.t: Wa-labisoo fee kahfihim salaasa mi'atin sineena wazdaadoo tis'aa

18:26.t: Qulil laahu a'lamu bimaa labisoo lahoo ghaibus samaawaati wal-ardi absir bihee Wa-asmi'; maa lahum min doonihee minw waliyyinw Wa-laa yushriku fee hukmihee ahadaa

18:27.t: Watlu maaa oohiya ilaika min Kitaabi Rabbika laa mubaddila li-Kalimaatihee Wa-lan tajida min doonihee multahadaa

18:28.t: Wasbir nafsaka ma'al lazeena yad'oona Rabbahum bilghadaati wal'ashiyyi yureedoona Wajhahoo Wa-laa ta'du 'aynaaka 'anhum tureedu zeenatal hayaatid dunyaa Wa-laa tuti' man aghfalnaa qalbahoo 'an zikrinaa wattaba'a hawaahu Wa-kaana amruhoo furutaa

18:29.t: Wa-qulil haqqu mir Rabbikum faman shaaa'a falyu'minw Wa-man shaaa'a falyakfur; innaaa a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena Naaran ahaata bihim suraadiquhaa; Wa-ien yastagheesoo yughaasoo bimaaa'in kalmuhli yashwil wujooh' bi'sash sharaab; Wa-saaa'at murtafaqaa

18:30.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati innaa laa nudee'u ajra man ahsana 'amalaa

18:31.t: Ulaaa'ika lahum Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihimul anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw Wa-yalbasoona siyaaban khudram min sundusinw Wa-istabraqim muttaki'eena feehaa 'alal araaa'ik; ni'mas sawaab; Wa-hasunat murtafaqaa

18:32.t: Wadrib lahum masalar rajulaini ja'alnaa li-ahadihimaa jannataini min a'naabinw Wa-hafafnaahumaa binakhilinw Wa-ja'alnaa bainahumaa zar'aa

18:33.t: Kiltal jannataini aatat ukulahaa Wa-lam tazlim minhu shai'anw Wa-fajjarnaa khi-laalahumaa naharaa

18:34.t: Wa-kaana lahoo samarun faqaala lisaahibihee Wa-huwa yuhaawiruhoo ana aksaru minka maalanw Wa-a'azzu nafaraa

18:35.t: Wa-dakhala jannatahoo Wa-huwa zaalimul linafsihee qaala maaa azunnu an tabeeda haaziheee abadaa

18:36.t: Wa-maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw Wa-la'ir rudittu ilaa Rabbee la-ajidanna khairam minhaa munqalabaa

18:37.t: Qaala lahoo saahibuhoo Wa-huwa yuhaawiruhooo akafarta billazee khalaqaka min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa sawwaaka rajulaa

18:38.t: Laakinaa Huwal laahu Rabbee Wa-laa ushriku bi-Rabbeee ahadaa

18:39.t: Wa-law-laaa iz dakhalta jannataka qulta maa shaaa'al laahu laa quwwata illaa billaah; in tarani ana aqalla minka maalanw Wa-waladaa

18:40.t: Fa'asaa Rabeee aien yu'tiyani khairam min jannatika Wa-yursila 'alaihaa husbaanam minas samaaa'i fatusbiha sa'eedan zalaqaa

18:41.t: Aw yusbiha maaa'uhaaa ghawran falan tastatee'a lahoo talabaa

18:42.t: Wa-uheeta bisamarihee faasbaha yuqallibu kaffaihi 'alaa maaa anfaqa feehaa Wa-hiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa Wa-yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam ushrik bi-Rabbeee ahadaa

18:43.t: Wa-lam takul lahoo fi'atuien yansuroonahoo min doonil laahi Wa-maa kaana muntasiraa

18:44.t: Hunaalikal walaayatu lillaahil haqq; huwa khairun sawaabanw Wa-khairun 'uqbaa

18:45.t: Wadrib lahum masalal hayaatid dunyaa kamaaa'in anzalnaahu minas samaaa'i fakhtalata bihee nabaatul ardi fa-asbaha hasheeman tazroo-hur riyaah; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'im muqtadiraa

18:46.t: Almaalu walbanoona zeenatul hayaatid dunya wal-baaqiyaatus saalihaatu khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw Wa-khairun amalaa

18:47.t: Wa-yawma nusaiyirul jibaala Wa-taral arda baariza-tanw Wa-hasharnaahum falam nughaadir minhum ahadaa

18:48.t: Wa 'uridoo 'alaa Rabbika saffaa, laqad ji'tumoonaa kamaa khalaqnaakum awala marrah; bal za'amtum allannaj'ala lakum maw'idaa

18:49.t: Wa-wudi'al kitaabu fataral mujrimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa feehi Wa-yaqooloona yaa-wailatanaa maa lihaazal kitaabi laa yughaadiru saghee-ratanw Wa-laa kabeeratan illaaa ahsaahaa; Wa-wajadoo maa 'amiloo haadiraa; Wa-laa yazlimu Rabbuka ahadaa

18:50.t: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa kaana minal jinni fafasaqa 'an amri Rabbih; afatattakhizoonahoo Wa-zurriyatahooo awliyaaa'a min doonee Wa-hum lakum 'aduww; bi'sa lizzaalimeena badalaa

18:51.t: Maaa ash-hattuhum khalqas samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-laa khalqa anfusihim Wa-maa kuntu muttakhizal mudilleena 'adudaa

18:52.t: Wa-Yawma yaqoolu naadoo shurakaaa'i yal-lazeena za'amtum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum Wa-ja'alnaa bainahum maw-biqaa

18:53.t: Wa-ra al-mujrimoonan Naara fazannooo annahum muwaaqi'oohaa Wa-lam yajidoo 'anhaa masrifaa

18:54.t: Wa-laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal quraani linnaasi min kulli masal; Wa-kaanal insaanu aksara shai'in jadalaa

18:55.t: Wa-maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaa Wa-yastaghfiroo Rabbahum illaaa an taatiyahum sunnatul awwaleena aw yaatiyahumul 'azaabu qubulaa

18:56.t: Wa-maa nursilul mursaleena illaa mubashshireena Wa-munzireen; Wa-yujaadilul lazeena kafaroo bilbaatili liyudhidoo bihil haqqa wattakhazooo Aayaatee Wa-maaa unziroo huzuwaa

18:57.t: Wa-man azlamu mimman zukkira bi-ayaati Rabbihee fa-a'rada 'anhaa Wa-nasiya maa qaddamat yadaah; innaa ja'alnaa 'alaa quloobihim akinnatan any yafqahoohu Wa-feee aazaanihim waqraa; Wa-in tad'uhum ilal hudaa falany yahtadooo izan abadaa

18:58.t: Wa-Rabbukal Ghafooru zur rahmati law yu'aakhi-zuhum bimaa kasaboo la'ajala lahumul 'azaab; bal lahum maw'idul laien yajidoo min doonihee maw'ilaa

18:59.t: Wa-tilkal quraaa ahlak-nahum lammaa zulamoo Wa-ja'alnaa limahlikihim maw'idaa

18:60.t: Wa-iz qaalaa Moosaa lifataahu laaa abrahu hattaaa ablugha majma'al bahrayni aw amdiya huqubaa

18:61.t: Falammaa balaghaa majma'a bainihimaa nasiyaa hootahumaa fattakhaza sabeelahoo fil bahri sarabaa

18:62.t: Falammaa jaawazaa qaala lifataahu aatinaa ghadaaa'anaa laqad laqeena min safarinaa haazaa nasabaa

18:63.t: Qaala ara'ayta iz awainaaa ilas sakhrati fa-innee naseetul hoota Wa-maaa ansaaneehu illash Shaitaanu an azkurah; wattakhaza sabeelahoo fil bahri 'ajabaa

18:64.t: Qaala zaalika maa kunnaa nabghi; fartaddaa 'alaa aasaari-him-maa qasasaa

18:65.t: Fa-wajadaa 'abdam min 'ibaadinaaa aatainaahu Rahmatam min 'indinaa Wa-'allamnaahu mil ladunnaa 'ilmaa

18:66.t: Qaala lahoo Moosaa hal attabi'uka 'alaaa an tu'allimani mimmaa 'ullimta rushdaa

18:67.t: Qaalaa innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa

18:68.t: Wa-kaifa tasbiru 'alaa maa lam tuhit bihee khubraa

18:69.t: Qaala satajiduneee in shaa 'al-laahu saabiranw Wa-laaa a'see laka amraa

18:70.t: Qaala fa-init taba'tanee falaa tas'alnee 'an shai'in hattaaa uhdisa laka minhu zikraa

18:71.t: Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaa rakibaa fis safeenati kharaqahaa qaala akharaqtahaa litughriqa ahlahaa laqad ji'ta shai'an imraa

18:72.t: Qaala alam aqul innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa

18:73.t: Qaala laa tu'aakhiznee bimaa naseetu Wa-laa turhiqnee min amree 'usraa

18:74.t: Fantalaqaa hattaa izaa laqiyaa ghulaaman faqatalahoo qaala aqatalta nafsan zakiy-yatam bighairi nafs; laqad ji'ta shai'an nukraa

18:75.t: Qaala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa

18:76.t: Qaala in sa-altuka 'an shai'im ba'dahaa falaa tusaahibnee qad balaghta mil ladunnee 'uzraa

18:77.t: Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaaa atayaaa ahla qaryatinis tat'amaaa ahlahaa fa-abaw any yudaiyifoohumaa fawajadaa feehaa jidaarany yureedu any yanqadda fa-aqaamah; qaala law shi'ta lattakhazta 'alaihi ajraa

18:78.t: Qaala haazaa firaaqu bainee Wa-bainik; sa-unabi-'uka bitaaweeli maa lam tastati' 'alaihi sabraa

18:79.t: Ammas safeenatu fakaanat limasaakeena ya'maloona fil bahri fa-arattu an a'eebahaa Wa-kaana waraaa'-ahum malikuien yaakhuzu kulla safeenatin ghasbaa

18:80.t: Wa-aammal ghulaamu fakaana abawaahu mu'minaini fakhasheenaaa aien yurhiqa-humaa tughyaananw Wa-kufraa

18:81.t: Faradnaa aien yubdila-humaa Rabbuhumaa khairam minhu zakaatanw Wa-aqraba ruhmaa

18:82.t: Wa-ammal jidaaru fakaana lighulaamaini yateemaini fil madeenati Wa-kaana tahtahoo kanzul lahumaa Wa-kaana aboohumaa saalihan fa-araada Rabbuka any yablughaaa ashuddahumaa Wa-yastakhrijaa kanzahumaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; Wa-maa fa'altuhoo 'an amree; zaalika taaweelu maa lam tasti' 'alaihi sabra

18:83.t: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'an Zil Qarnaini qul sa-atloo 'alaikum minhu zikraa

18:84.t: Innaa makkannaa lahoo fil ardi Wa-aatainaahu min kulli shai'in sababaa

18:86.t: Hattaaa izaa balagha maghribash shamsi wajadahaaa taghrubu fee 'aynin hami'a-tinw Wa-wajada 'indahaa qawmaa; qulnaa yaa-Zal Qarnaini immaaa an tu'az-ziba Wa-immaaa an tattakhiza feehim husnaa

18:87.t: Qaala amma man zalama fasawfa nu'azzibuhoo summa yuraddu ilaa Rabbihee fa-yu-'azzibuhoo azaaban nukraa

18:88.t: Wa-ammaa man aamana Wa-'amila saalihan falahoo jazaaa'anil husnaa Wa-sanaqoolu lahoo min amrinaa yusraa

18:90.t: Hattaaa izaa balagha matli'ash shamsi wajdahaa tatlu'u alaa qawmil lam naj'al lahum min doonihaa sitraa

18:91.t: Kazaalika Wa-qad ahatnaa bimaa ladaihi khubraa

18:93.t: Hattaaa izaa balagha bainas saddaini wajada min doonihimaa qawmal laa yakaa-doona yafqahoona qawlaa

18:94.t: Qaaloo yaa-Zal qarnaini inna Yaajooja Wa-Maajooja mufsidoona fil ardi fahal naj'alu laka kharjan 'alaaa an taj'ala bainanaa Wa-bainahum saddaa

18:95.t: Qaala maa makkannee feehi Rabbee khairun fa-a'eenoonee biquwwatin aj'al bainakum Wa-bainahum radmaa

18:96.t: Aatoonee zubaral hadeed, hattaaa izaa saawaa bainas sadafaini qaalan fukhoo hattaaa izaa ja'alahoo naaran qaala aatooneee ufrigh 'alaihi qitraa

18:97.t: Famas taa'ooo aien yazharoohu Wa-mas tataa'oo lahoo naqbaa

18:98.t: Qaala haaza rahmatum mir Rabbee fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'du Rabbee ja'alahoo dakkaaa'a; Wa-kaana; Wa-du Rabbee haqqaa

18:99.t: Wa-taraknaa ba'dahum Yawma'izien yamooju fee ba'dinw Wa-nufikha fis Soori fajama'naahum jam'aa

18:101.t: Allazeena kaanat a'yunuhum fee ghitaaa'in 'an zikree Wa-kaanoo la yastatee'oona sam'aa

18:102.t: Afahasibal lazeena kafarooo aien yattakhizoo 'ibaadee min dooneee awliyaaa'; innaaa a'tadnaa jahannama lil-kaafireena nuzulaa

18:104.t: Allazeena dalla sa'yuhum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-hum yahsaboona annahum yuhsinoona sun'aa

18:105.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi-aayaati Rabbihim Wa-liqaaa'ihee fahabitat a'maaluhum falaa nuqeemu lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati waznaa

18:106.t: Zaalika jazaaa'uhum jahannamu bimaa kafaroo wattakhazooo Aayaatee Wa-Rusulee huzuwaa

18:107.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati kaanat lahum Jannaatul Firdawsi nuzulaa

18:109.t: Qul law kaanal bahru midaadal li-kalimaati Rabbee lanafidal bahru qabla an tanfada Kalimaatu Rabbee Wa-law ji'naa bimislihee madadaa

18:110.t: Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaa ilaahukum Ilaahunw Waahid; faman kaana yarjoo liqaaa'a Rabbihee falya'mal 'amalan saalihanw Wa-laa yushrik bi'ibaadati Rabbiheee ahadaa

19:4.t: Qaala Rabbi innee wahanal 'azmu minnee washta-'alar ra'su shaibanw Wa-lam akun bidu'aaa'ika Rabbi shaqiyyaa

19:5.t: Wa-innee khiftul mawaaliya minw waraaa'ee Wa-kaanat imra atee 'aqiran fa-hablee mil ladunka waliyyaa

19:6.t: Yarisunee Wa-yarisu min aali Ya'qoob, waj'alhu Rabbi radiyya

19:7.t: Yaa-Zakariyyaaa innaa nubashshiruka bi-ghulaamin ismuhoo Yahyaa lam naj'al lahoo min qablu samiyyaa

19:8.t: Qaala Rabbi annaa yakoonu lee ghulaamunw Wa-kaanat imra-atee 'aaqiranw Wa-qad balaghtu minal kibari 'itiyyaa

19:9.t: Qaala kazaalika qaala Rabbuka huwa 'alaiya haiyinunw Wa-qad khalaqtuka min qablu Wa-lam taku shai'aa

19:10.t: Qaala Rabbij 'al leee Aayah; qaala Aayatuka allaa tukalliman naasa salaasa layaalin sawiyyaa

19:11.t: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee minal mihraabi fa-awhaaa ilaihim an sabbihoo bukratanw Wa-'ashiyyaa

19:12.t: Yaa-Yahyaa khuzil Kitaaba biquwwatinw Wa-aatainaahul hukma sabiyyaa

19:13.t: Wa-hanaanam mil ladunnaa Wa-zakaatanw Wa-kaana taqiyyaa

19:15.t: Wa-salaamun 'alaihi yawma wulida Wa-yawma yamootu Wa-yawma yub'asu haiyyaa

19:16.t: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Maryma; izin tabazat min ahlihaa makaanan sharqiyyaa

19:17.t: Fattakhazat min doonihim hijaaban fa-arsalnaaa ilaihaa roohanaa fatamassala lahaa basharan sawiyyaa

19:18.t: Qaalat inneee a'oozu bir-Rahmaani minka in kunta taqiyyaa

19:19.t: Qaala innamaa ana rasoolu Rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulaaman zakiyyaa

19:20.t: Qaalat anna yakoonu lee ghulaamunw Wa-lam yamsasnee bashrunw Wa-lam aku baghiyyaa

19:21.t: Qaala kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki huwa 'alaiya haiyyimunw Wa-linaj-'alahooo Aayatal linnaasi Wa-rahmatam minnaa; Wa-kaana amram maqdiyyaa

19:23.t: Fa-ajaaa-'ahal makhaadu ilaa jiz'in nakhlati qaalat yaa-laitanee mittu qabla haazaa Wa-kuntu nasyam mansiyyaa

19:24.t: Fanaadaahaa min tahtihaaa allaa tahzanee qad ja'ala Rabbuki tahtaki sariyyaa

19:25.t: Wa-huzzeee ilaiki bijiz-'in nakhlati tusaaqit 'alaiki rutaban janiyyaa

19:26.t: Fakulee washrabee Wa-qarree 'ainaa; fa-immaa tarayinnna minal bashari ahadan faqooleee innee nazartu lir-Rahmaani sawman falan ukallimal yawma insiyyaa

19:27.t: Fa-atat bihee qawmahaa tahmiluhoo qaaloo yaa-Maryamoo laqad ji'ti shai'an fariyyaa

19:28.t: Yaaa-ukhta Haaroona maa kaana abooki mra'a saw'inw Wa-maa kaanat ummuki baghiyyaa

19:29.t: Fa-ashaarat ilaih; qaaloo kaifa nukallimu man kaana fil mahdi sabiyyaa

19:30.t: Qaala innee 'abdul laahi aataaniyal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alanee Nabiyyaa

19:31.t: Wa-ja'alanee mubaarakan aina maa kuntu Wa-awsaanee bis-Salaati waz-Zakaati maa dumtu haiyaa

19:32.t: Wa-barram biwaalidatee Wa-lam yaj'alnee jabbaaran shaqiyyaa

19:33.t: Wassalaamu 'alaiya yawma wulidtu Wa-yawma amootu Wa-yawma ub'asu haiyaa

19:34.t: Zaalika 'Eesab nu Maryama; qawlal haqqil lazee feehi yamtaroon

19:35.t: Maa kaana lillaahi aien yattakhiza minw waladin Subhaanah; izaa qadaaa amran fa-innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fa-yakoon

19:36.t: Wa-innal laaha Rabbee Wa-Rabbukum fa'budooh; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem

19:37.t: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu min bainihim fawailul lillazeena kafaroo min mashhadi Yawmin 'azeem

19:38.t: Asmi' bihim Wa-absir Yawma ya'toonanaa laakiniz zaalimoonal yawma fee dalaalin mubeen

19:39.t: Wa-anzirhum Yawmal hasrati iz qudiyal amr; Wa-hum fee ghaflatinw Wa-hum laa yu'minoon

19:40.t: Innaa nahnu narisul arda Wa-man 'alaihaa Wa-ilainaa yurja'oon

19:41.t: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Ibraaheem; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa

19:42.t: Iz qaala li-abeehi yaaa-abati lima ta'budu maa laa yasma'u Wa-laa yubsiru Wa-laa yughnee 'anka shai'aa

19:43.t: Yaaa-abati innee qad jaaa'anee minal 'ilmi maa lam ya'tika fattabi'neee ahdika siraatan Sawiyyaa

19:44.t: Yaaa-abati laa ta'budish Shaitaan; innash Shaitaana kaana lir-Rahmaani 'asiyyaa

19:45.t: Yaaa-abati innee akhaafu aien yamassaka 'azaabum minar Rahmaani fatakoona lish-Shaitaani waliyyaa

19:46.t: Qaala araaghibun anta 'an aalihatee yaaa-Ibraaheemu la-'il lam tantahi la-arjumannaka wahjurnee maliyyaa

19:47.t: Qaala salaamun 'alaika sa-astaghfiru laka Rabbeee innahoo kaana bee hafiyyaa

19:48.t: Wa-a'tazilukum Wa-maa tad'oona min doonil laahi Wa-ad'oo Rabbee 'asaaa allaaa akoona bidu'aaa'i Rabbee shaqiyyaa

19:49.t: Fa-lam ma'tazalahum Wa-maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi wahabnaa lahoo is-haaqa Wa-ya'qoob; Wa-kullan ja'alnaa Nabiyyaa

19:50.t: Wa wahabnaa lahum mirrahmatinaa Wa-ja'alnaa lahum lisaana sidqin 'aliyyaa

19:51.t: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Moosaaa; innahoo kaana mukhlasanw Wa-kaana Rasoolan Nabiyyaa

19:52.t: Wa-naadainaahu min jaanibit Tooril aimani Wa-qarrabnaahu najiyyaa

19:53.t: Wa-wahabnaa lahoo mir rahmatinaaa akhaahu Haaroona Nabiyyaa

19:54.t: Wazkur fil Kitaabi ismaa'eel; innahoo kaana saadiqal wa'di Wa-kaana Rasoolan Nabiyyaa

19:55.t: Wa-kaana ya'muru ahlahoo bis-Salaati waz-zakaati Wa-kaana 'inda Rabbihee mardiyyaa

19:56.t: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Idrees; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa

19:58.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena an'amal laahu 'alaihim minan Nabiyyeena min zurriyyati Aadama Wa-mimman hamalnaa ma'a Noohinw Wa-min zurriyyati Ibraaheema Wa-Israaa'eela Wa-mimman hadainaa wajta-bainaaa; izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatur Rahmaani kharroo sujjadanw Wa-bukiyyaa

19:59.t: Fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun adaa'us Salaata wattaba'ush shahawaati fasawfa yalqawna ghaiyyaa

19:60.t: Illaa man taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal jannata Wa-laa yuzlamoona shai'aa

19:61.t: Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'adar Rahmaanu ibaadahoo bilghaib; innahoo kaana wa'duhoo ma'tiyyaa

19:62.t: Laa yasma'oona feehaa laghwan illaa salaamaa; Wa-lahum rizquhum feehaa bukratanw Wa-'ashiyyaa

19:63.t: Tilkal jannatul latee noorisu min 'ibaadinaa man kaana taqiyyaa

19:64.t: Wa-maa natanazzalu illaa bi-amri Rabbika lahoo maa baina aideenaa Wa-maa khalfanaa Wa-maa baina zaalik; Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka nasiyyaa

19:65.t: Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa fa'bud-hu wastabir li'ibaadatih; hal ta'lamu lahoo samiyyaa

19:66.t: Wa-yaqoolul insaanu 'a-izaa maa mittu lasawfa ukhraju haiyaa

19:67.t: A-Wa-laa yazkurul insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min qablu Wa-lam yaku shai'aa

19:68.t: Fawa-Rabbika lanahshu-rannahum wash-shayaateena summa lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jisiyyaa

19:69.t: Summa lanan-zi'anna min kulli shee'atin aiyuhum ashaddu 'alar Rahmaani 'itiyyaa

19:70.t: Summa lanahnu a'lamu billazeena hum awlaa bihaa siliyyaa

19:71.t: Wa-in minkum illaa waariduhaa; kaana 'alaa Rabbika hatmam maqdiyyaa

19:72.t: Summa nunajjil lazeenat taqaw Wa-nazaruz zaalimeena feehaa jisiyyaa

19:73.t: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo aiyul fareeqaini khairum maqaamanw Wa-ahsanu nadiyyaa

19:74.t: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu asaasanw Wa-ri'yaa

19:75.t: Qul man kaana fid da-laalati falyamdud lahur Rahmaanu maddaa; hattaaa izaa ra-aw maa yoo'adoona immal 'azaaba Wa-immas Saa'ata fasa-ya'lamoona man huwa sharrum makaananw Wa-ad'afu jundaa

19:76.t: Wa-yazeedul laahul lazeenah tadaw hudaa; wal-baaqiyaatus saalihaatu khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw Wa-khairum maraddaa

19:77.t: Afara'aytal lazee kafara bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-qaala la-oota-yanna maalanw Wa-waladaa

19:79.t: Kallaa; sanaktubu maa yaqoolu Wa-namuddu lahoo minal 'azaabi maddaa

19:81.t: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal liyakoonoo lahum 'izzaa

19:83.t: Alam tara annaaa arsalnash Shayaateena 'alal kaafireena ta'uzzuhum azzaa

19:84.t: Falaa ta'jal alaihim innamaa na-'uddu lahum 'addaa

19:85.t: Yawma nahshurul muttaqeena ilar Rahmaani wafdaa

19:87.t: Laa yamlikoonash shafaa'ata illaa manit takhaza 'indar Rahmaani 'ahdaa

19:90.t: Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna minhu Wa-tanshaq qul-ardu Wa-takhirrul jibaalu haddaa

19:92.t: Wa-maa yambaghee li-Rahmaani aien yattakhiza waladaa

19:93.t: In kullu man fis samaawaati wal-ardi illaaa aatir Rahmaani 'abdaa

19:96.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati sa-yaj'alu lahumur Rahmaanu wuddaa

19:97.t: Fa-innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika litubashshira bihil muttaqeena Wa-tunzira bihee qawmal luddaa

19:98.t: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qabla-hum min qarnin hal tuhissu minhum min ahadin aw tasma'u lahum rikzaa

20:6.t: Lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa Wa-maa tahtas saraa

20:7.t: Wa-in tajhar bilqawli fainnahoo ya'lamus sirra Wa-akhfaa

20:8.t: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa huwa lahul asmaa'ul husnaa

20:10.t: Iz ra-aa naaran faqaala li-ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la'alleee aateekum minhaa biqabasin aw ajidu 'alan naari hudaa

20:12.t: Inneee Ana Rabbuka fakhla' na'laika innaka bilwaadil muqaddasi Tuwaa

20:14.t: Innaneee Anal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Ana fa'budnee Wa-aqimis salaata lizikree

20:15.t: Innas Saa'ata aatiyatun akaadu ukhfeehaa litujzaa kullu nafsin bimaa tas'aa

20:16.t: Falaa yasuddannaka 'anhaa mal laa yu'minu bihaa wattaba'a hawaahu fatardaa

20:18.t: Qaala hiya 'asaaya atawakka'u alaihaa Wa-ahushshu bihaa 'alaa ghanamee Wa-liya feehaa ma-aaribu ukhraa

20:21.t: Qaala khuzhaa Wa-laa ta-khaf sanu'eeduhaa seeratahal oolaa

20:22.t: Wadmum yadaka ilaa janaahika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in Aayatan ukhraa

20:38.t: Iz awhainaaa ilaaa ummika maa yoohaaa

20:39.t: Ani qzifeehi fit Taabooti fa-qzifeehi fil yammi fal-yul-qihil yammu bis-saahili ya'khuzhu 'aduwwul lee Wa-'aduwwul lah; Wa-alqaitu 'alaika mahabbatan minnee Wa-litusna'a 'alaa 'ainee

20:40.t: Iz tamsheee ukhtuka fataqoolu hal adullukum 'alaa maien yakfuluhoo faraja-'naaka ilaaa ummika kai taqarra 'ainuhaa Wa-laa tahzan; Wa-qatalta nafsan fanajjainaaka minal ghammi Wa-fatannaaka futoonaa; falabista sineena feee ahli Madyana summa ji'ta 'alaa qadarien yaa-Moosa

20:42.t: Izhab anta Wa-akhooka bi-Aayaatee Wa-laa taniyaa fee zikree

20:44.t: Faqoolaa lahoo qawlal laiyinal la-allahoo yatazakkkaru 'aw yakhshaa

20:45.t: Qaalaa Rabbanaaa innanaa nakhaafu aien yafruta 'alainaaa aw ai yatghaa

20:46.t: Qaala laa takhaafaaa innanee ma'akumaa asma'u Wa-araa

20:47.t: Faatiyaahu faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolaa Rabbika fa-arsil ma'anaa Banee Israaa'eela Wa-laa tu'azzibhum qad ji'naaka bi-Aayatim mir Rabbika wassa-laamu 'alaa manit taba'al hudaa

20:48.t: Innaa qad oohiya ilainaaa annnal 'azaaba 'alaa man kaz-zaba Wa-tawalla

20:50.t: Qaala Rabbunal lazeee a'taa kulla shai'in khalqahoo summa hadaa

20:52.t: Qaala 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabee fee kitaab, laa yadillu Rabbee Wa-laa yansaa

20:53.t: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw Wa-salaka lakum feehaa subulanw Wa-anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-akhrajnaa biheee azwaajam min nabaatin shatta

20:54.t: Kuloo war'aw an'aamakum; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil li-ulin nuhaa

20:55.t: Minhaa khalaqnaakum Wa-feehaa nu'eedukum Wa-minhaa nukhrijukum taaratan ukhraa

20:56.t: Wa-laqad arainaahu Aayaatinaa kullahaa fakaz-zaba Wa-abaa

20:57.t: Qaala aji'tanaa litukhri-janaa min ardinaa bisihrika yaa-Moosa

20:58.t: Falanaatiyannaka bisihrim mislihee faj'al bainanaa Wa-bainaka maw'idal laa nukhlifuhoo nahnu Wa-laaa anta makaanan suwaa

20:59.t: Qaala maw'idukum yawmuz zeenati Wa-ai yuhsharan naasu duhaa

20:60.t: Fatawallaa Fir'awnu fajjama'a kaidahoo summa ataa

20:61.t: Qaala lahum Moosaa wailakum laa taftaroo 'alal laahi kaziban fa-yus-hitakum bi-'azaab, Wa-qad khaaba manif taraa

20:63.t: Qaalooo in haaazaani lasaahiraani yureedaani aien yukhrijaakum min ardikum bisihrihimaa Wa-yazhabaa bitareeqatikumul muslaa

20:64.t: Fa-ajmi'oo kaidakum summa' too saffaa; Wa-qad aflahal yawma manis ta'laa

20:65.t: Qaaloo yaa-Moosaaa immaaa an tulqiya Wa-immaaa an nakoona awala man alqaa

20:66.t: Qaala bal alqoo fa-izaa hibaaluhum Wa-'isiyyuhum yukhaiyalu ilaihi min sihrihim annahaa tas'aa

20:68.t: Qulnaa laa takhaf innaka antal a'laa

20:69.t: Wa-alqi maa fee yamee-nika talqaf maa sana'oo; innamaa sana'oo kaidu saahir; Wa-laa yuflihus saahiru haisu ataa

20:70.t: Fa-ulqiyas saharatu sujjadan qaalooo aamannaa bi-Rabbi Haaroona Wa-Moosa

20:71.t: Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum; innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 'allama-kumus sihra fala-uqatti'anna aidiyakum Wa-arjulakum min khilaafinw Wa-la-usallibannakum fee juzoo'in nakhli Wa-lata'lamunna aiyunaaa ashaddu 'azaabanw Wa-abqaa

20:72.t: Qaaloo lan nu'siraka 'alaa maa jaaa'anaa minal baiyinaati wallazee fataranaa faqdi maaa anta qaad; innamaa taqdee haazihil hayaatad dunyaa

20:73.t: Innaaa aamannaa bi-Rabbinaa liyaghfira lanaa khataayaanaa Wa-maaa akrahtanaa 'alaihi minas sihr; wallaahu khairunw Wa-abqaa

20:74.t: Innahoo mai ya'ti Rabbahoo mujriman fa-inna lahoo Jahannama laa yamootu feehaa Wa-laa yahyaa

20:75.t: Wa-main ya'tihee mu'minan qad 'amilas saalihaati fa-ulaaa'ika lahumud darajaatul 'ulaa

20:76.t: Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; Wa-zaalika jazaaa'u man tazakka

20:77.t: Wa-laqad awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadee fadrib lahum tareeqan fil bahri yabasal laa takhaafu darakanw Wa-laa takhshaa

20:78.t: Fa-atba'ahum Fir'awnu bijunoodihee faghashiyahum minal yammmi maa ghashi-yahum

20:80.t: Yaa-Baneee Israaa'eela qad anjainaakum min 'aduw-wikum Wa-wa'adnaakum jaanibat Tooril aimana Wa-nazzalnaa 'alaikumul Manna was-Salwaa

20:81.t: Kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum Wa-laa tatghaw feehi fa-yahilla 'alaikum ghadabee Wa-mai yahlil 'alaihi ghadabee faqad hawaa

20:82.t: Wa-innee la-Ghaffaarul liman taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan summah tadaa

20:84.t: Qaala hum ulaaa'i 'alaaa asaree Wa-'ajiltu ilaika Rabbi litardaa

20:85.t: Qaala fa-innaa qad fatannaa qawmaka mim ba'dika Wa-adallahumus Saamiriyy

20:86.t: Faraja'a Moosaaa ilaa qawmihee ghadbaana asifaa; qaala yaa-qawmi alam ya'idkum Rabbukum wa'dan hasanaa; afataala 'alaikumul 'ahdu am arattum ai yahilla 'alaikum ghadabum mir Rabbikum fa-akhlaftum maw'idee

20:87.t: Qaaloo maaa akhlafnaa maw'idaka bimalkinna Wa-laakinna hummilnaaa awzaaram min zeenatil qawmi faqazafnaahaa fakazaalika alqas Saamiriyy

20:88.t: Fa-akhraja lahum 'ijlan jasadal lahoo khuwaarun faqaaloo haazaaa ilaahukum Wa-ilaahu Moosaa fanasee

20:89.t: Afalaa yarawna allaa yarji'u ilaihim qawlanw Wa-laa yamliku lahum darranw Wa-laa naf'aa

20:90.t: Wa-laqad qaala lahum Haaroonu min qablu yaa-qawmi innamaa futintum bihee Wa-inna Rabbakumur Rahmaanu fattabi'oonee Wa-atee'ooo amree

20:91.t: Qaaloo lan nabraha 'alaihi 'aakifeena hattaa yarji'a ilainaa Moosaa

20:92.t: Qaala Yaa-Haaroonu maa mana-'aka iz ra-aitahum dallooo

20:94.t: Qaala yabna'umma laa ta'khuz bi-lihyatee Wa-laa bi-ra'see innee khasheetu an taqoola farraqta baina Baneee Israaa'eela Wa-lam tarqub qawlee

20:96.t: Qaala basurtu bimaa lam yabsuroo bihee faqabadtu qabdatam min asarir Rasooli fanabaztuhaa Wa-kazaalika sawwalat lee nafsee

20:97.t: Qaala fazhab fa-inna laka fil hayaati an taqoola laa misaasa Wa-inna laka maw'idal lan tukhlafahoo wanzur ilaaa ilaahikal lazee zalta 'alaihi 'aakifaa; la-nuharriqannahoo thumma la-nansifannahoo fil yammi nasfaa

20:98.t: Innamaaa ilaahu-kumul laahul lazee laa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wasi'a kulla shai'in ilmaa

20:99.t: Kazaalika naqussu 'alaika min anbaaa'i maa qad sabaq; Wa-qad aatainaaka mil ladunnaa Zikraa

20:100.t: Man a'rada 'anhu, fa-innahoo yahmilu Yawmal Qiyaamati wizraa

20:101.t: Khaalideena feehi Wa-saaa'a lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati himlaa

20:102.t: Yawma yunfakhu fissoori Wa-nahshurul mujrimeena Yawma 'izin zurqaa

20:104.t: nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona iz yaqoolu amsaluhum tareeqatan il labistum illaa yawmaa

20:105.t: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'anil jibaali faqul yansifuhaa Rabbee nasfaa

20:108.t: Yawma-izien yattabi'oonad daa'iya laa 'iwaja lahoo Wa-khasha'atil aswaatu lir-Rahmaani falaa tasma'u illaa hamsaa

20:109.t: Yawma-'izil laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu illaa man azina lahur Rahmaanu Wa-radiya lahoo qawlaa

20:110.t: Ya'lamu maa bainaa aideehim Wa-maa khalfahum Wa-laa yuheetoona bihee 'ilmaa

20:111.t: Wa-'anatil wujoohu lil-Haiiyil Qaiyoomi Wa-qad khaaba man hamala zulmaa

20:112.t: Wa-main ya'mal minas saalihaati Wa-huwa mu'minun falaa yakhaafu zulmanw Wa-laa hadmaa

20:113.t: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaahu Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyanw Wa-sarrafnaa fee-hi minal wa'eedi la'allahum yattaqoona aw yuhdisu lahum zikraa

20:114.t: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; Wa-laa ta'jal bil-Quraani min qabli aien yuqdaaa ilaika wahyuhoo Wa-qur Rabbi zidnee 'ilmaa

20:115.t: Wa-laqad 'ahidnaaa ilaaa Aadama min qablu fanasiya Wa-lam najid lahoo 'azmaa

20:116.t: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa; abaa

20:117.t: Faqulnaa yaaa-Aadamu inna haazaa 'aduwwul laka Wa-lizawjika falaa yukhrijan-nakumaa minal Jannati fatashqaa

20:118.t: Innaa laka allaa tajoo'a feeha Wa-laa ta'raa

20:119.t: Wa-annaka laa tazma'u feehaa Wa-laa tadhaa

20:120.t: Fa-waswasa ilaihish Shaitaanu qaala yaaa-Aadamu hal adulluka 'alaa shajaratil khuldi Wa-mulkil laa yablaa

20:121.t: Fa-akalaa minhaa fabadat lahumaa saw-aatuhumaa Wa-tafiqaa yakhsifaani 'alaihimaa minw waraqil jannah; Wa-'asaaa Aadamu Rabbahoo faghawaa

20:123.t: Qaalah bita minhaa jamee'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww; fa-immaa ya'tiyannakum minnee hudan famanit taba'a hudaaya falaa yadillu Wa-laa yashqaa

20:124.t: Wa-man a'rada 'an Zikree fa-inna lahoo ma'eeshatan dankanw Wa-nahshuruhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati a'maa

20:125.t: Qaala Rabbi lima hashar-tanee a'maa Wa-qad kuntu baseeraa

20:126.t: Qaala kazaalika atatka Aayaatunaa fanaseetahaa Wa-kazaalikal Yawma tunsaa

20:127.t: Wa-kazaalika najzee man asrafa Wa-lam yu'min bi-Aayaati Rabbih; Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaddu Wa-abqaa

20:128.t: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa qablahum minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil li-ulin nuhaa

20:129.t: Wa-law-laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika lakaana lizaamanw Wa-'ajalun musammaa

20:130.t: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona Wa-sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi Wa-qabla ghuroobihaa Wa-min aanaaa'il laili fasabbih Wa-atraafan nahaari la-'allaka tardaa

20:131.t: Wa-laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa ma matta'na biheee azwajam minhum zahratal hayaatid dunya linaftinahum feeh; Wa-rizqu Rabbika khairunw Wa-abqaa

20:132.t: Wa'mur ahlaka bis-Salaati wastabir 'alaihaa laa nas'aluka rizqaa; nahnu narzuquk; wal-'aaqibatu littaqwaa

20:133.t: Wa-qaaloo law-laa ya'teenaa bi-aayatin mir Rabbih; awa-lam ta'tihim baiyyinatu maa fis suhufil oolaa

20:134.t: Wa-law annaaa ahlaknaahum bi-'azaabin min qablihee laqaaloo Rabbanaa law-laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika min qabli an nazilla Wa-nakhzaa

20:135.t: Qul kullum mutarabbisun fa-tarabbasoo fa-sa-ta'lamoona man Ashaabus Siraatis Sawiyyi Wa-manih tadaa

21:1.t: Iqtaraba linnaasi hisaabuhum Wa-hum fee ghaflatim mu'ridoon

21:2.t: Maa ya'teehim min zikrim mir Rabbihim muhdasin illas tama'oohu Wa-hum yal'aboon

21:3.t: Laahiyatan quloobuhum; Wa-asarrun najwal lazeena zalamoo hal haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum 'afa-ta'toonas sihra Wa-antum tubsiroon

21:4.t: Qaala Rabbee ya'lamul qawla fis samaaa'i wal-ardi Wa-Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

21:5.t: Bal qaalooo adghaasu ahlaamin bal iftaraahu bal huwa shaa'irun fal-ya'tinaa bi-Aayatin kamaa ursilal awwaloon

21:6.t: Maaa aaamanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa a-fahum yu'minoon

21:7.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaa qablaka illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim fas'aloo ahlaz zikri in kuntum laa ta'lamoon

21:8.t: Wa-maa ja'alnaahum jasadal laa ya'kuloonat ta'aama Wa-maa kaanoo khaalideen

21:9.t: Summa sadaqnaa-humul wa'da fa-anjainaahum Wa-man nashaaa'u Wa-ahlaknal musrifeen

21:10.t: Laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Kitaaban feehi zikrukum afalaa ta'qiloon

21:11.t: Wa-kam qasamnaa min qaryatin kaanat zaalimatanw Wa-ansha'-naa ba'dahaa qawman aakhareen

21:12.t: Falammaaa ahassoo ba'sanaaa izaa hum minhaa yarkudoon

21:13.t: Laa tarkudoo warji'ooo ilaa maaa utriftum feehi Wa-masaakinikum la'allakum tus'aloon

21:15.t: Famaa zaalat tilka da'waahum hattaa ja'alnaahum haseedan khaamideen

21:16.t: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa laa'ibeen

21:17.t: Law aradnaaa an nattakhiza lahwal lat-takhaznaahu mil ladunnaaa in kunnaa faa'ileen

21:18.t: Bal naqzifu bilhaqqi 'alal baatili fa-yadmaghuhoo fa-izaa huwa zaahiq; Wa-lakumul wailu mimmaa tasifoon

21:19.t: Wa-lahoo man fis samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-man 'indahoo laa yastakbiroona 'an 'ibaada-tihee Wa-laa yastahsiroon

21:21.t: Amit takhazooo aalihatam minal ardi hum yunshiroon

21:22.t: Law kaana feehimaaa aalihatun illal laahu lafasadataa; fa-Subhaanal laahi Rabbil 'Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon

21:24.t: Amit takhazoo min doonihee aalihatan qul haatoo burhaanakum haaza zikru mam ma'iya Wa-zikru man qablee; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoonal haqqa fahum mu'ridoon

21:25.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika mir Rasoolin illaa nooheee ilaihi annahoo laaa ilaaha illaaa Ana fa'budoon

21:26.t: Wa-qaalut takhazar Rahmaanu waladaa; Subhaanahu bal 'ibaadum mukramoon

21:27.t: Laa yasbiqoonahoo bil-qawli Wa-hum bi-amrihee ya'maloon

21:28.t: Ya'lamu maa baina aideehim Wa-maa khalfahum Wa-laa yashfa'oona illaa limanir tadaa Wa-hum min khash-yatihee mushfiqoon

21:29.t: Wa-main yaqul minhum inneee ilaahum min doonihee fazaalika najzeehi Jahannam; kazaalika najziz zaalimeen

21:30.t: Awalam yaral lazeena kafarooo annas samaawaati wal-arda kaanataa ratqan fafataqnaa-humaa Wa-ja'alnaa minal maaa'i kulla shai'in haiyin afalaa yu'minoon

21:31.t: Wa-ja'alnaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bihim Wa-ja'alnaa feehaa fijaajan subulal la'allahum yahtadoon

21:32.t: Wa-ja'alnas samaaa'a saqfam mahfoozanw Wa-hum 'an Aayaatihaa mu'ridoon

21:33.t: Wa-Huwal lazee khalaqal laila wannahaara washshamsa wal-qamara kullun fee falakiny yasbahoon

21:34.t: Wa-maa ja'alnaa libasharim min qablikal khuld; afa immitta fahumul khaalidoon

21:35.t: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawt; Wa-nablookum bi-sharri walkhairi fitnatanw Wa-ilainaa turja'oon

21:36.t: Wa-izaa ra-aakal lazeena kafarooo ien yattakhizoonaka illa huzuwan; ahaazal lazee yazkuru aalihatakum Wa-hum bi-zikrir Rahmaani hum kaafiroon

21:37.t: Khuliqal insaanu min 'ajal; sa-ureekum Aayaatee falaa tasta'jiloon

21:38.t: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

21:39.t: Law ya'lamul lazeena kafaroo heena laa yakuffoona 'anw wujoohihimun Naara Wa-laa 'an zuhoorihim Wa-laa hum yunsaroon

21:40.t: Bal ta'teehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum falaa yastatee'oona raddahaa Wa-laa hum yunzaroon

21:41.t: Wa-laqadis tuhzi'a bi-Rusulim min qablika fahaaqa billazeena sakhiroo minhum maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

21:42.t: Qul main yakla-'ukum billaili wannahaari minar Rahmaan; bal hum 'an zikri Rabbihim mu'ridoon

21:43.t: Am lahum aalihatun tamna'uhum min dooninaa; laa yastatee'oona nasra anfusihim Wa-laa hum minna yus-haboon

21:44.t: Bal matta'naa haaa'ulaaa'i Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa taala 'alaihimul 'umur; afalaa yarawna anna na'til arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; afahumul ghaaliboon

21:45.t: Qul innamaaa unzirukum bilwahyi; Wa-laa yasma'us summud du'aaa-'a izaa maa yunzaroon

21:46.t: Wa-la'in massat-hum nafhatun min 'azaabi Rabbika la-yaqoolunna yaawailanaaa innnaa kunnaa zaalimeen

21:47.t: Wa-nada'ul mawaazeenal qista li-Yawmil Qiyaamati falaa tuzlamu nafsun shai'aa; Wa-in kaana misqaala habbatim min khardalin atainaa bihaa; Wa-kafaa binaa haasibeen

21:48.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosa Wa-haaroonal Furqaana Wa-diyaa'anw Wa-zikral lilmuttaqeen

21:49.t: Allazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi Wa-hum minas Saa'ati mushfiqoon

21:50.t: Wa-haazaa Zikrum Mubaarakun anzalnaah; afa-antum lahoo munkiroon

21:51.t: Wa-laqad aatainaaa Ibraaheema rushdahoo min qablu Wa-kunnaa bihee 'aalimeen

21:52.t: Iz qaala li-abeehi Wa-qawmihee maa haazihit tamaaseelul lateee antum lahaa 'aakifoon

21:54.t: Qaala laqad kuntum antum Wa-aabaaa'ukum fee dalaalin mubeen

21:55.t: Qaalooo aji'tanaa bil-haqqi am anta minal laa'ibeen

21:56.t: Qaala bar Rabbukum Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardil lazee fatarahunna Wa-ana 'alaa zaalikum minash shaahideen

21:57.t: Wa-tallaahi la-akeedanna asnaamakum ba'da an tuwalloo mudbireen

21:58.t: Faja'alahum juzaazan illaa kabeeral lahum la'allahum ilaihi yarji'oon

21:59.t: Qaaloo man fa'ala haazaa bi-aalihatinaaa innahoo laminaz zaalimeen

21:60.t: Qaaloo sami'naa fatany yazkuruhum yuqaalu lahooo ibraaheem

21:61.t: Qaaloo fa'too bihee 'alaaa a'yunin naasi la'allahum yash-hadoon

21:63.t: Qaala bal fa'alahoo kabeeruhum haazaa fas'aloohum in kaanoo yantiqoon

21:64.t: Faraja'ooo ilaaa anfusihim faqaalooo innakum antumuz zaalimoon

21:65.t: Summa nukisoo 'alaa ru'oosihim laqad 'alimta maa haaa'ulaaa'i yantiqoon

21:66.t: Qaala afata'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'ukum shai'anw Wa-laa yadurrukum

21:67.t: Uffil lakum Wa-limaa ta'budoona min doonil laah; afalaa ta'qiloon

21:68.t: Qaaloo harriqoohu wansurooo aalihatakum in kuntum faa'ileen

21:69.t: Qulnaa yaa-naaru koonee bardanw Wa-salaaman 'alaaa Ibraaheem

21:71.t: Wa-najjainaahu Wa-Lootan ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa lil-'aalameen

21:72.t: Wa-wahabnaa lahooo Ishaaqa; Wa-Ya'qooba naafilah; Wa-kullan ja'alnaa saaliheen

21:73.t: Wa-ja'alnaahum a'immataien yahdoona bi-amrinaa Wa-awhainaaa ilaihim fi'lal khairaati Wa-iqaamas Salaati Wa-eetaaa'az Zakaati Wa-kaanoo lanaa 'aabideen

21:74.t: Wa-Lootan aatainaahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmanw Wa-najjainaahu minal qaryatil latee kaanat ta'malul khabaaa'is; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in faasiqeen

21:75.t: Wa-adkhalnaahu fee rahmatinaa innahoo minas saaliheen

21:76.t: Wa-noohan iz naadaa min qablu fastajabnaa lahoo fanajjainaahu Wa-ahlahoo minal karbil 'azeem

21:77.t: Wa-nasarnaahu minal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in fa-aghraq-naahum ajma'een

21:78.t: Wa-Daawooda Wa-Sulaimaana iz yahkumaani fil harsi iz nafashat feehi ghanamul qawmi Wa-kunnaa lihukmihim shaahideen

21:79.t: Fafahhamnaahaa sulaimaan; Wa-kullan aatainaa hukmanw wa'ilmanw Wa-sakh-kharnaa ma'a Daawoodal jibaala yusabbihna wattayr; Wa-kunnaa faa'ileen

21:80.t: Wa-'allamanaahu san'ata laboosil lakum lituhsinakum min ba'sikum fahal antum shaakiroon

21:81.t: Wa-li-Sulaimaanar reeha 'aasifatan tajree bi-amriheee ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa; Wa-kunnaa bikulli shai'in 'aalimeen

21:82.t: Wa-minash Shayaateeni maien yaghoosoona lahoo Wa-ya'maloona 'amalan doona zaalika Wa-kunna lahum haafizeen

21:83.t: Wa-Ayyooba iz naadaa Rabbahooo annee massaniyad durru Wa-Anta arhamur raahimeen

21:84.t: Fastajabnaa lahoo fakashaf-naa maa bihee min durrinw Wa-aatainaahu ahlahoo Wa-mislahum ma'ahum rahmatan min 'indinaa Wa-zikraa lil'aabideen

21:85.t: Wa-Ismaa'eela Wa-Idreesa Wa-Zal Kifli kullum minas saabireen

21:86.t: Wa-adkhalnaahum fee rahmatinaa innahum minas saaliheen

21:87.t: Wa-Zan Nooni iz zahaba mughaadiban fa-zannaa al lan naqdira 'alaihi fanaadaa fiz zulumaati al laaa ilaaha illaaa Anta Subhaanaka innee kuntu minaz zaalimeen

21:88.t: Fastajabnaa lahoo Wa-najjainaahu minal ghamm; Wa-kazaalika nunjil mu'mineen

21:89.t: Wa-Zakariyyaaa iz naadaa Rabbahoo Rabbi laa tazarnee fardanw Wa-Anta khairul waariseen

21:90.t: Fastajabnaa lahoo Wa-wahabnaa lahoo Yahyaa Wa-aslahnaa lahoo zawjah; innahum kaanoo yusaari'oona fil khairaati Wa-yad'oonanaa raghabanw Wa-rahabaa; Wa-kaanoo lanaa khaashi'een

21:91.t: Wallateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehaa min roohinaa Wa-ja'alnaahaa wabnahaaa Aayatan lil'aalameen

21:92.t: Inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw Wa-Ana Rabbukum fa'budoon

21:93.t: Wa-taqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum kullun ilainaaa raaji'oon

21:94.t: Famaien ya'mal minas saalihaati Wa-huwa mu'minun falaa kufraana lisa'yihee Wa-innaa lahoo kaatiboon

21:95.t: Wa-haraamun 'alaa qaryatin ahlaknaahaaa annahum laa yarji'oon

21:96.t: Hattaaa izaa futihat Ya'jooju Wa-Ma'jooju Wa-hum min kulli hadabien yansiloon

21:97.t: Waqtarabal wa'dul haqqu fa-izaa hiya shaakhisatun absaarul lazeena kafaroo yaawailanaa qad kunna fee ghaflatin min haaza bal kunnaa zaalimeen

21:98.t: Innakum Wa-maa ta'budoona min doonil laahi hasabu Jahannama antum lahaa waaridoon

21:99.t: Law kaana haaa'ulaaa'i aalihatan maa waradoohaa Wa-kullun feehaa khaalidoon

21:100.t: Lahum feehaa zafeerunw Wa-hum feehaa laa yasma'oon

21:101.t: Innal lazeena sabaqat lahum minnal husnaaa ulaaa'ika 'anhaa mub'adoon

21:102.t: Laa yasma'oona hasee-sahaa Wa-hum fee mash tahat anfusuhum khaalidoon

21:103.t: Laa yahzunuhumul faza'ul akbaru Wa-tatalaq-qaahumul malaaa'ikatu haazaa Yawmukumul lazee kuntum too'adoon

21:104.t: Yawma natwis samaaa'a kataiyis sijilli lilkutub; kamaa bada'naa awwala khalqin nu'eeduh; wa'dan 'alainaa; innaa kunna faa'ileen

21:105.t: Wa-laqad katabnaa fiz Zaboori min ba'diz zikri annal arda yarisuhaa 'ibaadi-yas saalihoon

21:108.t: Qul innamaa yoohaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum illaahunw Waahid, fahal antum muslimoon

21:109.t: Fa-in tawallaw faqul aazantukum 'alaa sawaaa'; Wa-in adreee aqareebun am ba'eedun maa too'adoon

21:110.t: Innahoo ya'lamul jahra minal qawli Wa-ya'lamu maa taktumoon

21:111.t: Wa-in adree la'allahoo fitnatul lakum Wa-mataa'un ilaa heen

21:112.t: Qaala Rabbih kum bil-haqq; Wa-Rabbunar Rahmaa-nul musta'aanu 'alaa maa tasifoon

22:1.t: Yaaa ayyuhan naasuttaqoo Rabbakum; inna zalzalatas Saa'ati shai'un 'azeem

22:2.t: Yawma tarawnahaa tazhalu kullu murdi'atin 'ammaaa arda'at Wa-tada'u kullu zaati hamlin hamlahaa Wa-tarannaasa sukaaraa Wa- maa hum bisukaaraa Wa-lakinaa 'azaabal laahi shadeed

22:3.t: Wa-minan naasi maien yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi 'ilminw Wa-yattabi'u kullaa shaitaanim mareed

22:4.t: Kutiba 'alaihi annahoo man tawallaahu fa-annahoo yudilluhoo Wa-yahdeehi ilaa 'azaabis sa'eer

22:5.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu in kuntum fee raibin minal ba'thi fa-innaa khalaqnaakum min turaabin thumma min nutfatin thumma min 'alaqatin thumma min mudghatin mukhallaqatinw Wa-ghairi mukhallaqatin linubaiyina lakum; Wa-nuqirru fil arhaami maa nashaaa'u ilaaa ajalin musamman thumma nukhrijukum tiflan thumma litablughooo ashuddakum Wa-minkum mai yutawaffa Wa-minkum mai yuraddu ilaaa arzalil 'umuri likailaa ya'lama min ba'di 'ilmin shai'aa; Wa-taral arda haamidatan fa-izaaa anzalnaa 'alaihal maaa'ah tazzat Wa-rabat Wa-ambatat min kulli zawjin baheej

22:6.t: Zaalika bi annal laaha Huwal haqqu Wa-annahoo yuhyil mawtaa Wa-annahoo 'alaakulli shai'in Qadeer

22:7.t: Wa-annas Saa'ata aatiya tul laa raiba feeha Wa-annal laaha yab'asuman fil quboor

22:8.t: Wa-minan naasi maien yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi 'ilminw Wa-laa hudanw Wa-laa Kitaabim Muneer

22:9.t: Saaniya 'itfihee liyudilla 'an sabeelil laahi lahoo fiddun yaa khizyunw Wa-nuzeequhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati azaabal hareeq

22:10.t: Zaalika bimaa qaddamat yadaaka Wa-annal laaha laisa bizallaamil lil'abeed

22:11.t: Wa-minan naasi maien ya'budul laaha 'alaa harfin fa-in asaabahoo khairunit maanna bihee Wa-in asaabat-hu fitnatunin qalaba 'alaa wajhihee khasirad dunyaa wal-aakhirah; zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen

22:12.t: Yad'oo min doonil laahi maa laa yadurruhoo Wa-maa laa yanfa'uh' zaalika huwad dalaalul ba'ed

22:13.t: Yad'oo laman darruhooo aqrabu min naf'ih; labi' salmawlaa Wa-labi'sal 'asheer

22:14.t: Innal laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaar; innal laaha yaf'alu maa yureed

22:15.t: Man kaana yazunnu al laien yansurahul laahu fid dunyaa wal-aakhirati fal-yamdud bisababin ilas samaaa'i summal yaqta' falyanzur hal yuzhibanna kaiduhoo maa yagheez

22:16.t: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaahu aayaatim baiyinaatinw Wa-annal laaha yahdee mai yureed

22:17.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo wallazeena haadoo was-saabi'eena wan-nasaaraa wal-Majoosa wallazeena ashrakooo innal laaha yafsilu bainahum yawmal qiyaamah; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in shaheed

22:18.t: Alam tara annal laaha yasjudu lahoo man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi wash-shamsu walqamaru wan-nu-joomu wal-jibaalu wash-shajaru wad-dawaaabbu Wa-kaseerum minan naasi Wa-kaseerun haqqa 'alaihil 'azaab; Wa-maien yuhinil laahu famaa lahoo mim mukrim; innal laaha yaf'alu maa yashaaa

22:19.t: Haazaani khasmaanikh tasamoo fee Rabbihim fal-lazeena kafaroo qutti'at lahum siyaabum min naar; yusabbu min fawqi ru'oosihimul hameem

22:20.t: Yusharu bihee maa fee butoonihim waljulood

22:22.t: Kullamaa araadooo any yakhrujoo minhaa min ghammin u'eedoo feeha Wa-zooqoo 'azaabal hareeq

22:23.t: Innal laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw Wa-lu'lu'aa; Wa-libaasuhum feehaa hareer

22:24.t: Wa-hudooo ilat taiyibi minal qawli Wa-hudooo ilaaa siraatil hameed

22:25.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo Wa-yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi wal-Masjidil Haraamil lazee ja'alnaahu linnaasi sawaaa'anil 'aakifu feehi walbaad; Wa-maien yurid feehi bi-ilhaadim bizulmin nuziqhu min 'azaabin aleem

22:26.t: Wa-iz bawwaanaa li-Ibraaheema makaanal Baiti al laa tushrik bee shai'anw Wa-tahhir Baitiya litaaa'ifeena walqaaa'-imeena warrukka-'is sujood

22:27.t: Wa-azzin fin naasi bil-Hajji yaatooka rijaalanw Wa-'alaa kulli daamirien yaateena min kulli fajjin 'ameeq

22:28.t: Li yashhadoo manaafi'a lahum Wa-yazkurus mal laahi feee ayyaamimma'loomaatin 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil an'aami fakuloo minhaa Wa-at'imul baaa'isal faqeer

22:29.t: Summal yaqdoo tafasahum wal-yoofoo nuzoorahum wal-yattawwafoo bil-Baitil 'Ateeq

22:30.t: Zaalika Wa-maien yu'azzim hurumaatil laahi fahuwa khairul lahoo 'inda Rabbih; Wa-uhillat lakumul an'aamu illaa maa yutlaa 'alaikum fajtanibur rijsa minal awsaani wajtaniboo qawlaz zoor

22:31.t: Hunafaaa'a lillaahi ghaira mushrikeena bih; Wa-maien yushrik billaahi faka-annamaa kharra minas samaaa'i fatakh-tafuhut tairu aw tahwee bihir reehu bee makaanin saheeq

22:32.t: Zaalika Wa-mai yu'azzim sha'aaa'iral laahi fa-innahaa min taqwal quloob

22:33.t: Lakum feehaa manaafi'u ilaaa ajalim musamman summa mahilluhaaa ilal Baitil 'Ateeq

22:34.t: Wa-likulli ummatin ja'alnaa mansakal liyazkurus mal laahi 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil an'aam; failaahukum ilaahunw Waahidun falahooo aslimoo; Wa-bashshiril mukhbiteen

22:35.t: Allazeena izaa zukiral laahu wajilat quloobuhum wassaabireena 'alaa maaa asaabahum walmuqeemis Salaati Wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

22:36.t: Walbudna ja'alnaahaa lakum min sha'aaa'iril laahi lakum feehaa khairun fazkurus mal laahi 'alaihaa sawaaff; fa-izaa wajabat junoobuhaa fakuloo minhaa Wa-at'imul qaani'a walmu'tarr; kazaalika sakhkharnaahaa lakum la'allakum tashkuroon

22:37.t: Laien yanaalal laaha luhoo-muhaa Wa-laa dimaaa'uhaa Wa-laakiny yanaaluhut taqwaa minkum; kazaalika sakhkharhaa lakum litukabbirul laaha 'alaa ma hadaakum; Wa-bashshirul muhsineen

22:38.t: Innal laaha yudaafi' 'anil lazeena aamanoo; innal laaha laa yuhibbu kulla khawwaanin kafoor

22:39.t: Uzina lillazeena yuqaataloona bi-annahum zulimoo; Wa-innal laaha 'alaa nasrihim la-Qaderr

22:40.t: Allazeena ukhrijoo min diyaarihim bighairi haqqin illaaa any yaqooloo rabbunallaah; Wa-law laa daf'ul laahin naasa ba'dahum biba'dil lahuddimat sawaami'u Wa-biya'unw Wa-salawaatunw Wa-masaajidu yuzkaru feehasmul laahi kaseeraa; Wa-layansurannal laahu mai yansuruh; innal laaha la qawiyyun 'Azeez

22:41.t: Allazeena im makkan-naahum fil ardi aqaamus Salaata Wa-aatawuz Zakaata Wa-amaroo bilma'roofi Wa-nahaw 'anil munkar; Wa-lillaahi 'aaqibatul umoor

22:42.t: Wa-ien yukazzibooka faqad kazzabat qablahum qawmu Nooinw Wa-Aadunw Wa-Samood

22:44.t: Wa-as-haabu Madyana Wa-kuzziba Moosaa fa-amlaitu lilkaafireena summa akhaztuhum fakaifa kaana nakeer

22:45.t: Faka-ayyim min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa Wa-hiya zaalimatun fahiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa Wa-bi'rim mu'at-talatinw Wa-qasrim masheed

22:46.t: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fatakoona lahum quloobuien ya'qiloona bihaaa aw aazaanunien yasma'oona bihaa fa-innahaa laa ta'mal absaaru Wa-laakin ta'mal quloobul latee fis sudoor

22:47.t: Wa-yasta'juloonaka bil'azaabi Wa-lany yukhlifal laahu wa'dah; Wa-inna yawman 'inda Rabbika ka'alfi sanatim mimmaa ta'uddoon

22:48.t: Wa-ka-ayyim min qaryatin amlaitu lahaa Wa-hiya zaalimatun summa akhaztuhaa Wa-ilaiyal maseer

22:49.t: Qul yaaa-ayyuhan naasu innamaaa ana lakum nazeerum mubeen

22:50.t: Fallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilu saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw Wa-rizqun kareem

22:51.t: Wallazeena sa'aw feee Aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa-ika As-haabul jaheem

22:52.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaa min qablika mir Rasoolinnw Wa-laa Nabiyyin illaaa izaaa tamannaaa alqash Shaitaanu feee umniy-yatihee fa-yansakhul laahu maa yulqish Shaitaanu summa yuhkimul laahu aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

22:53.t: Liyaj'ala maa yulqish Shaitaanu fitnatal lillazeena fee quloobihim maradunw walqaasiyati quloobuhum; Wa-innaz zaalimeena lafee shiqaaqim ba'eed

22:54.t: Wa-liya'lamal lazeena ootul 'ilma annahul haqqu mir Rabbika fa-yu'minoo bihee fatukhbita lahoo quloobuhum; Wa-innal laaha lahaadil lazeena aamanoo ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

22:55.t: Wa-laa yazaalul lazeena kafaroo fee miryatim minhu hattaa taatiyahumus Saa'atu baghtatan aw yaatiyahum 'azaabu Yawmin 'aqeem

22:56.t: Almulku Yawma'izil lillaahi yahkumu bainahum; fallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fee jannaatin Na'eem

22:57.t: Wallazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa fa-ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen

22:58.t: Wallazeena haajaroo fee sabeelil laahi summa qutilooo aw maatoo la-yarzuqan-nahumul laahu rizqan hasanaa; Wa-innal laaha la-Huwa khairur raaziqeen

22:59.t: La-yudkhilan-nahum mud-khalaien yardawnah; Wa-innal laaha la-'Aleemun Haleem

22:60.t: Zaalika Wa-man 'aaqaba bimisli maa 'ooqiba bihee summa bughiya 'alaihi la-yansurannahul laah; innal laaha la-'Afuwwun Ghafoor

22:61.t: Zaalika bi-annal laaha yoolijul laila fin nahaari Wa-yoolijun nahaara fil laili Wa-annal laaha Samee'um Baseer

22:62.t: Zaalika bi-annal laaha Huwal haqqu Wa-anna maa yad'oona min doonihee huwal baatilu Wa-annal laaha Huwal 'Aliyyul kabeer

22:63.t: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fatusbihul ardu mukhdarrah; innal laaha Lateefun Khabeer

22:64.t: Lahoo ma fis samaawaati Wa-ma fil ard; Wa-innal laaha la-Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed

22:65.t: Alam tara annal laaha sakhkhara lakum maa fil ardi wal-fulka tajree fil bahri bi-amrihee Wa-yumsikus samaaa'a an taqa'a 'alal ardi illaa biiznih; innal laaha binnaasi la-Ra'oofur Raheem

22:66.t: Wa-Huwal lazee ahyaakum summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum; innal insaana la-kafoor

22:67.t: Likulli ummatin ja'alnaa mansakan hum naasikoohu falaa yunaazi-'unnaka fil amr; wad'u ilaa Rabbika innaka la-'alaa hudan mustaqeem

22:68.t: Wa-in jaadalooka faqulil laahu a'lamu bimaa ta'maloon

22:69.t: Allaahu yahkumu bainakum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon

22:70.t: Alam ta'lam annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaaa'i wal-ard; inna zaalika fee kitaab; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

22:71.t: Wa-ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa lam yunazzil bihee sultaananw Wa-maa laisa lahum bihee 'ilm; Wa-maa lizzaalimeena min naseer

22:72.t: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'laihim Aayaatunaa baiyyinaatin ta'rifu fee wujoohil lazeena kafarul munkara yakaadoona yastoona bil-lazeena yatloona 'alaihim Aayaatinaa; qul afa-unab-bi'ukum bisharrim min zaalikum; an-Naaru Wa-'adahal laahul lazeena kafaroo Wa-bi'sal maseer

22:73.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu duriba masalun fastami'oo lah; innal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi laien yakhluqoo zubaabanw Wa-lawi ijtama'oo lahoo Wa-ien yaslub-humuz zubaabu shai'an laa yastanqizoohu minh; da'ufat taalibu wal-matloob

22:74.t: Maa qadrul laaha haqqa qadrih; innal laaha la-Qawiyyun 'Azeez

22:75.t: Allahu yastafee minal malaaa'ikati Rusulanw Wa-minan naas; innal laaha Samee'un Baseer

22:76.t: Ya'lamu maa baina aydeehim Wa-maa khalfahum; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

22:77.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanur ka'oo wasjudoo wa'budoo Rabbakum waf'alul khaira la'allakum tuflihoon

22:78.t: Wa-jaahidoo fil laahi haqqa jihaadih; Huwaj tabaakum Wa-maa ja'ala 'alaikum fid deeni min haraj; Millata abeekum Ibraaheem; Huwa sammaakumul muslimeena min qablu Wa-fee haaza li-yakoonar Rasoolu shaheedan 'alaikum Wa-takoonoo shuhadaaa'a 'alan naas; fa-aqeemus salaata Wa-aatuz zakaata wa'tasimoo billaahi Huwa mawlaakum fani'mal mawlaa Wa-ni'man naseer

23:6.t: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aimaanuhum fa-innahum ghairu maloomeen

23:7.t: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon

23:11.t: Allazeena yarisoonal Firdawsa hum feehaa khaalidoon

23:12.t: Wa-laqad khalaqnal insaana min sulaalatim min teen

23:13.t: Summa ja'alnaahu nutfatan fee qaraarim makeen

23:14.t: Summa khalaqnan nutfata 'alaqatan fakhalaqnal 'alaqata mudghatan fakhalaq-nal mudghata 'izaaman fakasawnal 'izaama lahman summa anshaanaahu khalqan aakhar; fatabaarakal laahu ahsanul khaaliqeen

23:17.t: Wa-laqad khalaqnaa fawqakum sab'a taraaa'iqa Wa-maa kunnaa 'anil khalqi ghaafileen

23:18.t: Wa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa-askannaahu fil ardi Wa-innaa 'alaa zahaabim bihee laqaa-diroon

23:19.t: Fa-anshaanaa lakum bihee Jannaatim min nakheelinw Wa-a'naab; lakum feehaa fawaakihu kaseeratunw Wa-minhaa taakuloon

23:20.t: Wa-shajaratan takhruju min Toori Sainaaa'a tambutu bidduhni Wa-sibghil lil-aakileen

23:21.t: Wa-inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmaa fee butoonihaa Wa-lakum feehaa manaafi'u kaseeratunw Wa-minhaa taakuloon

23:23.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee faqaala yaa qawmi'budul laaha maa lakum min ilahin ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon

23:24.t: Faqaalal mala'ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee maa haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum yureedu aien yatafaddala 'alaikum Wa-law shaaa'al laahu la-anzala malaaa'ikatam maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen

23:25.t: In huwa illaa rajulum bihee jinnatun fatarabbasoo bihee hattan heen

23:27.t: Fa-awhainaaa ilaihi anis na'il fulka bi-a'yuninaa Wa-wahyinaa fa-izaa jaaa'a amrunaa Wa-faarat tannooru fasluk feehaa min kullin zawjainis naini Wa-ahlaka illaa man sabaqa 'alaihil qawlu minhum Wa-laa tukhaat-ibnee fil lazeena zalamooo innaahum mughraqoon

23:28.t: Fa-izas tawaita ata Wa-mam ma'aka 'alal fulki faqulil hamdu lillaahil lazee najjaanaa minal qawmiz zalimeen

23:29.t: Wa-qur Rabbi anzilnee munzalam mubaarakanw Wa-Anta khairul munzileen

23:30.t: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatinw Wa-in kunnaa lamubtaleen

23:31.t: Summaa anshaana mim ba'dihim qarnan aakhareen

23:32.t: Fa-arsalnaa feehim Rasoolam minhum ani 'budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon

23:33.t: Wa-qaalal mala-u min qawmihil lazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-liqaaa'il Aakhirati Wa-atrafnaahum fil hayaatid dunyaa maa haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum yaakulu mimmaa taakuloona minhu Wa-yashrabu mimmaa tashraboon

23:34.t: Wa-la'in at'atum basharam mislakum innakum izal lakhaasiroon

23:35.t: A-Ya'idukum annakum izaa mittum Wa-kuntum turaabanw Wa-izaaman annakum mukhrajoon

23:37.t: In hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu Wa-nahyaa Wa-maa nahnu bimab'ooseen

23:38.t: In huwa illaa rajulunif taraa 'alal laahi kazibanw Wa-maa nahnuu lahoo bimu'mineen

23:41.t: Fa-akhazat-humus saihatu bilhaqqi faja'alnaahum ghusaaa'aa; fabu;dal lilqaw-miz zaalimeen

23:42.t: Summa anshaanaa mim ba'dihim quroonan aakhareen

23:43.t: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa Wa-maa yastaakhiroon

23:44.t: Summa arsalnaa Rusulanaa tatraa kulla maa jaaa'a ummatar Rasooluhaa kazzabooh; fa-atba'naa ba'dahum ba'danw Wa-ja'alnaahum ahaadees; fabu'dal liqawmil laa yu'minoon

23:45.t: Summa arsalnaa Moosaa Wa-akhaahu Haaroona bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-sultaanim mubeen

23:46.t: Ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihee fastakbaroo Wa-kaanoo qawman 'aaleen

23:47.t: Faqaaloo annu'minu libasharaini mislinaa Wa-qawmuhumaa lanaa 'aabidoon

23:49.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba la'allahum yahtadoon

23:50.t: Wa-ja'alnab na Maryama Wa-ummahooo aayatannw Wa-aawainaahumaaa ilaa rabwatin zaati qaraarinw Wa-ma'een

23:51.t: Yaaa-aiyuhar Rusulu kuloo minat taiyibaati wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem

23:52.t: Wa-inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw Wa-Ana Rabbukum fattaqoon

23:53.t: Fataqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum zuburaa; kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim farihoon

23:55.t: A-yahsaboona annnamaa numiduhum bihee mim maalinw Wa-baneen

23:56.t: Nusaari'u lahum fil khairaat; bal laa yash'uroon

23:57.t: Innal lazeena hum min khashyati Rabbihim mushfiqoon

23:60.t: Wallazeena yu'toona maaa aataw Wa-quloobuhum wajilatun annahum ilaa Rabbihim raaji'oon

23:61.t: Ulaaa'ika yusaari'oona fil khairaati Wa-hum lahaa saabiqoon

23:62.t: Wa-laa nukallifu nafsan illaa wus'ahaa Wa-ladainaa kitaabuny yantiqu bilhaqqi Wa-ahum la yuzlamoon

23:63.t: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratim min haazaa Wa-lahum a'maalum min dooni zaalika hum lahaa 'aamiloon

23:64.t: Hattaaa izaaa akhaznaa mutrafeehim bil'azaabi izaa hum yaj'aroon

23:65.t: Laa taj'arul yawma innakum minnaa laa tunsaroon

23:66.t: Qad kaanat Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum 'alaaa a'qaabikum tankisoon

23:68.t: Afalam yaddabbarrul qawla am jaaa'ahum maa lam yaati aabaaa'ahumul awwaleen

23:69.t: Am lam ya'rifoo Rasoolahum fahum lahoo munkiroon

23:70.t: Am yaqooloona bihee jinnnah; bal jaaa'ahum bilhaqqi Wa-aksaruhum lil-haqqi kaarihoon

23:71.t: Wa-lawit taba'al haqqu ahwaaa'ahum lafasadatis samaawaatu wal-ardu Wa-man feehinnn; bal atainaahum bizikrihim fahum 'an zikrihim mu'ridoon

23:72.t: Am tas'aluhum kharjan fakharaaju Rabbika khairunw Wa-Huwa khairur raaziqeen

23:74.t: Wa-innnal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati 'anis siraati lanaakiboon

23:75.t: Wa-law rahimnaahum Wa-kashafnaa maa bihim min durril lalajjoo fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon

23:76.t: Wa-laqad akhaznaahum bil'azaabi famas takaanoo li-Rabbihim Wa-maa yatadarra'oon

23:77.t: Hattaaa izaa fatahnaa 'alaihim baaban zaa 'azaabin shadeedin izaa hum feehi mublisoon

23:78.t: Wa-Huwal lazeee ansha-a lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idah; qaleelam maa tashkuroon

23:79.t: Wa-Huwal lazee zara-akum fil ardi Wa-ilaihi tuhsharoon

23:80.t: Wa-Huwal lazee yuhyee Wa-yumeetu Wa-lahukh tilaaful laili wannahaar; afalaa ta'qiloon

23:81.t: Bal qaaloo misla maa qaalal awwaloon

23:82.t: Qaalooo 'a-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaabanw Wa-'izaaman 'a-innaa lamab-'oosoon

23:83.t: Laqad wu'idnaa nahnu Wa-aabaaa'unaa haazaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

23:84.t: Qul limanil ardu Wa-man feehaaa in kuntum ta'lamoon

23:86.t: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaatis sab'i Wa-Rabbul 'Arshil 'Azeem

23:88.t: Qul mam bi-yadihee malakootu kulli shai'inw Wa-Huwa yujeeru Wa-laa yujaaru 'alaihi in kuntum ta'lamoon

23:91.t: Mat takhazal laahu minw waladinw Wa-maa kaana ma'ahoo min ilaah; izal lazahaba kullu ilaahim bimaa khalaqa Wa-la'alaa ba'duhum 'alaa ba'd; Subhaannal laahi 'ammaa yasifoon

23:93.t: Qur Rabbi immmaa turiyannee maa yoo'adoon

23:94.t: Rabbi falaa taj'alnee fil qawmiz zaalimeen

23:95.t: Wa-innaa 'alaaa an nuriyaka maa na'iduhum laqaadiroon

23:96.t: Idfa' billate hiya ahsanus saiyi'ah; nahnu a'lamu bimaa yasifoon

23:97.t: Wa-qur Rabbi a'oozu bika min hamazaatish Shayaateen

23:99.t: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a ahada-humul mawtu qaala Rabbir ji'oon

23:100.t: La'alleee a'malu saalihan feemaa taraktu kallaa; innahaa kalimatun huwa qaaa'iluhaa Wa-minw waraaa'ihim barzakhun ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

23:101.t: Fa-izaa nufikha fis Soori falaaa ansaaba bainahum yawma'izinw Wa-laa yatasaaa'aloon

23:102.t: Faman saqulat mawaazee-nuhoo fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

23:103.t: Wa-man khaffat mawaa-zeenuhoo fa-ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasiroo 'anfusahum fee Jahannama khaalidoon

23:104.t: Talfahu wujoohahumun Naaru Wa-hum feehaa kaalihoon

23:105.t: Alam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum bihaa tukazziboon

23:106.t: Qaaloo Rabbanaa ghalabat 'alainaa shiqwatunaa Wa-kunnaa qawman daaalleen

23:107.t: Rabbanaa akhrijnaa minhaa fa-in 'udnaa fa-innaa zaalimoon

23:109.t: Innahoo kaana fareequm min 'ibaadee yaqooloona Rabbanaaa aamannaa faghfir lanaa warhamnaa Wa-Anta khairur raahimeen

23:110.t: Fattakhaztumoohum sikhriyyan hattaaa ansawkum zikree Wa-kuntum minhum tadhakoon

23:111.t: Inee jazaituhumul Yawma bimaa sabarooo annahum humul faaa'izoon

23:112.t: Qaala kam labistum fil ardi 'adada sineen

23:113.t: Qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawmin fas'alil 'aaaddeen

23:114.t: Qaala il labistum illaa qaleelal law annakum kuntum ta'lamoon

23:115.t: Afahsibtum annamaa khalaqnaakum 'abasanw Wa-annakum ilainaa laa turja'oon

23:116.t: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Kareem

23:117.t: Wa-maien yad'u ma'allaahi ilaahan aakhara laa burhaana lahoo bihee fa-inna maa hisaabuhoo 'inda Rabbih; innahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon

23:118.t: Wa-qul Rabbigh fir warham Wa-Anta khairur raahimeen

24:1.t: Sooratun anzalnaahaa Wa-faradnaahaa Wa-anzalnaa feehaaa Aayaatim baiyinaatil la'allakum tazakkaroon

24:2.t: Azzaaniyatu wazzaanee fajlidoo kulla waahidim minhumaa mi'ata jaldatinw Wa-laa taakhuzkum bihimaa raafatun fee deenil laahi in kuntum tu'minoona billaahi wal-Yawmil Aakhiri wal-yashhad 'azaabahumaa taaa'ifatum minal mu'mineen

24:3.t: Azzaanee laa yankihu illaa zaaniyatan aw mushrikatanw wazzaaniyatu laa yankihuhaaa illaa zaanin aw mushrik; Wa-hurrima zaalika 'alal mu'mineen

24:4.t: Wallazeena yarmoonal muhsanaati summa lam yaatoo bi-arba'ati shuhadaaa'a fajlidoohum samaaneena jaldatanw Wa-laa taqbaloo lahum shahaadatan abadaa; Wa-ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon

24:5.t: Illal lazeena taaboo mim ba'di zaalika Wa-aslahoo fa-innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

24:6.t: Wallazeena yarmoona azwaajahum Wa-lam yakul lahum shuhadaaa'u illaaa anfusuhum fashahaadatu ahadihim arba'u shahaadaatim billaahi innahoo laminas saadiqeen

24:7.t: Wal-khaamisatu anna la'natal laahi 'alaihi in kaana minal kaazibeen

24:8.t: Wa-yadra'u anhal 'azaaba an tashhada arba'a shahaa-daatim billaahi innahoo laminal kaazibeen

24:9.t: Wal-khaamisata anna ghadabal laahi 'alaihaaa in kaana minas saadiqeen

24:10.t: Wa-law-laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum Wa-rahmatuhoo Wa-annal laaha Tawwaabun Hakeem

24:11.t: Innal lazeena jaaa'oo bilifki 'usbatum minkum; laa tahsaboohu sharral lakum bal huwa khairul lakum; likul limri'im minhum mak tasaba minal ism; wallazee tawallaa kibrahoo minhum lahoo 'azaabun 'azeem

24:12.t: Law-laaa iz sami'tumoohu zannal mu'minoona walmu'minaatu bi-anfusihim khairanw Wa-qaaloo haazaaa ifkum mubeen

24:13.t: Law-laa jaaa'oo 'alaihi bi-arba'ati shuhadaaa'; fa-iz lam yaatoo bishshuhadaaa'i fa-ulaaa-'ika 'indal laahi humul kaaziboon

24:14.t: Wa-law-laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum Wa-rahmatuhoo fiddunyaa wal aakhirati lamassakum fee maaa afadtum feehi 'azaabun 'azeem

24:15.t: Iz talaqqawnahoo bi-alsinatikum Wa-taqooloona bi-afwaahikum maa laisa lakum bihee 'ilmunw Wa-tahsaboo-nahoo haiyinanw Wa-huwa 'indal laahi 'azeem

24:16.t: Wa-law-laaa iz sami'tu-moohu qultum maa yakoonu lanaaa an natakallama bihaazaa Subhaanaka haaza buhtaanun 'azeem

24:17.t: Ya'izukumul laahu an ta'oodoo limisliheee abadan in kuntum mu'mineen

24:18.t: Wa-yubaiyinul laahu lakumul Aayaat; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

24:19.t: Innal lazeena yuhibboona an tashee'al faahishatu fil lazeena aamanoo lahum 'azaabun aleemun fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirah; wallaahu ya'lamu Wa-antum laa ta'lamoon

24:20.t: Wa-law-laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum Wa-rahmatuhoo Wa-annal laaha Ra'oofur Raheem

24:21.t: Yaaa aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish Shaitaan; Wa-many-yattabi' khutuwaatish Shaitaani fa-innahoo yaamuru bilfahshaaa'i walmunkar; Wa-law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum Wa-rahmatuhoo maa zakaa minkum min ahadin abadanw Wa-laakinnal laaha yuzakkee many-yashaaa'; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

24:22.t: Wa-laa yaatali ulul fadli minkum wassa'ati ai yu'tooo ulil qurbaa walmasaakeena walmuhaajireena fee sabeelillaahi walya'foo walyasfahoo; alaa tuhibboona aien yaghfiral laahu lakum; wal laahu Ghafoorur Raheem

24:23.t: Innal lazeena yarmoonal muhsanaatil ghaafilaatil mu'minaati lu'inoo fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-lahum 'azaabun 'azeem

24:24.t: Yawma tashhhadu 'alaihim alsinatuhum Wa-aideehim Wa-arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

24:25.t: Yawma'izien yuwaf-feehimul laahu deenahumul haqqa Wa-ya'lamoona annal laaha Huwal Haqqul Mubeen

24:26.t: Al-khabeesaatu lil-khabeeseena wal-khabeesoona lil-khabeesaati wat-taiyibaatu lit-taiyibeena wat-taiyiboona lit-taiyibaat; ulaaa'ika mubarra'oona mimma yaqooloona lahum maghfiratunw Wa-rizqun kareem

24:27.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira buyootikum hatta tastaanisoo Wa-tusallimoo 'allaa ahlihaa; zaalikum khairul lakum la'allakum tazakkaroon

24:28.t: Fa-il lam tajidoo feehaaa ahadan falaa tadkhuloohaa hattaa yu'zana lakum Wa-in qeela lakumur ji'oo farji'oo huwa azkaa lakum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem

24:29.t: Laisa 'alaikum junaahun ann tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira maskoonatin feeha mataa'ul lakum; wallaahu ya'lamu maa tubdoona Wa-maa taktumoon

24:30.t: Qul lilmu' mineena yaghuuddoo min absaarihim Wa-yahfazoo furoojahum; zaalika azkaa lahum; innallaaha khabeerum bimaa yasna'oon

24:31.t: Wa qul lilmu'minaati yaghdudna min absaarihinna Wa-yahfazna furoojahunna Wa-laa yubdeena zeenatahunna illaa maa zahara minhaa walyadribna bikhumurihinna 'alaa juyoobihinna Wa-laa yubdeena zeenatahunna illaa libu'oolatihinna aw aabaaa'i hinna aw aabaaa'i bu'oolati hinna aw abnaaa'ihinaa aw abnaaa'i bu'oolatihinnna aw ikhwaanihinnna aw baneee ikhwaanihinna aw banee akhawaatihinna aw nisaaa'i hinna aw maa malakat aimaanuhunna awit taabi'eena ghairi ilil irbati minar rijaali awit tiflillazeena lam yazharoo 'alaa 'awraatin nisaaa'i wala yadribnna bi arjulihinna min zeenatihinn; Wa-toobooo ilallaahi jammee'an aiyuhal mu'minoona la'allakum tuflihoon

24:32.t: Wa-ankihul ayaamaa minkum was-saaliheena min 'ibaadikum Wa-imaa'kum; ien yakoonoo fuqaraaa'a yughni-himul laahu min fadlih; wal-laahu Waasi'un 'Aleem

24:33.t: Wal-yasta'fifil lazeena laa yajidoona nikaahan hatta yughniyahumul laahu min fadlih; wallazeena yabtaghoonal kitaaba mimmaa malakat aimaanukum fakaatiboohum in 'alimtum feehim khairanw Wa-aatoohum mim maalil laahil lazeee aataakum; Wa-laa tukrihoo fatayaatikum 'alal bighaaa'i in aradna tahassunal litabtaghoo 'aradal hayaatid dunyaa; Wa-mai yukrihhunna fa-innal laaha mim ba'di ikraahihinna Ghafoorur Raheem

24:34.t: Wa-laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Aayaatim mubaiyinaatinw Wa-masalam minnal lazeena khalaw min qablikum Wa-maw'izatal lilmuttaqeen

24:35.t: Allaahu noorus samaawaati wal-ard; masalu noorihee kamishkaatin feehaa misbaah; almisbaahu fee zujaajatin azzujaajatu ka-annahaa kawkabun durriyyuien yooqadu min shajaratim mubaarakatin zaitoonatil laa shariqiyyatinw Wa-laa gharbiyyatien yakaadu zaituhaa yudeee'u Wa-law lam tamsashu naar; noorun 'alaa noor; yahdil laahu linoorihee mai yashaaa'; Wa-yadribul laahul amsaala linnaas; wallaahu bikulli shai'in Aleem

24:36.t: Fee buyootin azinal laahu an turfa'a Wa-yuzkara feehas muhoo yusabbihu lahoo feehaa bilghuduwwi wal-aasaal

24:37.t: Rijaalul laa tulheehim tijaaratunw Wa-laa bai'un 'an zikril laahi Wa-iqaamis Salaati Wa-eetaaa'iz Zakaati yakhaafoona Yawman tataqallabu feehil quloobu wal-absaar

24:38.t: Liyajziyahumul laahu ahsana maa 'amiloo Wa-yazeedahum min fadlih; wal-laahu yarzuqu maien yashaaa'u bighairi hisaab

24:39.t: Wallazeena kafarooo a'maaluhum kasaraabim biqee'atien yahsabuhuz zamaanu maaa'an hattaaa izaa jaaa'ahoo lam yajid-hu shai'anw Wa-wajadal laaha 'indahoo fa-waffaahu hisaabah; wallaahu saree'ul hisaab

24:40.t: Aw kazulumaatin fee bahril lujjiyyiny yaghshaahu mawjun min fawqihee mawjun min fawqihee sahaab; zulumatun ba'duhaa fawqa ba'din izaaa akhraja yadahoo lam yakad yaraahaa Wa-man lam yaj'alil laahu lahoo nooran famaa lahoo min noor

24:41.t: Alam tara annal laaha yusabbihu lahoo man fissamaawaati wal-ardi wat tairu saaaffaatim kullun qad 'alima Salaatahoo Wa-tasbeehah; wallaahu 'aleemum bimaa yaf'aloon

24:42.t: Wa-lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-ilal laahil maseer

24:43.t: Alam tara annal laaha yuzjee sahaaban summa yu'allifu bainahoo summa yaj'aluhoo rukaaman fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilaalihee Wa-yunazzilu minas samaaa'i min jibaalin feehaa mim baradin fa-yuseebu bihee maien yashaaa'u Wa-yasrifuhoo 'am maien yashaaa'u yakaadu sanaa barqihee yazhabu bil-absaar

24:44.t: Yuqallibul laahul laila wannahaar; inna fee zaalika la'ibratal li-ulil absaar

24:45.t: Wallaahu khalaqa kulla daaabbatim mim maaa'in faminhum mai yamshee 'alaa batnihee Wa-minhum mai yamshee 'alaa rijlaine Wa-minhum maien yamshee 'alaaa arba'; yakhluqul laahu maa yashaaa'; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

24:46.t: Laqad anzalnaaa Aayaatim mubaiyinaat; wallaahu yahdee mai yashaaa'u ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

24:47.t: Wa-yaqooloona aamannaa billaahi Wa-bir-Rasooli Wa-ata'naa summa yatawallaa fareequm minhum mim ba'di zaalik; Wa-maaa ulaaa'ika bilmu'mineen

24:48.t: Wa-izaa du'ooo ilal laahi Wa-Rasoolihee li-yahkuma bainahum izaa fareequm minhum mu'ridoon

24:49.t: Wa-ien yakul lahumul haqqu yaatooo ilaihi muz'ineen

24:50.t: Afee quloobihim ma-radun amir taabooo am yakhaafoona aien yaheefal laahu 'alaihim Wa-Rasooluh; bal ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

24:51.t: Innamaa kaana qawlal mu'mineena izaa du'ooo ilal laahi Wa-Rasoolihee li-yahkuma bainahum ai yaqooloo sami'naa Wa-ata'naa; Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

24:52.t: Wa-maien yuti'il laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-yakhshal laaha Wa-yattaqhi fa-ulaaa'ika humul faaa'izoon

24:53.t: Wa-aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim la'in amartahum la-yakhrujunna qul laa tuqsimoo taa'atum ma'roofah innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

24:54.t: Qul atee'ul laaha Wa-atee'ur Rasoola fa-in tawallaw fa-innamaa 'alaihi maa hummila Wa-'alaikum maa hummiltum Wa-in tutee'oohu tahtadoo; Wa-maa 'alar Rasooli illal balaaghul mubeen

24:55.t: Wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum Wa-'amilus saalihaati la-yastakh-lifan-nahum fil ardi kamastakh lafal lazeena min qablihim Wa-la-yumakki-nanna lahum deenahumul lazir tadaa lahum Wa-la-yubaddi-lannahum mim ba'di khawfihim amnaa; ya'budoona-nee laa yushrikoona bee shai'aa; Wa-man kafara ba'da zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon

24:56.t: Wa-aqeemus Salaata Wa-aatuz Zakaata Wa-atee'ur Rasoola la'allakum turhamoon

24:57.t: Laa tahsabannal lazeena kafaroo mu'jizeena fil ard; Wa-maawaahumun Naaru Wa-labi'sal maseer

24:58.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo li-yasta'zinkumul lazeena malakat aimaanukum wallazeena lam yablughul huluma minkum salaasa marraat; min qabli Salaatil Fajri Wa-heena tada'oona siyaa-bakum minaz zaheerati Wa-min ba'di Salaatil Ishaaa'; salaasu 'awraatil lakum; laisa 'alaikum Wa-laa 'alaihim junaahun ba'dahunn; tawwaafoona 'alaikum ba'dukum 'alaa ba'd; kazaalika yubaiyyinul laahu lakumul aayaat; wallahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

24:59.t: Wa-izaa balaghal atfaalu minkumul huluma fal-yasta'zinoo kamas ta'zanal lazeena min qablihim; kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakum Aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

24:60.t: Walqawaa'idu minan nisaaa'il laatee laa yarjoona nikaahan fa-laisa 'alaihinna junaahun aien yada'na siyaabahunna ghaira mutabarrijaatin bi-zeenah; Wa-aien yasta'fif-na khairul lahunn; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

24:61.t: Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw Wa-laa 'alal a'raji harajunw Wa-laa 'alal mareedi harajun Wa-laa 'alaa anfusikum 'an ta'kuloo min buyootikum aw buyooti aabaaa'ikum aw buyooti ummahaatikum aw buyooti ikhwaanikum aw buyooti akhawaatikum aw buyooti a'maamikum aw buyooti 'ammaatikum aw buyooti akhwaalikum aw buyooti khaalaatikum aw maa malaktum mafaatihahooo aw sadeeqikum; laisa 'alaikum junaahun 'an ta'kuloo jamee'an aw ashtaata; fa-izaa dakhaltum buyootan fa-sallimoo 'alaaa anfusikum tahiyyatan min 'indil laahi mubaarakatan taiyyibah; kazaalika yubai-yyinul laahu lakumul Aayaati la'allakum ta'qiloon

24:62.t: Innamal mu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-izaa kaanoo ma'ahoo 'alaaa amrin jaami'il lam yazhaboo hattaa yasta'zinooh; innal lazeena yasta'zinoonaka ulaaa'ikal lazeena yu'minoona billaahi Wa-Rasoolih; fa-izas ta'zanooka li-ba'di sha'nihim fa'zal liman shi'ta minhum wastaghfir lahumul laah; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
