24:63.t: Laa taj'aloo du'aaa'ar Rasooli bainakum ka-du'aaa'i ba'dikum ba'daa; qad ya'lamul laahul lazeena yatasallaloona minkum liwaazaa; fal-yahzaril lazeena yukhaalifoona 'an amriheee 'an tuseebahum fitnatun aw yuseebahum 'azaabun aleem

24:64.t: Alaaa inna lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi qad ya'lamu maaa antum 'alaihi Wa-Yawma yurja'oona ilaihi fa-yunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

25:1.t: Tabaarakal lazee nazzalal Furqaana 'alaa 'abdihee li-yakoona lil'aalameena nazeera

25:2.t: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi Wa-lam yattakhiz waladanw Wa-lam yakul lahoo shareekun filmulki Wa-khalaqa kulla shai'in faqaddarahoo taqdeeraa

25:3.t: Wattakhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal laa yakhluqoona shai'anw Wa-hum yukhlaqoona Wa-laa yamlikoona li-anfusihim darranw Wa-laa naf'anw Wa-laa yamlikoona mawtanw Wa-laa hayaatanw Wa-laa nushooraa

25:4.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafarooo in haazaaa illaaa ifkunif taraahu Wa-a'aanahoo 'alaihi qawmun aakharoona faqad jaaa'oo zulmanw Wa-zooraa

25:5.t: Wa-qaalooo asaateerul awwaleenak tatabahaa fahiya tumlaa 'alaihi bukratanw Wa-aseelaa

25:6.t: Qul anzalhul lazee ya'lamus sirra fis samaawaati wal-ard; innahoo kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa

25:7.t: Wa-qaaloo maa-li haazar Rasooli ya'kulut ta'aama Wa-yamshee fil aswaaq; law-laaa unzila ilaihi malakun fa-yakoona ma'ahoo nazeeraa

25:8.t: Aw yulqaaa ilaihi kanzun aw takoonu lahoo jannatuien ya'kulu minhaa; Wa-qaalaz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulan mas-hooraa

25:9.t: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa

25:10.t: Tabaarakal lazeee in shaaa'a ja'ala laka khairan min zaalika jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru Wa-yaj'al laka qusooraa

25:11.t: Bal kazzaboo bis-Saa'ati Wa-a'tadnaa liman kazzaba bis-Saa'ati sa'eeraa

25:12.t: Izaa ra'at-hum min makaanin ba'eedin sami'oo lahaa taghaiyuzanw Wa-zafeeraa

25:13.t: Wa-izaaa ulqoo minhaa makaanan daiyyiqam muqar-raneena da'aw hunaalika thuboora

25:14.t: Laa tad'ul yawma thubooranw waahidanw wad'oo thubooran kaseeraa

25:15.t: Qul azaalika khairun am Jannatul khuldil latee wu'idal muttaqoon; kaanat lahum jazaaa'anw Wa-maseeraa

25:16.t: Lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oona khaalideen; kaana 'alaa Rabbika wa'dan mas'oolaa

25:17.t: Wa-Yawma yahshuruhum Wa-maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi fa-yaqoolu 'a-antum adlaltum 'ibaadee haaa'ulaaa'i am hum dallus sabeel

25:18.t: Qaaloo Subhaanaka maa kaana yanbaghee lanaaa an nattakhiza min doonika min awliyaaa'a Wa-laakin matta'tahum Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa nasooz zikra Wa-kaanoo qawman booraa

25:19.t: Faqad kazzabookum bimaa taqooloona famaa tastatee'oona sarfanw Wa-laa nasraa; Wa-many yazlim minkum nuziqhu 'azaaban kabeeraa

25:20.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaa qablaka minal mursaleena illaaa innahum la-ya'kuloonat ta'aama Wa-yamshoona fil aswaaq; Wa-ja'alnaa ba'dakum liba'din fitnatan atasbiroon; Wa-kaana Rabbuka Baseera

25:21.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa law-laaa unzila 'alainal malaaa'ikatu aw naraa Rabbanaa; laqadis takbaroo feee anfusihim Wa-'ataw 'utuwwan kabeeraa

25:22.t: Yawma yarawnal malaaa-'ikata laa bushraa Yawmaizin lil-mujrimeena Wa-yaqooloona hijran mahjooraa

25:23.t: Wa qadimnaaa ilaa maa 'amiloo min 'amalin faja'alnaahuhabaaa'an manthooraa

25:24.t: As-haabul jannati yawma'izin khairun mustaqar-ranw Wa-ahsanu maqeela

25:25.t: Wa-Yawma tashaqqaqus samaaa'u bilghamaami Wa-nuzzilal malaaa'ikatu tanzeela

25:26.t: Almulku Yawma'izinil haqqu lir Rahmaan; Wa-kaana Yawman'alal kaafireena 'aseeraa

25:27.t: Wa-Yawma ya'adduz zaalimu 'alaa yadaihi yaqoolu yaa-laitanit takhaztu ma'ar Rasooli sabeelaa

25:28.t: Yaa-wailataa laitanee lam attakhiz fulaanan khaleelaa

25:29.t: Laqad adallanee 'aniz zikri ba'da iz jaaa'anee; Wa-kaanash Shaitaanu lil-insaani khazoolaa

25:30.t: Wa-qaalar Rasoolu yaa-Rabbi inna qawmit takhazoo haazal Qur'aana mahjooraa

25:31.t: Wa-kazaalika ja'alnaa likulli Nabiyyin 'aduwwan minal mujrimeen; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika haadiyanw Wa-naseeraa

25:32.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo law-laa nuzzila 'alaihil Qur'aanu jumlatanw waahidah; kazaalika linusabbita bihee fu'aadaka Wa-rattalnaahu tarteelaa

25:33.t: Wa-laa ya'toonaka bi-masalin illaa ji'naaka bilhaqqi Wa-ahsana tafseeraa

25:34.t: Allazeena yuhsharoona 'alaa wujoohihim ilaa jahannama ulaaa'ika sharrun makaananw Wa-adallu sabeelaa

25:35.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alnaa ma'ahooo akhaahu Haaroona wazeeraa

25:36.t: Faqulnaz habaaa ilal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa fadammarnaahum tadmeeraa

25:37.t: Wa-qawma Noohin lammaa kazzabur Rusula aghraqnaahum Wa-ja'alnaahum linnaasi Aayatanw Wa-a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena 'azaaban aleemaa

25:38.t: Wa-'Aadanw Wa-Samooda Wa-As-haabar Rassi Wa-quroonan baina zaalika katheeraa

25:39.t: Wa-kullan darabnaa lahul amsaala Wa-kullan tabbarnaa tatbeera

25:40.t: Wa-laqad ataw 'alal qaryatil lateee umtirat mataras saw'; afalam yakoonoo yarawnahaa; bal kaanoo laa yarjoona nushooraa

25:41.t: Wa-izaa ra-awka ien yattakhizoonaka illaa huzuwan ahaazal lazee ba'asal laahu Rasoolaa

25:42.t: In kaada la-yudillunaa 'an aalihatinaa law-laaa an sabarnaa 'alaihaa; Wa-sawfa ya'lamoona heena yarawnal 'azaaba man adallu sabeela

25:43.t: Ara'aita manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu afa-anta takoonu 'alaihi wakeelaa

25:44.t: Am tahsabu anna aksarahum yasma'oona aw ya'qiloon; in hum illaa kal-an'aami bal hum adallu sabeelaa

25:45.t: Alam tara ilaa Rabbika kaifa maddaz zilla Wa-law shaaa'a la-ja'alahoo saakinan thumma ja'alnash shamsa 'alaihi daleelaa

25:47.t: Wa-Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul laila libaasanw wannawma subaatanw Wa-ja'alan nahaara nushooraa

25:48.t: Wa-Huwal lazeee arsalar riyaaha bushran baina yadai rahmatih; Wa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an tahooraa

25:49.t: Linuhyiya bihee baldatan maitanw-wa nusqiyahoo mimmaa khalaqnaaa an'aamanw Wa-anaasiyya katheeraa

25:50.t: Wa-laqad sarrafnaahu bainahum li-yazzakkaroo fa-abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa

25:51.t: Wa-law shi'naa laba'asnaa fee kulli qaryatin nazeeraa

25:52.t: Falaa tuti'il kaafireena Wa-jaahidhum bihee jihaadan kabeeraa

25:53.t: Wa-Huwal lazee marajal bahraini haazaa 'azbun furaatunw Wa-haazaa milhun ujaaj; Wa-ja'ala bainahumaa barzakhanw Wa-hijran mahjooraa

25:54.t: Wa-Huwal lazee khalaqa minal maaa'i basharan fa-ja'alahoo nasaban Wa-sihraa; Wa-kaana Rabbuka Qadeeraa

25:55.t: Wa-ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uhum Wa-laa yadurruhum; Wa-kaanal kaafiru 'alaa Rabbihee zaheeraa

25:57.t: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin illaa man shaaa'a ai yattakhiza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa

25:58.t: Wa-tawakkal 'alal Haiyil lazee laa yamootu Wa-sabbih bihamdih; Wa-kafaa bihee bizunoobi 'ibaadihee khabeeraa

25:59.t: Allazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati aiyaamin thumma stawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ar-Rahmaanu fas'al bihee khabeeraa

25:60.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahumus judoo lir-Rahmaani qaaloo Wa-mar Rahmaanu 'a-nasjudu limaa ta'murunaa Wa-zaadahum nufooraa

25:61.t: Tabaarakal lazee ja'ala fis samaaa'i buroojanw Wa-ja'ala feehaa siraajanw Wa-qamaran muneeraa

25:62.t: Wa-huwal lazee ja'alal laila wannahaara khilfatan liman araada 'any yazzakkara aw araadaa shukooraa

25:63.t: Wa-'ibaadur Rahmaanil lazeena yamshoona 'alal ardi hawnanw Wa-izaa khaata-bahumul jaahiloona qaaloo salaamaa

25:65.t: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanas rif 'annaa 'azaaba Jahannama inna 'azaabahaa kaana gharaamaa

25:67.t: Wallazeena izaaa anfaqoo lam yusrifoo Wa-lam yaqturoo Wa-kaana baina zaalika qawaamaa

25:68.t: Wallazeena laa yad'oona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara Wa-laa yaqtuloonan nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqqi Wa-laa yaznoon; Wa-mai yaf'al zaalika yalqa 'athaamaa

25:69.t: Yudaa'af lahul 'azaabu Yawmal Qiyaamati Wa-yakhlud feehee muhaanaa

25:70.t: Illaa man taaba Wa-'aamana Wa-'amila 'amalan saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika yubad-dilul laahu saiyyi-aatihim hasanaat; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

25:71.t: Wa-man taaba Wa-'amila saalihan fa-innahoo yatoobu ilal laahi mataabaa

25:72.t: Wallazeena laa yash-hadoonaz zoora Wa-izaa marroo billaghwi marroo kiraamaa

25:73.t: Wallazeena izaa zukkiroo bi-Aayaati Rabbihim lam yakhirroo 'alaihaa summanw wa'umyaanaa

25:74.t: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaa hab lanaa min azwaajinaa Wa-zurriyaatinaa qurrata a'yuninw waj-'alnaa lilmuttaqeena Imaamaa

25:75.t: Ulaaa'ika yujzawnal ghurfata bimaa sabaroo Wa-yulaqqawna feehaa tahiyyatanw Wa-salaamaa

25:77.t: Qul maa ya'ba'u bikum Rabbee law-laa du'aaa'ukum faqad kazzabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizaamaa

26:3.t: La'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka allaa yakoonoo mu'mineen

26:4.t: In nashaa nunazzil 'alaihim minas samaaa'i Aayatan fazallat a'naaquhum lahaa khaadi'een

26:5.t: Wa-maa yaateehim min zikrim minar Rahmaani muhdasin illaa kaanoo 'anhu mu'rideen

26:6.t: Faqad kazzaboo fasa-yaateehim ambaaa'u maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

26:7.t: Awa-lam yaraw ilal ardi kam ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjin kareem

26:8.t: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

26:10.t: Wa-iz naadaa Rabbuka Moosaaa ani' til qawmaz zaalimeen

26:12.t: Qaala Rabbi inneee akhaafu ai yukazziboon

26:13.t: Wa-yadeequ sadree Wa-laa yantaliqu lisaanee fa-arsil ilaa Haaroon

26:15.t: Qaala kallaa fazhabaa bi-Aayaatinaaa innaa ma'akum mustami'oon

26:16.t: Faatiyaa Fir'awna faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen

26:18.t: Qaala alam nurabbika feenaa waleedanw Wa-labista feenaa min 'umurika sineen

26:19.t: Wa-fa'alta fa'latakal latee fa'alta Wa-anta minal kaafireen

26:20.t: Qaala fa'altuhaaa izanw Wa-ana minad daaaleen

26:21.t: Fafarartu minkum lam-maa khiftukum fawahaba lee Rabbee hukmanw Wa-ja'alanee minal mursaleen

26:22.t: Wa-tilka ni'matun tamun-nuhaa 'alaiya an 'abbatta Baneee Israaa'eel

26:24.t: Qaala Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa in kuntum mooqineen

26:27.t: Qaala inna Rasoolakumul lazee ursila ilaikum lamajnoon

26:28.t: Qaala Rabbul mashriqi wal-maghribi Wa-maa baina-humaa in kuntum ta'qiloon

26:29.t: Qaala la'init takhazta ilaahan ghairee la-aj'alannaka minal masjooneen

26:31.t: Qaala faati biheee in kunta minas saadiqeen

26:33.t: Wa-naza'a yadahoo faizaa hiya baidaaa'u linnaa-zireen

26:34.t: Qaala lilmala-i hawlahooo inna haazaa lasaahirun 'aleem

26:35.t: Yureedu aien yukhrijakum min ardikum bisihrihee famaazaa taamuroon

26:36.t: Qaalooo arjih Wa-akhaahu wab'as fil madaaa'ini haashireen

26:40.t: La'allanaa nattabi'us saharata in kaanoo humul ghaalibeen

26:41.t: Falammaa jaaa'as saharatu qaaloo li-Fir'awna a'inna lanaa la-ajjran in kunnaa nahnul ghaalibeen

26:42.t: Qaala na'am Wa-innakum izal laminal muqarrabeen

26:43.t: Qaala lahum Moosaaa alqoo maaa antum mulqoon

26:44.t: Fa-alqaw hibaalahum Wa-'isiyyahum Wa-qaaloo bi'izzati Fir'awna innaa lanahnul ghaaliboon

26:45.t: Fa-alqaa Moosaa 'asaahu fa-izaa hiya talqafu maa yaafikoon

26:49.t: Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 'alla-makumus sihra falasawfa ta'lamoon; la-uqatti'anna aidiyakum Wa-arjulakum min khilaafinw Wa-la-usallibanna-kum ajma'een

26:50.t: Qaaloo la daira innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa munqalliboon

26:51.t: Innaa natma'u aien yaghfira lanaa Rabbunna khataa-yaanaaa an kunnaaa awwalal mu'mineen

26:52.t: Wa-awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadeee innakum muttaba'oon

26:61.t: Falammaa taraaa'al jam'aani qaala as-haabu Moosaaa innaa lamudrakoon

26:62.t: Qaala kallaaa inna ma'iya Rabbee sa-yahdeen

26:63.t: Fa-awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa anid rib bi'asaakal bahra fanfalaqa fakaana kullu firqin kattawdil 'azeem

26:67.t: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayaah; Wa-maa kaana aksaru-hu mu'mineen

26:70.t: Iz qaala li-abeehi Wa-qawmihee maa ta'budoon

26:74.t: Qaaloo bal wajadnaaa aabaaa-'anaa kazaalika yaf'aloon

26:82.t: Wallazeee atma'u aien yaghfira lee khateee'-atee Yawmad Deen

26:83.t: Rabbi hab lee hukmanw Wa-alhiqnee bis-saaliheen

26:84.t: Waj'al lee lisaana sidqin fil aakhireen

26:86.t: Waghfir li-abeee innahoo kaana mind daalleen

26:88.t: Yawma laa yanfa'u maalunw Wa-laa banoon

26:89.t: Illaa man atal laaha biqalbin saleem

26:92.t: Wa-qeela lahum aina maa kuntum ta'budoon

26:93.t: Min doonil laahi hal yansuroonakum aw yantasiroon

26:97.t: Tallaahi in kunnaa lafee dalaalim mubeen

26:102.t: Falaw anna lanaa karratan fanakoona minal mu'mineen

26:103.t: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayatanw Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

26:106.t: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Noohun alaa tattaqoon

26:109.t: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

26:113.t: In hisaabuhum illaa 'alaa Rabbee law tash'uroon

26:116.t: Qaaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa-Noohu latakoonanna minal marjoomeen

26:118.t: Faftab bainee Wa-bai-nahum fat-hanw Wa-najjinee Wa-mam ma'iya minal mu'mineen

26:119.t: Fa-anjainaahu Wa-mam ma'ahoo fil fulkil mashhoon

26:121.t: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayaah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

26:124.t: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Hoodun alaa tattaqoon

26:127.t: Wa-maa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

26:136.t: Qaaloo sawaaa'un 'alainaaa awa-'azta am lam takum minal waa'izeen

26:139.t: Fakazzaboohu fa-ahlaknaahum; inna fee zaalika la-aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

26:142.t: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Saalihun alaa tattaqoon

26:145.t: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

26:152.t: Allazeena yufsidoona fil ardi Wa-laa yuslihoon

26:154.t: Maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa faati bi-Aayatin in kunta minas saadiqeen

26:155.t: Qaala haazihee naaqatul lahaa shirbunw walakum shirbu yawmim ma'loom

26:158.t: Fa-akhazahumul 'azaab; inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

26:161.t: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Lootun alaa tattaqoon

26:164.t: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

26:166.t: Wa-tazaroona maa khalaqa lakum Rabbukum min azwaajikum; bal antum qawmun 'aadoon

26:167.t: Qaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa-Lootu latakoonanna minal mukhrajeen

26:174.t: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

26:177.t: Iz qaala lahum Shu'aybun alaa tattaqoon

26:180.t: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

26:181.t: Awful kaila Wa-laa takoonoo minal mukhsireen

26:183.t: Wa-laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa-'ahum Wa-laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

26:186.t: Wa-maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa Wa-in nazunnuka laminal kaazibeen

26:187.t: Fa-asqit 'alainaa kisafam minas samaaa'i in kunta minas saadiqeen

26:189.t: Fakazzaboohu fa-akhazahum 'azaabu Yawmiz zullah; innahoo kaana 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem

26:190.t: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

26:197.t: Awalam yakul lahum Aayatan ai ya'lamahoo 'ulamaaa'u Baneee Israaa'eel

26:201.t: Laa yu'minoona bihee hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem

26:208.t: Wa-maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa lahaa munziroon

26:213.t: Falaa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatakoona minal mu'azzabeen

26:215.t: Wakhfid janaahaka limanit taba-'aka minal mu'mineen

26:216.t: Fa-in asawka faqul innee bareee'um mimmmaa ta'maloon

26:225.t: Alam tara annahum fee kulli waadiny yaheemoon

26:227.t: Illal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-zakarul laaha kaseeranw wantasaroo min ba'di maa zulimoo; Wa-saya'lamul lazeena zalamooo aiya munqalabiny yanqaliboon

27:1.t: Taa-Seeen; tilka Aayaatul Qur-aani Wa-Kitaabim Mubeen

27:3.t: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata Wa-yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-hum bil-Aakhirati hum yooqinoon

27:4.t: Innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati zaiyannaa lahum a'maalahum fahum ya'mahoon

27:5.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena lahum sooo'ul 'azaabi Wa-hum fil Aakhirati humul akhsaroon

27:6.t: Wa-innaka latulaqqal Qur-aana mil ladun Hakeemin 'Aleem

27:7.t: Iz qaala Moosaa li-ahliheee inneee aanastu naaran saaateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw aateekum bishihaabin qabasil la'allakum tastaloon

27:8.t: Falammaa jaaa'ahaa noodiya am boorika man fin naari Wa-man hawlahaa Wa-Subhaanal laahi Rabbil 'aalameen

27:10.t: Wa-alqi 'asaak; falammmaa ra-aahaa tahtazzu ka-annahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw Wa-lam yu'aqqib; yaa-Moosaa laa takhaf innee laa yakhaafu ladaiyal mursaloon

27:11.t: Illaa man zalama summa baddala husnam ba'da sooo'in fa-innee Ghafoorur Raheem

27:12.t: Wa-adkhil yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in fee tis'i Aayaatin ilaa Fir'awna Wa-qawmih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

27:13.t: Falammaa jaaa'at-hum Aayaatunaa mubsiratan qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen

27:14.t: Wa-jahadoo bihaa wastaiqanat-haaa anfusuhum zulmanw wa-'uluwwaa; fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mufsideen

27:15.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Daawooda Wa-sulaimaana 'ilmaa; Wa-qaalal hamdu lil-laahil lazee faddalanaa 'alaa kaseerim min 'ibaadihil mu'mineen

27:16.t: Wa-warisa Sulaimaanu Daawooda Wa-qaala yaaa-aiyuhan naasu 'ullimnaa mantiqat tairi Wa-ooteenaa min kulli shai'in inna haazaa lahuwal fadlul mubeen

27:17.t: Wa-hushira Sulaimaana junooduhoo minal jinni wal-insi wattairi fahum yooza'oon

27:18.t: hattaaa izaaa ataw 'alaa waadin namli qaalat namlatuien yaaa-aiyuhan namlud khuloo masaakinakum laa yahtimannakum Sulaimaanu Wa-junooduhoo Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

27:19.t: Fatabassama daahikam min qawlihaa Wa-qaala Rabbi awzi'nee an ashkura ni'mata-kal lateee an'amta 'alaiyya Wa-'alaa waalidaiyya Wa-an a'mala saalihan tardaahu Wa-adkhilnee birahmatika fee 'ibaadikas saaliheen

27:20.t: Wa-tafaqqadat taira faqaala maa liya laaa araa al-hudhuda, am kaana minal ghaaa'ibeen

27:21.t: La-u'azzibanahoo 'azaaban shadeedan aw la-azbahannahoo aw layaatiyannee bisultaanim mubeen

27:22.t: Famakasa ghaira ba'eedin faqaala ahattu bimaa lam tuhit bihee Wa-ji'tuka min Sabaim binaba-iny yaqeen

27:23.t: Innee wajattum ra-atan tamlikuhum Wa-ootiyat min kulli shai'inw Wa-lahaa 'arshun 'azeem

27:24.t: Wajattuhaa Wa-qawmahaa yasjudoona lishshamsi min doonil laahi Wa-zaiyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum 'anis sabeeli fahum laa yahtadoon

27:25.t: Allaa yasjudoo lillaahil lazee yukhrijul khab'a fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-ya'lamu maa tukhfoona Wa-maa tu'linoon

27:26.t: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Azeem

27:27.t: Qaala sananzuru asadaqta am kunta minal kaazibeen

27:28.t: Izhab bikitaabee haaza fa-alqih ilaihim summma tawalla 'anhum fanzur maazaa yarji'oon

27:29.t: Qaalat yaaa-aiyyuhal mala'u innee ulqiya ilaiya kitaabun kareem

27:30.t: Innahoo min Sulaimaana Wa-innahoo bismil laahir Rahmaanir Raheem

27:32.t: Qaalat yaaa-aiyyuhal mala'u aftoonee fee amree maa kuntu qaati'atan amran hattaa tashhhaddon

27:33.t: Qaaloo nahnu uloo quwwatinw Wa-uloo baasin shadeed; wal-amru ilaiki fanzuree maazaa taamureen

27:34.t: Qaalat innal mulooka izaa dakhaloo qaryatan afsadoohaa Wa-ja'alooo a'izzata ahlihaaa azillah; Wa-kazaalika yaf'aloon

27:35.t: Wa-innee mursilatun ilaihim bihadiyyatin fanaaziratum bima yarji'ul mursaloon

27:36.t: Falammaa jaaa'a Sulaimaana qaala atumiddoonani bimaalin famaaa aataaniyal laahu khairum mimmmaaa aataakum bal antum bihadiy-yatikum tafrahoon

27:37.t: Irji' ilaihim falanaatiyan-nahum bijunoodil laa qibala lahum bihaa Wa-lanukhri-jannahum minhaaa azillatanw Wa-hum saaghiroon

27:38.t: Qaala yaaa-aiyyuhal mala'u aiyyukum yaateenee bi'arshihaa qabla aien yaatoonee muslimeen

27:39.t: Qaala 'ifreetum minal jinni ana aateeka bihee qabla an taqooma mim maqaamika Wa-innee 'alaihi laqawiyyun ameen

27:40.t: Qaalal lazee indahoo 'ilmum minal Kitaabi ana aateeka bihee qabla aien yartadda ilaika tarfuk; falammaa ra-aahu mustaqirran 'indahoo qaala haazaa min fadli Rabbee li-yabluwaneee 'a-ashkuru am akfuru Wa-man shakara fa-innamaa yashkuru linafsihee Wa-man kafara fa-inna Rabbee Ghaniyyun Kareem

27:41.t: Qaala nakkiroo lahaa 'arshahaa nanzur atahtadeee am takoonu minal lazeena laa yahtadoon

27:42.t: Falammaa jaaa'at qeela ahaakaza 'arshuki qaalat kaanna hoo; Wa-ooteenal 'ilma min qablihaa Wa-kunnaa muslimeen

27:43.t: Wa-saddahaa maa kaanat ta'budu min doonil laahi innahaa kaanat min qawmin kaafireen

27:44.t: Qeela lahad khulis sarha falammaa ra-at-hu hasibat-hu lujjatanw Wa-khashafat 'an saaqaihaa; qaala innahoo sarhum mumarradum min qawaareer; qaalat Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee Wa-aslamtu ma'a Sulaimaana lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

27:45.t: Wa laqad arsalnaaa ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihan ani'budul lahha fa-izaa hum fareeqaani yakhtasimoon

27:46.t: Qaala yaa-qawmi lima tasta'jiloona bissaiyi'ati qablal hasanati law-laa tas-taghfiroonal laaha la'allakum turhamoon

27:47.t: Qaalut taiyyarnaa bika Wa-bimam ma'ak; qaala taaa'irukum 'indal laahi bal antum qawmun tuftanoon

27:48.t: Wa-kaana fil madeenati tis'atu rahtien yufsidoona fil ardi Wa-laa yuslihoon

27:49.t: Qaaloo taqaasamoo billaahi lanubaiyyitannahoo Wa-ahlahoo summaa lanaqoolana liwaliy-yihee maa shahidnaa mahlika ahliee Wa-innaa lasaadiqoon

27:50.t: Wa-makaroo makranw Wa-makarnaa makranw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

27:51.t: Fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatu makrihim annaa dammar-naahum Wa-qawmahum ajma'een

27:52.t: Fatilka buyootuhum khaa-wiyatam bimaa zalamoo; inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal liqaw-mien ya'lamoon

27:54.t: Wa-lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee ataatoonal faa-hishata Wa-antum tubsiroon

27:55.t: A'innakum lataatoonar rijaala shahwatam min doonin nisaaa'; bal antum qawmun tajhaloon

27:56.t: Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalooo akhrijooo aalaa Lootim min qaryatikum innahum unaasuny yatatahharoon

27:57.t: Fa-anjainaahu Wa-ahlahooo illam ra-atahoo qaddarnaahaa minal ghaabireen

27:59.t: Qulil hamdu lillaahi Wa-salaamun 'alaa 'ibaadihil lazeenas tafaa; aaallaahu khairun ammmaa yushrikoon

27:60.t: Amman khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-anzala lakum minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-anbatnaa bihee hadaaa'iqa zaata bahjah; maa kaana lakum an tunbitoo shajarahaa; 'a-ilaahun ma'al laah; bal hum qawmuien ya'diloon

27:61.t: Ammann ja'alal arda qaraaranw Wa-ja'ala khilaalahaaa anhaaranw Wa-ja'ala lahaa rawaasiya Wa-ja'ala bainal bahraini haajizaa; 'a-ilaahun ma' allah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

27:62.t: Ammaien yujeebul mud-tarra izaa da'aahu Wa-yakshifus sooo'a Wa-yaj'alukum khula-faaa'al ardi 'a-ilaahun ma' allaah qaleelan maa tazak-karoon

27:63.t: Ammaien yahdeekum fee zulumaatil barri wal bahri Wa-maien yursilu riyaaha bushran baina yadai rahmatih; 'a-ilaahun ma'allah; Ta'aalal laahu 'ammaa yushrikoon

27:64.t: Ammaien yabda'ul khalqa thumma yu'eeduhoo Wa-maien yarzuqukum minas sammaaa'i wal ard; 'a-ilaahun ma'allah; qul haatoo burhaanakum in kuntum saadiqeen

27:65.t: Qul laa ya'lamu man fis sammaawaati wal-ardil ghaiba illal laah; Wa-maa yash'uroona aiyaana yub'asoon

27:66.t: Balid daaraka 'ilmuhum fil Aakhirah; bal hum fee shakkin minhaa bal hum minhaa 'amoon

27:67.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafarooo 'a-izaa kunnaa turaabanw Wa-aabaaa'unaaa a'innaa lamukhrajoon

27:68.t: Laqad wu'idnaa haazaa nahnu Wa-aabaaa'unaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

27:69.t: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mujrimeen

27:70.t: Wa-laa tahzan 'alaihim Wa-laa takun fee daiqin mimmaa yamkuroon

27:71.t: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

27:72.t: Qul 'asaaa aien yakoona radifa lakum ba'dul lazee tasta'jiloon

27:73.t: Wa-inna Rabbaka lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa yashkuroon

27:74.t: Wa-inna Rabbaka la-ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum Wa-maa yu'linoon

27:75.t: Wa-maa min ghaaa'ibatin fis samaaa'i wal-ardi illaa fee kitaabin mubeen

27:76.t: Inna haazal Qur-aana yaqussu 'alaa Baneee israaa'eela aksaral lazee hum feehi yakhtalifoon

27:78.t: Inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum bihukmih; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul 'Aleem

27:80.t: Innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa Wa-laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa izaa wallaw mudbireen

27:81.t: Wa-maaa anta bihaadil-'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa mai yu'minu bi aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon

27:82.t: Wa-izaa waqa'al qawlu 'alaihim akhrajnaa lahum daaabbatan minal ardi tukal-limuhum annan naasa kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa laa yooqinoon

27:83.t: Wa-Yawma nahshuru min kulli ummatin fawjan mimmaien yukazzibu bi-Aayaatinaa fahum yooza'oon

27:84.t: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'oo qaala akazzabtum bi-Aayaatee Wa-lam tuheetoo bihaa 'ilman ammaazaa kuntum ta'maloon

27:85.t: Wa-waqa'al qawlu 'alaihim bimaa zalamoo fahum laa yantiqoon

27:86.t: Alam yaraw annaa ja'alnal laila li-yaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqaw-mien yu'minoon

27:87.t: Wa-Yawma yunfakhu fis Soori fafazi'a man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi illaa man shaaa'al laah; Wa-kullun atawhu daakhireen

27:88.t: Wa-taral jibaala tahsabuhaa jaamidatanw Wa-hiya tamurru marras sahaab; sun'al laahil lazeee atqana kulla shai'; innahoo khabeerun bimaa taf'aloon

27:89.t: Man jaaa'a bil-hasanati falahoo khairun minhaa Wa-hum min faza'ien Yawma'izin aaminoon

27:90.t: Wa-man jaaa'a bissai-yi'ati fakubbat wujoohuhum fin Naari hal tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

27:91.t: Innamaaa umirtu an a'buda Rabba haazihil baldatil lazee harramahaa Wa-lahoo kullu shai'inw Wa-umirtu an akoona minal muslimeen

27:92.t: Wa-an atluwal Qur-aana famanih tadaa fa-innamaa yahtadee linafsihee Wa-man dalla faqul innamaaa ana minal munzireen

27:93.t: Wa-qulil hamdu lillaahi sa-yureekum Aayaatihee fa-ta'rifoonahaa; Wa-maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon

28:3.t: Natloo 'alaika min naba-i Moosaa Wa-Fir'awna bilhaqqi liqawminy yu'miinoon

28:4.t: Inna Fir'awna 'alaa fil ardi Wa-ja'ala ahlahaa shiya'ai yastad'ifu taaa'ifatam minhum yuzabbihu abnaaa'ahum Wa-yastahyee nisaaa'ahum; innahoo kaana minal mufsideen

28:5.t: Wa-nureedu an namunna 'alal lazeenas tud'ifoo fil ardi Wa-naj'alahum a'immatanw Wa-naj'alahumul waariseen

28:6.t: Wa-numakkina lahum fil ardi Wa-nuriya Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-junoodahumaa minhum maa kaanoo yahzaroon

28:7.t: Wa-awhainaaa ilaaa ummi Moosaaa an ardi'eehi faizaa khifti 'alaihi fa-alqeehi fil yammi Wa-laa takhaafee Wa-laa tahzaneee innaa raaaddoohu ilaiki Wa-jaa'iloohu minal mursaleen

28:8.t: Faltaqatahooo Aalu Fir'awna li-yakoona lahum 'aduwwanw Wa-hazanaa; inna Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-junooda-humaa kaanoo khaati'een

28:9.t: Wa-qaalatim ra-atu Fir'awna qurratu 'aynil lee Wa-lak; laa taqtuloohu 'asaaa aien yanfa'anaa aw nattakhizahoo waladanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

28:10.t: Wa-asbaha fu'aadu ummi Moosaa faarighan in kaadat latubdee bihee law laaa arrabatnaa 'alaa qalbihaa litakoona minal mu'mineen

28:11.t: Wa-qaalat li-ukhtihee qusseehi fabasurat bihee 'an junubinw wahum laa yash'uroon

28:12.t: Wa-harramnaa 'alaihil maraadi'a min qablu faqaalat hal adullukum 'alaaa ahli baitiny yakfuloonahoo lakum Wa-hum lahoo naasihoon

28:13.t: Faradadnaahu ilaa ummihee kai taqarra 'ainuhaa Wa-laa tahzana Wa-lita'lama anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

28:14.t: Wa-lammaa balagha ashuddahoo wastawaaa aatai-naahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmaa; Wa-kazaalika najzil muhsineen

28:15.t: Wa-dakhalal madeenata 'alaa heene ghaflatim min ahlihaa fawajada feeha raju-laini yaqtatilaani haazaa min shee'atihee Wa-haaza min 'aduwwihee fastaghaasahul lazee min shee'atihee 'alal lazee min 'aduwwihee fawakazahoo Moosaa faqadaa 'alaihi qaala haaza min 'amalish Shaitaani innahoo 'aduwwum mmudillum mubeen

28:16.t: Qaala Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee faghfir lee faghafara lah; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

28:17.t: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa an'amta 'alaiya falan akoona zaheeral lilmujrimeen

28:18.t: Fa-asbaha fil madeenati khaaa'ifaien yataraqqabu fa-izal lazis tansarahoo bil-amsi yastasrikhuh; qaala lahoo moosaaa innaka laghawiyyum mubeen

28:19.t: Falammaaa an araada aien yabtisha billazee huwa 'aduwwul lahumaa qaala yaa-Moosaaa atureedu an taqtulanee kamaa qatalta nafsam bil-amsi in tureedu illaaa an takoona jabbaaram fil ardi Wa-maa tureedu an takoona minal musliheen

28:20.t: Wa-jaaa'a rajulum min aqsal madeenati yas'aa qaala yaa-Moosaaa innal mala-a yaa-tamiroona bika liyaqtulooka fakhruj innee laka minan naasiheen

28:21.t: Fakharaja minhaa khaaa 'ifany-yataraqqab; qaala Rabbi najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen

28:22.t: Wa-lammaa tawajjaha tilqaaa'a Madyana qaala 'asaa Rabbeee aien yahdiyanee Sawaaa'as Sabeel

28:23.t: Wa-lammaa warada maaa'a Madyana wajada 'alaihi ummatam minannaasi yasqoona Wa-wajada min doonihimum ra ataini tazoodaani qaala maa khatubkumaa qaalataa laa nasqee hataa yusdirar ri'aaa'u Wa-aboonaa shaikhun kabeer

28:24.t: Fasaqaa lahumaa summa tawallaaa ilaz zilli faqaala Rabbi innee limaaa anzalta ilaiya min khairin faqeer

28:25.t: Fajaaa'at-hu ihdaahumaa tamshee 'alas tihyaaa'in qaalat inna abee yad'ooka li-yajziyaka ajra maa saqaita lanaa; falammaa jaaa'ahoo Wa-qassa 'alaihil qasasa qaala laa takhaf najawta minal qawmiz zaalimeen

28:26.t: Qaalat ihdaahumaa yaaa abatis taajirhu inna khaira manistaajartal qawiyyul ameen

28:27.t: Qaala innee ureedu an unkihaka ihdab nataiya haataini 'alaaa an taajuranee samaaniya hijaj; fa-in atmamta 'ashran famin 'indika Wa-maaa ureedu an ashuqqa 'alaik; satajiduneee in shaaa'al laahu minas saaliheen

28:28.t: Qaala zaalika bainee Wa-bainaka aiyamal ajalaini qadaitu falaa 'udwaana 'alaiya wallaahu 'alaa ma naqoolu Wakeel

28:29.t: Falammmaa qadaa Moosal ajala Wa-saara bi-ahliheee aanasa min jaanibit Toori naaran qaala li-ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la-'alleee aateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw jazwatim minan naari la-'allakum tastaloon

28:30.t: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya min shaati'il waadil aimani fil buq'atil muubaarakati minash shajarati aien yaa-Moosaaa inneee Anal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen

28:31.t: Wa-an alqi 'asaaka falam-maa ra-aahaa tahtazzu ka-annnahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw Wa-lam yu'aqqib; yaa-Moosaa aqbil Wa-laa takhaf innaka minal aamineen

28:32.t: Usluk yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'inw wadmum ilaika janaahaka minar rahbi fazaanika burhaanaani mir Rabbika ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

28:33.t: Qaala Rabbi innee qataltu minhum nafsan fa-akhaafu aien yaqtuloon

28:34.t: Wa-akhee Haaroonu huwa afsahu minnee lisaanan fa-arsilhu ma'iya rid-aien yusaddiquneee innee akhaafu aien yukazziboon

28:35.t: Qaala sanashuddu 'adudaka bi-akheeka Wa-naj'alu lakumaa sultaanan falaa yasiloona ilaikumaa; bi-Aayaatinaa antumaa Wa-manit taba'akumal ghaaliboon

28:36.t: Falammaa jaaa'ahum Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaaa illaa sihrum muftaranw Wa-maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen

28:37.t: Wa-qaala Moosaa Rabbeee a'alamu biman jaaa'a bilhudaa min 'indihee Wa-man takoonu lahoo 'aaqibatud daari innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon

28:38.t: Wa-qaala Fir'awnu yaaa-aiyyuhal mala-u maa 'alimtu lakum min ilaahin ghairee fa-awqid lee yaa-Haamaanu 'alatteeni faj'al lee sarhal la'alleee attali'u ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa Wa-innee la azunnuhoo minal kaazibeen

28:39.t: Wastakbara huwa Wa-junooduhoo fil ardi bighairil haqqi Wa-zannooo annahum ilainaa laa yurja'oon

28:40.t: Fa-akhaznaahu Wa-junoo-dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatuz zaalimeen

28:41.t: Wa-ja'alnaahum a'immataien yad'oona ilan Naari Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati laa yunsaroon

28:42.t: Wa-atba'naahum fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati hum minal maqbooheen

28:43.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba mim ba'di maaa ahlaknal quroonal oolaa basaaa'ira linnaasi Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal la'allahum yata-zakkkaroon

28:44.t: Wa-maa kunta bijaanibil gharbiyyi iz qadainaaa ilaa Moosal amra Wa-maa kunta minash shaahideen

28:45.t: Wa-laakinnaa anshaanaa quroonan fatataawala 'alaihimul 'umur; Wa-maa kunta saawiyan feee ahli Madyana tatloo 'alaihim Aayaatinaa Wa-laakinnaa kunnaa mursileen

28:46.t: Wa-maa kunta bijaanibit Toori iz naadainaa Wa-laakir rahmatam mir Rabbika litunzira qawmam maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yatazakkaroon

28:47.t: Wa-law-laaa an tuseebahum museebatum bimaa qaddamat aideehim fa-yaqooloo Rabbanaa law-laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika Wa-nakoona minal mu'mineen

28:48.t: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min 'indinaa qaaloo law-laa ootiya misla maaa ootiyaa Moosaa; awalam yakfuroo bimaaa ootiya Moosaa min qablu qaaloo sihraani tazaaharaa Wa-qaalooo innaa bikullin kaafiroon

28:49.t: Qul faatoo bi-Kitaabim min 'indil laahi huwa ahdaa minhu-maaa attabi'hu in kuntum saadiqeen

28:50.t: Fa-il lam yastajeeboo laka fa'lam annamaa yattabi'oona ahwaaa'ahum; Wa-man adallu mimmanit taba'a hawaahu bighari hudam minal laah; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

28:51.t: Wa-laqad wassalnaa lahumul qawla la'allahum yatazakkaroon

28:52.t: Allazeena aatainaahu-mul Kitaaba min qablihee hum bihee yu'minoon

28:53.t: Wa-izaa yutlaa 'alaihim qaaloo aamannaa biheee innahul haqqu mir rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa min qablihee muslimeen

28:54.t: Ulaaa'ika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bimaa sabaroo Wa-yadra'oona bil-hasanatis saiyyi'ata Wa-mimmmaa razaq-naahum yunfiqoon

28:55.t: Wa-izaa sami'ul laghwa a'radoo 'anhu Wa-qaaloo lanaaa a'maalunaa Wa-lakum a'maalukum salaamun 'alaikum laa nabtaghil jaahileen

28:56.t: Innaka laa tahdee man ahbata Wa-laakinna laaha yahdee maien yashaaa'; Wa-Huwaa 'lamu bilmuhtadeen

28:57.t: Wa-qaalooo in nattabi'il hudaa ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardinaa; awalam numakkkil lahum haraman aaminany yujbaaa ilaihi samaraatu kulli shai'ir rizqam mil ladunnaa Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

28:58.t: Wa-kam ahlaknaa min qaryatim batirat ma'eeshatahaa fatilka masaakinuhum lam tuskam mim ba'dihim illaa qaleelaa; Wa-kunnaa Nahnul waariseen

28:59.t: Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka muhlikal quraa hattaa yab'asa feee ummihaa Rasoolany yatloo 'alaihim aayaatina; Wa-maa kunnaa muhlikil quraaa illaa Wa-ahluhaa zaalimoon

28:60.t: Wa-maaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa Wa-zeenatuhaa; Wa-maa 'indal laahi khairunw Wa-abqaa; afalaa ta'qiloon

28:61.t: Afamanw wa'adnaahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laaqeehi kamam matta'naahu mataa'al hayaatid dunyaa summa huwa Yawmal Qiyaamati minal muhdareen

28:62.t: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa-'iyal lazeena kuntum taz'umoon

28:63.t: Qaalal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu Rabbanaa haaa'ulaaa'il lazeena aghwainaa aghwainaahu kamaa ghawainaa tabarraanaaa ilaika maa kaanoo iyyaanaa ya'budoon

28:64.t: Wa-qeelad 'oo shurakaaa'akum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum Wa-ra-awul 'azaab; law annahum kaanoo yahtadoon

28:65.t: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu maazaaa ajabtumul mursaleen

28:66.t: Fa'amiyat 'alaihimul ambaaa'u Yawma'izin fahum laa yatasaaa'aloon

28:67.t: Fa-ammaa man taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa'asaaa ai yakoona minal mufliheen

28:68.t: Wa-Rabbuka yakhuluqu maa yashaaa'u Wa-yakhtaar; maa kaana lahumul khiyarah; Subhannal laahi Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammmaa yushrikoon

28:69.t: Wa-Rabbuka ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum Wa-maa yu'linoon

28:70.t: Wa-Huwal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa lahul hamdu fil oolaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-lahul hukmu Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

28:71.t: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumul laila sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaa-teekum bidiyaaa'in afalaa tasma'oon

28:72.t: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumun nahaara sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaateekum bilailin taskunoona feehi afalaa tubsiroon

28:73.t: Wa-mir rahmatihee ja'ala lakumul laila wannahaara litaskunoo feehi Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

28:74.t: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum tazz'umoon

28:75.t: Wa-naza'naa min kulli ummatin shaheedan faqulnaa haatoo burhaanakum fa'alimooo annal haqqa lillaahi Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

28:76.t: Inna Qaaroona kaana min qawmi Moosaa fabaghaaa 'alaihim Wa-aatainaahu minal kunoozi maaa inna mafaati-hahoo latanooo'u bil'usbati ulil quwwati iz qaala lahoo qawmuhoo laa tafrah innal laahaa laa yuhibbul fariheen

28:77.t: Wabtaghi feemaaa aataakal laahud Daaral Aakhirata Wa-laa tansa naseebaka minad dunyaa Wa-ahsin kamaaa ahsanal laahu ilaika Wa-laa tabghil fasaada fil ardi innal laaha laa yuhibbul mufsideen

28:78.t: Qaala innamaaa ootee-tuhoo 'alaa 'ilmin 'indeee; awalam ya'lam annal laaha qad ahlaka min qablihee minal qurooni man huwa ashaddu minhu quwwatanw Wa-aksaru jam'aa; Wa-laa yus'alu 'an zunoobihimul mujrimoon

28:79.t: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee fee zeenatih; qaalal lazeena yureedoonal hayaatad dunyaa yaalaita lanaa misla maaa ootiya Qaaroonu innahoo lazoo hazzin 'azeem

28:80.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wailakum sawaabul laahi khairul liman aamana Wa-'amila saalihaa; Wa-laa yulaq-qaahaaa illas saabiroon

28:81.t: Fakhasafnaa bihee Wa-bidaarihil arda famaa kaana laho min fi'atien yansuroo-nahoo min doonil laahi Wa-maa kaana minal muntasireen

28:82.t: Wa-asbahal lazeena tamannaw makaanahoo bil-amsi yaqooloona waika-annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limaien ya-shaaa'u min 'ibaadihee Wa-yaqdiru law-laaa am mannal laahu 'alainaa lakhasafa binaa waika-annahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon

28:83.t: Tilkad Daarul Aakhiratu naj'aluhaa lillazeena laa yureedoona 'uluwwan fil ardi Wa-laa fasaadaa; wal-'aaqibatu lilmuttaqeen

28:84.t: Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo khairum minhaa Wa-man jaaa'a bissaiyi'ati falaa yujzal lazeena 'amilus saiyiaati illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon

28:85.t: Innal azee farada 'alaikal Qur-aana laraaadduka ilaa ma'aad; qur Rabbeee a'lamu man jjaaa'a bil-hudaa Wa-man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen

28:86.t: Wa-maa kunta tarjooo aien yulqaaa ilaikal Kitaabu illaa rahmatam mir Rabbika falaa takoonanna zaheeral lilkaafireen

28:87.t: Wa-laa yasuddunnaka 'an Aayaatil laahi ba'da iz unzilat ilaika wad'u ilaa Rabbika Wa-laa takonanna minal mushrikeen

28:88.t: Wa-laa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; kullu shai'in haalikun illaa Wajhah; lahul hukkmu Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

29:2.t: Ahasiban naasu any yutrakooo any yaqoolooo aamannaa Wa-hum la yuftanoon

29:3.t: Wa-laqad fatannal lazeena min qablihim fala-ya'lamannal laahul lazeena sadaqoo Wa-la-ya'lamannal kaazibeen

29:4.t: Am hasibal lazeena ya'maloonas sayyiaati any yasbiqoonaa; saaa'a maa yahkumoon

29:5.t: Man kaana yarjoo liqaaa 'allaahi fa-inna ajalal laahi laaat; Wa-Huwass Sameeul 'Aleem

29:6.t: Wa-man jaahada fainnamaa yujaahidu linafsih; innal laaha laghaniyyun 'anil 'aalameen

29:7.t: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lanukaf-firanna 'anhum saiyiaatihim Wa-lanajziyannahum ahsanal lazee kaanoo ya'maloon

29:8.t: Wa-wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi husnanw Wa-in jaahadaaka litushrika bee maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun falaa tuti'humaa; ilaiya marji'ukum fa-unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

29:9.t: Wallazeena aamanoo wa'amilus saalihaati lanudkhilan-nahum fis saaliheen

29:10.t: Wa-minan naasi maien yaqoolu aamannaa billaahi faizaaa ooziya fil laahi ja'ala fitnatan naasi ka'azaabil laahi Wa-la'in jaaa'a nasrum mir Rabbika la-yaqoolunna innaa kunnaa ma'akum; awa-laisal laahu bi-a'lama bimaa fee sudooril 'aalameen

29:11.t: Wa-la-ya'lamannal laahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-la-ya'lamannal munaafiqeen

29:12.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanut tabi'oo sabeelanaa walnahmil khataayaakum Wa-maa hum bihaamileena min khataa-yaahum min shai'in innahum lakaaziboon

29:13.t: Wa-la-yahmilunna asqaa-lahum Wa-asqaalam ma'a asqaalihim Wa-la-yus'alunna Yawmal Qiyaamati 'ammaa kaanoo yaftaroon

29:14.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee falabisa feehim alfa sanatin illaa khamseena 'aaman fa-akhazahumut toofaanu Wa-hum zaalimoon

29:15.t: Fa-anjainaahu Wa-as-haabas safeenati Wa-ja'alnaahaaa Aayatal lil'aalameen

29:16.t: Wa-Ibraheema iz qaala liqawmihi' budul laaha wattaqoohu zaalikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

29:17.t: Innamaa ta'budoona min doonil laahi awsaananw-wa takhluqoona ifkaa; innal lazeena ta'budoona min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona lakum rizqan fabtaghoo 'indal laahir rizqa wa'budoohu washkuroo lahooo ilaihi turja'oon

29:18.t: Wa-in tukazziboo faqad kazzaba umamum min qablikum Wa-maa' alar Rasooli illal balaaghul mubeen

29:19.t: Awa-lam yaraw kaifa yubdi'ul laahul khalqa summa yu'eeduh; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

29:20.t: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa bada'a al-khalqa summal laahu yunshi'-'un nash-atal Aakhirah; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

29:21.t: Yu'azzibu many yashaaa'u Wa-yarhamu many yashaaa'; Wa-ilaihi tuqlaboon

29:22.t: Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi Wa-laa fis samaaa'i Wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi minw waliyyinw Wa-laa naseer

29:23.t: Wallazeena kafaroo bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-liqaaa'iheee ulaaa'ika ya'isoo mir rahmatee Wa-ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem

29:24.t: Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaaluqtuloohu aw harriqoohu fa-anjaahul laahu minan naar; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil laqawmien yu'minoon

29:25.t: Wa-qaala innamat takhaz-tum min doonil laahi awsaanam mawaddata bainikum fil hayaatid dunyaa summa Yawmal Qiyaamati yakfuru ba'dukum biba'dinw Wa-yal'anu ba'dukum ba'danw Wa-ma'waakumun Naaru Wa-maa lakum min naasireen

29:26.t: Fa-aamana lahoo Loot; Wa-qaala innee muhajirun ilaa Rabbee innahoo Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

29:27.t: Wa-wahabnaa lahoo Iss-haaqa Wa-Ya'Qooba Wa-ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihin Nubuwwata wal-Kitaaba Wa-aatainaahu ajrahoo fid dunyaa Wa-innahoo fil aakhirati laminas saaliheen

29:28.t: Wa-Lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee innakum ta'toonal faahishata maa sabaqakum bihaa min ahadin minal 'aalameen

29:29.t: A'innakum la-ta'toonar rijaala Wa-taqta'oonas sabeela Wa-ta'toona fee naadeekumul munkara famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalu' tinaaa bi'azaabil laahi in kunta minas saadiqeen

29:31.t: Wa-lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaaa Ibraaheema bil-bushraa qaalooo innaa muhlikoo ahli haazihil qaryati inna ahlahaa kaanoo zaalimeen

29:32.t: Qaala inna feeha Lootaa; qaaloo nahnu a'lamu biman feehaa lanunajjjiyannahoo Wa-ahlahooo illam ra-atahoo kaanat minal ghaabireen

29:33.t: Wa-lammaaa an jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim Wa-daaqa bihim zar'anw Wa-qaaloo laa takhaf Wa-laa tahzan innaa munajjooka Wa-ahlaka illam ra-ataka kaanat minal ghaabireen

29:34.t: Innaa munziloona 'alaaa ahli haazihil qaryati rijzan minas samaaa'i bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon

29:35.t: Wa-laqad taraknaa min-haaa aayatan baiyyinatan liqawmien ya'qiloon

29:36.t: Wa-ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'ayban faqaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha warjul yawmal aakhira Wa-laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

29:37.t: Fakazzaboohu fa-akhazat-humur rajfatu fa-asbahoo fee daarihim jaasimeen

29:38.t: Wa-'Aadanw Wa-Samooda Wa-qad tabaiyana lakum min masaakinihim Wa-zaiyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum 'anis sabeeli Wa-kaanoo mustabsireen

29:39.t: Wa-Qaaroona Wa-Fir'awna Wa-haamaana Wa-laqad jaaa'ahum Moosa bilbaiyinaati fastakbaroo fil ardi Wa-maa kaanoo saabiqeen

29:40.t: Fakullan akhaznaa bi-zanbihee faminhum man arsalnaa 'alaihi haasibaa; Wa-minhum man akhazat-hus saihatu Wa-minhum man khasafnaa bihil arda Wa-minhum man aghraqnaa; Wa-maa kaanal laahu li-yazlimahum Wa-laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon

29:41.t: Masalul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa'a kamasalil 'ankaboot, ittakhazat baitaa; Wa-inna awhanal buyooti la-baitul 'ankaboot; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

29:42.t: Innal laaha ya'lamu maa yad'oona min doonihee min shai'; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

29:43.t: Wa-tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi Wa-maa ya'qiluhaaa illal 'aalimoon

29:44.t: Khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; inna fee zaalika la-aayatan lil-mu'mineen

29:45.t: Utlu maaa oohiya ilaika minal Kitaabi Wa-aqimis Salaata innas Salaata tanhaa 'anil fahshaaa'i wal-munkar; Wa-lazikrul laahi akbar; wal-laahu ya'lamu maa tasna'oon

29:46.t: Wa-laa tujaadilooo Ahlal Kitaabi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu illal lazeena zalamoo minhum Wa-qoolooo aamannaa billazeee unzila ilainaa Wa-unzila ilaikum Wa-illaahunna Wa-illahukum waahidunw-wa nahnu lahoo muslimoon

29:47.t: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaab; fallazeena aatainaahumul kitaaba yu'minoona bihee Wa-min haaa'ulaaa'i many yu'minu bih; Wa-maa yajhadu bi'Aayaatinaa illal kaafiroon

29:48.t: Wa-maa kunta tatloo min qablihee min kitaabinw Wa-laa takhuttubhoo bi-yameenika izal lartaabal mubtiloon

29:49.t: Bal huwa aayaatum baiyinaatun fee sudooril lazeena ootul 'ilm; Wa-maa yajhadu bi-aayaatinaa illaz zaalimoon

29:50.t: Wa-qaaloo law-laaa unzila 'alaihi aayaatum mir Rabbihee qul innamal aayaatu 'indal laahi Wa-innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen

29:51.t: Awa-lam yakfihim annaaa anzalnaa 'alaikal kitaaba yutlaa 'alaihim; inna fee zaalika larahmatanw Wa-zikraa liqawmien yu'minoon

29:52.t: Qul kafaa billaahi bainee Wa-bainakum shaheedaa; ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal-ard; wallazeena aamanoo bil-baatili Wa-kafaroo billaahi ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

29:53.t: Wa-yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaab; Wa-law-laaa ajalum musammal lajaaa'ahumul a'zaab; Wa-la-ya'tiannahum baghta-tanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

29:54.t: Yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaab; Wa-inna Jahannama la-muheetatum bil-kaafireen

29:55.t: Yawma yaghshaahumul 'azaabu min fawqihim Wa-min tahti arjulihim Wa-yaqoolu zooqoo maa kuntum ta'maloon

29:56.t: Yaa-'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanooo inna ardee waasi-'atun fa-iyyaaya fa'budoon

29:57.t: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawti summa ilainaa turja'oon

29:58.t: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati la-nubawwi-'annahum minal Jannati ghurafan tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; ni'ma ajrul 'aamileen

29:60.t: Wa-ka-ayyim min daaabbatil laa tahmilu rizqahaa; al-laahu yarzuquhaa Wa-iyyaakum; Wa-Huwas Samee'ul Aleem

29:61.t: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-sakhkharash shamsa wal-qamara la-yaqoolunnal laahu fa-anna yu'fakoon

29:62.t: Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee Wa-yaqdiru lah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in Aleem

29:63.t: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-ahyaa bihil arda min ba'di mawtihaa la-yaqoolunnal laah; qulil hamdu lillah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon

29:64.t: Wa-maa haazihil hayaa-tud dunyaaa illaa lahwunw wa-la'ib; Wa-innad Daaral Aakhirata la-hiyal ha-yawaan; law kaano ya'lamoon

29:65.t: Fa-izaa rakiboo fil fulki da'awul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena falammaa najjaa-hum ilal barri izaa hum yushrikoon

29:66.t: Li-yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum Wa-li-yatamatta'oo fasawfa ya'lamoon

29:67.t: Awalam yaraw annaa ja'alnaa haraman aaminanw Wa-yutakhattafun naasu min haw-lihim; afabil-baatili yu'minoona Wa-bini'matil laahi yakfuroon

29:68.t: Wa-man azlamu mimma nif-taraa 'alal laahi kaziban aw kazzaba bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ah; alaisa fee jahannama maswal lil-kaafireen

29:69.t: Wallazeena jaahadoo feenaa lanahdiyannahum subulana; Wa-innal laaha lama'al muhsineen

30:3.t: Feee adnal ardi Wa-hum mim ba'di ghalabihim sa-yaghliboon

30:4.t: Fee bid'i sineen; lillaahil amru min qablu Wa-mim ba'd; Wa-yawma'izien yafrahul mu'minoon

30:5.t: Binasril laa; yansuru maien yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

30:6.t: Wa'dal laahi laa yukhliful laahu wa'dahoo Wa-laakin-na aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

30:7.t: Ya'lamoona zaahiram minal hayaatid dunya Wa-hum 'anil Aakhirati hum ghaafiloon

30:8.t: Awalam yatafakkaroo feee anfusihim; maa khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaaa illaa bil-haqqi Wa-ajalim musammaa; Wa-inna kaseeram minan naasi biliqaaa'i Rabbihim lakaafiroon

30:9.t: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; kaanooo ashadda minhhum quwwatanw Wa-asaarul arda Wa-'amaroohaaa aksara mimmaa 'amaroohaa Wa-jaaa'athum Rusuluhum bil-baiyyinaati famaa kaanal laahu liyazli-mahum Wa-laakin kaanooo anfusahum yazlimoon

30:10.t: Summa kaana 'aaqibatal lazeena asaaa'us sooo-aaa an kazzaboo bi-aayaatil laahi Wa-kaanoo bihaa yastahzi'oon

30:11.t: Allaahu yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo summa ilaihi turja'oon

30:13.t: Wa-lam yakul lahum min shurakaaa'ihim shufa'aaa'u Wa-kaanoo bishurakaaa'ihim kaafireen

30:15.t: Fa-ammal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fahum fee rawdatien yuhbaroon

30:16.t: Wa-ammal lazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-liqaaa'il Aakhirati faulaaa'ika fil 'azaabi muhdaroon

30:17.t: Fa-Subhaanal laahi heena tumsoona Wa-heena tusbihoon

30:18.t: Wa-lahul hamdu fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-'ashiyyanw Wa-heena tuzhiroon

30:19.t: Yukhrijul haiyya minal maiyyiti Wa-yukhrijul maiyyita minal haiyyi Wa-yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; Wa-kazaalika tukhrajoon

30:20.t: Wa-min Aayaatiheee an khalaqakum min turaabin summa izaaa antum basharun tantashiroon

30:21.t: Wa-min Aayaatiheee an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwaajal litaskunooo ilaihaa Wa-ja'ala bainakum mawad-datanw Wa-rahmah; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yatafakkaroon

30:22.t: Wa-min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal-aardi wakhtilaafu alsinatikum Wa-alwaanikum; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil lil'aalimeen

30:23.t: Wa-min Aayaatihee manaamukum bil-laili wannahaari wabtighaaa'ukum min fadlih; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yasma'oon

30:24.t: Wa-min Aayaatihee yureekumul barqa khawfanw Wa-tama'anw Wa-yunazzilu minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-yuhyee bihil arda ba'da mawtihaaa inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien ya'qiloon

30:25.t: Wa-min Aayaatihee an taqoomas samaaa'u wal-ardu bi-amrih; summa izaa da'aakum da'watam minal ardi izaaa antum takhrujoon

30:26.t: Wa-lahoo man fis samaawaati wal-ardi kullul lahoo qaanitoon

30:27.t: Wa-Huwal lazee yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo Wa-huwa ahwanu 'alaih; Wa-lahul masalul la'laa fis samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

30:28.t: Daraba lakum masalam min anfusikum hal lakum mimmaa malakat aymaanukum min shurakaaa'a fee maa razaqnaakum fa-antum feehi sawaaa'un takhaafoonahum kakheefa tikum anfusakum; kazaalika nufassilul Aayaati liqawminy ya'qiloon

30:29.t: Balit taba'al lazeena zalamooo ahwaaa'ahum bighairi 'ilmin famai yahdee man adallal laahu Wa-maa lahum min naasireen

30:30.t: Fa-aqim wajhaka liddeeni Haneefaa; fitratal laahil latee fataran naasa 'alaihaa; laa taabdeela likhalqil laah; zaalikad deenul qaiyimu Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

30:31.t: Muneebeena ilaihi wattaqoohu Wa-aqeemus Salaata Wa-laa takoonoo minal mushrikeen

30:32.t: Minal lazeena farraqoo deenahum Wa-kaanoo shiya'an kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim farihoon

30:33.t: Wa-izaa massan naasa durrun da'aw Rabbahum muneebeena ilaihi summa izaaa azaqahum minhu rahmatan izaa fareequm minhum bi-Rabbihim yushrikoon

30:34.t: Li-yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum; fatamatta'oo fasawfa ta'lamoon

30:35.t: Am anzalnaa 'alaihim sultaanan fahuwa yatakallamu bimaa kaanoo bihee yushrikoon

30:36.t: Wa-izaaa azaqnan naasa rahmatan farihoo bihaa Wa-in tusibhum sayyi'atum bimaa qaddamat aydeehim izaa hum yaqnatoon

30:37.t: Awalam yaraw annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yu'minoon

30:38.t: Fa-aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnassabeel; zaalika khairul lil lazeena yureedoona Wajhal laahi Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

30:39.t: Wa-maaa aataitum mir ribal li-yarbuwa feee amwaalin naasi falaa yarboo 'indal laahi Wa-maaa aataitum min zaakaatin tureedoona wajhal laahi fa-ulaaa'ika humul mud'ifoon

30:40.t: Allaahul lazee khalaqa-kum summa razaqakum summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum hal min shurakaaa'ikum maien yaf'alu min zaalikum min shai'; Sub-haanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

30:41.t: Zaharal fasaadu fil barri wal-bahri bimaa kasabat aydin naasi li-yuzeeqahum ba'dal lazee 'amiloo la'allahum yarji'oon

30:42.t: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qabl; kaana aksaruhum mushrikeen

30:43.t: Fa-aqim wajhaka lid-deenil qaiyyimi min qabli aien yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo minal laahi Yawma'izien yassadda'oon

30:44.t: Man kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo Wa-man 'amila saalihan fali-anfusihim yamhadoon

30:45.t: Li-yajziyal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati min fadlih; innahoo laa yuhibbul kaafireen

30:46.t: Wa-min Aayaatiheee aien yursilar riyaaha mubashshi-raatinw Wa-li-yuzeeqakum mir rahmatihee Wa-litajriyal fulku bi-amrihee Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

30:47.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa min qablika Rusulan ilaa qawmihim fajaaa'oohum bil-baiyyinaati fantaqamnaa minal lazeena ajramoo Wa-kaana haqqan 'alainaa nasrul mu'mineen

30:48.t: Allaahul lazee yursilur riyaaha fatuseeru sahaaban fa-yabsutuhoo fis samaaa'i kaifa yashaaa'u Wa-yaj'aluhoo kisafan fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilaalihee fa-izaaa asaaba bihee mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee izaa hum yastabshiroon

30:49.t: Wa-in kaanoo min qabli aien yunazzala 'alaihim min qablihee lamubliseen

30:50.t: Fanzur ilaaa aasaari rahmatil laahi kaifa yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; inna zaalika lamuhyil mawtaa Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

30:51.t: Wa-la'in arsalnaa reehan fara-awhu musfarral lazalloo mim ba'dihee yakfuroon

30:52.t: Fa-innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa Wa-laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa'a izaa wallaw mudbireen

30:53.t: Wa-maa anta bihaadil 'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa maien yuminu bi-aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon

30:54.t: Allahul lazee khalaqa-kum min du'fin summa ja'ala mim ba'di du'fin quwwatan summa ja'ala mim ba'di quwwatin du'fanw Wa-shaibah; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal 'Aleemul Qadeer

30:55.t: Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu yuqsimul mujrimoona maa labisoo ghaira saa'ah; kazaalika kaanoo yu'fakoon

30:56.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wal-eemaana laqad labistum fee kitaabil laahi ilaa yawmil ba'si fahaazaa yawmul ba'si Wa-laakinnakum kuntum laa ta'lamoon

30:57.t: Fa-Yawma'izil laa yanfa'ul lazeena zalamoo ma'ziratu-hum Wa-laa hum yusta'taboon

30:58.t: Wa-laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Quraani min kulli masal; Wa-la'in ji'tahum bi-aayatil la-yaqoolannal lazeena kafaroo in antum illaa mubtiloon

30:59.t: Kazaalika yatba'ul laahu 'alaa quloobil lazeena laa ya'lamoon

30:60.t: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-laa yastakhif-fannakal lazeena laa yooqinoon

31:4.t: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata Wa-yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-hum bil-Aakhirati hum yooqinoon

31:5.t: Ulaaa'ika 'alaa hudam mir Rabbihim Wa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

31:6.t: Wa-minan naasi maien yashtaree lahuwal hadeesi li-yudilla 'an sabeelil laahi bighairi 'ilminw Wa-yattakhizahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen

31:7.t: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alayhi Aayaatunaa wallaa mustakbiran ka-al lam yasma'haa ka-anna feee uzunaihi waqran fabash-shiru bi'azaabin aleem

31:8.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum Janaatun Na'eem

31:9.t: Khaalideena feeha wa'dal laahi haqqaa; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

31:10.t: Khalaqas samaawaati bi-ghairi 'amadin tarawnahaa Wa-alqaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bikum Wa-bassa feehaa min kulli daaabbah; Wa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-ambatnaa feeha min kulli zawjin kareem

31:11.t: Haazaa khalqul laahi fa-aroonee maazaa khalaqal lazeena min doonih; baliz zaalimoona fee dalalim Mubeen

31:12.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Luqmaanal hikmata anish kur lillaah; Wa-maien yashkur fa-innamaa yashkuru linafsihee Wa-man kafara fa-innal laaha Ghaniyyun Hameed

31:13.t: Wa-iz qaala luqmaanu libnihee Wa-huwa ya'izuhoo ya-bunaiya laa tushrik billaah; innash shirka lazulmun 'azeem

31:14.t: Wa-wassainal insaana bi-waalidaihi hamalat hu ummuhoo wahnan 'alaa wahninw Wa-fisaaluhoo fee 'aamaini anishkur lee Wa-liwaalidaika ilaiyal maseer

31:15.t: Wa-in jaahadaaka 'alaaa an tushrika bee maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun falaa tuti'humaa Wa-saahib-humaa fid dunyaa ma'roofanw wattabi' sabeela man anaaba ilayy; summa ilaiyya marji'ukum fa-unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

31:16.t: Ya-bunaiya innahaaa in taku misqaala habbatim min khardalin fatakun fee sakhratin aw fis samaawaati aw fil ardi yaati bihal laa; innal laaha lateefun Khabeer

31:17.t: Yaa bunaiya aqimis-Salaata waamur bilma'roofi wanha 'anil munkari wasbir 'alaa maaa asaabaka inna zaalika min 'azmil umoor

31:18.t: Wa-laa tusa'-ir khaddaka linnaasi Wa-laa tamshi fil ardi maarahan innal laaha laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhoor

31:19.t: Waqsid fee mashyika waghdud min sawtik; inna ankaral aswaati lasawtul hameer

31:20.t: Alam taraw annal laaha sakhkhara lakum maa fis sa-maawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-asbaha 'alaikum ni'amahoo zaahiratanw Wa-baatinah; Wa-minan naasi many yujaadilu fil laahi bighayri 'ilminw Wa-laa hudanw Wa-laa Kitaabim muneer

31:21.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahumut tabi'oo maaa anzalal laahu qaaloo bal nattabi'u maa wajadnaa 'alaihi aabaaa'anaa; awalaw kaanash Shaitaanu yad'oohum ilaa 'azaabis sa'eer

31:22.t: Wa-maien yuslim wajha-hooo ilal laahi Wa-huwa muhsinun faqadistamsaka bil'ur watil wusqaa; Wa-ilal laahi 'aaqibatul umoor

31:23.t: Wa-man kafara falaa yahzunka kufruh; ilainaa marji'uhum fanunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; innal laaha 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

31:24.t: Numatti'uhum qaleelan summa nadtarruhum ilaa 'azaabin ghaleez

31:25.t: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunnal laah; qulil hamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

31:26.t: Lilaahi ma fis samaa-waati wal-ard; innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed

31:27.t: Wa-law annamaa fil ardi min shajaratin aqlaamunw wal-bahru yamudduhoo mim ba'dihee sab'atu abhurim maa nafidat Kalimaatul laah; innal laaha 'azeezun Hakeem

31:28.t: Maa khalqukum Wa-laa ba'sukum illaa kanafsinw-waa hidah; innal laaha Samee'um Baseer

31:29.t: Alam tara annal laaha yoolijul laila fin nahaari Wa-yoolijun nahaara fil laili Wa-sakhkharash shamsa wal-qamara kulluny yajreee ilaaa ajalim musammanw Wa-annal laaha bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer

31:30.t: Zaalika bi-annal laaha Huwal Haqqu Wa-anna maa yad'oona min doonihil baatilu Wa-annal laaha Huwal 'Aliyyul Kabeer

31:31.t: Alam tara annal fulka tajree fil bahri bini'matil laahi li-yuriyakum min Aayaatih; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

31:32.t: Wa-izaa ghashiyahum mawjun kazzulali da'a-wul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena fa-lammaa najjaahum ilal barri faminhum muqtasid; Wa-maa yajhadu bi-Aayaatinaa illaa kullu khattaarin kafoor

31:33.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasut taqoo Rabbakum wakhshaw Yawmal laa yajzee waalidun 'anw waladihee Wa-laa mawloodun huwa jaazin 'anw waalidihee shai'aa; innaa wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurran-nakumul hayaatud dunyaa Wa-laa yaghur-rannakum billaahil gharoor

31:34.t: Innal laaha 'indahoo 'ilmus saa'ati Wa-yunazzilul ghaisa Wa-ya'lamu maa fil arhaami Wa-maa tadree nafsum maazaa taksibu ghadaa; Wa-maa tadree nafsum bi-ayyi ardin tamoot; innal laaha 'Aleemun Khabeer

32:2.t: Tanzeelul Kitaabi laa raiba feehi mir rabbil 'aalameen

32:3.t: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu bal huwal haqqu mir rabbika litunzira qawma maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yahtadoon

32:4.t: Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaamin thummas tawaa 'alal 'arsh; maa lakum min doonihee minw waliyyinw wala shafee'; afalaa tatazakkaroon

32:5.t: Yudabbirul amra minas samaaa'i ilal ardi thumma ya'ruju ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhooo alfa sanatim mimmaa ta'uddoon

32:7.t: Allazee ahsana kulla shai-in khalaqa; Wa-bada-a khalqal insaani min teen

32:8.t: Thumma ja'ala naslahoo min sulaalatim mim maaa'im maheen

32:9.t: Thumma sawwaahu Wa-nafakha feehi mir roohihih; Wa-ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idah; qaleelam maa tashkuroon

32:10.t: Wa-qaalooo 'a-izaa dalalnaa fil ardi 'a-innaa lafee khalqin jadeed; bal hum biliqaaa'i rabbihim kaafiroon

32:11.t: Qul yatawaffaakum malakul mawtil lazee wukkila bikum Thumma ilaa rabbikum turja'oon

32:12.t: Wa-law taraaa izil mujrimoona naakisoo ru'oosihim 'inda rabbihim rabbanaaa absarnaa Wa-sami'naa farji'naa na'mal saalihan innaa mooqinoon

32:13.t: Wa-law shi'naa la-aatainaa kulla nafsin hudaahaa Wa-laakin haqqal qawlu minnee la-amla'anna jahannama minal jinnati wannaasi ajma'een

32:14.t: Fazooqoo bimaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawminkum haaza innaa naseenaakum Wa-zooqoo 'azaabal khuldi bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

32:15.t: Innamaa yu'minu bi-aayaatinal lazeena izaa zukkiroo bihaa kharroo sujjadanw Wa-sabbahoo bihamdi rabbihim Wa-hum laa yastakbiroon

32:16.t: Tatajaafaa junoobuhum 'anil madaaji'i yad'oona rabbahum khawfanw Wa-tama'anw Wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

32:17.t: Falaa ta'lamu nafsum maaa ukhfiya lahum min qurrati a'yunin jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

32:18.t: Afaman kaana mu'minan kaman kaana faasiqaa; laa yasta-woon

32:19.t: Ammal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati falahum jannaatul ma'waa nuzulam bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

32:20.t: Wa-ammal lazeena fasaqoo fama'waahumun Naaru kullamaaa araadooo any yakhrujoo minhaaa u'eedoo feehaa Wa-qeela lahum zooqoo 'azaaaban Naaril lazee kuntum bihee tukazziboon

32:21.t: Wa-lanuzeeqan-nahum minal 'azaabil ladnaa doonal 'azaabil akbari la'allahum yarji'oon

32:22.t: Wa-man azlamu mimman zukkira bi-aayaati rabbihee summa a'rada 'anhaa; innaa minal mujrimeena muntaqimoon

32:23.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba falaa takun fee miryatim mil liqaaa'ihee Wa-ja'alnaahu hudal li-Baneee Israaa'eel

32:24.t: Wa-ja'alnaa minhum a'immataien yahdoona bi-amrinaa lammaa sabaroo Wa-kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa yooqinoon

32:25.t: Inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu bainahum yawmal qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

32:26.t: Awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa min qablihim minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la-aayaatin afalaa yasma'oon

32:27.t: Awalam yaraw annaa nasooqul maaa'a ilal ardil juruzi fanukhriju bihee zar'an ta'kulu minhu an'aamuhum Wa-anfusuhum afalaa yubsiroon

32:28.t: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal fath-hu in kuntum saadiqeen

32:29.t: Qul yawmal fath-hi laa yanfa'ul lazeena kafarooo eemaanuhum Wa-laa hum yunzaroon

33:1.t: Yaa-aiyuhan Nabiyyut taqil laaha Wa-laa tuti'il kaafireena wal-munaafiqeen; innal laaha kaana 'aleeman Hakeemaa

33:2.t: Wattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika mir Rabbik; innal laaha kaana bimaa ta'maloona Khabeera

33:4.t: Maa ja'alal laahu lirajulim min qalbaini fee jawfih; Wa-maa ja'ala azwaajakumul laaa'ee tuzaahiroona minhunna ummahaatikum; Wa-maa ja'ala ad'iyaaa'akum abnaaa'akum; zaalikum qawlukum bi-afwaa-hikum wallaahu yaqoolul haqqa Wa-Huwa yahdis sabeel

33:5.t: Ud'oohum li-aabaaa'ihim huwa aqsatu 'indal laah; fa-il lam ta'lamooo aabaaa'ahum fa-ikhwaanukum fid deeni Wa-mawaaleekum; Wa-laisa 'alaikum junaahun feemaaa akhtaatum bihee Wa-laakim maa ta'ammadat quloobukum; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

33:6.t: An-Nabiyyu awlaa bil-mu'mineena min anfusihim Wa-azwaajuhoo ummahatuhum Wa-ulul arhaami ba'duhum awlaa biba'din fee Kitaabil laahi minal mu'meneena wal-Muhaajireena illaaa an taf'alooo ilaaa awliyaaa'ikum ma'roofaa; kaana zaalika fil kitaabi mastooraa

33:7.t: Wa-iz akhaznaa minan Nabiyyeena meesaaqahum Wa-minka Wa-min Noohinw Wa-Ibraaheema Wa-Moosaa Wa-Eesab ni Maryama Wa-akhaznaa minhum meesaaqan ghaleezaa

33:8.t: Liyas'alas saadiqeena 'an sidqihim; Wa-a'adda lilkaa-fireena 'azaaban aleemaa

33:9.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanuz kuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz jaaa'atkum junoodun fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim reehanw Wa-junoodal lam tarawhaa; Wa-kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseera

33:10.t: Iz jaaa'ookum min fawqikum Wa-min asfala minkum Wa-iz zaaghatil absaaru Wa-balaghatil quloobul hanaajira Wa-tazunnoona billaahiz zunoonaa

33:11.t: Hunaalikab tuliyal mu'minoona Wa-zulziloo zilzaalan shadeedaa

33:12.t: Wa-iz yaqoolul munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradum maa wa'adanal laahu Wa-Rasooluhooo illaa ghurooraa

33:13.t: Wa-iz qaalat taaa'ifatum minhum yaaa-ahla Yasriba laa muqaamaa lakum farji'oo; Wa-yastaazinu fareequm minhumun Nabiyya yaqooloona inna buyootanaa 'awrah; Wa-maa hiya bi'awratin iny yureedoona illaa firaaraa

33:14.t: wa-law dukhilat 'alaihim min aqtaarihaa summa su'ilul fitnata la-aatawhaa Wa-maa talabbasoo bihaaa illaa yaseeraa

33:15.t: Wa-laqad kaanoo 'aahadul laaha min qablu laa yuwal-loonal adbaar; Wa-kaana 'ahdul laahi mas'oolaa

33:16.t: Qul laien yanfa'akumul firaaru in farartum minal mawti awil qatli Wa-izal laa tumatta'oona illaa qaleelaa

33:17.t: Qul man zal lazee ya'simukum minal laahi in araada bikum sooo'an aw araada bikum rahmah; Wa-laa yajidoona lahum min doonil laahi waliyyanw Wa-laa naseeraa

33:18.t: Qad ya'lamul laahul mu'awwiqeena minkum walqaaa'ileena li-ikhwaanihim halumma ilainaa, Wa-laa yaatoonal baasa illaa qaleelaa

33:19.t: Ashihhatan 'alaikum faizaa jaaa'al khawfu ra-aytahum yanzuroona ilaika tadooru a'yunuhum kallazee yughshaa 'alaihi minal mawti fa-izaa zahabal khawfu salqookum bi-alsinatin hidaadin ashibbatan 'alal khayr; ulaaa'ika lam yu'minoo fa-ahbatal laahu a'maalahum; Wa-kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseeraa

33:20.t: Yahsaboonal Ahzaaba lam yazhaboo Wa-ien yaatil Ahzaabu yawaddoo law annahum baadoona fil A'raabi yasaloona 'an ambaaa'ikum Wa-law kaanoo feekum maa qaatalooo illaa qaleela

33:21.t: Laqad kaana lakum fee Rasoolil laahi uswatun hasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal-yawmal Aakhira Wa-azkaral laaha kaseeraa

33:22.t: Wa-lammaa ra al-mu'minoonal Ahzaaba qaaloo haazaa maa wa'adanal laahu Wa-Rasooluh; Wa-sadaqal laahu Wa-Rasooluh; Wa-maa zaadahum illaaa eemaananw Wa-tasleemaa

33:23.t: Minal mu'mineena rijaalun sadaqoo maa 'aahadul laaha 'alaihi faminhum man qadaa nahbahoo Wa-minhum mai yantaziru Wa-maa baddaloo tabdeelaa

33:24.t: Li-yajziyal aahus saadiqeena bisidqihim Wa-yu'azzibal munaafiqeena in shaaa'a aw yatooba 'alaihim; innal laaha kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa

33:25.t: Wa-raddal laahul lazeena kafaroo bighaizihim lam yanaaloo khairaa; Wa-kafal laahul mu'mineenal qitaal; Wa-kaanal laahu Qawiyyan 'Azeezaa

33:26.t: Wa-anzalal lazeena zaaha-roohum min Ahlil Kitaabi min sa-yaaseehim Wa-qazafa fee quloobihimm mur-ru'ba fareeqan taqtuloona Wa-taasiroona fareeqaaa

33:27.t: Wa-awrasakum ardahum Wa-diyaarahum Wa-amwaalahum Wa-ardal lam tata'oohaa; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeeraa

33:28.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu qul li-azwaajika in kuntunna turidnal hayaatad dunyaa Wa-zeenatahaa fata'aalaina umatti'kunna Wa-usarrihkunna saraahan jameela

33:29.t: Wa-in kuntunna turidnal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo wad-Daaral Aakhirata fa-innal laaha a'adda lil-muhsinaati min-kunna ajjran 'azeemaa

33:30.t: Yaa-nisaaa'an Nabiyyi maien yaati minkunna bifaa-hishatim mubaiyyinatien yudaa'af lahal 'azaabu di'faini Wa-kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseera

33:31.t: Wa-maien yaqnut minkunna lillaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-ta'mal saalihan nu'tihaaa ajrahaa marratayni Wa-a'tadnaa lahaa rizqan kareema

33:32.t: Yaa-nisaaa'an Nabiyyi lastunna ka-ahadim minan nisaaa'i init taqaitunna falaa takhda'na bilqawli fa-yatma'al lazee fee qalbihee maradunw Wa-qulna qawlam ma'roofaa

33:33.t: Wa-qarna fee bu-yoo-tikunna Wa-laa tabarrajna tabarrujal Jaahiliyyatil oolaa Wa-aqimnas Salaata Wa-aaateenaz Zakaata Wa-ati'nal laaha Wa-Rasoolah; innamaa yureedul laahu liyuzhiba 'ankumur rijsa Ahlal Bayti Wa-yutahhirakum tatheeraa

33:34.t: Wazkurna maa yutlaa fee bu-yootikunna min aayaatil laahi wal-Hikmah; innal laaha kaana lateefan Khabeera

33:35.t: Innal muslimeena wal-muslimaati wal-mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati walqaaniteena walqaanitaati wassaadiqeena wassaadiqaati wassaabireena wassaabiraati walkhaashi'eena walkhaashi'aati walmutasaddiqeena walmutasaddiqaati wassaaa'imeena wassaaa'imaati walhaafizeena furoojahum walhaafizaati waz-zaakireenal laaha kaseeranw waz-zaakiraati a'addal laahu lahum maghfiratanw Wa-ajran 'azeemaa

33:36.t: Wa-maa kaana limu'mininw Wa-laa mu'minatin izaa qadal laahu Wa-Rasooluhooo amran aien yakoona lahumul khiyaratu min amrihim; Wa-maien ya'sil laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo faqad dalla dalaalam mubeenaa

33:37.t: Wa-iz taqoolu lillazeee an'amal laahu 'alaihi Wa-an'amta 'alaihi amsik 'alaika zawjaka wattaqil laaha Wa-tukhfee fee nafsika mal laahu mubdeehi Wa-takhshan naasa wallaahu ahaqqu an takhshaah; falammaa qadaa Zaidum minhaa wataran zawwajnaa-kahaa likay laa yakoona 'alal mu'mineena harajun feee azwaaji ad'iyaaa'ihim izaa qadaw minhunna wataraa; Wa-kaana amrul laahi maf'oolaa

33:38.t: Maa kaana 'alan nabiyyyi min harajin feemaa faradal laahu lahoo sunnatal laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qabl; Wa-kaana amrul laahi qadaram maqdooraa

33:39.t: Allazeena yuballighoona Risaalaatil laahi Wa-yakhshaw-nahoo Wa-laa yakkhshawna ahadan illal laah; Wa-kafaa billaahi Haseebaa

33:40.t: Maa kaana Muhammmadun abaaa ahadim mir rijaalikum Wa-laakir Rasoolal laahi Wa-Khaataman Nabiyyeen; Wa-kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleema

33:41.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanuz kurul laaha zikran kaseera

33:43.t: Huwal lazee yusallee 'alaikum Wa-malaaa'ikatuhoo liyukhrijakum minaz zulumaati ilan noor Wa-kaana bilmu'mineena Raheemaa

33:44.t: Tahiyyatuhum Yawma yalqawnahoo salaamunw Wa-a'adda lahum ajran kareemaa

33:45.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa arsalnaaka shaahidanw Wa-mubashshiranw Wa-nazeeraa

33:46.t: Wa-daa'iyan ilal laahi bi-iznihee Wa-siraajam muneeraa

33:47.t: Wa-bashshiril mu'mineena bi-annna lahum minal laahi fadlan kabeera

33:48.t: Wa-laa tuti'il kaafireena walmunaafiqeena Wa-da 'azaahum Wa-tawakkal 'alal laah; Wa-kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa

33:49.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa nakahtumul mu'minaati summa tallaqtu-moohunna min qabli an tamas-soohunna famaa lakum 'alaihinna min 'iddatin ta'taddoonahaa famatti'oohunna Wa-sarri-hoohunna saraahan jameelaa

33:50.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa ahlalnaa laka azwaa-jakal laatee aataiyta ujoora-hunna Wa-maa malakat yameenuka mimmaaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaika Wa-banaati 'ammika Wa-banaati 'ammaatika Wa-banaati khaalika Wa-banaati khaalaa-tikal laatee haajarna ma'aka wamra'-atan mu'minatan inw wahabat nafsahaa lin-Nabiyyi in araadan Nabiyyu aien yastan-kihahaa khaalisatan laka min doonil mu'mineen; qad 'alimnaa maa faradnaa 'alaihim feee azwaajihim Wa-maa malakat aimaanuhum li-kailaa yakoona 'alaika haraj; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheema

33:51.t: Turjee man tashaaa'u minhunna Wa-tu'weee ilaika man tashaaa'u Wa-manib ta-ghaita mimman 'azalta falaa junaaha 'alaik; zaalika adnaaa an taqarra a'yunuhunna Wa-laa yahzanna Wa-yardaina bimaa aataitahunna kulluhunn; wal-laahu ya'lamu maa fee quloo-bikum; Wa-kaanal laahu 'Aleeman haleemaa

33:52.t: Laa yahillu lakan nisaaa'u mim ba'du Wa-laaa an tabaddala bihinna min azwaajinw Wa-law ajabaka husnuhunna illaa maa malakat yameenukk; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'ir Raqeeba

33:53.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo bu-yootan Nabiyyi ilaaa aien yu'zana lakum ilaa ta'aamin ghaira naazireena inaahu Wa-laakin izaa du'eetum fadkhuloo fa-izaa ta'imtum fantashiroo Wa-laa mustaaniseena lihadees; inna zaalikum kaana yu'zin Nabiyya fa-yastahyee minkum wallaahu laa yastahyee minal haqq; Wa-izaa sa-altumoohunna mataa'an fas'aloohunna minw waraaa'i hijaab; zaalikum atharu liquloobikum Wa-quloobihinn; Wa-maa kaana lakum an tu'zoo Rasoolal laahi Wa-laaa an tankihooo azwaajahoo mim ba'diheee abadaa; inna zaalikum kaana 'indal laahi 'azeema

33:54.t: In tubdoo shai'an aw tukhfoohu fa-innal laaha kaana bikulli shai'in 'Aleemaa

33:55.t: Laa junaaha 'alaihinna feee aabaaa'ihinna Wa-laaa abnaaa'ihinna Wa-laaa ikhwaanihinnna Wa-laaa abnaaa'i ikhwaanihinna Wa-laaa abnaaa'i akhawaatihinna Wa-laa nisaaa'i-hinna Wa-laa Maa malakat aimaanuhunn; wattaqeenal laah; innal laaha kaana 'alaa kulli shai'in Shaheedaa

33:56.t: Innal laaha Wa-malaaa'i-katahoo yusalloona 'alan Nabiyy; yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo salloo 'alaihi Wa-sallimoo tasleemaa

33:57.t: Innal lazeena yu'zoonal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo la'anahumul laahu fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-a'adda lahum 'azaabam muheenaa

33:58.t: Wallazeena yu'zoonal mu'mineena almu'manaati bighairi mak tasaboo faqadih tamaloo buhtaananw Wa-ismam mubeenaa

33:59.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu qul li-azwaajika Wa-banaatika Wa-nisaaa'il mu'mineena yudneena 'alaihinna min jalaabee-bihinn; zaalika adnaaa aien yu'rafna falaa yu'zain; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

33:60.t: La'il lam yantahil munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradunw walmur-jifoona fil madeenati lanughri-yannaka bihim summa laa yujaawiroonaka feehaaa illaa qaleela

33:61.t: Mal'ooneena ainamaa suqifoo ukhizoo Wa-quttiloo taqteelaa

33:62.t: Sunnatal laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qablu Wa-lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelaa

33:63.t: Yas'alukan naasu 'anis Saa'ati qul innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'indal laah; Wa-maa yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata takoonu qareebaa

33:64.t: Innal laaha la'anal kaafireena Wa-a'adda lahum sa'eeraa

33:65.t: Khaalideena feehaaa abadaa, laa yajidoona waliyyanw Wa-laa naseeraa

33:66.t: Yawma tuqallabu wujoohuhum fin Naari yaqooloona yaa-laitanaaa ata'nal laaha Wa-ata'nar Rasoolaa

33:67.t: Wa-qaaloo Rabbanaaa innaaa ata'naa saadatanaa Wa-kubaraaa'anaa fa-adalloonas sabeelaa

33:68.t: Rabbanaaa aatihim di'fai-ni minal 'azaabi wal'anhum la-nan kabeera

33:69.t: yaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo las takoonoo kalla-zeena aazaw Moosaa fa-barra-ahul laahu mimmmaa qaaloo; Wa-kaana 'indal laahi wajeehaa

33:70.t: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha Wa-qooloo qawlan sadeedaa

33:71.t: Yuslih lakum a'maalakum Wa-yaghfir lakum zunoobakum; Wa-mai yuti'il laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo faqad faaza fawzan 'azeemaa

33:72.t: Innaa 'aradnal amaanata 'alas samaawaati walardi wal-jibaali fa-abaina aien yahmil-nahaa Wa-ashfaqna minhaa Wa-hamalahal insaanu innahoo kaana zalooman jahoolaa

33:73.t: Liyu-'azzibal laahul munaafiqeena wal-munaafiqaati walmushrikeena wal-mushrikaati Wa-yatoobal laahu 'alal mu'mineena walmu'minaat; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheema

34:1.t: Alhamdu lillaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-lahul hamdu fil aakhirah; Wa-Huwal Hakeemul Khabeer

34:2.t: Ya'lamu maa yaliju fil ardi Wa-maa yakhruju minhaa Wa-maa yanzilu minas samaaa'i Wa-maa ya'ruju feehaa; Wa-Huwar Raheemul Ghafoor

34:3.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa taateenas Saa'ah; qul balaa Wa-Rabbee lataatiyannakum 'Aalimul Ghaib; laa ya'zubu 'anhu misqaalu zarratin fis samaawaati Wa-laa fil ardi Wa-laaa asgharu min zaalika Wa-laaa akbaru illaa fee kitaabim mubeen

34:4.t: Liyajziyal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaat; ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw Wa-rizqun kareem

34:5.t: Wallazeena sa'aw feee aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa-'ika lahum 'azaabum mir rijzin aleem

34:6.t: Wa-yaral lazeena ootul 'ilmal lazeee unzila ilaika mir Rabbika huwal haqqa Wa-yahdeee ilaaa siraatil 'Azeezil Hameed

34:7.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo hal nadullukum 'alaa rajuliny yanabbi-'ukum izaa muzziqtum kulla mumazzaqin innakum lafee khalqin jadeed

34:8.t: Aftaraa 'alal laahi kaziban am bihee jinnah; balil lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati fil'azaabi wad dalaalil ba'eed

34:9.t: Afalam yaraw ilaa maa baina aydeehim Wa-maa khalfahum minas samaaa'i wal-ard; in nashad nakhsif bihimul arda aw nusqit 'alaihim kisafam minas samaaa'; inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal likulli 'abdim muneeb

34:10.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Daawooda minnaa fadlaien yaa-jibaalu awwibee ma'ahoo wattaira Wa-alannaa lahul hadeed

34:11.t: Ani 'mal saabighaatinw Wa-qaddir fis sardi wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

34:12.t: Wa-li-Sulaimaanar reeha ghuduwwuhaa shahrunw Wa-ra-waahuhaa shahrunw Wa-asalnaa lahoo 'ainal qitr; Wa-minal jinni maien ya'malu baina yadaihi bi-izni Rabbih; Wa-maien yazigh minhum 'an amrinaa nuziqhu min 'azaabis sa'eer

34:13.t: Ya'maloona lahoo ma yashaaa'u mim mahaareeba Wa-tamaaseela Wa-jifaanin kaljawaabi Wa-qudoorir raasiyaat; i'maloo aala Daawooda shukraa; Wa-qaleelum min 'ibaadiyash shakoor

34:14.t: Falammaa qadainaa 'alaihil mawta ma dallahum 'alaa mawtiheee illaa daaabbatul ardi taakulu minsa-atahoo falammaa kharra tabaiyyanatil jinnu al law kaanoo ya'lamoonal ghaiba maa labisoo fil 'azaabil muheen

34:15.t: Laqad kaana li-Saba-in fee maskanihim Aayatun jannataani 'aien yameeninw Wa-shimaalin kuloo mir rizq Rabbikum washkuroo lah; baldatun taiyyibatunw Wa-Rabbun Ghafoor

34:16.t: Fa-a'radoo fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim Sailal 'Arimi Wa-baddalnaahum bijannataihim jannataini zawaatai ukulin khamtinw Wa-aslinw Wa-shai'im min sidrin qaleel

34:17.t: Zaalika jazainaahum bimaa kafaroo Wa-hal nujaazeee illal kafoor

34:18.t: Wa-ja'alnaa bainahum Wa-bainal qural latee baaraknaa feehaa quran zaahiratanw Wa-qaddamaa feehas sayr; seeroo feehaa la-yaalirya Wa-aiyaaman aamineen

34:19.t: Faqaaloo Rabbanaa baa'id baina asfaarinaa Wa-zalamooo anfusahum faja'alnaahum ahaadeesa Wa-mazzaq-naahum kulla mumazzaq; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

34:20.t: Wa-laqad saddaq 'alaihim Ibleesu zannnabhoo fattaba'oohu illaa fareeqam minal mu'mineen

34:21.t: Wa-maa kaana lahoo 'alaihim min sultaanin illaa lina'lama maien yu-minu bil-Aakhirati mimman huwa minhaa fee shakk; Wa-Rabbuka 'alaa kulli shai'in Hafeez

34:22.t: Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona misqaala zarratin fis samaawaati Wa-laa fil ardi Wa-maa lahum feehimaa min shirkinw Wa-maa lahoo minhum min zaheer

34:23.t: Wa-laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu 'indahooo illaa liman azina lah; hattaaa izaa fuzzi'a 'an quloobihim qaaloo maazaa qaala Rabbukum; qaalul haqq, Wa-Huwal 'Aliyul Kabeer

34:24.t: Qul maien yarzuqukum minas samaawaati wal-ardi qulil laahu Wa-innaaa aw iyyaakum la'alaa hudan aw fee dalaalim mubeen

34:25.t: Qul laa tus'aloona 'ammaaa ajramnaa Wa-laa nus'alu 'ammaa ta'maloon

34:26.t: Qul yajma'u bainanaa Rabbunaa summa yaftahu bainanaa bilhaqq; Wa-Huwal Fattaahul 'Aleem

34:27.t: Qul arooniyal lazeena alhaqtum bihee shurakaaa'a kallaa; bal Huwal Laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem

34:28.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaaka illaa kaaffatal linnaasi basheeranw Wa-nazeeranw Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

34:29.t: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

34:30.t: Qul lakum mee'aadu Yawmil laa tasta'khiroona 'anhu saa'atanw Wa-laa tastaqdimoon

34:31.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo lan nu'mina bihaazal Quraani Wa-laa billazee baina yadayh; Wa-law taraaa iziz zaalimoona mawqoofoona 'inda Rabbihim yarji'u ba'duhum ilaa ba'dinil qawla yaqoolul lazeenas tud'ifoo lillazeenas takbaroo law-laaa antum lakunnaa mu'mineen

34:32.t: Qaalal lazeenas takbaroo lillazeenas tud'ifooo anahnu sadadnaakum 'anil hudaa ba'da iz jaaa'akum bal kuntum mujrimeen

34:33.t: Wa-qaalal lazeenastud'ifoo lillazeenas takbaroo bal makrul laili wannahaari iz ta'muroonanaaaa an nakfura billaahi Wa-naj'ala lahooo andaadaa; Wa-asarrun nadaamata lammaa ra awul 'azaab; Wa-ja'alnal aghlaala feee a'naaqil lazeena kafaroo; hal yujzawna illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon

34:34.t: Wa-maaa arsalnaa' fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafooaa innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon

34:35.t: Wa-qaaloo nahnu aksaru amwaalanw Wa-awlaadanw Wa-maa nahnu bimu-'azzabeen

34:36.t: Qul inna Rabbee yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdiru Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

34:37.t: Wa-maaa amwaalukum Wa-laaa awlaadukum billatee tuqarribukum 'indanaa zulfaaa illaa man aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika lahum jazaaa'ud di'fi bimaa 'amiloo Wa-hum fil ghurufaati aaminoon

34:38.t: Wallazeena yas'awna feee Aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa'ika fil 'azaabi muhdaroon

34:39.t: Qul inna Rabbee yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee Wa-yaqdiru lah; Wa-maaa anfaqtum min shai'in fahuwa yukhlifuhoo Wa-Huwa khairur raaziqeen

34:40.t: Wa-yawma yahshuruhum jamee'an summa yaqoolu lilmalaaa'ikati a-haaa'ulaaa'i iyyaakum kaanoo ya'budoon

34:41.t: Qaaloo Subhaanaka Anta waliyyunaa min doonihim bal kaanoo ya'budoonal jinna aksaruhum bihim mu'minoon

34:42.t: Fal-Yawma laa yamliku ba'dukum liba'din naf'anw Wa-laa darraa; Wa-naqoolu lil-lazeena zalamoo zooqoo 'azaaban Naaril latee kuntum bihaa tukazziboon

34:43.t: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaa illaa rajuluien yureedu aien yasuddakum 'ammaa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'ukum Wa-qaaloo maa haazaaa illaaa ifkum muftaraa; Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum in haazaaa illaa sihrum mubeen

34:44.t: Wa-maaa aatainaahum min Kutubiny yadrusoonahaa Wa-maaa arsalnaaa ilaihim qablaka min nazeer

34:45.t: Wa-kazzabal lazeena min qablihim Wa-maa balaghoo mi'shaara maaa aatainaahum fakazzaboo Rusulee; fakaifa kaana nakeer

34:46.t: Qul innamaaa a'izukum biwaahidatin an taqoomoo lillaahi masnaa Wa-furaadaa summa tatafakkaroo; maa bisaahibikum min jinnah; in huwa illaa nazeerul lakum baina yadai 'azaabin shadeed

34:47.t: Qul maa sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum in ajriya illaa 'alal laahi Wa-Huwa 'alaa kullin shai-in Shaheed

34:48.t: Qul inna Rabbee yaqzifu bilhaqq 'Allaamul Ghuyoob

34:49.t: Qul jaaa'al haqqu Wa-maa yubdi'ul baatilu Wa-maa yu'eed

34:50.t: Qul in dalaltu fainnamaaa adillu 'alaa nafsee Wa-inih tadaitu fabimaa yoohee ilaiyya Rabbee; innahoo Samee'un Qareeb

34:51.t: Wa-law taraaa iz fazi'oo falaa fawta Wa-ukhizoo mim makaanin qareeb

34:52.t: Wa-qaaloo aamannaa bihee Wa-annaa lahumut tanaawushu min makaanin ba'eed

34:53.t: Wa-qad kafaroo bihee min qablu Wa-yaqzifoona bilghaibi min makaanin ba'eed

34:54.t: Wa-heela bainahum Wa-baina maa yashtahoona kamaa fu'ila bi-ashyaa'ihim min qabl; innahum kaanoo fee shakkin mureeb
