35:1.t: Alhamdu lillaahi faatiris samaawaati wal-ardi jaa'ilil malaaa'ikati rusulan uleee ajnihatim masnaa Wa-sulaasa Wa-rubaa'; yazeedu fil khalqi maa yashaaa'; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

35:2.t: Maa yaftahil laahu linnaaasi mir rahmatin falaa mumsika lahaa Wa-maa yumsik falaa mursila lahoo mim ba'dihi; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

35:3.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasuzkuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum; hal min khaaliqin ghairul laahi yarzuqukum minas samaaa'i wal ard; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa-annaa tu'fakoon

35:4.t: Wa-ien yukazzibooka faqad kuzzibat Rusulum min qablik; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

35:5.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu inna wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurrannakumul hayaatud dunyaa; Wa-laa yaghurran-nakum billaahil gharoor

35:6.t: Innash shaitaana lakum 'aduwwun fattakhizoohu 'aduwwaa; innamaa yad'oo hizbahoo liyakoonoo min ashaabis sa'eer

35:7.t: Allazeena kafaroo lahum 'azaabun shadeed; wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw Wa-ajrun kabeer

35:8.t: Afaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee fara-aahu hasanaa; fa-innal laaha yudillu mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdee mai yashaaa'u falaa tazhab nafsuka 'alaihim hasaraat; innal laaha 'aleemun bimaa yasna'oon

35:9.t: Wallaahul lazeee arsalar riyaaha fatuseeru sa-haaban fasuqnaahu ilaa baladim maiyitin fa-ahyaynaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa; kazaalikan nushoor

35:10.t: Man kaana yureedul 'izzata falillaahil 'izzatu jamee'aa; ilaihi yas'adul kalimut taiyibu wal'amalus saalihu yarfa'uh; wallazeena yamkuroonas sayyiaati lahum 'azaabun shadeed; Wa-makru ulaaa'ika huwa yaboor

35:11.t: Wallaahu khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa ja'alakum azwaajaa; Wa-maa tahmilu min unsaa Wa-laa tada'u illaa bi'ilmih; Wa-maa yu'ammaru mim mu'ammarinw Wa-laa yunqasu min 'umuriheee illaa fee kitaab; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

35:12.t: Wa-maa yastawil bahraani haaza 'azbun furaatun saaa'ighun sharaabuhoo Wa-haazaa milhun ujaaj; Wa-min kullin ta'kuloona lahman tariyyanw Wa-tastakhrijoona hilyatan talbasoonahaa Wa-taral fulka feehi mawaakhira litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

35:13.t: Yoolijul laila fin nahaari Wa-yoolijun nahaara fil laili Wa-sakhkharash shamsa wal-qamara kulluien yajree li-ajalim musammaa; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum lahul mulk; wallazeena tad'oona min doonihee maa yamlikoona min qitmeer

35:14.t: In tad'oohum laa yasma'oo du'aaa'akum Wa-law sami'oo mas tajaaboo lakum; Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati Yakfuroona bishirkikum; Wa-laa yunabbi'uka mislu khabeer

35:15.t: Yaaa-ayyunhan naasu antumul fuqaraaa'u ilal laahi wallaahu Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed

35:16.t: Ien yasha' yuzhibkum Wa-ya'ti bikhalqin jadeed

35:18.t: Wa-laa taziru waaziratun wizra ukhraa; Wa-in tad'u musqalatun ilaa himlihaa laa yuhmal minhu shai'unw Wa-law kaana zaa qurbaa; innamaa tunzirul lazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi Wa-aqaamus Salaah; Wa-man tazakkaa fa-innamaa yatazakkaa linafsih; Wa-ilal laahil maseer

35:22.t: Wa-maa yastawil ahyaaa'u Wa-lal amwaat; innal laaha yusmi'u maien yashaaa'u Wa-maaa anta bi-musmi'im man fil quboor

35:24.t: Innaa arsalnaaka bil-haqqi basheeranw Wa-nazeeraa; Wa-im min ummatin illaa khalaa feehaa nazeer

35:25.t: Wa-ien yukazzibooka faqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim jaaa'at-hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyyinaati Wa-biz-Zuburi Wa-bil-Kitaabil Muneer

35:26.t: Summa akhaztul lazeena kafaroo fakaifa kaana nakeer

35:27.t: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-akhrajnaa bihee samaraatim mukhtalifan alwaanuhaa; Wa-minal jibaali judadum beedunw Wa-humrum mukhtalifun alwaanuhaa Wa-gharaabeebu sood

35:28.t: Wa-minan naasi wadda-waaabbi wal-an'aami mukhtalifun alwaanuhoo kazalik; innamaa yakhshal laaha min 'ibaadihil 'ulamaaa'; innal laaha 'Azeezun Ghafoor

35:29.t: Innal lazeena yatloona Kitabbal laahi Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw Wa-'alaa-niyataien yarjoona tijaaratal lan taboor

35:30.t: Liyuwaffiyahum ujoorahum Wa-yazeedahum min fadlih; innahoo Ghafoorun Shakoor

35:31.t: Wallazeee awhainaaa ilaika minal Kitaabi huwal haqqu musaddiqal limaa baina yadayh; innal laaha bi'ibaadihee la-khabeerum Baseer

35:32.t: Summa awrasnal Kitaabal lazeenas tafainaa min 'ibaadinaa faminhum zaalimul linafsihee Wa-minhum muqtasidu, Wa-minhum saabiqum bilkhairaati bi-iznil laah; zaalika huwal fadlul kabeer

35:33.t: Jannaatu 'adnien yad-khuloonahaa yuhallawna feeha min asaawira min zahabinw Wa-lu'lu'anw Wa-libaa-suhum feehaa hareer

35:34.t: Wa-qaalul hamdu lillaahil lazeee azhaba 'annal hazan; inna Rabbanaa la-Ghafoorun Shakoor

35:35.t: Allazeee ahallanaa daaral muqaamati min fadlihee laa yamassunaa feehaa nasabunw Wa-laa yamassunaa feehaa lughoob

35:36.t: Wallazeena kafaroo lahum naaru Jahannama laa yuqdaa 'alaihim fa-yamootoo Wa-laa yukhaffafu 'anhum min 'azaabihaa; kazaalika najzee kulla kafoor

35:37.t: Wa-hum yastarikhoona feehaa Rabbanaa akhrijnaa na'mal saalihan ghairal lazee kunnaa na'mal; awa-lamnu 'ammirkum maa yatazak-karu feehi man tazakkara Wa-jaaa'akumun nazeeru fazooqoo famaa lizzaalimeena min naseer

35:38.t: Innal laaha 'aalimu ghaibis samaawaati wal-ard; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

35:39.t: Huwal lazee ja'alakum khalaaa'ifa fil ard; faman kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo; Wa-laa yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum 'inda Rabbihim illaa maqtanw Wa-laa yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum illaa khasaaraa

35:40.t: Qul ara'aytum shurakaaa'a-kumul lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi; aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati am aatainaahum Kitaaban fahum 'alaa baiyyinatim minh; bal ien ya'iduz zaalimoona ba-'duhum ba'dan illaa ghurooraa

35:41.t: Innal laaha yumsikus samaawaati wal-arda an tazoolaaa; Wa-la'in zaalataaa in amsa-kahumaa min ahadim mim ba'dih; innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa

35:42.t: Wa-aqsamoo billaahi jahda aymaanihim la'in jaaa'ahum nazeerul layakoonunna ahdaa min ihdal umami falam-maa jaaa'ahum nazeerum maa zaadahum illaa nufooraa

35:43.t: Istikbaaran fil ardi Wa-makras sayyi'; Wa-laa yaheequl makrus sayyi'u illaa bi-ahlih; fahal yanzuroona illaa sunnatal awwaleen; falan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelanw Wa-lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tahweela

35:44.t: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min Qablihim Wa-kaanoo ashadda minhum quwwah; Wa-maa kaanal laahu liyu'jizahoo min shai'in fis samaawaati Wa-laa fil ard; innahoo kaana 'Aleeman Qadeeraa

35:45.t: Wa-law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bima kasaboo maa taraka 'alaa zahrihaa min daaabbatinw Wa-laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa-izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum fa-innal laaha kaana bi'ibaadihee Baseeraa

36:6.t: Litunzira qawmam maaa unzira aabaaa'uhum fahum ghaafiloon

36:7.t: Laqad haqqal qawlu 'alaaa aksarihim fahum laa yu'minoon

36:8.t: Innaa ja'alnaa feee a'naaqihim aghlaalan fahiya ilal azqaani fahum muqmahoon

36:9.t: Wa-ja'alnaa mim baini aydeehim saddanw wa-min khalfihim saddan fa-aghshai-naahum fahum laa yubsiroon

36:10.t: Wa-sawaaa'un 'alaihim 'a-anzartahum am lam tunzirhum laa yu'minoon

36:11.t: Innamaa tunziru manit taba 'az-Zikra Wa-khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaib, fabashshirhu bimaghfiratinw-wa ajrin kareem

36:12.t: Innaa Nahnu nuhyil mawtaa Wa-naktubu maa qaddamoo Wa-aasaarahum; Wa-kulla shai'in ahsainaahu feee Imaamim Mubeen

36:13.t: Wadrib lahum masalan Ashaabal Qaryatih; iz jaaa'ahal mursaloon

36:14.t: Iz arsalnaaa ilaihimus naini fakazzaboohumaa fa'azzaznaa bisaalisin faqaalooo innaaa ilaikum mursaloon

36:15.t: Qaaloo maaa antum illaa basharum mislunaa Wa-maaa anzalar Rahmaanu min shai'in in antum illaa takziboon

36:16.t: Qaaloo Rabbunaa ya'lamu innaaa ilaikum lamursaloon

36:18.t: Qaaloo innaa tataiyarnaa bikum la'il lam tantahoo lanar-jumannakum Wa-la-yamassan-nakum minnaa 'azaabun aleem

36:19.t: Qaaloo taaa'irukum ma'akum; a'in zukkirtum; bal antum qawmum musrifoon

36:20.t: Wa-jaaa'a min aqsal madeenati rajuluien yas'aa qaala yaa-qawmit tabi'ul mursaleen

36:21.t: Ittabi'oo mal laa yas'alukum ajranw wa-hum muhtadoon

36:22.t: Wa-maa liya laaa a'budul lazee fataranee Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

36:23.t: A-attakhizu min dooniheee aalihatan ien yuridnir Rahmaanu bidurril laa tughni 'annee shafaa-'atuhum shai-'anw wa-laa yunqizoon

36:26.t: Qeelad khulil Jannnah; qaala yaa-laita qawmee ya'lamoon

36:27.t: Bimaa ghafara lee Rabbee Wa-ja'alanee minal mukrameen

36:28.t: Wa-maaa anzalnaa 'alaa qawmihee mim ba'dihee min jundim minas samaaa'i Wa-maa kunnaa munzileen

36:29.t: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum khaamidoon

36:30.t: Yaa-hasratan 'alal 'ibaaad; maa ya'teehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi-'oon

36:31.t: Alam yaraw kam ahlak-naa qablahum minal qurooni annahum ilaihim laa yarji'oon

36:32.t: Wa-in kullul lammaa jamee'ul ladainaa muhdaroon

36:33.t: Wa-Aayatul lahumul ardul maitatu ahyainaahaa Wa-akhrajnaa minhaa habban faminhu ya'kuloon

36:34.t: Wa-ja'alnaa feehaa jannaatim min nakheelinw Wa-a'naabinw Wa-fajjarnaa feeha minal 'uyoon

36:35.t: Li-ya'kuloo min samarihee Wa-maa 'amilat-hu aideehim; afalaa yashkuroon

36:36.t: Subhaanal lazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa mimmaa tumbitul ardu Wa-min anfusihim Wa-mimmaa laa ya'lamoon

36:37.t: Wa-Aayatul lahumul lailu naslakhu minhun nahaara fa-izaa hum muzlimoon

36:38.t: Wash-shamsu tajree limustaqarril lahaa; zaalika taqdeerul 'Azeezil Aleem

36:39.t: Walqamara qaddarnaahu manaazila hattaa 'aada kal'ur-joonil qadeem

36:40.t: Lash shamsu yambaghee lahaaa an tudrikal qamara walal lailu saabiqun nahaar; Wa-kullun fee falaki yasbahoon

36:41.t: Wa-Aayatul lahum annaa hamalnaa zurriyatahum fil fulkil mashhoon

36:42.t: Wa-khalaqnaa lahum mim mislihee maa yarkaboon

36:43.t: Wa-in nashaa nughriqhum falaa sareekha lahum Wa-laa hum yunqazoon

36:44.t: Illaa rahmatam minnaa Wa-mataa'an ilaa heen

36:45.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahumut taqoo maa baina aideekum Wa-maa khalfakum la'allakum turhamoon

36:46.t: Wa-maa ta'teehim min aayatim min Aayaati Rabbihim illaa kaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen

36:47.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahum anfiqoo mimmaa razaqakumul laahu qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo anut'imu mal law yashaaa'ul laahu at'amahooo in antum illaa fee dalaalim mubeen

36:48.t: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

36:49.t: Maa yanzuroona illaa saihatanw waahidatan ta'khuzuhum Wa-hum yakhissimoon

36:50.t: Falaa yastatee'oona taw-siyatanw wa-laaa ilaaa ahlihim yarji'oon

36:51.t: Wa-nufikha fis soori faizaa hum minal ajdaasi ilaa Rabbihim yansiloon

36:52.t: Qaaloo yaa-wailanaa mam ba'asanaa mim marqadinaa; haaza maa wa'adar Rahmanu Wa-sadaqal mursaloon

36:53.t: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum jamee'ul ladainaa muhdaroon

36:54.t: Fal-Yawma laa tuzlamu nafsun shai'anw-wa laa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

36:55.t: Inna Ashaabal jannatil Yawma fee shughulin faakihoon

36:56.t: Hum Wa-azwaajuhum fee zilaalin 'alal araaa'iki muttaki'oon

36:57.t: Lahum feehaa faakiha-tunw wa-lahum maa yadda'oon

36:60.t: Alam a'had ilaikum yaa Baneee Aadama al-laa ta'budush Shaitaana innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen

36:62.t: Wa-laqad adalla minkum jibillan kaseeraa; afalam takoonoo ta'qiloon

36:65.t: Al-Yawma nakhtimu 'alaaa afwaahihim Wa-tukallimunaaa aideehim Wa-tashhadu arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

36:66.t: Wa-law nashaaa'u lata-masna 'alaaa aiyyunihim fasta-baqus siraata fa-annaa yubsiroon

36:67.t: Wa-law nashaaa'u lamasakhnaahum 'alaa makaanatihim famas tataa'oo mudiyyanw-wa laa yarji'oon

36:68.t: Wa-man nu-'ammirhu nunakkishu fil khalq; afalaa ya'qiloon

36:69.t: Wa-maa 'allamnaahush shi'ra Wa-maa yambaghee lah; in huwa illaa zikrunw-wa Qur-aanum mubeen

36:70.t: Liyunzira man kaana haiyyanw wa-yahiqqal qawlu 'alal kaafireen

36:71.t: Awalam yaraw annaa khalaqnaa lahum mimmaa 'amilat aideenaaa an'aaman fahum lahaa maalikoon

36:72.t: Wa-zallalnaahaa lahum faminhaa rakoobuhum Wa-minhaa ya'kuloon

36:73.t: Wa-lahum feehaa manaa-fi'u Wa-mashaarib; afalaa yashkuroon

36:74.t: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal la'allahum yunsaroon

36:75.t: Laa yastatee'oona nasrahum Wa-hum lahum jundum muhdaroon

36:76.t: Falaa yahzunka qawluhum; innaa na'lamu maa yusirroona Wa-maa yu'linoon

36:77.t: Awalam yaral insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min nutfatin fa-izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen

36:78.t: Wa-daraba lanaa maslanw wa-nasiya khalqahoo qaala maien yuhyil 'izaama Wa-hiya rameem

36:79.t: Qul yuh-yeehal lazeee ansha-ahaaa awwala marrah; Wa-Huwa bikulli khalqin 'Aleem

36:80.t: Allazee ja'ala lakum minash shajaril akhdari naaran fa-izaaa antum minhu tooqidoon

36:81.t: Awa-laisal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda biqaadirin 'alaaa ai-yakhluqa mislahum; balaa Wa-Huwal Khallaaqul 'Aleem

36:82.t: Innamaa amruhooo izaaa araada shai'an aien yaqoola lahoo kun fa-yakoon

36:83.t: Fa-Subhaanal lazee biyadihee malakootu kulli shai-inw wa-ilaihi turja'oon

37:5.t: Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa Wa-Rabbul mashaariq

37:8.t: Laa yassamma-'oona ilal mala-'il a'alaa Wa-yuqzafoona min kulli jaanib

37:10.t: Illaa man khatifal khatfata fa-atba'ahoo shihaabun saaqib

37:11.t: Fastaftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqnaa; innaa khalaqnaahum min teenil laazib

37:15.t: Wa-qaalooo in haazaa illaa sihrum mubeen

37:16.t: A-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaabanw Wa-'izaaman 'a-innaa lamab'oosoon

37:19.t: Fa-innamaa hiya zajra-tunw waahidatun fa-izaa hum yanzuroon

37:21.t: Haazaa Yawmul Faslil lazee kuntum bihee tukaziboon

37:22.t: Uhshurul lazeena zalamoo Wa-azwaajahum Wa-maa kaanoo ya'budoon

37:23.t: Min doonil laahi fahdoohum ilaa siraatil Jaheem

37:30.t: Wa-maa kaana lanaa 'alaikum min sultaanim bal kuntum qawman taagheen

37:35.t: Innahum kaanooo izaa qeela lahum laaa ilaaha illal laahu yastakbiroon

37:36.t: Wa-yaqooloona a'innaa lataarikooo aalihatinaa lishaa'irim majnoon

37:39.t: Wa-maa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

37:47.t: Laa feehaa ghawlunw Wa-laa hum 'anhaa yunzafoon

37:51.t: Qaala qaaa'ilum minhum innee kaana lee qareen

37:53.t: A-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaabanw Wa-'izaaman 'a-innaa lamadeenoon

37:57.t: Wa-law-laa ni'matu Rabbee lakuntu minal muhdareen

37:59.t: Illa mawtatanal oola Wa-maa nahnu bimu'azzabeen

37:62.t: Azaalika khairun nuzulan am shajaratuz Zaqqoom

37:64.t: Innahaa shajaratun takhruju feee aslil Jaheem

37:66.t: Fa-innahum la-aakiloona minhaa famaali'oona minhal butoon

37:67.t: Summa inna lahum 'alaihaa lashawbam min hameem

37:85.t: Iz qaala li-abeehi Wa-qawmihee maazaa ta'budoon

37:91.t: Faraagha ilaaa aalihatihim faqaala alaa taakuloon

37:97.t: Qaalub noo lahoo bun-yaanan fa-alqoohu fil jaheem

37:99.t: Wa-qaala innee zaahibun ilaa Rabbee sa-yahdeen

37:102.t: Falamma balagha ma'a-hus sa'ya qaala yaa-buniya inneee araa fil manaami anneee azbahuka fanzur maazaa taraa; qaala yaaa-abatif 'al maa tu'maru satajidunee in shaaa' allaahu minas saabireen

37:105.t: Qad saddaqtar ru'yaa; innaa kazaalika najzil muhsineen

37:113.t: Wa-baaraknaa 'alaihi Wa-'alaaa Ishaaq; Wa-min zurriyya-tihimaa muhsinunw Wa-zaalimul linafsihee mubeen

37:144.t: Lalabisa fee batniheee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

37:147.t: Wa-arsalnaahu ilaa mi'ati alfin aw yazeedoon

37:150.t: Am khalaqnal malaaa'i-kata inaasanw Wa-hum shaahidoon

37:158.t: Wa-ja'aloo bainahoo Wa-bainal jinnati nasabaa; Wa-laqad 'alimatil jinnatu innahum lamuhdaroon

37:164.t: Wa-maa minnaaa illaa lahoo maqaamun ma'loom

37:177.t: Fa-izaa nazala bisaahatihim fasaaa'a sabaahul munzareen

38:3.t: Kam ahlaknaa min qablihim min qarnin fanaadaw Wa-laata heena manaas

38:4.t: Wa-'ajibooo an jaaa'a-hum munzirum minhum Wa-qaalal kaafiroona haazaa saahirun kazzaab

38:5.t: Aja'alal aalihata Ilaahanw Waahidan inna haazaa lashai'un 'ujaab

38:6.t: Wantalaqal mala-u minhum anim shoo wasbiroo 'alaaa aalihatikum innna haazaa lashai-'uien yuraad

38:7.t: Maa sami'naa bihaazaa fil millatil aakhirati in haazaaa illakh tilaaq

38:8.t: A-unzila 'alaihiz zikru min baininaa; bal hum fee shakkin min Zikree bal lammaa yazooqoo 'azaab

38:10.t: Am lahum mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa falyartaqoo fil asbaab

38:11.t: Jundum maa hunaalika mahzoomum minal Ahzaab

38:12.t: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw Wa-'Aadunw Wa-Fir'awnu zul awtaad

38:13.t: Wa-Samoodu Wa-qawmu Lootinw Wa-As-haabul 'Aykah; ulaaa'ikal Ahzaab

38:14.t: In kullun illaa kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa 'iqaab

38:15.t: Wa-maa yanzuru haaa-ulaaa'i illaa saihatanw waahidatam maa lahaa min fawaaq

38:16.t: Wa-qaaloo Rabbanaa 'ajjil lanaa qittanaa qabla Yawmil Hisaab

38:17.t: Isbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wazkur 'abdanaa Daawooda zal aidi innahooo awwaab

38:18.t: Innaa sakhkharnal jibaala ma'ahoo yusabbihna bil'ashiyyi wal-ishraaq

38:20.t: Wa-shadadnaa mulkahoo Wa-aatainaahul Hikmata Wa-faslal khitaab

38:21.t: Wa-hal ataaka naba'ul khasm; iz tasawwarul mihraab

38:22.t: Iz dakhaloo 'alaa Daawooda fafazi'a minhum qaaloo laa takhaf khasmaani baghaa ba'dunaa 'alaa ba'din fahkum bainanaaa bilhaqqi Wa-laa tushtit wahdinaaa ilaa Sawaaa'is Siraat

38:23.t: Inna haazaaa akhee lahoo tis'unw Wa-tis'oona na'jatanw Wa-liya na'jatunw waahidah; faqaala akfilneeha Wa-'azzanee fil khitaab

38:24.t: Qaala laqad zalamaka bisu-'aali na'jatika ilaa ni'aajih; Wa-inna kaseeran minal khulataaa'i la-yabghee ba'duhum 'alaa ba'din illal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-qaleelun maa hum; Wa-zanna Daawoodu annamaa fatannaahu fastaghfara Rabbahoo Wa-kharra raaki'anw Wa-anaab

38:25.t: Faghafarnaa lahoo zaalik; Wa-inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa Wa-husna ma-aab

38:26.t: Yaa-Daawoodu innaa ja'alnaaka khaleefatan fil ardi fahkum bainan naasi bilhaqqi Wa-laa tattabi'il hawaa fayudillaka 'an sabeelil laah; innal lazeena yadilloona 'an sabeelil laah; lahum 'azaabun shadeedum bimaa nasoo Yawmal Hisaab

38:27.t: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa baatilaa; zaalika zannul lazeena kafaroo; fa-waylul lil-lazeena kafaroo minan Naar

38:28.t: Am naj'alul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati kalmufisdeena fil ardi am naj'alul muttaqeena kalfujjaar

38:29.t: Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika mubaarakul liyaddabbarooo Aayaatihee Wa-liyatazakkara ulul albaab

38:30.t: Wa-wahabnaa li-Daawooda Sulaimaan; ni'mal 'abd; innahoo awwaab

38:32.t: Faqaala inneee ahbabtu hubbal khairi 'an zikri Rabbee hattaa tawaarat bilhijaab

38:34.t: Wa-laqad fatannaa Sulaimaana Wa-alqainaa 'alaa kursiyyihee jasadan summa anaab

38:35.t: Qaala Rabbigh fir lee Wa-hab lee mulkal laa yambaghee li-ahadin min ba'dee innaka Antal Wahhaab

38:36.t: Fa-sakharnaa lahur reeha tajree bi-amrihee rukhaaa'an haisu asaab

38:39.t: Haazaa 'ataaa'unaa famnun aw amsik bighairi hisaab

38:41.t: Wazkur 'abdanaaa Ayyoob; iz naada Rabbahooo annee massaniyash Shaitaanu bi-nusbinw Wa-'azaab

38:42.t: Urkud bi-rijlika haaza mughtasalun baaridunw Wa-sharaab

38:43.t: Wa-wahabnaa lahoo ahlahoo Wa-mislahum ma'ahum rahmatan minna Wa-zikraa li-ulil albaab

38:44.t: Wa-khuz biyadika dighsan fadrib bihee Wa-laa tahnas, innaa wajadnaahu saabiraa; ni'mal 'abd; innahooo awwaab

38:45.t: Wazkur 'ibaadanaaa Ibraaheema Wa-Is-haaqa Wa-Ya'qooba ulil aydee walabsaar

38:48.t: Wazkur Ismaa'eela wal Yasa'a Wa-Zal-Kifli Wa-kullun minal akhyaar

38:49.t: Haazaa zikrun Wa-inna lil-muttaqeena la-husna ma-aab

38:51.t: Muttaki'eena feehaa yad'oona feehaa bifaakihatin kaseeratinw Wa-sharaab

38:54.t: Inna haazaa larizqunaa maa lahoo min nafaad

38:59.t: Haazaa fawjun muqtahimun ma'akum laa marhaban bihim; innahum saalun Naar

38:60.t: Qaaloo bal antum laa marhaban bikum; antum qaddamtumoohu lanaa fabi'sal qaraar

38:61.t: Qaaloo Rabbanaa man qaddama lanaa haazaa fa-zidhu 'azaaban di'fan fin Naar

38:62.t: Wa-qaaloo maa lanaa laa naraa rijaalan kunnaa na'udduhum minal ashraar

38:64.t: Inna zaalika lahaqqun takhaasumu Ahlin Naar

38:65.t: Qul innamaaa ana munzirunw Wa-maa min laahin illal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar

38:66.t: Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar

38:69.t: Maa kaana liya min 'ilmin bil-mala'il a'laaa iz yakhtasimoon

38:70.t: Ien-yoohaaa ilaiya illaaa anna maaa ana nazeerun mubeen

38:71.t: Iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'ikati innee khaaliqun basharan min teen

38:72.t: Fa-iza sawwaituhoo Wa-nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen

38:74.t: Illaaa Iblees; stakbara Wa-kaana minal kaafireen

38:75.t: Qaala yaaa-Ibleesu maa mana'aka an tasjuda limaa khalaqtu bi-yadaiyya-'a stakbarta am kunta min al-'aaleen

38:76.t: Qaala ana khairum minhu; khalaqtanee min naarinw Wa-khalaqtahoo min teen

38:79.t: Qaala Rabbi fa-anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

38:85.t: La-amla'anna Jahannama minka Wa-mimman tabi'aka minhum ajma'een

38:86.t: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrinw Wa-maaa ana minal mutakallifeen

39:2.t: Innaaa anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi fa'budil laaha mukhlisal lahud deen

39:3.t: Alaa lillaahid deenul khaalis; wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a maa na'buduhum illaa liyuqar-riboonaaa ilal laahi zulfaa; innal laaha yahkumu baina-hum fee maa hum feehi yakhtalifoon; innal laaha laa yahdee man huwa kaazibun kaffaar

39:4.t: Law araadal laahu aien yattakhiza waladal lastafaa mimmaa yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; Subhaanahoo Huwal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar

39:5.t: Khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; yukawwirul laila 'alan nahaari Wa-yukawwirun nahaara 'alaal laili Wa-sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li-ajalim musammaa; alaa Huwal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar

39:6.t: Khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatin summa ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa Wa-anzala lakum minal an'aami samaani-yata azwaaj; yakhlu-qukum fee butooni ummahaatikum khalqam mim ba'di khalqin fee zulumaatin salaas; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum lahul mulk; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa-annaa tusrafoon

39:7.t: In takfuroo fa-innal laaha ghaniyyun 'ankum; Wa-laa yardaa li'ibaadihil kufra Wa-in tashkuroo yardahu lakum; Wa-laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; summa ilaa Rabikum marji'ukum fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

39:8.t: Wa-izaa massal insaana durrun da'aa Rabbahoo muneeban ilaihi summa izaa khawwalahoo ni'matam minhu nasiya maa kaana yad'ooo ilaihi min qablu Wa-ja'ala lillaahi andaadal liyudilla 'an sabeelih; qul tamatta' bikufrika qaleelan innaka min Ashaabin Naar;

39:9.t: Amman huwa qaanitun aanaaa'al laili saajidanw Wa-qaaa'imai yahzarul Aakhirata Wa-yarjoo rahmata Rabbih; qul hal yastawil lazeena ya'lamoona wallazeena laa ya'lamoon; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab

39:10.t: Qul yaa-'ibaadil lazeena aamanut taqoo Rabbakum; lillazeena ahsanoo fee haazihid dunyaa hasanah; Wa-ardul laahi waasi'ah; innamaa yuwaffas saabiroona ajrahum bighayri hisab

39:11.t: Qul inneee umirtu an a'budal laaha mukhlisal lahud deen

39:13.t: Qul inneee akhaafu in 'asaitu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem

39:14.t: Qulil laaha a'budu mukhlisal lahoo deenee

39:15.t: Fa'budoo maa shi'tum min doonih; qul innal khaasireenal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum Wa-ahleehim yawmal qiyaamah; alaa zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen

39:16.t: Lahum min fawqihim zulalum minan Naari Wa-min tahtihim zulal; zaalika yukhaw-wiful laahu bihee 'ibaadah; yaa-'ibaadi fattaqoon

39:17.t: Wallazeenaj tanabut Taaghoota aien ya'budoohaa Wa-anaabooo ilal laahi lahumul bushraa; fabashshir 'ibaad

39:18.t: Allazeena yastami'oonal qawla fayattabi'oona ahsanah; ulaaa'ikal lazeena hadaahumul laahu Wa-ulaaa'ika hum ulul albaab

39:19.t: Afaman haqqa 'alaihi kalimatul 'azaab; afa-anta tunqizu man fin Naar

39:20.t: Laakinil lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum lahum ghurafum min fawqihaa ghurafum mabniyyatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; wa'dal laah; laa yukhliful laahul mee'aad

39:21.t: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasalakahoo yanaabee'a fil ardi summa yukhriju bihee zar'am mukhtalifan alwaanuhoo summa yaheeju fatarahu musfarran summa yaj'aluhoo hutaamaa; inna fee zaalika lazikraa li-ulil albaab

39:22.t: Afaman sharahal laahu sadrahoo lil-Islaami fahuwa 'alaa noorim mir Rabbih; fa-wailul lilqaasiyati quloobuhum min zikril laah; ulaaa'ika fee dalaalim mubeen

39:23.t: Allahu nazzala ahsanal hadeesi Kitaabam mutashaa-biham masaaniya taqsha'irru minhu juloodul lazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum summa taleenu julooduhum Wa-quloo-buhum ilaa zikril laah; zaalika hudal laahi yahdee bihee maien yashaaa'; Wa-maien yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad

39:24.t: Afamaien yattaqee biwaj-hihee sooo'al 'azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; Wa-qeela lizzaali-meena zooqoo maa kuntum taksiboon

39:25.t: Kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fa-ataahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon

39:26.t: Fa-azaaqahumul laahul khizya fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

39:27.t: Wa-laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Qur-aani min kulli masalil la'allahum yatazakkaroon

39:29.t: Darabal laahu masalar rajulan feehi shurakaaa'u mutashaakisoona Wa-rajulan salamal lirajulin hal yastawi-yaani masalaa; alhamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

39:31.t: Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'inda Rabbikum takhtasimoon

39:32.t: Faman azlamu mimman kazaba 'alal laahi Wa-kazzaba bissidqi iz jaaa'ah; alaisa fee Jahannama maswal lilkaafireen

39:33.t: Wallazee jaaa'a bissidqi Wa-saddaqa biheee ulaaa'ika humul muttaqoon

39:34.t: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona 'inda Rabbihim; zaalika jazaaa'ul muhsineen

39:35.t: Liyukaffiral laahu 'anhum aswa allazee 'amiloo Wa-yajziyahum ajrahum bi-ahsanil lazee kaano ya'maloon

39:36.t: Alaisal laahu bikaafin 'abdahoo Wa-yukhawwi-foonaka billazeena min doonih; Wa-maien yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad

39:37.t: Wa-maien yahdil laahu famaa lahoo min mudil; alai-sal laahu bi'azeezin zin tiqaam

39:38.t: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunal laah; qul afara'aitum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi in araadaniyal laahu bidurrin hal hunna kaashi-faatu durriheee aw araadanee birahmatin hal hunna mumsikaatu rahmatih; qul hasbiyal laahu 'alaihi yatawakkalul mutawakkiloon

39:39.t: Qul yaa qawmi'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun fasawfa ta'lamoon

39:41.t: Innaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba linnaasi bilhaqq; famanih tadaa falinafsihee Wa-man dalla fa-innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa Wa-maaa anta 'alaihim biwakeel

39:42.t: Allaahu yatawaffal anfusa heena mawtihaa wallatee lam tamut fee manaamihaa fa-yumsikul latee qadaa 'alaihal mawta Wa-yursilul ukhraaa ilaaa ajalim musammaa; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmaien yatafakkarroon

39:43.t: Amit takhazoo min doonil laahi shufa'aaa'; qul awalaw kaanoo laa yamlikoona shai'aw Wa-laa ya'qiloon

39:44.t: Qul lillaahish shafaa'atu jamee'aa; lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi summa ilaihi turja'oon

39:45.t: Wa-izaa zukiral laahu wahdahush ma-azzat quloobul lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati Wa-izaa zukiral lazeena min dooniheee izaa hum yastabshiroon

39:46.t: Qulil laahumma faatiras samaawaati wal-ardi 'Aalimal Ghaibi washshahaadati Anta tahkumu baina 'ibaadika fee maa kaanoo feehee yakhtalifoon

39:47.t: Wa-law anna lillazeena zalamoo maa fil ardi jamee'anw Wa-mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bihee min sooo'il azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; Wa-badaa lahum minal laahi maa lam yakkoonoo yahtasiboon

39:48.t: Wa-badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa kasaboo Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

39:49.t: Fa-izaa massal insaana durrun da'aanaa summa izaa khawwalnaahu ni'matam minna qaala innamaaa ootee-tuhoo 'alaa 'ilm; bal hiya fitna-tunw Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

39:50.t: Qad qaalahal lazeena min qablihim famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon

39:51.t: Fa-asaabahum saiyyi-aatu maa kasaboo; wallazeena zalamoo min haaa'ulaaa'i sa-yuseebuhum saiyyi-aatu maa kasaboo Wa-maa hum bimu'jizeen

39:52.t: Awalam ya'lamooo annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yu'minoon

39:53.t: Qul yaa'ibaadiyal lazeena asrafoo 'alaaa anfusihim laa taqnatoo mir rahmatil laah; innal laaha yaghfiruz zunooba jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

39:54.t: Wa-aneebooo ilaa Rabbikum Wa-aslimoo lahoo min qabli ai yaatiyakumul 'azaabu summa laa tunsaroon

39:55.t: Wattabi'ooo ahsana maaa unzila ilaikum mir Rabbikum min qabli aien yaatiyakumal 'azaabu baghtatanw Wa-antum laa tash'uroon

39:56.t: An taqoola nafsuien yaahasrataa 'alaa maa farrattu fee jambil laahi Wa-in kuntu laminas saakhireen

39:57.t: Aw taqoola law annal laaha hadaanee lakuntu minal muttaqeen

39:58.t: Aw taqoola heena taral 'azaaba law anna lee karratan fa-akoona minal muhsineen

39:59.t: Balaa qad jaaa'atka aayaatee fa-kazzabta bihaa Wa-stakbarta Wa-kunta minal kaafireen

39:60.t: Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati taral lazeena kazaboo 'alal laahi wujoohuhum muswaddah; alaisa fee Jahannama maswal lilmutakabbireen

39:61.t: Wa-yunajjil laahul lazee-nat taqaw bimafaazatihim laa yamassuhumus sooo'u Wa-laa hum yahzanoon

39:62.t: Allaahu khaaliqu kulli shai'inw Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'inw Wakeel

39:63.t: Lahoo maqaaleedus sa-maawaati wal-ard; wallazeena kafaroo bi-ayaatil laahi ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

39:64.t: Qul afaghairal laahi taamurooonneee a'budu ayyuhal jaahiloon

39:65.t: Wa-laqad oohiya ilaika Wa-ilal lazeena min qablika la-in ashrakta la-yahbatanna 'amalu-ka Wa-latakoonanna minal khaasireen

39:66.t: Balil laahha fa'bud Wa-kum minash shaakireen

39:67.t: Wa-maa qadarul laaha haqqa qadrihee wal-ardu jamee-'an qabdatuhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati wassamaawaatu matwiyyaatum biyameenih; Subhaanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'amma yushrikoon

39:68.t: Wa-nufikha fis Soori fasa'iqa man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi illaa man shaa'al lahu summa nufikha feehi ukhraa fa-izaa hum qiyaamuny yanzuroon

39:69.t: Wa-ashraqatil ardu binoori Rabbihaa Wa-wudi'al Kitaabu Wa-jeee'a bin-nabiyyeena wash-shuhadaaa'i Wa-qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

39:70.t: Wa-wuffiyat kullu nafsim maa 'amilat Wa-Huwa a'lamu bimaa yaf'aloon

39:71.t: Wa-seeqal lazeena kafaroo ilaa jahannama zumaraa hattaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa futihat abwaabuhaa Wa-qaala lahum khazanatuhaaa alam ya'tikum Rusulun minkum yatloona 'alaikum Aayaati Rabbikum Wa-yunziroonakum liqaaa'a Yawmikum haazaa; qaaloo balaa Wa-laakin haqqat kalimatul 'azaabi 'alal kaafireen

39:72.t: Qeelad khuloo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha fabi'sa maswal mutakabbireen

39:73.t: Wa-seeqal lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum ilal Jannati zumaraa hattaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa Wa-futihat abwaabuhaa Wa-qaala lahum khazanatuhaa salaamun 'alaikum tibtum fadkhuloohaa khaalideen

39:74.t: Wa-qaalull hamdulillaahil lazee sadaqanaa wa'dahoo Wa-awrasanal arda natabaw wa-u minal jannati haisu nashaaa'u fani'ma ajrul 'aamileen

39:75.t: Wa-taral malaaa'ikata haaaffeena min hawlil 'Arshi yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim Wa-qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi Wa-qeelal hamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

40:3.t: Ghaafiriz zambi Wa-qaabilit tawbi shadeedil 'iqaabi zit tawli laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa ilaihil maseer

40:4.t: Maa yujaadilu feee Aayaatil laahi illal lazeena kafaroo falaa yaghrurka taqallubuhum fil bilaad

40:5.t: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wal-Ahzaabu min ba'dihim Wa-hammat kullu ummatin bi-Rasoolihim li-ya'khuzoohu Wa-jaadaloo bilbaatili li-yud-hidoo bihil haqqa fa-akhaztuhum fa-kaifa kaana 'iqaab

40:6.t: Wa-kazaalika haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika 'alal lazeena kafarooo annahum Ashaabun Naar

40:7.t: Allazeena yahmiloonal 'Arsha Wa-man hawlahoo yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim Wa-yu'minoona bihee Wa-yastaghfiroona lillazeena aamanoo Rabbanaa wasi'ta kulla shai'ir rahmatanw Wa-'ilman faghfir lillazeena taaboo wattaba'oo sabeelaka Wa-qihim 'azaabal Jaheem

40:8.t: Rabbannaa Wa-adkhilhum Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'attahum Wa-man salaha min aabaaa'ihim Wa-azwaajihim Wa-zurriyyaatihim; innaka Antal 'Azeezul Hakeem

40:9.t: Wa-qihimus saiyi-aat; Wa-man taqis saiyi-aati Yawma'izin faqad rahimtah; Wa-zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

40:10.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo yunaadawna lamaqtul laahi akbaru mim maqtikum anfusakum iz tud'awna ilal eemaani fatakfuroon

40:11.t: Qaaloo Rabbanaaa amat tanasnataini Wa-ahyaitanas nataini fa'tarafnaa bizunoo-binaa fahal ilaa khuroojim min sabeel

40:12.t: Zaalikum bi-annahooo izaa du'iyal laahu wahdahoo kafartum Wa-ien yushrak bihee tu'minoo; falhukmu lillaahil 'Aliyyil Kabeer

40:13.t: Huwal lazee yureekum Aayaatihee Wa-yunazzilu lakum minas samaaa'i rizqaa; Wa-maa tatazakkaru illaa maien yuneeb

40:14.t: Fad'ul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena Wa-law karihal kaafiroon

40:15.t: Rafee'ud darajaati zul 'Arshi yulqir rooha min amrihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee liyunzira yawmat talaaq

40:16.t: Yawma hum baarizoona laa yakhfaa 'alal laahi minhum shai; limanil mulkul Yawma lillaahil Waahidil Qahaar

40:17.t: Al-Yawma tujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat; laa zulmal Yawm; innal laaha saree'ul hisaab

40:18.t: Wa-anzirhum yawmal aazifati izil quloobu ladal hanaajiri kaazimeen; maa lizzaalimeena min hameeminw Wa-laa shafee'ien yutaa'

40:19.t: Ya'lamu khaaa'inatal a'yuni Wa-maa tukhfis sudoor

40:20.t: Wallaahu yaqdee bilhaqq, wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yaqdoona bishai'; innal laaha Huwas Samee'ul Baseer

40:21.t: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena kaanoo min qablihim; kaanoo hum ashadda minhum quwwatanw Wa-aasaaran fil ardi fa-akhazahumul laahu bizunoobihim Wa-maa kaana lahum minal laahi minw waaq

40:22.t: Zaalika bi-annahum kaanat taateehim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati fakafaroo fa-akhazahumul laah; innahoo qawiyyun shadeedul 'iqaab

40:23.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-sultaanim mubeen

40:24.t: Ilaa Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-Qaaroona faqaaloo saahirun kazzaab

40:25.t: Falama jaaa'ahum bil-haqqi min 'indinaa qaaluq tulooo abnaaa'al lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo wastahyoo nisaaa'ahum; Wa-maa kaidul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal

40:26.t: Wa-qaala Fir'awnu zarooneee aqtul Moosaa walyad'u Rabbahoo inneee akhaafu ai yubaddila deenakum aw aien yuzhira fil ardil fasaad

40:27.t: Wa-qaala Moosaaaa innee 'uztu bi-Rabbee Wa-Rabbikum min kulli mutakabbiril laayu'minu bi Yawmil Hisaab

40:28.t: Wa-qaala rajulum mu'minummin Aali Fir'awna yaktumu eemaanahooo ataqtuloona rajulan aien yaqoola Rabbi-yal laahu Wa-qad jaaa'akum bil baiyinaati mir Rabbikum Wa-iny yaku kaaziban fa'alaihi kazibuh Wa-ien yaku saadiqaien yasibkum ba'dul lazee ya'idukum innal laaha laa yahdee man huwa musrifun kazzaab

40:29.t: Yaa-qawmi lakumul mulkul yawma zaahireena fil ardi famaien yansurunaa mim baasil laahi in jaaa'anaa; qaala Fir'awnu maaa ureekum illaa maaa araa Wa-maaa ahdeekum illaa sabeelar Rashaad

40:30.t: Wa-qaalal lazee aamana yaa-qawmi inneee akhaafu 'alaikum misla yawmil Ahzaab

40:31.t: Misla daabi qawmi Noohinw Wa-'aadinw Wa-Samooda wallazeena mim ba'dihim; Wa-mal laahu yureedu zulmal lil'ibaad

40:33.t: Yawma tuwalloona mud-bireena maa lakum minal laahi min 'aasim; Wa-maien yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad

40:34.t: Wa-laqad jaaa'akum Yoosufu min qablu bil-baiyyinaati famaa ziltum fee shakkim mimaa jaaa'akum bihee hattaaa izaa halaka qultum laien yab-asal laahu mim ba'dihee Rasoolaa; kazaalika yudillul laahu man huwa Musrifum murtaab

40:35.t: Allazeena yujaadiloona feee Aaayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin ataahum kabura maqtan 'indal laahi Wa-'indal lazeena aamanoo; kazaalika yatbahul laahu 'alaa kulli qalbi mutakabbirin jabbaar

40:36.t: Wa-qaala Fir'awnu yaa Haamaanub-ni lee sarhal la'alleee ablughul asbaab

40:37.t: Asbaabas samaawaati faattali'a ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa Wa-innee la-azunnuhoo kaazibaa; Wa-kazaalika zuyyina li-Fir'awna sooo'u 'amalihee Wa-sudda 'anis sabeel; Wa-maa kaidu Fir'awna illaa fee tabaab

40:38.t: Wa-qaalal lazeee aamana yaa-qawmit tabi'ooni ahdikum sabeelar rashaad

40:39.t: Yaa-qawmi innamaa haazihil hayaatud dunyaa mataa'unw Wa-innal Aakhirata hiya daarul qaraar

40:40.t: Man 'amila saiyi'atan falaa yujzaaa illaa mislahaa Wa-man 'amila saaliham min zakarin aw unsaa Wa-huwa mu'minun fa-ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal Jannata yurzaqoona feehaa bighairi hisaab

40:41.t: Wa-yaa-qawmi maa leee ad'ookum ilan najaati Wa-tad'oonaneee ilan Naar

40:42.t: Tad'oonanee li-akfura billaahi Wa-ushrika bihee maa laisa lee bihee 'ilmunw Wa-ana ad'ookum ilal 'Azeezil Ghaffaar

40:43.t: Laa jarama annamaa tad'oonanee ilaihi laisa lahoo da'watun fid dunyaa Wa-laa fil Aakhirati Wa-anna maraddanaaa ilal laahi Wa-annal musrifeena hum Ashaabun Naar

40:44.t: Fasatazkuroona maaa aqoolu lakum; Wa-ufawwidu amreee ilal laah; innal laaha baseerum bil'ibaad

40:45.t: Fa-waqaahul laahu saiyyiaati maa makaroo Wa-haaqa bi Aali-Fir'awna sooo'ul 'azaab

40:46.t: An-Naaru yu'radoona 'alaihaa ghuduwwanw Wa-'ashiyyanw Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'aatu adkhilooo Aala Fir'awna ashaddal 'azaab

40:47.t: Wa-iz yatahaaajjoona fin Naari fa-yaqoolud du'afaaa'u lillazeenas takbarooo innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal antum mughnoona annaa naseebam minan Naar

40:48.t: Qaalal lazeenas takbarooo innaa kullun feehaaa innal laaha qad hakama baynal 'ibaad

40:49.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena fin Naari likhazanati Jahannamad 'oo Rabbakum yukhaffif 'annaa yawmam minal 'azaab

40:50.t: Qaalooo awalam taku taateekum Rusulukum bilbaiyinaati qaaloo balaa' qaaloo fad'oo; Wa-maa du'aaa'ul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal

40:51.t: Innaa lanansuru Rusulanaa wallazeena aamanoo fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-Yawma yaqoomul ashhaad

40:52.t: Yawma laa yanfa'uz zaalimeena ma'ziratuhum Wa-lahumul la'natu Wa-lahum soooud daar

40:53.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal hudaa Wa-awrasnaa Baneee Israaa-'eelal Kitaab

40:55.t: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wastaghfir lizambika Wa-sabbih bihamdi Rabbika bil'ashiyyi wal-ibkaar

40:56.t: Innal lazeena yujaadi-loona feee Aayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin ataahum in fee sudoorihim illaa kibrum maa hum bibaaligheeh; fasta'iz billaahi innahoo Huwas Samee'ul Baseer

40:57.t: Lakhalqus samaawaati wal-ardi akbaru min khalqin naasi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

40:58.t: Wa-maa yastawil a'maa walbaseeru wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-lal museee'; qaleelam maa tatazakkaroon

40:59.t: Innas Saa'ata la-aatiyatul laa raiba feehaa Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon

40:60.t: Wa-qaala Rabbukumud 'ooneee astajib lakum; innal lazeena yastakbiroona an 'ibaadatee sa-yadkhuloona jahannama daakhireen

40:61.t: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul laila littaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; innal laaha lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa yashkuroon

40:62.t: Zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum khaaliqu kulli shai'in; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa-annaa tu'fakoon

40:63.t: Kazaalika yu'fakul lazeena kaanoo bi-Aayaatil laahi yajhadoon

40:64.t: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul arda qaraaranw wassa-maaa'a binaaa'anw Wa-sawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum Wa-razaqakum minat taiyibaat; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum fatabaarakal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen

40:65.t: Huwal Hayyu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fad'oohu mukh liseena lahudeen; alhamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

40:66.t: Qul innee nuheetu an a'budal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi lammaa jaaa'a-niyal baiyinaatu mir Rabbee Wa-umirtu an uslima li-Rabbil 'aalameen

40:67.t: Huwal lazee khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa min 'alaqatin summa yukhrijukum tiflan summa litablughooo ashuddakum summa litakoonoo shuyookhaa; Wa-minkum maien yutawaffaa min qablu Wa-litablughooo ajalam musam-manw wa-la'allakum ta'qiloon

40:68.t: Huwal lazee yuhyee Wa-yumeetu fa-izaa qadaaa amran fa-innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fa-yakoon

40:69.t: Alam tara ilal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatil laahi annaa yusrafoon

40:70.t: Allazeena kazzaboo bil-Kitaabi Wa-bimaa arsalnaa bihee Rusulanaa fasawfa ya'lamoon

40:71.t: Izil aghlaalu feee a'naaqi-him wassalaasilu yushaboon

40:72.t: Fil hameemi summa fin Naari Yasjaroon

40:73.t: Summaa qeela lahum ayna maa kuntum tushrikoon

40:74.t: Min doonil laahi qaaloo dalloo 'annaa bal lam nakun nad'oo min qablu shai'aa; kazaalika yudillul laahul kaafireen

40:75.t: Zaalikum bimaa kuntum tafrahoona fil ardi bighairil haqqi Wa-bimaa kuntum tamrahoon

40:76.t: Udkhulooo abwaaba Jahannama khaalideena feehaa fabi'sa maswal mutakabbireen

40:77.t: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqq; fa-immaa nuriyannak ba'dal lazee na'i-duhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilainaa yurja'oon

40:78.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika minhum man qasasnaa 'alaika Wa-minhum mal lam naqsus 'alaik; Wa-maa kaana li-Rasoolin any yaatiya bi-Aayatin illaa bi-iznil laah; fa-izaa jaaa'a amrul laahi qudiya bilhaqqi Wa-khasira hunaalikal mubtiloon

40:79.t: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul an'aama litarkaboo minhaa Wa-minhaa taakuloon

40:80.t: Wa-lakum feehaa manaafi'u Wa-litablughoo 'alaihaa haajatan fee sudoorikum Wa-'alaihaa Wa-'alal fulki tuhmaloon

40:81.t: Wa-yureekum Aayaatihee fa-ayya Aayaatil laahi tunkiroon

40:82.t: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; kaanoo aksara minhum Wa-ashadda quwwatanw Wa-aasaaran fil ardi famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon

40:83.t: Falammaa jaaa'at-hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati farihoo bimaa 'indahum minal 'ilmi Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

40:84.t: Falammaa ra-aw baasanaa qaalooo aamannaa billaahi wahdahoo Wa-kafarnaa bimaa kunnaa bihee mushrikeen

40:85.t: Falam yaku tanfa-'uhum eemaanuhum lammaa ra-aw ba'sana sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat fee 'ibaadihee Wa-khasira hunaalikal kaafiroon

41:3.t: Kitaabun fussilat Aayaatuhoo Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal liqawmien ya'lamoon

41:4.t: Basheeranw Wa-nazeeran fa-a'rada aksaruhum fahum laa yasma'oon

41:5.t: Wa-qaaloo quloobunaa feee akinnatim mimmaa tad'oonaaa ilaihi Wa-feee aazaaninaa waqrunw Wa-mim baininaa Wa-bainika hijaabun fa'mal innanaa 'aamiloon

41:6.t: Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum Ilaahunw Waahidun fastaqeemooo ilaihi wastaghfirooh; Wa-wailul lil-mushrikeen

41:7.t: Allazeena laa yu'toonaz Zakaata Wa-hum bil-Aakhirati hum kaafiroon

41:8.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon

41:9.t: Qul a'innakum latakfuroona billazee khalaqal arda fee yawmaini Wa-taj'aloona lahooo andaadaa; zaalika Rabbul 'aalameen

41:10.t: Wa-ja'ala feehaa rawaa-siya min fawqihaa Wa-baaraka feehaa Wa-qaddara feehaaaa aqwaatahaa feee arba'ati ayyaamin sawaaa'al lissaaa'ileen

41:11.t: Summas tawaaa ilas samaaa'i Wa-hiya dukhaanun faqaala lahaa Wa-lil ardi'tiyaaa taw'an aw karhan qaalataaa atainaa taaa'i'een

41:12.t: Faqadaahunna sab'a samaawaatin fee yawmaini Wa-awhaa fee kulli samaaa'in amarahaa; Wa-zaiyannassa maaa'ad dunyaa bimasaabeeha Wa-hifzaa; zaalika taqdeerul 'Azeezil 'Aleem

41:13.t: Fa-in a'radoo faqul anzartukum saa'iqatam misla saa'iqati 'Aadinw Wa-Samood

41:14.t: Iz jaaa'at-humur Rusulu mim baini aydeehim Wa-min khalfihim allaa ta'budooo illal laaha qaaloo law shaaa'a Rabunaa la-anzala malaaa-'ikatan fa-innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon

41:15.t: Fa-ammaa 'Aadun fastak-baroo fil ardi bighairul haqqi Wa-qaaloo man ashaddu minnaa quwwatan awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqahum Huwa ashaddu minhum quwwatanw Wa-kaanoo bi-Aayaatinaa yajhadoon

41:16.t: Fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim reehan sarsaran feee ayyaamin nahisaatil linuzeeqahum 'azaabal khizyi fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati akhzaa Wa-hum laa yunsaroon

41:17.t: Wa-ammaa Samoodu fahadinaahum fastahabbul 'ama 'alal huda fa-akhazathum saa'iqatul 'azaabil hooni bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

41:19.t: Wa-yawma yuhsharu a'daaa'ul laahi ilan Naari fahum yooza'oon

41:20.t: Hattaaa izaa maa jaaa'oohaa shahida 'alaihim samu'uhum Wa-absaaruhum Wa-julooduhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

41:21.t: Wa-qaaloo lijuloodihim lima shahittum 'alainaa qaaloo antaqanal laahul lazeee antaqa kulla shai'inw Wa-Huwa khalaqakum awwala marratinw Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

41:22.t: Wa-maa kuntum tastatiroona aien yashhada 'alaikum sam'ukum Wa-laaa absaarukum Wa-laa juloodukum Wa-laakin zanantum annal laaha laa ya'lamu kaseeram mimmaa ta'maloon

41:23.t: Wa-zaalikum zannukumul lazee zanantum bi-Rabbikum ardaakum fa-asbahtum minal khaasireen

41:24.t: Fa-ien yasbiroo fan-naaru maswal lahum Wa-ien yasta'tiboo famaa hum minal mu'tabeen

41:25.t: Wa-qaiyadnaa lahum quranaaa'a fazaiyyanoo lahum maa baina aideehim Wa-maa khalfahum Wa-haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu feee umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal-insi innahum kaanoo khaasireen

41:26.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa tasma'oo lihaazal Quraani walghaw feehi la'allakum taghliboon

41:27.t: Falanuzeeqannal lazeena kafaroo 'azaaban shadeedanw Wa-lanajziyannahum aswal lazee kaanoo ya'maloon

41:28.t: Zaalika jazaaa'u a'daaa'il laahin Naaru lahum feehaa daarul khuld, jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo bi-aayaatinaa yajhadoon

41:29.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo Rabbanaaa arinal lazaini adal-laanaa minal jinni wal-insi naj'alhumaa tahta aqdaaminaa liyakoonaa minal asfaleen

41:30.t: Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo tatanazzalu 'alaihimul malaaa-'ikatu allaa takhaafoo Wa-laa tahzanoo Wa-abshiroo bil-Jannnatil latee kuntum too'adoon

41:31.t: Nahnu awliyaaa'ukum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-fil Aakhirati Wa-lakum feehaa maa tashtaheee anfusukum Wa-lakum feehaa ma tadda'oon

41:33.t: Wa-man ahsanu qawlam mimman da'aaa ilal laahi Wa-'amila saalihanw Wa-qaala innanee minal muslimeen

41:34.t: Wa-laa tastawil hasanatu Wa-las saiyi'ah; idfa' billatee hiya ahsanu fa'izal lazee bainaka Wa-bainahoo 'adaawatun ka'annahoo waliyun hameem

41:35.t: Wa-maa yulaqqaahaaa illal lazeena sabaroo Wa-maa yulaqqaahaaa illaa zoo hazzin 'azeem

41:36.t: Wa-immaa yanzaghannaka minash Shaitaani nazghun fasta'iz billaahi innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

41:37.t: Wa-min Aayaatihil lailu wannahaaru washshamsu walqamar; laa tasjudoo lishshamsi Wa-laa lilqamari wasjudoo lillaahil lazee khala-qahunna in kuntum iyyaahu ta'budoon

41:38.t: Fa-inis takbaroo fallazee-na 'inda Rabbika yusabbihoona lahoo billaili wannnahaari Wa-hum laa yas'amoon

41:39.t: Wa-min Aayaatiheee annaka taral arda khaashi'atan fa-izaaa anzalna 'alaihal maaa'ah tazzat Wa-rabat; innal lazeee ahyaahaa lamuhiyil mawtaa; innahoo 'alaa kulli shai-in Qadeer

41:40.t: Innal lazeena yulhidoona feee Aayaatina laa yakhfawna 'alainaa' afamai yulqaa fin Naari khayrun am maien yaateee aaminai Yawmal Qiyaamah; i'maloo ma shi'tum innahoo bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

41:41.t: Inna Lazeena kafaroo biz-Zikri lammaa jaa'ahum Wa-innahoo la-Kitaabun 'Azeez

41:42.t: Laa yaateehil baatilu mim baini yadaihi Wa-laa min khalfihee tanzeelum min Hakeemin Hameed

41:43.t: Maa yuqaalu laka illaa maa qad qeela lir-Rusuli min qablik; inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratinw Wa-zoo 'iqaabin aleem

41:44.t: Wa-law ja'alnaahu Qur-aanan A'jamiyyal laqaaloo law-laa fussilat Aayaatuhoo 'a-A'jamiyyunw Wa-'Arabiyy; qul huwa lillazeena aamanoo hudanw Wa-shifaaa'unw wallazeena la yu'minoona feee aazaanihim waqrunw Wa-huwa 'alaihim 'amaa; ulaaa'ika yunaadawna mim maakaanim ba'eed

41:45.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa fee; Wa-lawlaa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innahum lafee shakkim minhu mureeb

41:46.t: Man 'amila salihan falinafsihee Wa-man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa; wamaa rabbuka bizallaamil lil-'abeed

41:47.t: Ilaihi yuraddu 'ilmus Saaa'ah; Wa-maa takhruju min samaraatim min akmaamihaa Wa-maa tahmilu min unsaa Wa-laa tada'u illaa bi'ilmih; Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim aina shurakaaa'ee qaalooo aazannaaka maa minnaa min shaheed

41:48.t: Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yad'oona min qablu Wa-zannoo maa lahum mim mahees

41:49.t: Laa yas'amul insaanu min du'aaa'il khairi Wa-im massa hush-sharru fa-ya'oosun qanoot

41:50.t: Wa-la-in azaqnaahu rahmatam minnaa mim ba'di dar-raaa'a massat-hu la-yaqoolanna haazaa lee Wa-maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw Wa-la'in ruji'tu ilaa Rabbeee inna lee 'indahoo lalhusnaa; falanu-nabbi'annal lazeena kafaroo bimaa 'amiloo Wa-lanuzeeqan-nahum min 'azaabin ghaleez

41:51.t: Wa-izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada Wa-na-aa bijaani-bihee Wa-izaa massahush sharru fazoo du'aaa'in 'areed

41:52.t: Qul araaitum in kaana min 'indil laahi summa kafar-tum bihee man adallu mimman huwa fee shiqaqim ba'eed

41:53.t: Sanureehim Aayaatinaa fil aafaaqi Wa-feee anfusihim hattaa yatabaiyana lahum annahul haqq; awa-lam yakfi bi-Rabbika annahoo 'alaa kulli shai-in Shaheed

41:54.t: Alaaa innahum fee miryatim mil liqaaa'i Rabbihim; alaaa innahoo bikulli shai'im muheet

42:3.t: Kazaalika yooheee ilaika Wa-ilal lazeena min qablikal laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem

42:4.t: Lahoo maa fis samaa-waati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-Huwal 'Aliyul 'Azeem

42:5.t: Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna min fawqihinn; walmalaaa'ikatu yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim Wa-yastaghfiroona liman fil ard; alaaa innal laaha huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

42:6.t: Wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'al laahu hafeezun 'alaihim Wa-maaa anta 'alaihim biwakeel

42:7.t: Wa-kazaalika awhainaaa ilaika Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal litunzira Ummal Quraa Wa-man hawlahaa Wa-tunzira Yawmal Jam'i laa raiba feeh; fareequn fil jannati Wa-fareequn fis sa'eer

42:8.t: Wa-law shaaa'al laahu laja'alahum ummatanw waahi-datanw walaakien yudkhilu maien yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; waz-zaalimoona maa lahum minw waliyyinw Wa-laa naseer

42:9.t: Amit takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a fallaahu Huwal Waliyyu Wa-Huwa yuhyil mawtaa Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

42:10.t: Wa-makh talaftum feehi min shai'in fahukmuhooo ilal laah; zaalikumul laahu Rabbee 'alaihi tawakkaltu Wa-ilaihi uneeb

42:11.t: Faatirus samaawaati wal-ard; ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw Wa-minal an'aami azwaajai yazra'ukum feeh; laisa kamislihee shai'unw Wa-Huwas Samee'ul Baseer

42:12.t: Lahoo maqaaleedus samaawaati wal-ardi yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; innahoo bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

42:13.t: Shara'a lakum minad deeni maa wassaa bihee Noohanw wallazeee awhainaaa ilaika Wa-maa wassainaa biheee Ibraaheema Wa-Moosa Wa-'Eesaaa an aqeemud deena Wa-laa tatafarraqoo feeh; kabura 'alal mushrikeena maa tad'oohum ilaih; Allaahu yajtabee ilaihi mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdeee ilaihi mai yuneeb

42:14.t: Wa-maa tafarraqooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum; Wa-law-laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika ilaaa ajalim musammal laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innal lazeena oorisul Kitaaba mim ba'dihim lafee shakkim minhu mureeb

42:15.t: Falizaalika fad'u wastaqim kamaaa umirta Wa-laa tattabi' ahwaaa'ahum Wa-qul aamantu bimaaa anzalal laahu min Kitaab, Wa-umirtu li-a'dila bainakum Allaahu Rabbunaa Wa-Rabbukum lanaaa a'maa-lunaa Wa-lakum a'maalukum laa hujjata bainanaa Wa-baina-kumul laahu yajma'u bainanaa Wa-ilaihil maseer

42:16.t: Wallazeena yuhaaajjoona fil laahi mim ba'di mas tujeeba lahoo hujjatuhum daahidatun 'inda Rabbihim Wa-'alaihim ghadabunw Wa-lahum 'azaabun shadeed

42:17.t: Allahul lazeee anzalal Kitaaba bilhaqqi wal-Meezaan; Wa-ma yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata qareeb

42:18.t: Yasta'jilu bihal lazeena laa yu'minoona bihaa wallazeena aamanoo mushfiqoona minhaa Wa-ya'lamoona annahal haqq; alaaa innal lazeena yumaaroona fis Saa'ati lafee dalaalin ba'eed

42:19.t: Allahu lateefum bi'ibaadihee yarzuqu maien yashaaa'u Wa-Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez

42:20.t: Man kaana yureedu harsal Aakhirati nazid lahoo fee harsihee Wa-man kaana yureedu harsad dunyaa nu'tihee minhaa Wa-maa lahoo fil Aakhirati min naseeb

42:21.t: Am lahum shurakaaa'u shara'oo lahum minad deeni maa lam ya'zan bihil laah; Wa-law-laa kalimatul fasli laqudiya bainahum; Wa-innaz zaalimeena lahum 'azaabun aleem

42:22.t: Taraz zaalimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa kasaboo Wa-huwa waaqi'um bihim; wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fee rawdaatil jannaati lahum maa yashaaa'oona 'inda Rabbihim; zaalika huwal fadlul kabeer

42:23.t: Zaalikal lazee yubash-shirul laahu 'ibaadahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaat; qul laaa as'alukum 'alaihi ajran illal mawaddata fil qurbaa; Wa-mai yaqtarif hasanatan nazid lahoo feehaa husnaa; innal laaha Ghafoorun Shakoor

42:24.t: Am yaqooloonaf tara 'alal laahi kaziban fa-ien yasha' illaahu yakhtim 'alaa qalbik; Wa-yamhul laahul baatila Wa-yuhiqqul haqqa bi-Kalimaatih; innahoo 'Aleemun bizaatis sudoor

42:25.t: Wa-Huwal lazee yaqbalut tawbata 'an 'ibaadihee Wa-ya'foo 'anis saiyiaati Wa-ya'lamu maa taf'aloon

42:26.t: Wa-yastajeebul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilu saalihaati Wa-yazeeduhum min fadlih; wal-kaafiroona lahum 'azaabun shadeed

42:27.t: Wa-law basatal laahur rizqa li'ibaadihee labaghaw fil ardi Wa-laakiny yunazzilu biqadarim maa yashaaa'; innahoo bi'ibaadihee Khabeerun Baseer

42:28.t: Wa-Huwal lazee yunazzilul ghaisa min ba'di maa qanatoo Wa-yanshuru rahmatah; Wa-Huwal Waliyyul Hameed

42:29.t: Wa-min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bassa feehimaa min daaabbah; Wa-Huwa 'alaa jam'ihim izaa yashaaa'u Qadeer

42:30.t: Wa-maaa asaabakum min museebatin fabimaa kasabat aydeekum Wa-ya'foo 'an kaseer

42:31.t: Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi Wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi minw Wa-liyyinw Wa-laa naseer

42:32.t: Wa-min Aayaatihil ja waarifil bahri kal-a'lam

42:33.t: Iny yashaaa yuskinir reeha fa-yazlalna rawaakida 'alaa zahrihi; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

42:34.t: Aw yoobiqhunna bimaa kasaboo Wa-ya'fu 'an kaseer

42:35.t: Wa-ya'lamal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatinaa maa lahum min mahees

42:36.t: Famaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa Wa-maa 'indal laahi khairunw Wa-abqaa lillazeena aamanoo Wa-'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

42:37.t: Wallazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi wal-fawaahisha Wa-izaa maa ghadiboo hum yaghfiroon

42:38.t: Wallazeenas tajaaboo li-Rabbihim Wa-aqaamus Salaata Wa-amruhum shooraa bainahum Wa-mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

42:39.t: Wallazeena izaa asaabahumul baghyu hum yantasiroon

42:40.t: Wa-jazaaa'u saiyi'atin saiyi'atum misluha faman 'afaa Wa-aslaha fa-ajruhoo 'alal laah; innahoo laa yuhibbuz zaalimeen

42:41.t: Wa-lamanin tasara ba'da zulmihee fa-ulaaa'ika maa 'alaihim min sabeel

42:42.t: Innamas sabeelu 'alal lazeena yazlimoonan naasa Wa-yabghoona fil ardi bighairil haqq; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem

42:43.t: Wa-laman sabara Wa-ghafara inna zaalika lamin 'azmil umoor

42:44.t: Wa-maien yudli lillaahu famaa lahoo minw waliyyin min ba'dih; Wa-taraz zaalimeena lammaa ra-awul 'azaaba yaqooloona hal ilaa maraddin min sabeel

42:45.t: Wa-taraahum yu'radoona 'alaihaa khaashi'eena minaz zulli yanzuroona min tarfin khaifiyy; Wa-qaalal lazeena aamanooo innal khaasireenal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum Wa-ahleehim Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa innaz zaalimeena fee 'azaabin muqeem

42:46.t: Wa-maa kaana lahum min awliyaaa'a yansuroonahum min doonil laah; Wa-mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min sabeel

42:47.t: Istajeeboo li-Rabbikum min qabli aien yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo min Allah; maa lakum min malja'-ien yawma'izinw Wa-maa lakum min nakeer

42:48.t: Fa-in a'radoo famaaa arsalnaaka 'alaihim hafeezan in 'alaika illal balaagh; Wa-innaaa izaaa azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan fariha bihaa Wa-in tusibhum saiyi'atun bimaa qaddamat aydeehim fa-innal insaana kafoor

42:49.t: Lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; yahabu limai yashaaa'u inaasanw Wa-yahabu limai yashaaa'uz zukoor

42:50.t: Aw yuzawwijuhum zukraananw Wa-inaasanw Wa-yaj'alu mai yashaaa'u 'aqeemaa; innahoo 'Aleemun Qadeer

42:51.t: Wa-maa kaana libasharin aien yukallimahul laahu illaa wahyan aw minw waraaa'i hijaabin aw yursila Rasoolan fa-yoohiya bi-iznihee maa yashaaa'; innahoo 'Aliyyun Hakeem

42:52.t: Wa-kazaalika awhainaaa ilaika roohan min amrinaa; maa kunta tadree mal Kitaabu Wa-lal eemaanu Wa-laakin ja'alnaahu nooran nahdee bihee man nashaaa'u min 'ibaadinaa; Wa-innaka latahdeee ilaaa Saraatin Mustaqeem

42:53.t: Siraatil laahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ard; alaaa ilal laahi taseerul umoor

43:4.t: Wa-innahoo feee Ummil Kitaabi Ladainaa la'aliyyun hakeem

43:5.t: Afa-nadribu 'ankumuz Zikra safhan an kuntum qawman musrifeen

43:6.t: Wa-kam arsalnaa min Nabiyyin fil awwaleen

43:7.t: Wa-maa ya'teehim min Nabiyyin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

43:8.t: Fa-ahlaknaaa ashadda minhum batshanw Wa-madaa masalul awwaleen

43:9.t: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunna khalaqa-hunnal 'Azeezul 'Aleem

43:10.t: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw Wa-ja'ala lakum feehaa subulan la'allakum tahtadoon

43:11.t: Wallazee nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an biqadarin fa-ansharnaa bihee baldatan maitaa' kazaalika tukhrajoon

43:12.t: Wallazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa Wa-ja'ala lakum minal fulki wal-an'aami maa tarkaboon

43:13.t: Litastawoo 'alaa zuhoorihee summa tazkuroo ni'mata Rabbikum izas tawaitum 'alaihi Wa-taqooloo Subhaanal lazee sakhkhara lana haaza Wa-maa kunnaa lahoo muqrineen

43:15.t: Wa-ja'aloo lahoo min 'ibaadihee juz'aa; innal insaana la-kafoorun mubeen

43:16.t: Amit takhaza mimmaa yakhluqu banaatinw Wa-asfaakum bilbaneen

43:17.t: Wa-izaa bushshira ahaduhum bimaa daraba lir-Rahmaani masalan zalla wajhuhoo muswaddanw Wa-huwa kazeem

43:18.t: Awa-maien yunashsha'u fil hilyati Wa-huwa fil khisaami ghairu mubeen

43:19.t: Wa-ja'alul malaaa'ikatal lazeena hum 'ibaadur Rahmaani inaasaa; 'a-shahidoo khalqahum; satuktabu shahaadatuhum Wa-yus'aloon

43:20.t: Wa-qaaloo law shaaa'ar Rahmaanu maa 'abadnaahum; maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum illaa yakhrusoon

43:21.t: Am aatainaahum Kitaaban min qablihee fahum bihee mustamsikoon

43:22.t: Bal qaalooo innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw Wa-innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muhtadoon

43:23.t: Wa-kazaalika maaa arsalnaa min qablika fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafoohaaa innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw Wa-innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muqtadoon

43:24.t: Qaala awa-law ji'tukum bi-ahdaa mimmaa wajatdtum 'alaihi aabaaa'akum qaalooo innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon

43:25.t: Fantaqamnaa minhum fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen

43:26.t: Wa-iz qaala Ibraaheemu li-abeehi Wa-qawmiheee innanee baraaa'un mimmaa ta'budoon

43:28.t: Wa-ja'alahaa kalimatan baaqiyatan fee 'aqibihee la-'allahum yarji'oon

43:29.t: Bal matta'tu haaa'ulaaa'i Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa jaaa'a-humul haqqu Wa-Rasoolun mubeen

43:30.t: Wa-lammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu qaaloo haazaa sihrunw Wa-innaa bihee kaafiroon

43:31.t: Wa-qaaloo law-laa nuzzila haazal Quraanu 'alaa rajulin minal qaryataini 'azeem

43:32.t: A-hum yaqsimoona rahmata Rabbik; Nahnu qasamnaa bainahum ma'eeshatahum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-rafa'naa ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajaatin li-yattakhiza ba'duhum ba'dan sukhriyyaa; Wa-rahmatu Rabbika khairun mimmaa yajma'oon

43:33.t: Wa-law-laaa aien yakoonan naasu ummatanw waahidatan laja'alnaa limaien yakfuru bir-Rahmaani li-buyootihim suqufan min fiddatinw Wa-ma'aarija 'alaihaa yazharoon

43:35.t: Wa-zukhrufaa; Wa-in kullu zaalika lammaa mataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa; wal-aakhiratu 'inda Rabbika lilmuttaqeen

43:36.t: Wa-maien ya'shu 'an zikrir Rahmaani nuqaiyid lahoo Shaitaanan fahuwa lahoo qareen

43:37.t: Wa-innahum la-yasuddoo-nahum 'anis sabeeli Wa-yahsaboona annahum muhtadoon

43:38.t: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'anaa qaala yaa-laita bainee Wa-bainaka bu'dal mashriqaini fabi'sal qareen

43:39.t: Wa-lai yanfa'akumul Yawma iz zalamtum annakum fil 'azaabi mushtarikoon

43:40.t: Afa-anta tusmi'us summa aw tahdil 'umya Wa-man kaana fee dalaalin mubeen

43:41.t: Fa-immaa nazhabanna bika fa-innaa minhum muntaqimoon

43:42.t: Aw nuriyannakal lazee wa'adnaahum fa-innaa 'alaihim muqtadiroon

43:43.t: Fastamsik billazeee oohiya ilaika innaka 'alaa Siraatin Mustaqeem

43:44.t: Wa-innahoo la-zikrun laka Wa-liqawmika Wa-sawfa tus'aloon

43:45.t: Was'al man arsalnaa min qablika mir Rusulinaaa 'a-ja'alnaa min doonir Rahmaani aalihatany yu'badoon

43:46.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-aayaatinaaa ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihee faqaala innee Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen

43:47.t: Falamma jaaa'ahum bi-aayaatinaaa izaa hum minhaa yadhakoon

43:48.t: Wa-maa nureehim min aayatin illaa hiya akbaru min ukhtihaa Wa-akhaznaahum bil'azaabi la'allahum yarji'oon

43:49.t: Wa-qaaloo yaaa ayyuhas saahirud'u lanaa Rabbaka bimaa 'ahida 'indaka innanaa lamuhtadoon

43:51.t: Wa-naadaa Fir'awnu fee qawmihee qaala yaa-qawmi alaisa lee mulku Misra Wa-haazihil anhaaru tajree min tahtee afalaa tubsiroon

43:52.t: Am ana khairun min haazal lazee huwa maheenunw Wa-laa yakaadu yubeen

43:53.t: Falaw-laa ulqiya 'alaihi aswiratun min zahabin aw jaaa'a ma'ahul malaaa'ikatu muqtarineen

43:54.t: Fastakhaffa qawmahoo fa-ataa'ooh; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

43:55.t: Falammaaa aasafoonan taqamnaa minhum fa-aghraqnaahum ajma'een

43:57.t: Wa-lammaa duribab nu Maryama masalan izaa qawmuka minhu yasiddoon

43:58.t: Wa-qaalooo 'a-aalihatunaa khairun am hoo; maa daraboohu laka illaa jadalaa; bal hum qawmun khasimoon

43:59.t: In huwa illaa 'abdun an'amnaa 'alaihi Wa-ja'alnaahu masalan li-Baneee Israaa'eel

43:60.t: Wa-law nashaaa'u laja'alnaa minkum malaaa'ikatan fil ardi yakhlufoon

43:61.t: Wa-innahoo la-'ilmun lis-Saa'ati fa-laa tamtarunna bihaa wattabi'oon; haazaa Siraatun Mustaqeem

43:62.t: Wa-laa yasuddan-nakumush Shaitaanu innahoo lakum 'aduwwun mubeen

43:63.t: Wa-lammaa jaaa'a 'Eesaa bilbaiyinaati qaala qad ji'tukum bil-Hikmati Wa-li-ubaiyyina lakum ba'dal lazee takhtalifoona feehi fattaqul laaha Wa-atee'oon

43:64.t: Innal laaha Huwa Rabbee Wa-Rabbukum fa'budooh; haaza Siraatum Mustaqeem

43:65.t: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu min bainihim fa-wailun lil-lazeena zalamoo min 'azaabi Yawmin aleem

43:66.t: Hal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an ta'tiyahum baghtatanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

43:67.t: Al-akhillaaa'u Yawma'izin ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illal muttaqeen

43:68.t: Yaa-'ibaadi laa khawfun 'alaikumul Yawma Wa-laaa antum tahzanoon

43:71.t: Yutaafu 'alaihim bi-sihafin min zahabinw Wa-akwaab, Wa-feehaa maa tashtaheehil anfusu Wa-talazzul a'yunu Wa-antum feehaa khaalidoon

43:72.t: Wa-tilkal jannatul lateee ooristumoohaa bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

43:73.t: Lakum feehaa faakihatun kaseeratun minhaa ta'kuloon

43:76.t: Wa-maa zalamnaahum Wa-laakin kaanoo humuz zaalimeen

43:77.t: Wa-naadaw yaa-Maaliku liyaqdi 'alainaa Rabbuka qaala innakum maakithoon

43:78.t: Laqad ji'naakum bilhaqqi Wa-laakinna aksarakum lil-haqqi kaarihoon

43:80.t: Am yahsaboona annaa laa nasma'u sirrahum Wa-najwaahum; balaa Wa-Rusulunaa ladaihim yaktuboon

43:81.t: Qul in kaana lir-Rahmaani walad; fa-ana awwalul 'aabideen

43:82.t: Subhaana Rabbis samaawaati wal-ardi Rabbil Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon

43:83.t: Fazarhum yakhoodoo Wa-yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo Yawmahumul lazee yoo'adoon

43:84.t: Wa-Huwal lazee fis samaaa'i ilaahunw Wa-fil ardi ilaah; Wa-Huwal Hakeemul 'Aleem

43:85.t: Wa-tabaarakal lazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa Wa-'indahoo 'ilmus Saa'ati Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

43:86.t: Wa-laa yamlikul lazeena yad'oona min doonihish shafaa'ata illaa man shahida bilhaqqi Wa-hum ya'lamoon

43:87.t: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqahum la-yaqoolun nallaahu fa-annaa yu'fakoon

43:88.t: Wa-qeelihee yaa-Rabbi inna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmul laa yu'minoon

44:3.t: Innaaa anzalnaahu fee lailatim mubaarakah; innaa kunnaa munzireen

44:6.t: Rahmatam mir rabbik; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

44:7.t: Rabbis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa; in kuntum mooqineen

44:8.t: Laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa yuhyee Wa-yumeetu Rabbukum Wa-Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen

44:10.t: Fartaqib Yawma ta'tis samaaa'u bi-dukhaanin mubeen

44:13.t: Annaa lahumuz zikraa Wa-qad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum mubeen

44:16.t: Yawma nabtishul batsha-tal kubraa innaa muntaqimoon

44:17.t: Wa-laqad fatannaa qablahum qawma Fir'awna Wa-jaaa'ahum Rasoolun kareem

44:18.t: An addooo ilaiya 'ibaadal laahi innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

44:19.t: Wa-al laa ta'loo 'alal laahi innee aateekum bisultaanim mubeen

44:22.t: Fada'aa rabbahooo anna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmum mujrimoon

44:24.t: Watrukil bahra rahwan innahum jundum mughraqoon

44:29.t: Famaa bakat 'alaihimus samaaa'u wal-ardu Wa-maa kaanoo munzareen

44:30.t: Wa-laqad najjainaa Baneee Israaa'eela minal 'azaabil muheen

44:31.t: Min Fir'awn; innahoo kaana 'aaliyam minal musrifeen

44:33.t: Wa-aatainaahum minal aayaati maa feehi balaaa'um mubeen

44:35.t: In hiya illaa mawtatunal oolaa Wa-maa nahnu bimun-shareen

44:37.t: Ahum khayrun am qawmu Tubba'inw wallazeena min qablihim; ahlaknaahum innahum kaanoo mujrimeen

44:38.t: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa baina-humaa laa'ibeen

44:39.t: Maa khalaqnaahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

44:41.t: Yawma laa yughnee mawlan 'am mawlan shai'anw Wa-laa hum yunsaroon

44:42.t: Illaa mar rahimal laah' innahoo huwal 'azeezur raheem

44:48.t: Summa subboo fawqa ra'sihee min 'azaabil hameem

44:50.t: Inna haazaa maa kuntum bihee tamtaroon

44:56.t: Laa yazooqoona feehal mawtaa illal mawtatal oolaa Wa-waqaahum 'azaabal jaheem

44:57.t: Fadlam mir rabbik; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

45:3.t: Innaa fis samaawaati wal-ardi la-Aayaatil lilmu'mineen

45:4.t: Wa-fee khalaqikum Wa-maa yabussu min daaabbatin Aayaatul liqawmien yooqinoon

45:5.t: Wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari Wa-maaa anzalal laahu minas samaaa'i mir rizqin fa-ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa Wa-tasreefir riyaahi Aayaatul liqawminy ya'qiloon

45:6.t: Tilka Aayatul laahi natloohaa 'alaika bil-haqq, fabiayyi hadeesim ba'dal laahi Wa-Aayaatihee yu'minoon

45:8.t: Yasma'u Aayaatil laahi tutlaa 'alaihi summa yusirru mustakbiran ka-al lam yasma'haa fabashshirhu bi'azaabin aleem

45:9.t: Wa-izaa 'alima min Aayaatinaa shai'-'anit takhazahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen

45:10.t: Minw waraaa'ihim Jahannamu Wa-laa yughnee 'anhum maa kasaboo shai'anw Wa-laa mat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa; Wa-lahum 'azaabun 'azeem

45:11.t: Haazaa hudaa; wal-lazeena kafaroo bi-aayaati Rabbihim lahum 'azaabum mir rijzin 'aleem

45:12.t: Allaahul lazee sahkhara lakumul bahra litajriyal fulku feehi bi-amrihee Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

45:13.t: Wa-sakhkhara lakum maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi jamee'am minhu; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yatafakkaroon

45:14.t: Qul lillazeena aamanoo yaghfiroo lillazeena laa yarjoona ayyaamal laahi liyajziya qawmam bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

45:15.t: Maa 'amila saalihan falinafsihee Wa-man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa summa ilaa Rabbikum turja'oon

45:16.t: Wa-laqad aatainaa Baneee Israaa'eelal Kitaaba walhukma wan Nubuwwata Wa-razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati Wa-faddalnaahum;alal 'aalameen

45:17.t: Wa-aatainaahum baiyinaatim minal amri famakh talafooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum; inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

45:18.t: Summa ja'alnaaka 'alaa sharee'atim minal amri fattabi'haa Wa-laa tattabi' ahwaaa' al-lazeena laa ya'lamoon

45:19.t: Innahum laien yughnoo 'anka minal laahi shai'aa; Wa-innaz zaalimeena ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'dinw wallaahu waliyyul muttaqeen

45:20.t: Haazaa basaaa'iru linnaasi Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatul liqawmien yooqinoon

45:21.t: Am hasibal lazeenaj tarahus saiyyiaati an naj'alahum kallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilu saalihaati sawaaa'am mahyaahum Wa-mamaatuhum; saaa'a maa yahkumoon

45:22.t: Wa-khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqqi Wa-litujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

45:23.t: Afara'ayta manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu Wa-adal-lahul laahu 'alaa 'ilminw Wa-khatama 'alaa sam'ihee Wa-qalbihee Wa-ja'ala 'alaa basarihee ghishaawatan famaien yahdeehi mim ba'dil laah; afalaa tazakkaroon

45:24.t: Wa-qaaloo maa hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu Wa-nahyaa Wa-maa yuhlikunaaa illad dahr; Wa-maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum illaa yazunnoon

45:25.t: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim aayaatuna baiyinaatim maa kaana hujjatahum illaaa an qaalu'too bi aabaaa'inaaa in kuntum saadiqeen

45:26.t: Qulil laahu yuhyeekum summa yumeetukum summa yajma'ukum ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati laa raiba feehi Wa-laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

45:27.t: Wa-lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu Yawma-'izien yakhsarul mubtiloon

45:28.t: Wa-taraa kulla ummatin jaasiyah; kullu ummatin tud'aaa ilaa kitaabihaa al-Yawma tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon

45:29.t: Haazaa kitaabunaa yantiqu 'alaikum bilhaqq; innaa kunnaa nastansikhu maa kuntum ta'maloon

45:30.t: Fa-ammal lazeena aamaanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati fayudkhiluhum Rabbuhum fee rahmatih; zaalika huwal fawzul mubeen

45:31.t: Wa-ammal lazeena kafarooo afalam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fastakbartum Wa-kuntum qawmam mujrimeen

45:32.t: Wa-izaa qeela inna wa'dallaahi haqqunw was Saa'atu laa raiba feehaa qultum maa nadree mas Saa'atu in nazunnu illaa zannanw Wa-maa nahnu bimustaiqineen

45:33.t: Wa-badaa lahum saiyyiaatu maa 'amiloo Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

45:34.t: Wa-qeelal yawma nansaakum kamaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawmikum haazaa Wa-maawaakumun Naaru Wa-maa lakum min naasireen

45:35.t: Zaalikum bi-annakumut takhaztum aayaatil laahi huzuwanw Wa-gharratkumul hayaatud dunyaa; fal yawma laa yukhrajoona minhaa Wa-laahum yusta'taboon

45:36.t: Falillaahil hamdu Rabbis samaawaati Wa-Rabbil ardi Rabbil 'aalameen

45:37.t: Wa-lahul kibriyaaa'u fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

46:3.t: Maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi Wa-ajalim musammaa; wallazeena kafaroo 'ammaaa unziroo mu'ridoon

46:4.t: Qul ara'aytum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati eetoonee bi-kitaabim min qabli haazaaa aw asaaratim min 'ilmin in kuntum saadiqeen

46:5.t: Wa-man adallu mimmaien yad'oo min doonil laahi mal laa yastajeebu lahooo ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati Wa-hum 'an du'aaa'ihim ghaafiloon

46:6.t: Wa-izaa hushiran naasu kaanoo lahum a'daaa'anw Wa-kaanoo bi'ibaadatihim kaafireen

46:7.t: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum haazaa sihrum mubeen

46:8.t: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo falaa tamlikoona lee minal laahi shai'an Huwa a'lamu bimaa tufeedoona feehi kafaa bihee shaheedam bainee Wa-bainakum Wa-Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

46:9.t: Qul maa kuntu bid'am minal Rusuli Wa-maaa adreee ma yuf'alu bee Wa-laa bikum in attabi'u illaa maa yoohaaa ilaiya Wa-maaa ana illaa nazeerum mubeen

46:10.t: Qul ara'aytum in kaana min 'indil laahi Wa-kafartum bihee Wa-shahida shaahidum mim Banee Israaa'eela 'alaa mislihee fa-aamana wastak-bartum innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

46:11.t: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanoo law kaana khairam maa sabaqoonaaa ilyh; Wa-iz lam yahtadoo bihee fasa-yaqooloona haazaaa ifkun qadeem

46:12.t: Wa-min qablihee kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw wa-rahmah; Wa-haazaa Kitaabum musad-diqul lisaanan 'Arabiyyal liyunziral lazeena zalamoo Wa-bushraa lilmuhsineen

46:13.t: Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo falaa khawfun 'alaihim Wa-laa hum yahzanoon

46:14.t: Ulaaa'ika Ashabul Jannati khaalideena feehaa jazaaa'am bimaa kaano ya'maloon

46:15.t: Wa-wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi ihsaana; hamalat-hu ummuhoo kurhanwn wa-wada'at-hu kurhanw Wa-hamluhoo Wa-fisaaluhoo salaasoona shahraa; hattaaa izaa balagha ashuddahoo Wa-balagha arba'eena sanatan qaala Rabbi awzi'-neee an ashkura ni'matakal lateee an'amta 'alaiyya Wa-'alaa waalidaiya Wa-an a'mala saalihan tardaahu Wa-aslih lee fee zurriyyatee; innee tubtu ilaika Wa-innee minal muslimeen

46:16.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena nata-qabbalu 'anhum ahsana maa 'amiloo Wa-natajaawazu 'an saiyiaatihim feee Ashaabil jannati Wa'das sidqil lazee kaanoo yoo'adoon

46:17.t: Wallazee qaala liwaali-daihi uffil lakumaaa ata'idanineee an ukhraja Wa-qad khalatil quroonu min qablee Wa-humaa yastagheesaanil laaha wailaka aamin inna wa'dal laahi haqq, fa-yaqoolu maa haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

46:18.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu feee umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal-insi innahum kaanoo khaasireen

46:19.t: Wa-likullin darajaatum mimmaa 'amiloo Wa-liyuwaf-fiyahum a'maalahum Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

46:20.t: Wa-Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan Naari azhabtum taiyibaatikum fee hayaatikumud dunyaa wastam-ta'tum bihaa fal-Yawma tujzawna 'azaabal hooni bimaa kuntum tastakbiroona fil ardi bighairil haqqi Wa-bimaa kuntum tafsuqoon

46:21.t: Wazkur akhaa 'Aad, iz anzara qawmahoo bil-Ahqaafi Wa-qad khalatin nuzuru mim baini yadaihi Wa-min khalfiheee allaa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem

46:22.t: Qaaloo aji'tanaa li-taa-fikanaa 'an aalihatinaa fa'tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen

46:23.t: Qaala innamal 'ilmu indal laahi Wa-uballighukum maaa ursiltu bihee Wa-laakinneee araakum qawman tajhaloon

46:24.t: Falammaa ra awhu 'aaridam mustaqbila awdiyatihim qaaloo haazaa 'aaridum mumtirunaa; bal huwa masta'jaltum bihee reehun feehaa 'azaabun aleem

46:25.t: Tudammiru kulla shai'im bi-amri Rabbihaa fa-asbahoo laa yuraaa illaa masaakinuhum; kazaalika najzil qawmal mujrimeen

46:26.t: Wa-laqad makkannaahum feemaaa im makkannaakum feehi waj'alnaa lahum sam'anw Wa-absaaranw Wa-af'idatan famaaa aghnaa 'anhum samu'uhum Wa-laaa absaaruhum Wa-laaa af'idatuhum min shai'in iz kaanoo yajhadoona bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

46:27.t: Wa-laqad ahlaknaa ma hawlakum minal quraa Wa-sarrafnal Aayaati la'allahum yarji'oon

46:28.t: Falaw-laa nasarahumul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi qurbaanan aalihatam bal dalloo 'anhum' Wa-zaalika ifkuhum Wa-maa kaanoo yaftaroon

46:29.t: Wa-iz sarafinaaa ilaika nafaram minal jinni yastami'oonal Quraana falammaa hadaroohu qaalooo ansitoo falammaa qudiya wallaw ilaa qawmihim munzireen

46:30.t: Qaaloo yaa-qawmanaaa innaa sami'naa Kitaaban unzila mim ba'di Moosa musaddiqal limaa baina yadihi yahdeee ilal haqqi Wa-ilaa Tareeqim Mustaqeem

46:31.t: Yaa-qawmanaaa ajeeboo daa'iyal laahi Wa-aaminoo bihee yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yujirkum min 'azaabin aleem

46:32.t: Wa-mal laa yujib daa'iyal laahi falaisa bimu'jizin fil ardi Wa-laisa lahoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'; ulaaa-ika fee dalaalim mubeen

46:33.t: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-larda Wa-lam ya'ya bikhal qihinna biqaadirin 'alaaa aiyuhyiyal mawtaa; balaaa innahoo 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

46:34.t: Wa-Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan naari alaisa haaza bil-haqq; qaaloo balaa Wa-Rabbinaa; qaala fazooqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon

46:35.t: Fasbir kamaa sabara ulul 'azmi minar Rusuli Wa-laa tasta'jil lahum; ka-annahum Yawma yarawna maa yoo'adoona lam yalbasooo illaa saa'atam min nahaar; balaagh; fahal yuhlaku illal qawmul faasiqoon

47:1.t: Allazeena kafaroo Wa-saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi adalla a'maalahum

47:2.t: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-aamanoo bimaa nuzzila 'alaa Muhammadinw-wa huwal haqqu mir Rabbihim kaffara 'anhum saiyiaatihim Wa-aslaha baalahum

47:3.t: Zaalika bi-annal lazeena kafarut taba'ul baatila Wa-annal lazeena aamanut taba'ul haqqa mir Rabbihim; kazaalika yadribul laahu linnaasi amsaalahum

47:4.t: Fa-izaa laqeetumul lazeena kafaroo fadarbar riqaabi, hattaaa izaa askhan-tumoohum fashuddul wasaaqa, fa-immaa mannnam ba'du Wa-immaa fidaaa'an hattaa tada'al harbu awzaarahaa; zaalika Wa-law yashaaa'ul laahu lantasara minhum Wa-laakin li-yabluwa ba'dakum bi-ba'd; wallazeena qutiloo fee sabeelil laahi falaien yudilla a'maalahum

47:7.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo in tansurul laaha yansurkum Wa-yusabbit aqdaamakum

47:8.t: Wallazeena kafaroo fata'-sal lahum Wa-adalla a'maalahum

47:9.t: Zaalika bi-annahum karihoo maaa anzal allaahu fa-ahbata a'maalahum

47:10.t: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fayanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; dammaral laahu 'alaihim Wa-lilkaafireena amsaaluhaa

47:11.t: Zaalika bi-annal laaha mawlal lazeena aamanoo Wa-annal kaafireena laa mawlaa lahum

47:12.t: Innal-laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wallazeena kafaroo yatamatta'oona Wa-ya'kuloona kamaa ta'kulul an'aamu wan Naaru maswan lahum

47:13.t: Wa-ka-ayyim min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatam min qaryatikal lateee akhrajatka ahlaknaahum falaa naasira lahum

47:14.t: Afaman kaana 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbihee kaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum

47:15.t: Masalul jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona feehaaa anhaarum min maaa'in ghayri aasininw Wa-anhaarum mil labanil lam yataghaiyar ta'muhoo Wa-anhaarum min khamril lazzatin li-shaaribeena Wa-anhaarum min 'asalim musaffanw Wa-lahum feeha min kullis samaraati Wa-maghfiratum mir Rabbihim kaman huwa khaalidun fin naari Wa-suqoo maaa'an hameeman faqatta'a am'aaa'ahum

47:16.t: Wa-minhum maien yastami'u ilaika hattaaa izaa kharajoo min 'indika qaaloo lil-lazeena ootul 'ilma maazaa qaala aanifaa; ulaaa'ikal lazeena taba'al laahu 'alaa quloobihim wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum

47:17.t: Wallazeenah tadaw zaadahum hudanw Wa-aataahum taqwaahum

47:18.t: Fahal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an ta'tiyahum baghtatan faqad jaaa'a ashraatuhaa; fa-annaa lahum izaa jaaa'at-hum zikraahum

47:19.t: Fa'lam annahoo laaa ilaaha illal laahu wastaghfir lizambika Wa-lilmu'mineena walmu'minaat; wallaahu ya'lamu mutaqallabakum Wa-maswaakum

47:20.t: Wa-yaqoolul lazeena aamanoo law-laa nuzzilat Sooratun fa-izaaa unzilat Sooratum Muhkamatunw Wa-zukira feehal qitaalu ra-aytal lazeena fee quloobihim maraduien yanzuroona ilaika nazaral maghshiyyi 'alaihi minal mawti fa'awlaa lahum

47:21.t: Taa'atunw Wa-qawlum ma'roof; fa-izaa 'azamal amru falaw sadaqul laaha lakaana khairal lahum

47:22.t: Fahal 'asaitum in tawallaitum an tufsidoo fil ardi Wa-tuqatti'ooo arhaamakum

47:23.t: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena la'anahumul laahu fa-asammahum Wa-a'maaa absaarahum

47:24.t: Afalaa yatadabbaroonal Qur-aana am 'alaa quloobin aqfaaluhaa

47:25.t: Innal lazeenar taddoo 'alaaa adbaarihim min ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudash Shaitaanu sawwala lahum Wa-amlaa lahum

47:26.t: Zaalika bi-annahum qaaloo lillazeena karihoo maa nazzalal laahu sanutee'ukum fee ba'dil amri wallaahu ya'lamu israarahum

47:27.t: Fakaifa izaa tawaffat-humul malaaa'ikatu yadriboona wujoohahum Wa-adbaa-rahum

47:28.t: Zaalika bi-annahumut taba'oo maaa askhatal laaha Wa-karihoo ridwaanahoo fa-ahbata a'maalahum

47:29.t: Am hasibal lazeena fee quloobihim maradun al laien yukhrijal laahu adghaanahum

47:30.t: Wa-law nashaaa'u la-arainaakahum fala-'araftahum bi-seemaahum; Wa-lata'rifan-nahum fee lahnil qawl; wallaahu ya'lamu a'maalakum

47:31.t: Wa-lanabluwannakum hattaa na'lamal mujaahideena minkum wassaabireena Wa-nabluwa akhbaarakum

47:32.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo Wa-saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi Wa-shaaaqqur Rasoola min ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudaa laien yadurrul laaha shai'anw Wa-sa-yuhbitu a'maalahum

47:33.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo atee'ul laaha Wa-atee'ur Rasoola Wa-laa tubtilooo a'maalakum

47:34.t: Innal lazeena kafaroo Wa-saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi summa maatoo Wa-hum kuffaarun falaien yaghfiral laahu lahum

47:35.t: Falaa tahinoo Wa-tad'ooo ilas salmi Wa-antumul a'lawna wallaahu ma'akum Wa-lany yatirakum a'maalakum

47:36.t: Innamal hayaatud dunyaa la'ibunw Wa-lahw; Wa-in tu'minoo Wa-tattaqoo yu'tikum ujoorakum Wa-laa yas'alkum amwaalakum

47:37.t: Ien yas'alkumoohaa fa-yuhfikum tabkhaloo Wa-yukhrij adghaanakum

47:38.t: Haaa antum haaa'ulaaa'i tud'awna litunfiqoo fee sabeelillaahi faminkum many yabkhalu Wa-many yabkhal fa-innamaa yabkhalu 'an nafsih; wallaahu Ghaniyyu Wa-antumul fuqaraaa'; Wa-in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghairakum summa laa yakoonooo amsaalakum

48:2.t: Liyaghfira lakal laahu maa taqaddama min zanbika Wa-maa ta-akhkhara Wa-yutimma ni'matahoo 'alaika Wa-yahdiyaka siraatan mustaqeema

48:4.t: Huwal lazeee anzalas sakeenata fee quloobil mu'mineena liyazdaadooo eemaanamma'a eemaanihim; Wa-lillaahi junoodus samawaati wal ard; Wa-kaanal laahu 'Aleeman Hakeemaa

48:5.t: Liyudkhilal mu'mineena walmu'minaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa Wa-yukaffira 'anhum saiyyi-aatihim; Wa-kaana zaalika 'indal laahi fawzan 'azeemaa

48:6.t: Wa-yu'azzibal munaafiqeena walmunaafiqaati wal-mushrikeena walmushrikaatiz zaaanneena billaahi zannas saw'; 'alaihim daaa'iratus saw'i Wa-ghadibal laahu 'alaihim Wa-la'anahum Wa-a'adda lahum jahannama Wa-saaa-at maseeraa

48:7.t: Wa-lillaahi junoodus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-kaanal laahu 'azeezan hakeema

48:9.t: Litu-minoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-tu'azziroohu watuwaqqiroohu watusabbi-hoohu bukratanw Wa-aseelaa

48:10.t: Innal lazeena yubaayi'oonaka innamaa yubaayi'oonal laaha yadul laahi fawqa aydeehim; faman nakasa fainnamaa yankusu 'alaa nafsihee Wa-man awfaa bimaa 'aahada 'alaihullaaha fasa yu'teehi ajran 'azeemaa

48:11.t: Sa-yaqoolu lakal mukhal-lafoona minal A'raabi shaighalatnaaa amwaalunaa Wa-ahloonaa fastaghfir lanaa; yaqooloona bi-alsinatihim maa laisa fee quloobihim; qul famaien yamliku lakum minal laahi shai'an in araada bikum darran aw araada bikum naf'aa; bal kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeeraa
