48:12.t: Bal zanantum al laien yanqalibar Rasoolu walmu'minoona ilaaa ahleehim abadanw Wa-zuyyina zaalika fee quloobikum Wa-zanantum zannnas saw'i Wa-kuntum qawmam booraa

48:13.t: Wa-mal lam yu'mim billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee fainnaaa a'tadnaa lilkaafireena sa'eeraa

48:14.t: Wa-lillaahii mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; yaghfiru limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yu'azzibu maien yashaaa'; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

48:15.t: Sa-yaqoolul mukhalla-foona izan talaqtum ilaa maghaanima litaakhuzoohaa zaroonaa nattabi'kum yureedoona any yubaddiloo Kalaamallaah; qul lan tattabi'oonaa kazaalikum qaalal laahu min qablu fasa yaqooloona bal tahsudoonanna; bal kaanoo laa yafqahoona illaa qaleela

48:16.t: Qul lilmukhallafeena minal A'raabi satud'awna ilaa qawmin ulee baasin shadeedin tuqaati-loonahum aw yuslimoona fa-in tutee'oo yu'tikumul laahu ajran hasananw Wa-in tatawallaw kamaa tawallaitum min qablu yu'azzibkum 'azaaban aleemaa

48:17.t: Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw Wa-laa 'alal a'raji harajunw Wa-laa 'alal mareedi haraj' Wa-maien yutil'il laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru Wa-maien yatawalla yu'azzibhu 'azaaban aleemaa

48:18.t: Laqad radiyal laahu 'anil mu'mineena iz yubaayi-'oonaka tahtash shajarati fa'alima maa fee quloobihim fa-anzalas sakeenata 'alaihim Wa-asaa-bahum fat-han qareebaa

48:19.t: Wa-maghaanima kaseera-taien yaakhuzoonahaa; Wa-kaanal laahu 'Azeezan Hakeemaa

48:20.t: Wa'adakumul laahu ma-ghaanima kaseeratan taakhuzoo-nahaa fa'ajjala lakum haazihee Wa-kaffa aydiyan naasi 'ankum Wa-litakoona aayatal lilmu'mineena Wa-yahdiyakum siraatam mustaqeema

48:21.t: Wa-ukhraa lam taqdiroo 'alaihaa qad ahaatal laahu bihaa; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeera

48:22.t: Wa-law qaatalakumul lazeena kafaroo la-wallawul adbaara summa laa yajidoona waliyanw-wa laa naseeraa

48:23.t: Sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat min qablu Wa-lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelaa

48:24.t: Wa-Huwal lazee kaffa aydiyahum 'ankum Wa-aydiyakum 'anhum bibatni Makkata mim ba'di an azfarakum 'alaihim; Wa-kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseera

48:25.t: Humul lazeena kafaroo Wa-saddookum 'anil-Masjidil-Haraami walhadya ma'koofan any yablugha mahillah; Wa-law laa rijaalum mu'minoona Wa-nisaaa'um mu'minaatul lam ta'lamoohum an tata'oohum fatuseebakum minhum ma'arratum bighairi 'ilmin liyud khilal laahu fee rahmatihee many yashaaa'; law tazayyaloo la'azzabnal lazeena kafaroo minhum 'azaaban aleema

48:26.t: Iz ja'alal lazeena kafaroo fee quloobihimul hamiyyata hamiyyatal jaahiliyyati fa-anzalal laahu sakeenatahoo 'alaa Rasoolihee Wa-'alal mu-mineena Wa-alzamahum kalimatat taqwaa Wa-kaanooo ahaqqa bihaa Wa-ahlahaa; Wa-kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in Aleema

48:27.t: Laqad sadaqal laahu Rasoolahur ru'yaa bilhaqq, latadkhulunnal Masjidal Haraama in shaaa'al laahu aamineena muhalliqeena ru'oosakum Wa-muqassireena laa takhaafoona fa'alima maa lam ta'lamoo faja'ala min dooni zaalika fathan qareebaa

48:28.t: Huwal lazeee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa Wa-deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullih; Wa-kafaa billaahi Shaheeda

48:29.t: Muhammadur Rasoolul laah; wallazeena ma'ahooo ashiddaaa'u 'alal kuffaaari ruhamaaa'u bainahum taraahum rukka'an sujjadaien yabtaghoona fadlam minal laahi Wa-ridwaanan seemaahum fee wujoohihim min asaris sujood; zaalika masaluhum fit tawraah; Wa-masaluhum fil Injeeli kazar'in akhraja shat-'ahoo fa-'aazarahoo fastaghlaza fastawaa 'alaa sooqihee yu'jibuz zurraa'a liyagheeza bihimul kuffaar; wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati minhum maghfiratanw Wa-ajran 'azeemaa

49:1.t: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tuqaddimoo baina yada-yil laahi Wa-Rasoolihee wattaqul laah; innal laaha samee'un 'Aleem

49:2.t: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tarfa'ooo aswaatakum fawqa sawtin Nabiyyi Wa-laa tajharoo lahoo bilqawli kajahri ba'dikum liba-'din an tahbata a-'maalukum Wa-antum laa tash'uroon

49:3.t: Innal lazeena yaghud-doona aswaatahum 'inda Rasoolil laahi ulaaa'ikal lazeenam tah-anal laahu quloobahum littaqwaa; lahum maghfiratunw waajrun 'azeem

49:4.t: Innal lazeena yunaadoo-naka minw waraaa'il hujuraati aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon

49:5.t: Wa-law annahum sabaroo hatta takhruja ilaihim lakaana khairal lahum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

49:6.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo in jaaa'akum faasqum binaba-in fatabaiyanooo an tuseeboo qawmam bijahalatin fatusbihoo 'alaa maa fa'altum naadimeen

49:7.t: Wa'lamooo anna feekum Rasoolal laah; law yutee'ukum fee kaseerim minal amrila 'anittum Wa-laakinnal laaha habbaba ilaikumul eemaana Wa-zaiyanahoo fee quloobikum Wa-karraha ilaikumul kufra walfusooqa wal'isyaan; ulaaaika humur raashidoon

49:8.t: Fadlam minal laahi Wa-ni'mah; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

49:9.t: Wa-in taaa'ifataani minal mu'mineena naqtataloo fa-aslihoo bainahumaa; fa-im baghat ihdaahumaa 'alal ukhraa faqaatilul latee tabghee hattaa tafeee'a ilaaa amril laah; fa-in faaa'at fa-aslihoo bainahumaa bil'adli Wa-aqsitoo, innal laaha yuhibbul muqsiteen

49:10.t: Innamal mu'minoona ikhwatun fa-aslihoo baina akhawaykum wattaqul laaha la'allakum turhamoon

49:11.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa yaskhar qawmum min qawmin 'asaaa aien yakoonoo khairam minhum Wa-laa nisaaa'um min nisaaa'in 'Asaaa ay yakunna khairam minhunna Wa-laa talmizooo anfusakum Wa-laa tanaabazoo bil alqaab; bi'sal ismul fusooqu ba'dal eemaan; Wa-mal-lam yatub fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

49:12.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanuj taniboo kaseeram minaz zanni inna ba'daz zanni ismunw Wa-laa tajassasoo Wa-la yaghtab ba'dukum ba'daa; a-yuhibbu ahadukum aien yaakula lahma akheehi maitan fakarih-tumooh; wattaqul laa; innal laaha tawwaabur Raheem

49:13.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan naasu innaa khalaqnaakum min zakarinw Wa-unsaa Wa-ja'alnaakum shu'oobanw Wa-qabaaa'ila lita'aarafoo inna akramakum 'indal laahi atqaakum innal laaha 'Aleemun khabeer

49:14.t: Qaalatil-A 'raabu aamannaa qul lam tu'minoo Wa-laakin qoolooo aslamnaa Wa-lamma yadkhulil eemaanu fee quloobikum Wa-in tutee'ul laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo laa yalitkum min a'maalikum shai'aa; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

49:15.t: Innamal muu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee summa lam yartaaboo Wa-jaahadoo biamwaalihim Wa-anfusihim fee sabeelil laah; ulaaaika humus saadiqoon

49:16.t: Qul atu'allimoonal laaha bideenikum wallaahu ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ard; wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

49:17.t: Yamunnoona 'alaika an aslamoo qul laa tamunnoo 'alaiya Islaamakum balil laahu yamunnu 'alaikum an hadaakum lil-eemaani in kuntum saadiqeen

49:18.t: Innal laaha ya'lamu ghaibas samaawaati wal-ard; wallaahu baseerum bimaa ta'maloon

50:2.t: Bal 'ajibooo an jaa'ahum munzirum minhum faqaalal kaafiroona haazaa shai'un 'ajeeb

50:3.t: A-izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaaban zaalika raj'um ba'eed

50:4.t: Qad 'alimnaa maa tanqu-sul ardu minhum Wa-'indanaa Kitaabun Hafeez

50:5.t: Bal kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fahum feee amrim mareej

50:6.t: Afalam yanzurooo ilas samaaa'i fawqahum kaifa banainaahaa Wa-zaiyannaahaa Wa-maa lahaa min furooj

50:7.t: Wal-arda madadnaahaa Wa-alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya Wa-ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjim baheej

50:9.t: Wa-nazzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am mubaarakan fa-ambatnaa bihee jannaatinw Wa-habbal haseed

50:11.t: Rizqal lil'ibaad, Wa-ahyainaa bihee baldatam maitaa; kazaalikal khurooj

50:12.t: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw Wa-Ashaabur Rassi Wa-Samood

50:14.t: Wa-Ashaabul Aykati Wa-qawmu Tubba'; kullun kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa wa'eed

50:15.t: Afa'a-yeenaa bilkhalqil awwal; bal hum fee labsim min khalqin jadeed

50:16.t: Wa-laqad khalaqnal insaana Wa-na'lamu maa tuwaswisu bihee nafsuhoo Wa-Nahnu aqrabu ilaihi min hablil wareed

50:17.t: Iz yatalaqqal mutalaqqi-yaani 'anil yameeni Wa-'anish shimaali qa'eed

50:18.t: Maa yalfizu min qawlin illaa ladaihi raqeebun 'ateed

50:19.t: Wa-jaaa'at sakratul mawti bilhaqq; zaalika maa kunta minhu taheed

50:20.t: Wa-nufikha fis Soor; zaalika yawmul wa'eed

50:21.t: Wa-jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw Wa-shaheed

50:22.t: Laqad kunta fee ghaf-latim min haazaa fakashafnaa 'anka ghitaaa'aka fabasarukal yawma hadeed

50:26.t: Allazee ja'ala ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fa-alqiyaahu fil 'azaabish shadeed

50:27.t: Qaala qareenuhoo Rabbanaa maaa atghaituhoo Wa-laakin kaana fee dalaalin ba'eed

50:28.t: Qaala laa takhtasimoo ladaayya Wa-qad qaddamtu ilaikum bilwa'eed

50:29.t: Maa yubaddalul qawlu ladaiya Wa-maaa ana bizal-laamil lil'abeed

50:30.t: Yawma naqoolu li'jahannama halim talaati Wa-taqoolu hal mim mazeed

50:32.t: Haaza maa too'adoona likulli awwaabin hafeez

50:33.t: Man khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaibi Wa-jaaa'a biqalbim muneeb

50:35.t: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona feehaa Wa-ladainaa mazeed

50:36.t: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fil bilaad, hal mim mahees

50:37.t: Inna fee zaalika lazikraa liman kaana lahoo qalbun aw alqas sam'a Wa-huwa shaheed

50:38.t: Wa-laqad khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaamin Wa-maa massanaa mil lughoob

50:39.t: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona Wa-sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi Wa-qablal ghuroob

50:41.t: Wastami' yawma yunaa-dil munaadi mim makaanin qareeb

50:42.t: Yawma yasmaoonas sai-hata bilhaqq zaalika yawmul khurooj

50:43.t: Innaa Nahnu nuhyee Wa-numeetu Wa-ilainal maseer

50:44.t: Yawma tashaqqaqul ardu 'anhum siraa'aa; zaalika hashrun 'alainaa yaseer

50:45.t: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona Wa-maaa anta 'alaihim bijabbaarin fazakkir bil-quraani maien yakhaafu wa'eed

51:14.t: Zooqoo fitnatakum haa-zal lazee kuntum bihee tas-ta'jiloon

51:16.t: Aakhizeena maaa aataahum Rabbuhum; innahum kaanoo qabla zaalika muhsineen

51:17.t: kaanoo qaleelam minal laili maa yahja'oon

51:23.t: Fawa-Rabbis samaaa'i wal-ardi innahoo lahaqqum misla maa annakum tantiqoon

51:24.t: Hal ataaka hadeesu daifi Ibraaheemal mukrameen

51:25.t: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun qawmum munkaroon

51:26.t: Faraagha ilaaa ahlihee fajaaa'a bi'ijlin sameen

51:28.t: Fa-awjasa minhum khee-fatan qaaloo laa takhaf Wa-bashsharoohu bighulaamin 'aleem

51:29.t: Fa-aqbalatim ra-atuhoo fee sarratin fasakkat wajhahaa Wa-qaalat 'ajoozun 'aqeem

51:30.t: Qaaloo kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki innahoo huwal hakeemul 'aleem

51:32.t: Qaalooo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen

51:35.t: Fa-akhrajnaa man kaana feehaa minal mu'mineen

51:36.t: Famaa wajadnaa feehaa ghaira baitim minal muslimeen

51:37.t: Wa-taraknaa feehaaa aayatal lillazeena yakhaafoonal 'azaabal aleem

51:38.t: Wa-fee Moosaaa iz arsalnaahu ilaa Fir'awna bisultaa-nim mubeen

51:39.t: Fatawalla biruknihee Wa-qaala saahirun aw majnoon

51:40.t: Fa-akhaznaahu Wa-junoo-dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi Wa-huwa muleem

51:42.t: Maa tazaru min shai'in atat 'alaihi illaa ja'alat-hu karrameem

51:43.t: Wa-fee Samooda iz qeela lahum tamatta''oo hattaa heen

51:44.t: Fa'ataw 'an amri Rabbihim fa-akhazal-humus saa'iqatu Wa-hum yanzuroon

51:45.t: Famas tataa'oo min qiyaaminw Wa-maa kaanoo muntasireen

51:46.t: Wa-qawma Noohim min qablu innahum kaano qawman faasiqeen

51:49.t: Wa-min kulli shai'in khalaqnaa zawjaini la'allakum tazakkaroon

51:50.t: Fafirrooo ilal laahi innee lakum minhu nazeerum mubeen

51:51.t: Wa-laa taj'aloo ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara innee lakum minhu nazeerum mubeen

51:52.t: Kazaalika maaa atal lazeena min qablihim mir Rasoolin illaa qaaloo saahirun aw majnoon

51:53.t: Atawaasaw bih; bal hum qawmun taaghoon

51:56.t: Wa-maa khalaqtul jinna wal-insa illaa liya'budoon

51:57.t: Maaa ureedu minhum mir rizqinw Wa-maaa ureedu aien yut'imoon

51:58.t: Innal laaha Huwar Razzaaqu Zul Quwwatil Mateen

51:59.t: Fa-inna lillazeena zalamoo zanoobam misla zanoobi ashaabihim falaa yasta'jiloon

51:60.t: Fawailul lillazeena kafaroo mien yawmihimul lazee yoo'adoon

52:13.t: Yawma yuda'-'oona ilaa naari jahannama da'-'aa

52:14.t: Haazihin naarul latee kuntum bihaa tukazziboon

52:15.t: Afasihrun haazaaaa am antum laa tubsiroon

52:16.t: Islawhaa fasbirooo aw laa tasbiroo sawaaa'un 'alaikum innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon

52:18.t: Faakiheena bimaaa aataahum rabbuhum Wa-waqaahum rabbuhum 'azaabal jaheem

52:19.t: Kuloo washraboo haneee-'am bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

52:21.t: Wallazeena aamanoo wattaba'at-hum zurriyyatuhum bieemaanin alhaqnaa bihim zurriyyatahum Wa-maaa alatnaahum min 'amalihim min shai'; kullum ri'im bimaa kasaba raheen

52:23.t: Yatanaaza'oona feehaa kaasal laa laghwun feehaa Wa-laa taaseem

52:24.t: Wa-yatoofu 'alaihim ghilmaanul lahum ka-annahum lu'lu'um maknoon

52:26.t: Qaalooo innaa kunnaa qablu feee ahlinaa mushfiqeen

52:28.t: Innaa kunnaa min qablu nad'oohu innahoo huwal barrur raheem

52:29.t: Fazakkir famaaa anta bini'mati rabbika bikaahininw Wa-laa majnoon

52:30.t: Am yaqooloona shaa'irun natarabbasu bihee raibal manoon

52:31.t: Qul tarabbasoo fa-innee ma'akum minal mutarabbiseen

52:32.t: Am taamuruhum ahlaamuhum bihaazaaa am hum qawmun taaghoon

52:33.t: Am yaqooloona taqawwalah; bal laa yu'minoon

52:34.t: Falyaatoo bihadeesim misliheee in kaanoo saadiqeen

52:35.t: Am khuliqoo min ghairi shai'in am humul khaaliqoon

52:36.t: Am khalaqus samaawaati wal-ard; bal laa yooqinoon

52:37.t: Am 'indahum khazaaa'inu rabbika am humul musaitiroon

52:38.t: Am lahum sullamuien yastami'oona feehi falyaati mustami'uhum bisultaanim mubeen

52:40.t: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim maghramim musqaloon

52:42.t: Am yureedoona kaidan fallazeena kafaroo humul makeedoon

52:43.t: Am lahum ilaahun ghairul laa; subhaanal laahi 'ammaa yushrikoon

52:44.t: Wa-ien yaraw kisfam minas samaaa'i saaqitaien yaqooloo sahaabum markoom

52:45.t: Fazarhum hatta yulaaqoo yawmahumul lazee feehi yus'aqoon

52:46.t: Yawma laa yughnee 'anhum kaidumhum shai'anw Wa-laa hum yunsaroon

52:47.t: Wa-inna lillazeena zalamoo 'azaaban doona zalika Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

52:48.t: Wasbir lihukmi rabbika fa-innaka bi-a'yuninaa Wa-sabbih bihamdi rabbika heena taqoom

53:18.t: Laqad ra-aa min aayaati Rabbihil kubraaa

53:23.t: In hiya illaaa asmaaa'un sammaitumoohaaa antum Wa-aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa min sultaan; ien yattabi'oona illaz zanna Wa-maa tahwal anfusu Wa-laqad jaaa'ahum mir Rabbihimul hudaa

53:26.t: Wa-kam mim malakin fis samaawaati laa tughnee shafaa'atuhum shai'an illaa mim ba'di aien yaazanal laahu limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yardaa

53:27.t: innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-aakhirati la-yusammoonal malaaa'ikata tasmiyatal unsaa

53:28.t: Wa-maa lahum bihee min 'ilmin ien yattabi'oona illaz zanna Wa-innaz zanna laa yughnee minal haqqi shai'aa

53:29.t: Fa-a'rid 'am man tawallaa 'an zikrinaa Wa-lam yurid illal hayaatad dunyaa

53:30.t: Zalika mablaghuhum minal 'ilm; inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabee-lihee Wa-huwa a'lamu bimanih tadaa

53:31.t: Wa-lillaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi liyajziyal lazeena asaaa'oo bimaa 'amiloo Wa-yajziyal lazeena ahsanoo bilhusnaa

53:32.t: Allazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi walfawaa-hisha illal lamam; inna rabbaka waasi'ul maghfirah; huwa a'lamu bikum iz ansha-akum minal ardi Wa-iz antum ajinnatun fee butooni umma-haatikum falaa tuzakkooo anfusakum huwa a'lamu bimanit taqaa

53:36.t: Am lam yunabbaa bimaa fee suhuhfi Moosa

53:39.t: Wa-al laisa lil-insaani illaa maa sa'aa

53:52.t: Wa-qawma Noohim min qablu innahum kaanoo hum azlama Wa-atghaa

53:58.t: Laisa lahaa min doonil laahi kaashifah

54:2.t: Wa-ien yaraw aayataien yu'ridoo Wa-yaqooloo sihrun mustamirr

54:3.t: Wa-kazzaboo wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum; Wa-kullu amrin mustaqirr

54:4.t: Wa-laqad jaaa'ahum minal anbaaa'i maa feehi muzdajar

54:6.t: Fatawalla 'anhum; yawma yad'ud daa'i ilaa shai-'in nukur

54:7.t: Khushsha'an absaaruhum yakhrujoona minal ajdaasi ka-annahum jaraadum muntashir

54:8.t: Muhti'eena ilad daa'i yaqoolul kaafiroona haazaa yawmun 'asir

54:9.t: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohin fakazzaboo 'abdanaa Wa-qaaloo majnoonunw wazdujir

54:12.t: Wa-fajjarnal arda 'uyoonan faltaqal maaa'u 'alaaa amrin qad qudir

54:14.t: Tajree bi-a'yuninaa jazaaa'an liman kaana kufir

54:15.t: Wa-laqat taraknaahaa aayatan fahal min muddakir

54:17.t: Wa-laqad yassarnal Qur'aana liz-zikri fahal min muddakir

54:19.t: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim reehan sarsaran fee Yawmi nahsin mustamirr

54:20.t: Tanzi'un naasa ka-annahum a'jaazu nakhlin munqa'ir

54:22.t: Wa-laqad yassarnal Qur'aana liz-zikri fahal min muddakir

54:24.t: Faqaalooo a'-basharan minnaa waahidan nattabi'uhooo innaa izal lafee dalaalinw Wa-su'ur

54:25.t: A-ulqiyaz zikru 'alaihi min baininaa bal huwa kazzaabun ashir

54:27.t: Innaa mursilun naaqati fitnatan lahum fartaqibhum wastabir

54:28.t: Wa-nabbi'hum annal maaa'a qismatun bainahum kullu shirbin muhtadar

54:31.t: Innaaa arsalnaa 'alaihim saihatanw waahidatan fakaanoo kahasheemil muhtazir

54:32.t: Wa-laqad yassarnal Qur'aana liz-zikri fahal min muddakir

54:34.t: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim haasiban illaaa aala Lootin najjainaahum bisahar

54:35.t: Ni'matan min 'indinaa; kazaalika najzee man shakar

54:37.t: Wa-laqad raawadoohu 'an daifeehee fatamasnaaa a'yunahum fazooqoo 'azaabee Wa-nuzur

54:40.t: Wa-laqad yassarnal Qur'aana liz-zikri fahal min muddakir

54:42.t: Kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa kullihaa fa-akhaznaahum akhza 'azeezim muqtadir

54:43.t: A-kuffaarukum khairun min ulaaa'ikum am lakum baraaa'atun fiz Zubur

54:46.t: Balis Saa'atu maw'iduhum was-Saa'atu adhaa Wa-amarr

54:48.t: Yawma yus-haboona fin Naari 'alaa wujoohihim zooqoo massa saqar

54:50.t: Wa-maaa amrunaaa illaa waahidatun ka-lamhin bil-basar

54:51.t: Wa-laqad ahlaknaaa ashyaa'akum fahal min muddakir

55:9.t: Wa-aqeemul wazna bilqisti Wa-laa tukhsirul meezaan

55:15.t: Wa-khalaqal jaaan mim maarijim min naar

55:24.t: Wa-lahul jawaaril mun-sha'aatu fil bahri kal-a'laam

55:27.t: Wa-yabqaa wajhu rabbika zul jalaali wal-ikraam

55:29.t: Yas'aluhoo man fis samaawaati walard; kulla yawmin huwa fee shaan

55:33.t: Yaa-ma'sharal jinni wal-insi inis tata'tum an tanfuzoo min aqtaaris samaawaati wal-ardi fanfuzoo; laa tanfuzoona illaa bisultaan

55:35.t: Yursalu 'alaikumaa shuwaazum min naarinw-wa nuhaasun falaa tantasiraan

55:37.t: Fa-izan shaqqatis samaaa'u fakaanat wardatan kaddihaan

55:39.t: Fa-yawma'izil laa yus'alu 'an zambiheee insunw Wa-laa jaann

55:41.t: Yu'raful mujrimoona biseemaahum fa'yu'khazu binna-waasi wal-aqdaam

55:43.t: Haazihee jahannamul latee yukazzibu bihal mujrimoon

55:54.t: Muttaki'eena 'alaa furushim bataaa'inuhaa min istabraq; wajanal jannataini daan

55:56.t: Feehinna qaasiratut tarfi lam yatmishunna insun qablahum Wa-laa jaaann

55:74.t: Lam yatmis-hunna insun qablahum Wa-laa jaaann

55:78.t: Tabaarak asmu Rabbika Zil Jalaali wal-Ikraam

56:25.t: Laa yasma'oona feehaa laghwanw Wa-laa taaseemaa

56:47.t: Wa-kaanoo yaqooloona a'izaa mitnaa Wa-kunnaa turaabanw Wa-izaaman 'ainnaa lamab'oosoon

56:60.t: Nahnu qaddarnaa baina-kumul mawta Wa-maa nahnu bimasbooqeen

56:61.t: Alaaa an nubaddila amsaalakum Wa-nunshi'akum fee maa laa ta'lamoon

56:65.t: Law nashaaa'u laja'al-naahu hutaaman fazaltum tafakkahoon

56:69.t: A-antum anzaltumoohu minal muzni am nahnul munziloon

56:70.t: Law nashaaa'u ja'alnaahu ujaajan falaw-laa tashkuroon

56:72.t: A-antum anshaatum shajaratahaaa am nahnul munshi'oon

56:85.t: Wa-nahnu aqrabu ilaihi minkum Wa-laakil laa tubsiroon

56:90.t: Wa-ammaaa in kaana min as-haabil yameen

56:92.t: Wa-ammaaa in kaana minal mukazzibeenad daaalleen

57:1.t: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

57:2.t: Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi yuhyee Wa-yumeetu Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

57:3.t: Huwal Awwalu wal'Aakhiru waz-Zaahiru wal-Baatinu Wa-huwa bikulli shai'in Aleem

57:4.t: Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda fee sittati ayyaamin summas tawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ya'lamu maa yaliju filardi Wa-maa yakhruju minhaa Wa-maa yanzilu minas samaaa'i Wa-maa ya'ruju feeha Wa-Huwa ma'akum ayna maa kuntum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

57:5.t: Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

57:6.t: Yoolijul laila fin nahaari Wa-yoolijun nahaara fil lail; Wa-Huwa 'Aleemum bizaatis sudoor

57:7.t: Aaaminoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-anfiqoo mimmaa ja'alakum mustakh-lafeena feehi fallazeena aamanoo minkum Wa-anfaqoo lahum ajrun kabeer

57:8.t: Wa-maa lakum laa tu'minoona billaahi war-Rasoolu yad'ookum li-tu'minoo bi-Rabbikum Wa-qad akhaza meesaaqakum in kuntum mu'mineen

57:9.t: Huwal lazee yunazzilu 'alaa 'abdiheee Aayaatim baiyinaatil liyukhrijakum minaz zulumaati ilan noor; Wa-innal laaha bikum la-Ra'oofur Raheem

57:10.t: Wa-maa lakum allaa tunfiqoo fee sabeelil laahi Wa-lillaahi meeraasus samaawaati wal-ard; laa yastawee minkum man anfaqa min qablil fat-hi Wa-qaatal; ulaaa'ika a'zamu darajatam minal lazeena anfaqoo min ba'du Wa-qaataloo; Wa-kullanw wa'ad allaahul husnaa; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer

57:11.t: Man zal lazee yuqridul laaha qardan hasanan fa-yudaa'ifahoo lahoo Wa-lahooo ajrun kareem

57:12.t: Yawma taral mu'mineena walmu'minaati yas'aa nooruhum baina aydeehim Wa-bi-aymaanihim bushraakumul yawma jannaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feeha; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

57:13.t: Yawma yaqoolul munaafiqoona walmunaafiqaatu lil-lazeena aamanun zuroonaa naqtabis min noorikum qeela irji'oo waraaa'akum faltamisoo nooran faduriba bainahum bisooril lahoo baabun, baatinuhoo feehir rahmatu Wa-zaahiruhoo min qibalihi 'azaab

57:14.t: Yunaadoonahum alam nakum ma'akum qaaloo balaa Wa-laakinnakum fatantum anfusakum Wa-tarabbastum wartabtum Wa-gharratkumul amaaniyyu hatta jaaa'a amrul laahi Wa-gharrakum billaahil gharoor

57:15.t: Fal-Yawma laa yu'khazu minkum fidyatunw Wa-laa minal lazeena kafaroo; ma'waakumun Naaru hiya maw-laakum Wa-bi'sal maseer

57:16.t: Alam ya'ni lil-lazeena aamanooo an takhsha'a quloobuhum lizikril laahi Wa-maa nazala minal haqqi Wa-laa yakoonoo kallazeena ootul Kitaaba min qablu fataala 'alaihimul amadu faqasat quloobuhum Wa-kaseerum minhum faasiqoon

57:17.t: I'lamooo annal laaha yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; qad baiyannaa lakumul Aayaati la'allakum ta'qiloon

57:18.t: Innal mussaddiqeena wal-mussaddiqaati Wa-aqradul laaha qardan hassanaien yudaa'afu lahum Wa-lahum ajrun kareem

57:19.t: Wallazeena aamanoo billaahi Wa-Rusuliheee ulaaa'ika humus siddeeqoon; wash-shuhadaaa'u 'inda Rabbihim lahum ajruhum Wa-nooruhum; wallazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-aayaatinaaa ulaaa'ika As-haabul jaheem

57:20.t: I'lamooo annamal hayaa-tud dunyaa la'ibunw Wa-lahwunw Wa-zeenatunw Wa-tafaakhurum bainakum Wa-takaasurun fil amwaali wal-awlaad, kamasali ghaisin a'jabal kuffaara nabaatuhoo summa yaheeju fataraahu musfaaran summa yakoonu hutaamaa; Wa-fil aakhirati 'azaabun shadeedunw Wa-magh-firatum minal laahi Wa-ridwaan; Wa-mal haiyaa-tud dun-yaaa illaa mataa'ul ghuroor

57:21.t: Saabiqooo ilaa maghfiratim mir Rabbikum Wa-jannatin 'arduhaa ka-'ardis samaaa'i wal-ardi u'iddat lillazeena aamanoo billaahi Wa-Rusulih; zaalika fadlul laahi yu'teehi maien yashaaa'; wal-laahu zul fadlil 'azeem

57:22.t: Maaa asaaba min museebatin fil ardi Wa-laa feee anfusikum illaa fee kitaabim min qabli an nabra-ahaa; innaa zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

57:23.t: Likailaa ta'saw 'alaa maa faatakum Wa-laa tafrahoo bimaaa aataakum; wallaahu laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhoor

57:24.t: Allazeeena yabkhaloona Wa-yaamuroonan naasa bil-bukhl; Wa-maien yatawalla fa-innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed

57:25.t: Laqad arsalnaa Rusulanaa bilbaiyinaati Wa-anzalnaa ma'ahumul Kitaaba wal-Meezaana liyaqooman naasu bilqist, Wa-anzalnal hadeeda feehi baasun shadeedunw Wa-manaafi'u linnaasi Wa-liya'lamal laahu many yansuruhoo Wa-Rusulahoo bilghaib; innal laaha Qawiyyun 'Azeez

57:26.t: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Noohanw Wa-Ibraaheema Wa-ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihiman nubuwwata wal-Kitaaba faminhum muhtad; Wa-kaseerum minhum faasiqoon

57:27.t: Summa qaffainaa 'alaa aasaarihim bi-Rusulinaa Wa-qaffainaa bi-'Eesab ni Maryama Wa-aatainaahul Injeela Wa-ja'alnaa fee quloobil lazeenat taba'oohu ra'fatanw Wa-rahmatanw rahbaaniyyatan ibtada'ooha maa katabnaahaa 'alaihim illab tighaaa'a ridwaanil laahi famaa ra'awhaa haqqa ri'aayatihaa; fa-aatainal lazeena aamanoo minhum ajrahum; Wa-kaseerum minhum faasiqoon

57:28.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamaanut taqul laaha Wa-aaminoo bi-Rasoolihee yu'tikum kiflaini mir rahmatihee Wa-yaj'al lakum nooran tamshoona bihee Wa-yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

57:29.t: Li'alla ya'lama Ahlul kitaabi allaa yaqdiroona 'alaa shai'in min fadlil laahi Wa-annal fadla bi-Yadil laahi yu'teehi maien yashaaa'; wallaahu Zul fadilil 'azeem

58:1.t: Qad sami'al laahu qawlal latee tujaadiluka fee zawjihaa Wa-tashtakeee ilal laahi wallaahu yasma'u tahaawurakumaa; innal laaha samee'um baseer

58:2.t: Allazeena yuzaahiroona minkum min nisaaa'ihim maa hunnaa ummahaatihim in ummahaatuhum illal laaa'ee waladnahum; Wa-innaahum la-yaqooloona munkaram minal qawli Wa-zooraa; Wa-innal laaha la'afuwwun ghafoor

58:3.t: Wallazeena yuzaahiroona min nisaaa'ihim summa ya'oodoona limaa qaaloo fatahreeru raqabatim min qabli aien yatamaaassaa; zaalikum too'azoona bih; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona khabeer

58:4.t: Famal lam yajid fa-siyaamu shahraini mutataabi'ayni min qabli aien yatamaaassaa famal lam yastati' fa-it'aamu sitteena miskeena; zaalika litu'minoo billaahi Wa-rasoolih'wa tilka hudoodul laah; Wa-lilkaafireena 'azaabun aleem

58:5.t: Innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo kubitoo kamaa kubital lazeena min qablihim; Wa-qad anzalnaaa aayaatim baiyinaat; Wa-lilkaa-fireena 'azaabum muheen

58:6.t: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahu jamee'an fayunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; ahsaahul laahu Wa-nasooh; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in shaheed

58:7.t: Alam tara annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi maa yakoonu min najwaa salaasatin illaa Huwa raabi'uhum Wa-laa khamsatin illaa huwa saadisuhum Wa-laaa adnaa min zaalika Wa-laaa aksara illaa huwa ma'ahum ayna, maa kaanoo summa yunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo yawmal qiyaamah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in aleem

58:8.t: Alam tara ilal lazeena nuhoo 'anin najwaa summa ya'oodoona limaa nuhoo 'anhu Wa-yatanaajawna bil-ismi wal'udwaani Wa-ma'siyatir rasooli Wa-izaa jaaa'ooka haiyawka bimaa lam yuhai-yika bihil laahu Wa-yaqooloona fee anfusihim law-laa yu'azzibunal laahu bimaa naqool; hasbuhum jahannnamu yaslawnahaa fabi'sal maseer

58:9.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa tanaajaytum falaa tatanaajaw bil-ismi wal-'udwaani Wa-ma'siyatir rasooli Wa-tanaajaw bil-birri wattaqwaa wattaqul laahal lazeee ilaihi tuhsharoon

58:10.t: Innaman najwaa minash shaitaani liyahzunal lazeena aamanoo Wa-laisa bidaaarrihim shai'an illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minoon

58:11.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa qeela lakum tafassahoo fil majaalisi fafsahoo yafsahil laahu lakum Wa-izaa qeelan shuzoo fanshuzoo yarfa'il laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum wallazeena ootul 'ilma darajaat; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona khabeer

58:12.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa naajitumur Rasoola faqaddimoo baina yadai najwaakum sadaqah; zaalika khairul lakum Wa-athar; fa-il lam tajidoo fa-innal laaha ghafoorur Raheem

58:13.t: A-ashfaqtum an tuqaddimoo baina yadai najwaakum sadaqaat; fa-iz lam taf'aloo Wa-taabal laahu 'alaikum fa-aqeemus Salaata Wa-aatuz Zakaata Wa-atee'ul laaha Wa-rasoolah; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

58:14.t: Alam tara ilal lazeena tawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim maa hum minkum Wa-laa minhum Wa-yahlifoona 'alal kazibi Wa-hum ya'lamoon

58:15.t: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeedan innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon

58:16.t: Ittakhazooo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laahi falahum 'azaabum muheen

58:17.t: Lan tughniya 'anhum amwaaluhum Wa-laaa awladuhum minal laahi shai'aa; ulaaa-'ika As-haabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon

58:18.t: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahu jamee'an fa-yahlifoona lahoo kamaa yahlifoona lakum Wa-yahsaboona annahum 'alaa shai'; alaaa innahum humul kaaziboon

58:19.t: Istahwaza 'alaihimush shaitaanu fa-ansaahum zikral laah; ulaaa'ika hizbush shaitaaan; alaaa innaa hizbash shaitaani humul khaasiroon

58:20.t: Innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha Wa-Rasoolahooo ulaaa'ika fil azalleen

58:21.t: Katabal laahu la-aghlibanna ana Wa-Rusulee; innal laaha qawiyyun 'Azeez

58:22.t: Laa tajidu qawmaien yu'minoona billaahi wal-yawmil aakhiri yuwaaaddoona man haaaddal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-law kaanooo aabaaa'ahum aw abnaaa'ahum aw ikhwaa-nahum aw 'asheeratahum; ulaaa'ika kataba fee quloobihi-mul eemaana Wa-ayyadahum biroohim minhu Wa-yudkhilu-hum jannatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; radiyal laahu 'anhum Wa-radoo 'anhu; ulaaa-'ika hizbul laah; alaaa inna hizbal laahi humul muflihoon

59:1.t: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

59:2.t: Huwal lazeee akharajal lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi min diyaarihim li-awwalil Hashr; maa zanantum aien yakhrujoo Wa-zannooo annahum maa-ni'atuhum husoonuhum minal laahi faataahumul laahu min haisu lam yahtasiboo Wa-qazafa fee quloobihimur ru'ba yukhriboona bu-yootahum bi-aydeehim Wa-aydil mu'mineena fa'tabiroo yaaa-ulil absaar

59:3.t: Wa-law-laaa an katabal laahu 'alaihimul jalaaa'a la'azzabahum fid dunyaa Wa-lahum fil Aakhirati 'azaabun Naar

59:4.t: Zaalika bi-annahum shaaqqul laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-maien yushaaaqqil laaha fa-innal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab

59:5.t: Maa qata'tum mil leenatin aw taraktumoohaa qaaa'imatan'alaaa usoolihaa fabi iznil laahi Wa-liyukhziyal faasiqeen

59:6.t: Wa-maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaaa Rasoolihee minhum famaaa awjaftum 'alaihi min khailiinw Wa-laa rikaabinw Wa-laakinnal laaha yusallitu Rusulahoo 'alaa maien yashaaa'; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

59:7.t: Maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaa Rasoolihee min ahlil quraa falillaahi Wa-lir-Rasooli Wa-lizil qurbaa wal-yataamaa walmasaakeeni wabnis sabeeli kai laa yakoona doolatam bainal aghniyaaa'i minkum; Wa-maaa aataakumur Rasoolu fakhuzoohu Wa-maa nahaakum 'anhu fantahoo; wattaqul laah(a) innal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab

59:8.t: Lilfuqaraaa'il Muhaaji-reenal lazeena ukhrijoo min diyaarihim Wa-amwaalihim yabtaghoona fadlam minal laahi Wa-ridwaananw Wa-yansuroonal laaha Wa-Rasoolah; ulaaa'ika humus saadiqoon

59:9.t: Wallazeena tabawwa'ud daara wal-eemaana min qablihim yuhibboona man haajara ilaihim Wa-laa yajidoona fee sudoorihim haajatam mimmaa ootoo Wa-yu'siroona 'alaa anfusihim Wa-law kaana bihim khasaasah; Wa-maien yooqa shuhha nafsihee fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

59:10.t: Wallazeena jaaa'oo min ba'dihim yaqooloona Rabbanagh fir lanaa Wa-li-ikhwaani-nal lazeena sabqoonaa bil-eemaani Wa-laa taj'al fee quloobinaa ghillalil lazeena aamanoo rabbannaaa innaka Ra'oofur Raheem

59:11.t: Alam tara ilal lazeena naafaqoo yaqooloona li-ikhwaanihimul lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi la'in ukhrijtum lanakhrujanna ma'akum Wa-laa nutee'u feekum ahadan abadanw wa-in qootiltum lanansuran-nakum wallaahu yashhadu innahum lakaaziboon

59:12.t: La'in ukhrijoo laa yakhrujoona ma'ahum Wa-la'in qootiloo laa yansuroonahum Wa-la'in nasaroohum la-yuwallunnal adbaara summa laa yunsaroon

59:13.t: La-antum ashaddu rahbatan fee sudoorihim minal laah; zaalika bi-annahum qawmul laa yafqahoon

59:14.t: Laa yuqaatiloonakum jamee'an illaa fee quram muhas-sanatin aw minw waraaa'i judur; baasuhum bainahum shadeed; tahsabuhum jamee'anw-wa quloobuhum shatta; zaalika biannahum qawmul laa ya'qiloon

59:15.t: Kamasalil lazeena min qablihim qareeban zaaqoo wabaala amrihim Wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem

59:16.t: Kamasalish shaitaani izqaala lil insaanik fur falammaa kafara qaala innee bareee'um minka inneee akhaaful laaha rabbal 'aalameen

59:17.t: Fakaana 'aaqibatahumaaa annahumaa fin naari khaalidaini feehaa; Wa-zaalika jazaaa'uz zaalimeen

59:18.t: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul-laaha; waltanzur nafsum maa qaddamat lighadiw wattaqual laah; innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

59:19.t: Wa-laa takoonoo kallazeena nasul laaha fa-ansaahum anfusahum; ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon

59:20.t: Laa yastaweee as-haabun naari Wa-ashaabul jannah; as-haabul jannati humul faaa'izoon

59:21.t: Law anzalnaa haazal quraana 'alaa jabilil lara-aytahoo khaashi'am muta-saddi'am min khashiyatil laah; Wa-tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi la'allahum yatafakkaroon

59:22.t: Huwal laahul lazee laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwa 'Aalimul Ghaibi wash-shahaada; Huwar Rahmaanur Raheem

59:23.t: Huwal laahul lazee laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwal Malikul Quddoosus Salaamul Muminul Muhaiminul 'aAzeezul Jabbaarul Mutakabbir; Subhaanal laahi 'Ammaa yushrikoon

59:24.t: Huwal Laahul Khaaliqul Baari-'ul Musawwir; lahul Asmaaa'ul Husnaa; yusabbihu lahoo maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

60:1.t: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizoo 'aduwwee Wa-'aduwaakum awliyaaa'a tulqoona ilaihim bilmawaddati Wa-qad kafaroo bima jaaa'akum minal haqq, yukhrijoonar Rasoola Wa-iyyaakum an tu'minoo billaahi rabbikum in kuntum kharajtum jihaadan fee sabeelee wabtighaaa'a mardaatee; tusirroona ilaihim bilma-waddati Wa-ana a'alamu bimaaa akhfaitum Wa-maaa a'lantum; Wa-many yaf'alhu minkum faqad dalla sawaaa'as sabeel

60:2.t: Ien yasqafookum yakoonoo lakum a'daaa'anw Wa-yabsutooo ilaikum aydiyahum Wa-alsinatahum bissooo'i Wa-waddoo law takfuroon

60:3.t: Lan tanfa'akum arhaamukum Wa-laaa awlaadukum; yawmal qiyaamati yafsilu bainakum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloon baseer

60:4.t: Qad kaanat lakum uswatun hasanatun feee Ibraaheema wallazeena ma'ahoo iz qaaloo liqawmihim innaa bura-'aaa'u minkum Wa-mimmaa ta'budoona min doonil laahi kafarnaa bikum Wa-badaa bainanaa Wa-bainakumul 'adaawatu wal-baghdaaa'u abadan hattaa tu'minoo billaahi wahdahooo illaa qawla Ibraheema li-abeehi la-astaghfiranna laka Wa-maaa amliku laka minal laahi min shai; rabbanaa 'alaika tawakkalnaa Wa-ilaika anabnaa Wa-ilaikal maseer

60:5.t: Rabbana laa taj'alnaa fitnatal lillazeena kafaroo waghfir lanaa rabbanaa innaka antal azeezul hakeem

60:6.t: Laqad kaana lakum feehim uswatunhasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal yawmal aakhir; Wa-many yatawalla fa-innal laaha huwal ghaniyyul hameed

60:7.t: Asal laahu any yaj'ala bainakum Wa-bainal lazeena 'aadaitum minhum mawaddah; wallahu qadeer; wallahu ghafoorur raheem

60:8.t: Laa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena lam yuqaatilookum fid deeni Wa-lam yukhrijookum min diyaarikum an tabarroohum Wa-tuqsitooo ilaihim; innal laaha yuhibbul muqsiteen

60:9.t: Innamaa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena qaatalookum fid deeni Wa-akhrajookum min diyaarikum Wa-zaaharoo 'alaa ikhraajikum an tawallawhum; Wa-many yatawallahum fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

60:10.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa jaaa'akumul mu'minaatu muhaajiraatin famtahinoo-hunn; Allaahu a'lamu bi-eemaani-hinn; fa-in 'alimtumoo-hunna mu'minaatin falaa tarji'oo-hunna ilal kuffaar; laa hunna hillul lahum Wa-laa hum yahilloona lahunna Wa-aatoohum maa anfaqoo Wa-laa junaaha 'alaikum an tankihoohunna izaaa aataitumoohunna ujoorahunn; Wa-laa tumsikoo bi-'isamil kawaafir; was'aloo maaa anfaqtum walyas'aloo maaa anfaqoo; zaalikum hukmul laahi yahkumu bainakum; wallaahu 'aleemun hakeem

60:11.t: Wa-in faatakum shai'un min azwaajikum ilal kuffaari fa-'aaqabtum fa-aatul lazeena zahabat azwaajuhum misla maaa anfaqoo; wattaqul laahal lazeee antum bihee mu'minoon

60:12.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan nabbiyyu izaa jaaa'akal mu'minaatu yubaayigh'naka 'alaaa al laa yushrikna billaahi shai-'anw Wa-laa yasriqna Wa-laa yazneena Wa-laa yaqtulna awlaadahunna Wa-laa ya'teena bibuhtaanien yaftaree-nahoo baina aydeehinna Wa-arjulihinna Wa-laa ya'seenaka fee ma'roofin fa-baayigh'-hunna wastaghfir lahunnalla hunn allaah; innallaaha ghafoorur raheem

60:13.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena amanoo laa tatawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim qad ya'isoo minal aakhirati kamaa ya'isal kuffaaru min as-haabil quboor

61:1.t: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fis amaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

61:2.t: Yaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo lima taqooloona maa laa taf'aloon

61:3.t: Kabura maqtan 'indal laahi an taqooloo maa laa taf'aloon

61:4.t: Innal laaha yuhibbul lazeena yuqaatiloona fee sabeelihee saffan ka-annahum bunyaanum marsoos

61:5.t: Wa-iz qaala Moosa liqawmihee yaa-qawmi lima tu'zoonanee Wa-qat ta'lamoona annee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum falammaa zaaghooo azaaghal laahu quloobahum; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen

61:6.t: Wa-iz qaala 'Eesab nu Maryama yaa-Banee Israaa'eela innee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum musaddiqal limaa baina yadayya minat Tawraati Wa-mubashshiram bi-Rasooliny yaatee mim ba'dis muhooo Ahmad; falammaa jaaa'ahum bil-baiyinaati qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen

61:7.t: Wa-man azlamu mimma-nif taraa 'alal laahil kaziba Wa-huwa yad'aaa ilal Islaam; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

61:8.t: Yureedoona liyutfi'oo nooral laahi bi-afwaahihim wallaahu mutimmu noorihee Wa-law karihal kaafiroon

61:9.t: Huwal lazee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa Wa-deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullihee Wa-law karihal mushrikoon

61:10.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo hal adullukum 'alaa tijaaratin tunjeekum min 'azaabin aleem

61:11.t: Tu'minoona billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-tujaahidoona fee sabeelil laahi bi-amwaalikum Wa-anfusikum; zaalikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

61:12.t: Yaghfir lakum zunoobakum Wa-yudkhilkum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru Wa-masaakina taiyibatan fee Jannaati 'Adn; zaalikal fawzul 'Azeem

61:13.t: Wa-ukhraa tuhibboonahaa nasrum minal laahi Wa-fat-hun qareeb; Wa-bashshiril mu-'mineen

61:14.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo koonooo ansaaral laahi kamaa qaala 'Eesab nu Maryama lil-Hawaariyyeena man ansaareee ilal laah; qaalal Hawaariyyoona nahnu ansaa-rul laahi fa-aamanat taaa'ifatum mim Bannee Israaa'eela Wa-kafarat taaa'ifatun fa-ayyadnal lazeena aamanoo 'alaa 'aduwwihim fa-asbahoo zaahireen

62:1.t: Yusabbihu lilaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardil Malikil Quddoosil 'Azeezil Hakeem

62:2.t: Huwal lazee ba'asa fil ummiyyeena Rasoolam min-hum yatloo 'alaihim aayaatihee Wa-yuzakkeehim Wa-yu'allimuhumul Kitaaba wal-Hikmata Wa-in kaanoo min qablu lafee dalaalim mubeen

62:3.t: Wa-aakhareena minhum lammaa yalhaqoo bihim Wa-huwal 'azeezul hakeem

62:4.t: Zaalika fadlul laahi yu'teehi many yashaaa; wallaahu zul fadlil 'azeem

62:5.t: Masalul lazeena hum-milut tawraata summa lam yahmiloonhaa kamasalil himaari yah-milu asfaaraa; bi'sa masalul qawmil lazeena kaazzaboo bi-aayaatil laah; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

62:6.t: Qul yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena haadoo in za'amtum annakum awliyaaa'u lilaahi min doonin naasi fatamannawul mawta in kuntum saadiqeen

62:7.t: Wa-laa yatamannaw-nahooo abadam bimaa qaddamat aydeehim; wallaahu 'aleemum biz-zaalimeen

62:8.t: Qul innal mawtal lazee tafirroona minhu fa-innahoo mulaaqeekum summa turaddoona ilaa 'Aalimil Ghaibi wash-shahaadati fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

62:9.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa noodiya lis-Salaati miny yawmil Jumu'ati fas'aw ilaa zikril laahi Wa-zarul bai'; zaalikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

62:10.t: Fa-izaa qudiyatis Salaatu fantashiroo fil ardi wabtaghoo min fadlil laahi wazkurul laaha kaseeral la'allakum tuflihoon

62:11.t: Wa-izaa ra'aw tijaaratan aw lahwanin faddooo ilaihaa Wa-tarakooka qaaa'imaa; qul maa 'indal laahi khairum minal lahwi Wa-minat tijaarah; wallaahu khayrur raaziqeen

63:1.t: Izaa jaaa'akal munaafiqoona qaaloo nashhadu innaka la-rasoolul laah; wallaahu ya'lamu innaka la-rasooluhoo wallaahu yashhadu innal munaafiqeena lakaaziboon

63:2.t: Ittakhazoo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laah; innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon

63:3.t: Zaalika bi-annahum aamanoo summa kafaroo fatubi'a 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yafqahoon

63:4.t: Wa-izaa ra-aytahum tu'jibuka ajsaamuhum Wa-iny yaqooloo tasma' liqawlihim kaannahum khushubum musannadah; yahsaboona kulla saihatin 'alaihim; humul 'aduwwu fahzarhum; qaatalahumul laahu annaa yu'fakoon

63:5.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahum ta'aalaw yastaghfir lakum rasoolul laahi lawwaw ru'oo-sahum Wa-ra-aytahum yasuddoona Wa-hum mustakbiroon

63:6.t: Sawaaa'un 'alaihim as-taghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lany yaghfiral laahu lahum; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen

63:7.t: Humul lazeena yaqooloona laa tunfiqoo 'alaa man inda Rasoolil laahi hatta yanfaddoo; Wa-lillaahi khazaaa'inus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-laakinnal munaafiqeena la yafqahoon

63:8.t: Yaqooloona la'ir raja'naaa ilal madeenati la-yukhrijanal a'azzu minhal azall; Wa-lillaahil 'izzatu Wa-li-Rasoolihee Wa-lilmu'mineena Wa-laakinnal munaafiqeena laa ya'lamoon

63:9.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tulhikum amwaalukum Wa-laa awlaadukum 'anzik ril laah; Wa-mai yaf'al zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

63:10.t: Wa-anifqoo mim maa razaqnaakum min qabli any ya'tiya ahadakumul mawtu fa-yaqoola rabbi law-laaa akhkhartaneee ilaaa ajalin qareebin fa-assaddaqa Wa-akum minas saaliheen

63:11.t: Wa-lany yu-'akhkhiral laahu nafsan izaa jaaa'a ajaluhaa; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

64:1.t: Yusabbihu lillaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi lahul mulku Wa-lahul hamd, Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

64:2.t: Huwal lazee khalaqakum faminkum kaafirunw Wa-min-kum mu'min; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

64:3.t: Khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqqi Wa-sawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum Wa-ilaihil maseer

64:4.t: Ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-ya'lamu maa tusirroona Wa-maa tu'linoon; wallaahu 'Aleemum bizaatis sudoor

64:5.t: Alam ya'tikum naba'ul lazeena kafaroo min qablu fazaaqoo wabaala amrihim Wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem

64:6.t: Zaalika bi-annahoo kaanat ta'teehim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faqaaloo a-basharuny yahdoonanaa fakafaroo Wa-tawallaw; wastaghnal laah; wallaahu ghaniyyun hameed

64:7.t: Za'amal lazeena kafarooo al lany yub'asoo; qul balaa Wa-rabbee latub'asunna summa latunabba'unna bimaa 'amiltum; Wa-zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

64:8.t: Fa-aaminoo billaahi Wa-rasoolihee wannooril lazeee anzalnaa; wallaahu bima ta'maloona khabeer

64:9.t: Yawma yajma'ukum li-yawmil jam'i zaalika yawmut taghaabun; Wa-many yumim billaahi Wa-ya'mal saalihany yukaffir 'anhu sayyi-aatihee Wa-yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa abadaa; zaalikal fawzul 'azeem

64:10.t: Wallazeena kafaroo Wa-kazzaboo bi-aayaaatinaaa ulaaa'ika ashaabun naari khaalideena feehaa Wa-bi'sal maseer

64:11.t: Maaa asaaba mim musee-batin illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-many yu'mim billaahi yahdi qalbah; wallaahu bikulli shai'in Aleem

64:12.t: Wa-atee'ul laaha Wa-atee'ur Rasool; fa-in tawallaitum fa-innamaa 'alaa Rasoolinal balaaghul mubeen

64:13.t: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; Wa-'alal laahi falyata-wakkalil mu'minoon

64:14.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo inna min azwaaji-kum Wa-awlaadikum 'aduwwal lakum fahzaroohum; Wa-in ta'foo Wa-tasfahoo Wa-taghfiroo fa-innal laaha ghafoorur Raheem

64:15.t: Innamaa amwaalukum Wa-awlaadukum fitnah; wallaahu 'indahooo ajrun 'azeem

64:16.t: Fattaqul laaha mas tata'tum wasma'oo Wa-atee'oo Wa-anfiqoo khairal li-anfusikum; Wa-many yooqa shuh-ha nafsihee fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

64:17.t: In tuqridul laaha qardan hasanany yudaaifhu lakum Wa-yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Shakoorun Haleem

65:1.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan nabiyyu izaa tallaqtummun nisaaa'a fatalliqoohunna li'iddatihinna Wa-ahsul iddata wattaqul laaha rabbakum; laa tukhri-joohunna mim bu-yootihinna Wa-laa yakhrujna illaaa any ya'teema bifaahishatim mubaiyinah; Wa-tilka hudoodul laah; Wa-many yata'adda hudoodal laahi faqad zalama nafsah; laa tadree la'allal laaha yuhdisu ba'da zaalika amraa

65:2.t: Fa-izaa balaghna ajalahunna fa-amsikoohunna bima'roofin aw faariqoohunna bima'roofinw Wa-ashhidoo zawai 'adlim minkum Wa-aqeemush shahaadata lillaah; zaalikum yoo'azu bihee man kaana yu'minu billaahi wal-yawmil aakhir; Wa-many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo makhrajaa

65:3.t: Wa-yarzuqhu min haisu laa yahtasib; Wa-many yatawakkal 'alal laahi fahuwa husbuh; innal laaha baalighu amrih; qad ja'alal laahu likulli shai'in qadraa

65:4.t: Wallaaa'ee ya'isna minal maheedi min nisaaa'ikum inir tabtum fa'iddatuhunna salaasatu ashhurinw wallaaa'ee lam yahidn; Wa-ulaatul ahmaali ajaluhunna any yada'na hamlahun; Wa-many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo min amrihee yusraa

65:5.t: Zaalika amrul laahi anzalahoo ilaikum; Wa-many yattaqil laaha yukaffir 'anhu saiyi-aatihee Wa-yu'zim lahoo ajraa

65:6.t: Askinoohunna min haisu sakantum minw wujdikum Wa-laa tudaaarroohunna litudaiyiqoo 'alaihinn; Wa-in kunna ulaati hamlin fa-anfiqoo 'alaihinna hattaa yada'na hamlahunn; fain arda'na lakum fa-aatoo-hunna ujoorahunn; wa'tamiroo bainakum bima'roofinw Wa-in ta'aasartum fasaturdi'u lahooo ukhraa

65:7.t: Liyunfiq zoo sa'atim min sa'atih; Wa-man qudira 'alaihi rizquhoo falyunfiq mimmaaa aataahul laah; laa yukalliful laahu nafsan illaa maaa aataahaa; sa-yaj'alul laahu ba'da 'usriny yusraa

65:8.t: Wa-ka-ayyim min qaryatin 'atat 'an amri Rabbihaa Wa-Rusulihee fahaasabnaahaa hisaaban shadeedanw Wa-'azzabnaahaa 'azaaban nukraa

65:9.t: Fazaaqat wabbala amrihaa Wa-kaana 'aaqibatu amrihaa khusraa

65:10.t: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeedan fattaqul laaha yaaa-ulil albaab, allazeena aammanoo; qad anzalal laahu ilaikum zikraa

65:11.t: Rasoolany yatloo 'alaikum aayaatil laahi mubaiyinaatil liyukhrijal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati minaz zulumaati ilan noor; Wa-many yu'min billaahi Wa-ya'mal saalihany yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa abadaa qad ahsanal laahu lahoo rizqaa

65:12.t: Allaahul lazee khalaq Sab'a Samaawaatinw Wa-minal ardi mislahunna yatanazzalul amru bainahunna lita'lamooo annal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeerunw Wa-annal laaha qad ahaata bikulli shai'in 'ilmaa

66:1.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan nabiyyu lima tuharrimu maaa ahallal laahu laka tabtaghee mardaata azwaajik; wallaahu ghafoorur raheem

66:2.t: Qad faradal laahu lakum tahillata aymaanikum; wallaahu mawlaakum Wa-huwal 'aleemul hakeem

66:3.t: Wa-iz asarran nabiyyu ilaa ba'di azwaajihee hadeesan falammaa nabba-at bihee Wa-azharahul laahu 'alaihi 'arrafa ba'dahoo Wa-a'rada 'am ba'din falammaa nabba-ahaa bihee qaalat man amba-aka haaza qaala nabba-aniyal 'aleemul khabeer

66:4.t: In tatoobaaa ilal laahi faqad saghat quloobukumaa Wa-in tazaaharaa 'alaihi fa-innal laaha huwa mawlaahu Wa-jibreelu Wa-saalihul mu'mineen; wal-malaaa'ikatu ba'da zaalika zaheer

66:5.t: Asaa rabbuhooo in tallaqakunna any yubdilahooo azwaajan khairam minkunna muslimaatim mu'minaatin qaanitaatin taaa'ibaatin 'aabidaatin saaa'ihaatin saiyibaatinw Wa-abkaaraa

66:6.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo qooo anfusakum Wa-ahleekum naaranw waqoodu-han naasu wal-hijaaratu 'alaihaa malaaa'ikatun ghilaazun shidaadul laa ya'soonal laaha maa amarahum Wa-yaf'aloona maa yu'maroon

66:7.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena kafaroo la ta'tazirul yawma innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon

66:8.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo toobooo ilal laahi tawbatan nasoohan 'asaa rabbukum any yukaffira 'ankum sayyi-aatikum Wa-yudkhilakum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru yawma laa yukhzil laahun nabiyya wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo nooruhum yas'aa baina aydeehim Wa-bi-aymaanihim yaqooloona rabbanaaa atmim lanaa nooranaa waghfir lana innaka 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeer

66:9.t: Yaaa-ayyuhan nabiyyu jaahidil kuffaara walmunaa-fiqeena waghluz 'alaihim; Wa-ma'waahum jahannamu Wa-bi'sal maseer

66:10.t: Darabal laahu masalal lillazeena kafarum ra-ata Noohinw wamra-ata Loot, kaanataa tahta 'abdaini min 'ibaadinaa saalihaini fakhaanataahumaa falam yughniyaa 'anhumaa minal laahi shai-anw wa-qeelad khulan naara ma'ad Daakhileen

66:11.t: Wa-darabal laahu masalal lil-lezeena aamanum ra-ata Fir'awn; iz qaalat rab-bib ni lee 'indaka baitan fil jannati Wa-najjinee min Fir'awna Wa-'amalihee Wa-najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen

66:12.t: Wa-Maryamab nata 'Imraanal lateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehee mir roohinaa Wa-saddaqat bi-kalimaati Rabhihaa Wa-Kutubihee wakaanati minal qaaniteen

67:1.t: Tabaarakal lazee biyadihil mulku Wa-huwa 'alaa kulli shai-in qadeer

67:2.t: Allazee khalaqal mawta walhayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; Wa-huwal 'azeezul ghafoor

67:3.t: Allazee khalaqa sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa maa taraa fee khalqir rahmaani min tafaawut farji'il basara hal taraa min futoor

67:4.t: Summar ji'il basara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal basaru khaasi'anw Wa-huwa haseer

67:5.t: Wa-laqad zaiyannas samaaa'ad dunyaa bimasaa-beeha Wa-ja'alnaahaa rujoomal lish-shayaateeni Wa-a'tadnaa lahum 'azaabas sa'eer

67:6.t: Wa-lillazeena kafaroo bi-rabbihim 'azaabu jahannama Wa-bi'sal maseer

67:7.t: Izaaa ulqoo feehaa sami'oo lahaa shaheeqanw Wa-hiya tafoor

67:8.t: Takaadu tamayyazu minal ghaizz kullamaaa ulqiya feehaa fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuhaaa alam ya'tikum nazeer

67:9.t: Qaaloo balaa qad jaaa'anaa nazeerun fakazzabnaa Wa-qulnaa maa nazzalal laahu min shai-in in antum illaa fee dalaalin kabeer

67:10.t: Wa-qaaloo law kunnaa nasma'u aw na'qilu maa kunnaa feee as-haabis sa'eer

67:12.t: Innal lazeena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaibi lahum maghfiratunw Wa-ajrun kabeer

67:13.t: Wa-asirroo qawlakum awij haroo bih; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

67:14.t: Alaa ya'lamu man khalaqa Wa-huwal lateeful khabeer

67:15.t: Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul arda zaloolan famshoo fee manaakibihaa Wa-kuloo mir rizqih; Wa-ilaihin nushoor

67:16.t: A-amintum man fis samaaa'i ai yakhsifa bi-kumul arda fa-izaa hiya tamoor

67:17.t: Am amintum man fis samaaa'i ai yursila 'alaikum haasiba fasata'lamoona kaifa nazeer

67:18.t: Wa-laqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fakaifa kaana nakeer

67:19.t: Awalam yaraw ilat tairi fawqahum saaaffaatinw Wa-yaqbidn; maa yumsikuhunna illaar rahmaan; innahoo bikulli shai-im baseer

67:20.t: Amman haazal lazee huwa jundul lakum yansurukum min doonir rahmaan; inil kaafiroona illaa fee ghuroor

67:21.t: Amman haazal lazee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah; bal lajjoo fee 'utuwwinw Wa-nufoor

67:22.t: Afamai yamshee mukibban 'alaa wajhihee ahdaaa ammany yamshee sawiyyan 'alaa siratim mustaqeem

67:23.t: Qul huwal lazee ansha-akum Wa-ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idata qaleelam maa tashkuroon

67:24.t: Qul huwal lazee zara-akum fil ardi Wa-ilaihi tuhsharoon

67:25.t: Wa-yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

67:26.t: Qul innamal 'ilmu 'indal laahi Wa-innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen

67:27.t: Falaammaa ra-awhu zulfatan seee'at wujoohul lazeena kafaroo Wa-qeela haazal lazee kuntum bihee tadda'oon

67:28.t: Qul ara'aytum in ahlaka-niyal laahu Wa-mam ma'iya aw rahimanaa famai yujeerul kaafireena min 'azaabin aleem

67:29.t: Qul huwar rahmaanu aamannaa bihee Wa-'alaihi tawakkalnaa fasata'lamoona man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen

67:30.t: Qul ara'aytum in asbaha maaa'ukum ghawran famai ya'teekum bimaaa'im ma'een

68:7.t: Innaa Rabbaka Huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee Wa-Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen

68:15.t: Izaa tutlaa 'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaateerul awwaleen

68:17.t: Innaa balawnaahum kamaa balawnaaa As-haabal jannati iz 'aqsamoo la-yasri-munnahaa musbiheen

68:19.t: Fataafa 'alaihaa taaa'i-fum mir rabbika Wa-hum naaa'imoon

68:22.t: Anigh doo 'alaa harsikum in kuntum saarimeen

68:28.t: Qaala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum law-laa tusabbihoon

68:29.t: Qaaloo subhaana rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa zaalimeen

68:32.t: Asaa rabbunaaa any yubdilanaa khairam minhaaa innaaa ilaa rabbinaa raaghiboon

68:33.t: Kazaalikal azaab, Wa-la'azaabul aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

68:39.t: Am lakum aymaanun 'alainaa baalighatun ilaa yawmil qiyaamati inna lakum lamaa tahkumoon

68:41.t: Am lahum shurakaaa'u fal-ya'too bishurakaaa-'ihim in kaanoo saadiqeen

68:42.t: Yawma yukshafu 'am saaqinw Wa-yud'awna ilas sujoodi falaa yastatee'oon

68:43.t: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillatunw Wa-qad kaanoo yud'awna ilas sujoodi Wa-hum saalimoon

68:44.t: Fazarnee Wa-many yukazzibu bihaazal hadeesi sanastad-rijuhum min haisu laa ya'lamoon

68:46.t: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum min maghramin musqaloon

68:48.t: Fasbir lihukmi rabbika Wa-laa takun kasaahibil hoot; iz naadaa Wa-huwa makzoom

68:49.t: Law-laaa an tadaara-kahoo ni'matum mir rabbihee lanubiza bil'araaa'i Wa-huwa mazmoom

68:51.t: Wa-iny yakaadul lazeena kafaroo la-yuzliqoonaka biabsaarihim lammaa sami'uz Zikra Wa-yaqooloona innahoo lamajnoon

69:7.t: Sakkhara-haa 'alaihim sab'a la-yaalinw Wa-samaaniyata ayyaamin husooman fataral qawma feehaa sar'aa ka-annahum a'jaazu nakhlin khaawiyah

69:9.t: Wa-jaaa'a Firawnu Wa-man qablahoo wal-mu'tafikaatu bil-khaati'ah

69:10.t: Fa'asaw Rasoola Rabbihim fa-akhazahum akhzatar raabiyah

69:11.t: Innaa lammaa taghal maaa'u hamalnaakum fil jaariyah

69:12.t: Li-naj'alahaa lakum tazki-ratanw-wa ta'iyahaa uzununw waa'iyah

69:13.t: Fa-izaa nufikha fis soori nafkhatunw waahidah

69:14.t: Wa-humilatil ardu wal-jibaalu fadukkataa dakkatanw waahidah

69:17.t: Wal-malaku 'alaaa arjaaa'ihaa; Wa-yahmilu 'Arsha Rabbika fawqahum yawma'izin samaaniyah

69:18.t: Yawma'izin tu'radoona laa takhfaa min-kum khaafiyah

69:19.t: Fa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenihee fa-yaqoolu haaa'umuq ra'oo kitaabiyah

69:24.t: Kuloo washraboo haneee'am bimaaa aslaftum fil ayyaamil khaliyah

69:25.t: Wa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo bishimaalihee fa-yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam oota kitaaabiyah

69:32.t: Summa fee silsilatin zar'uhaa sab'oona ziraa'an faslukooh

69:41.t: Wa-maa huwa biqawli shaa'ir; qaleelan maa tu'minoon

69:42.t: Wa-laa biqawli kaahin; qaleelan maa tazakkaroon

70:4.t: Ta'rujul malaaa'ikatu war-Roohu ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhoo khamseena alfa sanah

70:11.t: Yubassaroonahum; ya-waddul mujrimu law yaftadee min 'azaabi yawma'izim bibaneeh

70:14.t: Wa-man fil ardi jamee'an summa yunjeeh

70:30.t: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aymaanuhum fa-innahum ghairu maloomeen

70:31.t: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon

70:38.t: Ayatma'u kullum ri'im minhum any yudkhala jannata Na'eem

70:40.t: Falaaa uqsimu bi-Rabbil mashaariqi wal-maghaaribi innaa laqaadiroon

70:41.t: Alaaa an nubaddila khairan minhum Wa-maa nahnu bi-masbooqeen

70:42.t: Fazarhum yakhoodoo Wa-yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo yawma-humul lazee yoo'adoon

70:43.t: Yawma yakhrujoona minal ajdaasi siraa'an ka-anna-hum ilaa nusubiny yoofidoon

70:44.t: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillah; zaalikal yawmul lazee kaanoo yoo'adoon

71:1.t: Innaaa arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee an anzir qawmaka min qabli any yaatiyahum 'azaabun aleem

71:2.t: Qaala yaa-qawmi innee lakum nazeerum mubeen

71:4.t: Yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yu'akhkhirkum ilaaa ajalim musammaa; innaa ajalal laahi izaa jaaa'a laa yu'akhkhar; law kuntum ta'lamoon

71:5.t: Qaala rabbi innee da'awtu qawmee lailanw Wa-naharaa

71:7.t: Wa-inee kullamaa da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'alooo asaabi'ahum fee aazaanihim wastaghshaw siyaabahum Wa-asarroo wastakbarus tikbaaraa

71:9.t: Summaa inneee a'lantu lahum Wa-asrartu lahum israaraa

71:10.t: Faqultus taghfiroo Rabakum innahoo kaana Ghaffaaraa

71:12.t: Wa-yumdidkum bi-am-waalinw Wa-baneena Wa-yaj'al lakum Jannaatinw Wa-yaj'al lakum anhaaraa

71:13.t: Maa lakum laa tarjoona lillaahi waqaaraa

71:15.t: Alam taraw kaifa khalaqal laahu sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa

71:16.t: Wa-ja'alal qamara feehinna nooranw Wa-ja'alash shamsa siraajaa

71:21.t: Qaala Noohur Rabbi innahum 'asawnee wattaba'oo mal lam yazid-hu maaluhoo Wa-waladuhooo illaa khasaara

71:23.t: Wa-qaaloo laa tazarunna aalihatakum Wa-laa tazarunna Waddanw Wa-laa Suwaa'anw Wa-laa Yaghoosa Wa-Ya'ooqa Wa-Nasraa

71:24.t: Wa-qad adalloo kasee-ranw Wa-laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa dalaalaa

71:25.t: Mimmaa khateee'-aatihim ughriqoo fa-udkhiloo Naaran falam yajidoo lahum min doonil laahi ansaaraa

71:26.t: Wa-qaala Noohur Rabbi laa tazar 'alal ardi minal kaafireena daiyaaraa

71:27.t: Innaka in tazarhum yudil-loo 'ibaadaka Wa-laa yalidooo illaa faajiran kaffaaraa

71:28.t: Rabbigh fir lee Wa-liwaa-lidaiya Wa-liman dakhala baitiya mu'minanw Wa-lil-mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati Wa-laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa tabaaraa

72:1.t: Qul oohiya ilaiya annna hustama'a nafarum minal jinni faqaalooo innaa sami'naa quraanan ajaba

72:2.t: Yahdeee ilar rushdi fa-aamannaa bihee Wa-lan nushrika bi-rabbinaaa 'ahada

72:3.t: Wa-annahoo Ta'aalaa jaddu Rabbinaa maat takhaza saahibatanw Wa-laa walada

72:4.t: Wa-annahoo kaana yaqoolu safeehunaa 'al allahi shatata

72:5.t: Wa-annaa zanannaaa al lan taqoolal insu wal-jinnu 'al allahi kaziba

72:6.t: Wa-annahoo kaana rijaalun minal insi ya'oozoona bi-rijaalin minal jinni fa-zaadoohum rahaqa

72:7.t: Wa-annahum zannoo kamaa zanantum al lany yab'asal laahu 'ahada

72:8.t: Wa-annaa lamasnas samaaa'a fa-wajadnaahaa muli'at harasan shadeedanw Wa-shuhuba

72:9.t: Wa-annaa kunnaa naq'udu minhaa maqaa'ida lis'sam'i famany yastami'il 'aana yajid lahoo shihaabar rasada

72:10.t: Wa-annaa laa nadreee asharrun ureeda biman fil ardi 'am 'araada bihim rabbuhum rashada

72:11.t: Wa-annaa minnas saalihoona Wa-minnaa doona zaalika kunnaa taraaa'iqa qidada

72:12.t: Wa-annaa zanan-naaa al lan nu'jizal laaha fil ardi Wa-lan nu'jizahoo haraba

72:13.t: Wa-annaa lammaa sami'nal hudaaa aamannaa bihee famany yu'min bi-rabbihee falaa yakhaafu bakhsanw Wa-laa rahaqa

72:14.t: Wa-annaa minnal muslimoona Wa-minnal qaasitoona faman aslama fa-ulaaa'ika taharraw rashada

72:16.t: Wa-alla-wis taqaamoo 'alat tareeqati la-asqaynaahum maa'an ghadaqa

72:17.t: Linaftinahum feeh; Wa-many yu'rid 'an zikri rabbihee yasluk-hu 'azaaban sa'ada

72:18.t: Wa-annal masaajida lil-laahi falaa tad'oo ma'al laahi 'ahada

72:19.t: Wa-annahoo lammaa qaama 'abdul laahi yad'oohu kaadoo yakoonoona 'alaihi libada

72:20.t: Qul innamaaa ad'oo rabbee Wa-laaa ushriku biheee 'ahada

72:21.t: Qul innee laaa amliku lakum darranw Wa-laa rashada

72:22.t: Qul innee lany yujeeranee minal laahi 'ahadunw, Wa-lan ajida min doonihee multahada

72:23.t: Illaa balaagham minal laahi Wa-risaalaatih; Wa-many ya'sil laaha Wa-rasoolahoo fa-inna lahoo naara jahannama khaalideena feehaaa 'abada

72:24.t: Hattaaa izaa ra-aw maa yoo'adoona fasaya'lamoona man ad'afu naasiranw Wa-aqallu 'adada

72:25.t: Qul in adreee a-qareebum maa too'adoona am yaj'alu lahoo rabbeee 'amada

72:26.t: Aalimul ghaibi falaa yuzhiru alaa ghaibiheee 'ahada

72:27.t: Illaa manir tadaa mir rasoolin fa-innahoo yasluku min baini yadaihi Wa-min khalfihee rasada

72:28.t: Liya'lama an qad ablaghoo risaalaati rabbihim Wa-ahaata bi-maa ladaihim Wa-ahsaa kulla shai'in 'adada

73:6.t: Inn naashi'atal laili hiya ashadddu wat-anw Wa-aqwamu qeelaa

73:7.t: Inna laka fin nahaari sabhan taweelaa

73:8.t: Wazkuris ma rabbika Wa-tabattal ilaihi tabteelaa

73:9.t: Rabbul mashriqi wal-maghriibi laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fattakhizhu wakeelaa

73:10.t: Wasbir 'alaa maa yaqoo-loona wahjurhum hajran jameelaa

73:11.t: Wa-zarnee walmukaz-zibeena ulin na'mati Wa-mahhilhum qaleelaa

73:14.t: Yawma tarjuful ardu waljibaalu Wa-kaanatil jibaalu kaseebam maheelaa

73:15.t: Innaa arsalnaaa ilaikum rasoolan shaahidan 'aleykum kamaaa arsalnaaa ilaa Fir'awna rasoolaa

73:16.t: Fa'asaa Fir'awnur Rasoola fa-akhaznaahu akhzanw wabeelaa

73:17.t: Fakaifa tattaqoona in kafartum yawmany yaj'alul wildaana sheeba

73:18.t: Assamaaa'u munfatirum bih; kaana wa'duhoo maf'oola

73:19.t: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa-man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa

73:20.t: Inna Rabbaka ya'lamu annaka taqoomu adnaa min sulusa-yil laili Wa-nisfahoo Wa-sulusahoo Wa-taaa'ifatum minal lazeena ma'ak; wal-laahu yuqaddirul laila wanna-haar; 'alima al lan tuhsoohu fataaba 'alaikum faqra'oo maa tayassara minal quraan; 'alima an sa-yakoonu minkum mardaa Wa-aakharoona yadriboona fil ardi yabtaghoona min fadlil laahi Wa-aakharoona yuqaatiloona fee sabeelil laahi faqra'oo ma tayassara minhu Wa-aqeemus salaata Wa-aatuz zakaata Wa-aqridul laaha qardan hasanaa; Wa-maa tuqadimoo li-anfusikum min khairin tajidoohu 'indal laahi huwa khayranw Wa-a'zama ajraa; wastaghfirul laahaa innal laaha ghafoorur raheem.

74:24.t: Faqaala in haazaaa illaa sihruny yu'sar

74:31.t: Wa-maa ja'alnaaa As-haaban naari illaa malaaa-'ikatanw Wa-maa ja'alnaa 'iddatahum illaa fitnatal lillazeena kafaroo liyastaiqinal lazeena ootul kitaaba Wa-yazdaadal lazeena aamanooo eemaananw Wa-laa yartaabal lazeena ootul kitaaba walmu'minoona Wa-liyaqoolal lazeena fee quloo-bihim maradunw walkaafiroona maazaaa araadal laahu bihaazaa masalaa; kazaalika yudillul laahu mai yashaaa'u Wa-yahdee mai yashaaa'; Wa-maa ya'lamu junooda rabbika illaa hoo; Wa-maa hiya illaa zikraa lil-bashar

74:37.t: Liman shaaa'a minkum any yataqaddama aw yata-akhkhar

74:52.t: Bal yureedu kullum ri'im minhum any yu'taa suhufam munashsharah

74:56.t: Wa-maa yazkuroona illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; Huwa ahlut taqwaa Wa-ahlul maghfirah

75:13.t: Yunabba-'ul insaanu yawma-'izim bimaa qaddama Wa-akhkhar

75:16.t: Laa tuharrik bihee lisaa-naka lita'jala bih

75:37.t: Alam yaku nutfatam mim maniyyiny yumnaa

75:40.t: Alaisa zaalika biqaadirin 'alaaa any yuhyiyal mawtaa

76:1.t: Hal ataa 'alal insaani heenum minad dahri lam yakun shai'am mazkooraa

76:2.t: Innaa khalaqnal insaana min nutfatin amshaajin nabta-leehi faja'alnaahu samee'am baseeraa

76:3.t: Innaa hadainaahus sabeela immaa shaakiranw Wa-immaa kafoora

76:4.t: Innaaa a'tadnaa lilkaa-fireena salaasila Wa-aghlaalanw Wa-sa'eeraa

76:5.t: Innal abraara yashra-boona min kaasin kaana mizaa-juhaa kaafooraa

76:6.t: Aynany yashrabu bihaa 'ibaadul laahi yufajjiroonahaa tafjeeraa

76:7.t: Yoofoona binnazri Wa-yakhaafoona yawman kaana sharruhoo mustateeraa

76:8.t: Wa-yut'imoonat ta'aama 'alaa hubbihee miskeenanw Wa-yateemanw Wa-aseeraa

76:9.t: Innaamaa nut'imukum li-wajhil laahi laa nureedu minkum jazaaa'anw Wa-laa shukooraa

76:10.t: Innaa nakhaafu mir Rabbinna Yawman 'aboosan qamtareeraa

76:11.t: Fa-waqaahumul laahu sharra zaalikal yawmi Wa-laqqaahum nadratanw Wa-surooraa

76:13.t: Muttaki'eena feeha 'alal araaa-'iki laa yarawna feehaa shamsanw Wa-laa zamhareeraa

76:15.t: Wa-yutaafu 'alaihim bi-aaniyatim min fiddatinw Wa-akwaabin kaanat qawaareeraa

76:17.t: Wa-yuskawna feehaa kaasan kaana mizaajuhaa zanjabeelaa

76:19.t: Wa-yatoofu 'alaihim wildaanum mukhalladoona izaa ra-aytahum hasibtahum lu'lu-'am mansoora

76:20.t: Wa-izaa ra-ayta samma ra-ayta na'eemanw Wa-mulkan kabeera

76:21.t: Aaliyahum siyaabu sundusin khudrunw Wa-istabraq, Wa-hullooo asaawira min fiddatinw Wa-saqaahum Rabbuhum sharaaban tahooraa

76:22.t: Innaa haazaa kaana lakum jazz-'anw Wa-kaana sa'yukum mashkooraa

76:24.t: Fasbir lihukmi Rabbika Wa-laa tuti' minhum aasiman aw kafooraa

76:26.t: Wa-minal laili fasjud lahoo Wa-sabbihhu lailan taweelaa

76:27.t: Inna haaa'ulaa'i yuhibboona 'aajilata Wa-yazaroona waraaa'ahum yawman saqeelaa

76:28.t: Nahnu khalaqnaahum Wa-shadadnaaa asrahum Wa-izaa shi'naa baddalnaaa amsaala-hum tabdeelaa

76:29.t: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa-man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa rabbihee sabeela

76:30.t: Wa-maa tashaaa'oona illaa any yashaaa'al laah; innal laahaa kaana 'Aleeman Hakeema

76:31.t: Yudkhilu mai yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; wazzaalimeena a'adda lahum 'azaaban aleemaa

77:27.t: Wa-ja'alnaa feehaa rawaasiya shaamikhaatinw Wa-asqainaakum maaa'an furaataa

77:29.t: Intaliqooo ilaa maa kuntum bihee tukazziboon

77:30.t: Intaliqooo ilaa zillin zee salaasi shu'ab

77:31.t: Laa zaleelinw Wa-laa yughnee minal lahab

77:43.t: Kuloo washraboo haneee-'am bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

77:48.t: Wa-izaa qeela lahumur ka'oo laa yarka'oon

78:18.t: Yauma yun-fakhu fis soori fataa-toona afwaaja

78:24.t: Laa ya-zooqoona feeha bar-daw walaa sharaaba

78:35.t: Laa yasma'oona fiha lagh-waw walaa kizzaba

78:37.t: Rabbis samaa-waati wal-ardi Wa-maa baina-humar rahmaani laa yam-likoona minhu khitaaba

78:38.t: Yauma yaqoo-mur roohu wal-malaa-ikatu saf-fal laa yatakallamoona ill-laa man azina lahur rahmaanu Wa-qaala sawaaba

78:39.t: Zaalikal yaumul haqqu faman shaa-at ta-khaaza ill-laa rabbihi ma-aaba

78:40.t: In-naa anzar-naakum azaaban qareebaiy yauma yan-zurul marr-u maa qaddamat yadaahu Wa-ya-qoolul kaafiru yaa-lai-tanee kuntu turaaba

79:16.t: Iz nadaahu rabbuhu bil-waadil muqad-dasi tuwa

79:18.t: Faqul hal laka ilaa an tazakka

79:26.t: Inna fee zaalika la'ibratal limaiy yaksha

79:27.t: A-antum a-shaddu khalqan amis samaa-u banaaha

79:40.t: Wa-ammaa man khaafa maqaama Rabbihee Wa-nahan nafsa 'anil hawaa

79:46.t: Ka-annahum Yawma yarawnahaa lam yalbasooo illaa 'ashiyyatan aw duhaahaa

80:37.t: Likul limri-im minhum yawmaa-izin shaa-nuy yughneeh

81:29.t: Wa-maa tashaaa'oona illaaa ai yashaaa-'al laahu Rabbul 'Aalameen

82:6.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal insaaanu maa gharraka bi-Rabbikal kareem

82:8.t: Feee ayye sooratim maa shaaa'a rakkabak

82:18.t: Summa maaa adraaka maa Yawmud Deen

82:19.t: Yawma laa tamliku nafsul linafsin shai'anw walamru yawma'izil lillaah

83:7.t: Kallaaa inna kitaabal fujjaari lafee Sijjeen

83:12.t: Wa-maa yukazzibu biheee illaa kullu mu'tadin aseem

83:13.t: Izaa tutlaa 'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaateerul awwaleen

83:14.t: Kallaa bal raana 'alaa quloobihim maa kaanoo yaksiboon

83:17.t: Summa yuqaalu haazal lazee kuntum bihee tukazziboon

83:18.t: Kallaaa inna kitaabal abraari lafee'il liyyeen

83:26.t: Khitaamuhoo misk; Wa-fee zaalika falyatanaafasil Mutanaafisoon

83:29.t: Innal lazeena ajramoo kaanoo minal lazeena aamanoo yadhakoon

83:31.t: Wa-izan qalabooo ilaaa ahlihimun qalaboo fakiheen

83:32.t: Wa-izaa ra-awhum qaalooo inna haaa'ulaaa'i ladaaal-loon

83:34.t: Fal-yawmal lazeena aamanoo minal kuffaari yadhakoon

83:36.t: Hal suwwibal kuffaaru maa kaanoo yaf'aloon

84:6.t: Yaaa-ayyuhal insaanu innaka kaadihun ilaa Rabbika kad-han famulaaqeeh

84:10.t: Wa-ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo waraaa'a zahrih

84:15.t: Balaaa inna Rabbahoo kaana bihee baseeraa

84:25.t: Illal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon

85:8.t: Wa-maa naqamoo minhum illaaa ai yu'minoo billaahil 'azeezil Hameed

85:9.t: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai-'in Shaheed

85:10.t: Innal lazeena fatanul mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati summa lam yatooboo falahum 'azaabu Jahannama Wa-lahum 'azaabul hareeq

85:11.t: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lahum Jannaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; zaalikal fawzul kabeer

86:10.t: Famaa lahoo min quwwatinw Wa-laa naasir

87:7.t: Illaa maa shaaa'al laah; innahoo ya'lamul jahra Wa-maa yakhfaa

87:13.t: Summa laa yamootu feehaa Wa-laa yahyaa

88:6.t: Laisa lahum ta'aamun illaa min daree'

88:7.t: Laa yusminu Wa-laa yughnee min joo'

88:17.t: Afalaa yanzuroona ilal ibili kaifa khuliqat

89:5.t: Hal fee zaalika qasamul lizee hijr

89:6.t: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi'aad

89:8.t: Allatee lam yukhlaq misluhaa fil bilaad

89:15.t: Fa-ammal insaanu izaa mab talaahu Rabbuhoo fa-akramahoo Wa-na'-'amahoo fa-yaqoolu Rabbeee akraman

89:16.t: Wa-ammaaa izaa mab talaahu faqadara 'alaihi rizqahoo fa-yaqoolu Rabbeee ahaanan

89:21.t: Kallaaa izaaa dukkatil ardu dakkan dakka

89:23.t: Wa-jeee'a yawma'izim bi-jahannnam; Yawma-'iziny yatazakkarul insaanu Wa-annaa lahuz zikraa

90:14.t: Aw it'aamun fee yawmin zee masghabah

90:17.t: Summa kaana minal lazeena aamanoo Wa-tawaasaw bissabri Wa-tawaasaw bilmarhamah

90:19.t: Wallazeena kafaroo bi-aayaatinaa hum as-haabul Mash'amah

91:13.t: Faqaala lahum Rasoolul laahi naaqatal laahi Wa-suqiyaahaa

91:14.t: Fakazzaboohu fa'aqaroohaa fadamdama 'alaihim Rabbuhum bizambihim fasaw-waahaa

95:4.t: Laqad khalaqnal insaana fee ahsani taqweem

95:6.t: Ill-lal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati; falahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon

96:15.t: Kalla la-il lam yantahi la-nasfa'am bin-nasiyah

97:3.t: Lailatul qadri khairum min alfee shahr

97:4.t: Tanaz-zalul malaa-ikatu war-roohu feeha bi-izni rab-bihim min kulli amr

98:1.t: Lam ya-kunil lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal-mushri-keena mun-fak-keena hattaa ta-tiya-humul bayyinah

98:2.t: Rasoolum minal laahi yatlu suhufam mutahharah

98:4.t: Wa-maa tafarraqal lazeena ootul kitaaba il-la mim b'adi ma jaa-at-humul baiyyinah

98:5.t: Wa-maa umiroo il-la liy'abu-dul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena huna-faa-a Wa-yuqeemus salaata Wa-yu-tuz zakaata; Wa-zaalika deenul qaiyimah

98:6.t: Innal lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal-mushri-keena fee nari jahan-nama khaali-deena feeha; ulaa-ika hum shar-rul ba-reeyah

98:7.t: Innal lazeena aamanu Wa-'amilus saalihaati ula-ika hum khairul bareey-yah

98:8.t: Jazaa-uhum inda rabbihim jan-naatu 'adnin tajree min tahtihal an-haaru khalideena feeha abada; radiy yallaahu 'anhum Wa-ra-du 'an zaalika liman khashiya rabbah

99:6.t: Yawma-iziny yas-durun naasu ash-tatal liyuraw a'maalahum

99:7.t: Famaiy ya'mal mithqala zarratin khai-raiy yarah

99:8.t: Wa-maiy y'amal mithqala zarratin sharraiy yarah

100:9.t: Afala ya'lamu iza b'uthira ma fil quboor

103:3.t: Illal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-tawaasaw bilhaqq; Wa-tawaasaw bissabr

105:1.t: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi-ashaabil feel

106:4.t: Allazeee at'amahum min joo'inw wa-aamanahum min khawf

110:2.t: Wa-ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajaa

110:3.t: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfirh, innahoo kaana tawwaaba
